###This is only for reducing error log clutter, since the events folder is overwritten entirely for EaW###
###ABY###
add_namespace = abyssinia
add_namespace = abyssinia_news

news_event = {
	id = abyssinia_news.1
	immediate = {log = "[Root.GetName]: event abyssinia_news.1"}#Auto-logging
	title = abyssinia_news.1.t
	desc = abyssinia_news.1.d
	picture = GFX_news_event_generic_pony_diplomacy
	major = yes
	is_triggered_only = yes
	option = {
		name = abyssinia_news.1.a
		trigger = {
			tag = MDL
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = abyssinia_news.1.b
		trigger = {
			OR = {
				original_tag = ABY
				original_tag = MGY
			}
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = abyssinia_news.1.c
		trigger = {
			NOT = {
				original_tag = MDL
				original_tag = ABY
				original_tag = MGY
			}
		}
	}
}
news_event = {
	id = abyssinia_news.2
	immediate = {log = "[Root.GetName]: event abyssinia_news.2"}#Auto-logging
	title = abyssinia_news.2.t
	desc = {
		text = abyssinia_news.2.d_owns_katren
		trigger = {
			WNG = {
				owns_state = 1200
			}
		}
	}
	desc = {
		text = abyssinia_news.2.d_dont_own_katren
		trigger = {
			WNG = {
				NOT = {
					owns_state = 1200
				}
			}
		}
	}
	picture = GFX_news_abyssinian_troops
	major = yes
	is_triggered_only = yes
	option = {
		name = abyssinia_news.2.a
		trigger = {
			original_tag = ABY
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = abyssinia_news.2.b
		trigger = {
			original_tag = WNG
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = abyssinia_news.2.c
		trigger = {
			NOT = {
				original_tag = ABY
				original_tag = WNG
			}
		}
	}
}

		}
	}
	option = {
		name = abyssinia_news.3.b
		trigger = {
			owns_state = 1200
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = abyssinia_news.3.c
		trigger = {
			NOT = {
				original_tag = ABY
				owns_state = 1200
			}
		}
	}
}
news_event = {
	id = abyssinia_news.4
	immediate = {
		log = "[Root.GetName]: event abyssinia_news.4"#Auto-logging
		FROM.FROM = { save_event_target_as = the_other_manedalusia_owner }
	}
	title = abyssinia_news.4.t
	desc = abyssinia_news.4.d
	picture = GFX_news_event_generic_pony_diplomacy
	major = yes
	is_triggered_only = yes
	option = {
		name = abyssinia_news.4.a
		trigger = {
			tag = MDL
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = abyssinia_news.4.b
		trigger = {
			OR = {
				original_tag = ABY
				tag = event_target:the_other_manedalusia_owner
			}
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = abyssinia_news.4.c
		trigger = {
			NOT = {
				original_tag = MDL
				original_tag = ABY
				tag = event_target:the_other_manedalusia_owner
			}
		}
	}
}

country_event = { #Starting event
	id = abyssinia.1
	immediate = {log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event abyssinia.1"}
	title = abyssinia.1.t
	desc = abyssinia.1.d
	picture = GFX_event_stormlands_portrait
	is_triggered_only = yes

	trigger = {
		NOT = { has_global_flag = katztime }
	}

	option = {
		name = abyssinia.1.a

		country_event = abyssinia.2
	}
}
country_event = { #Second event
	id = abyssinia.2
	immediate = {log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event abyssinia.2"}
	title = abyssinia.2.t
	desc = abyssinia.2.d
	picture = GFX_event_zebrica_1
	is_triggered_only = yes

	option = {
		name = abyssinia.2.a

		country_event = abyssinia.3
	}
}
country_event = { #Third event wow these comments are very detailed and insightful
	id = abyssinia.3
	immediate = {log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event abyssinia.3"}
	title = abyssinia.3.t
	desc = abyssinia.3.d
	picture = GFX_event_zebrica_1
	is_triggered_only = yes

	option = {
		name = abyssinia.3.a
		hidden_effect = {
			country_event = { id = abyssinia.4 days = 4 }
		}
		ai_chance = {
			base = 1
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				OR = {
					AND = {
						is_historical_focus_on = yes
						has_game_rule = {
							rule = ABY_ai_behavior
							option = DEFAULT
						}
					}
					has_country_flag = ABY_AI_HISTORICAL
					has_game_rule = {
						rule = ABY_ai_behavior
						option = HISTORICAL
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = abyssinia.3.b
		hidden_effect = {
			set_country_flag = ABY_seeking_help
			country_event = { id = abyssinia.4 days = 4 }
		}
		ai_chance = {
			base = 3
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				OR = {
					has_country_flag = ABY_AI_COMMUNIST
					has_game_rule = {
						rule = ABY_ai_behavior
						option = ABY_COMMUNIST_ALTERNATE
					}
					has_country_flag = ABY_AI_FASCIST
					has_game_rule = {
						rule = ABY_ai_behavior
						option = ABY_FASCIST_ALTERNATE
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}
}
country_event = { #Meeting of the aristocats
	id = abyssinia.4
	immediate = {log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event abyssinia.4"}
	title = abyssinia.4.t
	desc = abyssinia.4.d
	picture = GFX_event_catrina
	is_triggered_only = yes

	option = {
		name = abyssinia.4.a
		add_popularity = { ideology = fascism popularity = 0.05 }
		hidden_effect = {
			if = {
				limit = {
					has_country_flag = ABY_seeking_help
				}
				country_event = { id = abyssinia.5 days = 4 }
			}
			else = {
				country_event = { id = abyssinia.6 days = 8 }
			}
		}

	}
}
country_event = { #Pick your poison
	id = abyssinia.5
	immediate = {log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event abyssinia.5"}
	title = abyssinia.5.t
	desc = abyssinia.5.d
	picture = GFX_event_zebrica_1
	is_triggered_only = yes

	option = {
		name = abyssinia.5.a
		set_country_flag = ABY_doctor_option
		hidden_effect = {
			country_event = { id = abyssinia.6 days = 4 }
		}
		ai_chance = {
			base = 1
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				OR = {
					AND = {
						is_historical_focus_on = yes
						has_game_rule = {
							rule = ABY_ai_behavior
							option = DEFAULT
						}
					}
					has_country_flag = ABY_AI_HISTORICAL
					has_game_rule = {
						rule = ABY_ai_behavior
						option = HISTORICAL
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = abyssinia.5.b
		set_country_flag = ABY_king_absent
		hidden_effect = {
			country_event = { id = abyssinia.6 days = 4 }
		}
		ai_chance = {
			base = 2
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				OR = {
					has_country_flag = ABY_AI_COMMUNIST
					has_game_rule = {
						rule = ABY_ai_behavior
						option = ABY_COMMUNIST_ALTERNATE
					}
					has_country_flag = ABY_AI_FASCIST
					has_game_rule = {
						rule = ABY_ai_behavior
						option = ABY_FASCIST_ALTERNATE
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = abyssinia.5.c
		set_country_flag = ABY_family_option
		hidden_effect = {
			country_event = { id = abyssinia.6 days = 4 }
		}
		ai_chance = {
			base = 1
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				OR = {
					AND = {
						is_historical_focus_on = yes
						has_game_rule = {
							rule = ABY_ai_behavior
							option = DEFAULT
						}
					}
					has_country_flag = ABY_AI_HISTORICAL
					has_game_rule = {
						rule = ABY_ai_behavior
						option = HISTORICAL
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}
}
country_event = { #Blackmail material
	id = abyssinia.6
	immediate = {log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event abyssinia.6"}
	title = abyssinia.6.t
	desc = abyssinia.6.d
	picture = GFX_event_catrina
	is_triggered_only = yes

	option = {
		name = abyssinia.6.a
		set_country_flag = ABY_blackmail
		ABY_sourpuss_dejen = {
			set_character_flag = ABY_betrayal
		}
		hidden_effect = {
			if = {
				limit = {
					has_country_flag = ABY_doctor_option
				}
				country_event = { id = abyssinia.7 days = 4 }
			}
			else_if = {
				limit = {
					has_country_flag = ABY_king_absent
				}
				country_event = { id = abyssinia.8 days = 4 }
			}
			else_if = {
				limit = {
					has_country_flag = ABY_family_option
				}
				country_event = { id = abyssinia.9 days = 4 }
			}
			else = {
				country_event = { id = abyssinia.10 days = 5 }
			}
		}
		ai_chance = {
			base = 1
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				OR = {
					AND = {
						is_historical_focus_on = yes
						has_game_rule = {
							rule = ABY_ai_behavior
							option = DEFAULT
						}
					}
					has_country_flag = ABY_AI_HISTORICAL
					has_game_rule = {
						rule = ABY_ai_behavior
						option = HISTORICAL
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = abyssinia.6.b
		hidden_effect = {
			if = {
				limit = {
					has_country_flag = ABY_doctor_option
				}
				country_event = { id = abyssinia.7 days = 4 }
			}
			else_if = {
				limit = {
					has_country_flag = ABY_king_absent
				}
				country_event = { id = abyssinia.8 days = 4 }
			}
			else_if = {
				limit = {
					has_country_flag = ABY_family_option
				}
				country_event = { id = abyssinia.9 days = 4 }
			}
			else = {
				country_event = { id = abyssinia.10 days = 8 }
			}
		}
		ai_chance = {
			base = 3
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				OR = {
					has_country_flag = ABY_AI_COMMUNIST
					has_game_rule = {
						rule = ABY_ai_behavior
						option = ABY_COMMUNIST_ALTERNATE
					}
					has_country_flag = ABY_AI_FASCIST
					has_game_rule = {
						rule = ABY_ai_behavior
						option = ABY_FASCIST_ALTERNATE
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}
}
country_event = { #Oh wow they didnt actually understand depression in the 1900s thats crazy
	id = abyssinia.7
	immediate = {log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event abyssinia.7"}
	title = abyssinia.7.t
	desc = abyssinia.7.d
	picture = GFX_event_zebrica_1
	trigger = {
		NOT = {
			has_country_flag = ABY_its_joever
		}
		NOT = {
			has_country_flag = ABY_maybe_its_joever
		}
	}
	is_triggered_only = yes

	option = {
		trigger = {
			NOT = {
				has_country_flag = ABY_family_option
			}
		}
		name = abyssinia.7.a
		set_country_flag = ABY_family_option
		hidden_effect = {
			country_event = { id = abyssinia.10 days = 1 }
			#country_event = { id = abyssinia.9 days = 8 }
		}
		ai_chance = {
			base = 1

		}
	}
	option = {
		name = abyssinia.7.b
		hidden_effect = {
			country_event = { id = abyssinia.10 days = 1 }
			#country_event = { id = abyssinia.8 days = 8 }
		}
		ai_chance = {
			base = 2
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				OR = {
					has_country_flag = ABY_AI_COMMUNIST
					has_game_rule = {
						rule = ABY_ai_behavior
						option = ABY_COMMUNIST_ALTERNATE
					}
					has_country_flag = ABY_AI_FASCIST
					has_game_rule = {
						rule = ABY_ai_behavior
						option = ABY_FASCIST_ALTERNATE
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}
}
country_event = { #Kids suck
	id = abyssinia.8
	immediate = {log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event abyssinia.8"}
	title = abyssinia.8.t
	desc = abyssinia.8.d
	picture = GFX_event_green_mountain
	trigger = {
		NOT = {
			has_country_flag = ABY_its_joever
		}
		NOT = {
			has_country_flag = ABY_maybe_its_joever
		}
	}
	is_triggered_only = yes

	option = {
		name = abyssinia.8.a
		if = {
			limit = {
				NOT = {
					has_country_flag = ABY_king_absent
				}
			}
			set_country_flag = ABY_king_absent
		}
		hidden_effect = {
			if = {
				limit = {
					has_country_flag = ABY_speech_held
				}
				set_country_flag = ABY_delayed_vacation
				country_event = { id = abyssinia.15 days = 4 }
			}
			else = {
				country_event = { id = abyssinia.10 days = 1 }
			}
			#country_event = { id = abyssinia.14 days = 8 }
		}
	}
}

country_event = { #"The reason you suck"-speech OMG IS THAT A TVTROPES REFERENCE
	id = abyssinia.10
	immediate = {log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event abyssinia.10"}
	title = abyssinia.10.t
	desc = {
		text = abyssinia.10.d_present_and_no_blackmail
		trigger = {
			NOT = {
				has_country_flag = ABY_king_absent
			}
			NOT = {
				has_country_flag = ABY_blackmail
			}
		}
	}
	desc = {
		text = abyssinia.10.d_present_and_blackmail
		trigger = {
			NOT = {
				has_country_flag = ABY_king_absent
			}
			has_country_flag = ABY_blackmail
		}
	}
	desc = {
		text = abyssinia.10.d_not_present
		trigger = { has_country_flag = ABY_king_absent }
	}
	picture = GFX_event_catrina
	is_triggered_only = yes
	fire_only_once = yes
	option = {
		trigger = {
			NOT = {
				has_country_flag = ABY_king_absent
			}
			NOT = {
				has_country_flag = ABY_blackmail
			}
		}
		name = abyssinia.10.a
		set_country_flag = ABY_speech_held
		set_country_flag = ABY_maybe_its_joever
		hidden_effect = {
			country_event = { id = abyssinia.12 days = 4 }
		}
	}
	option = {
		trigger = {
			NOT = {
				has_country_flag = ABY_king_absent
			}
			has_country_flag = ABY_blackmail
		}
		name = abyssinia.10.b
		set_country_flag = ABY_speech_held
		set_country_flag = ABY_its_joever
		hidden_effect = {
			country_event = { id = abyssinia.12 days = 4 }
		}
	}
	option = {
		trigger = {
			has_country_flag = ABY_king_absent
		}
		name = abyssinia.10.c
		set_country_flag = ABY_speech_held
		hidden_effect = {
			country_event = { id = abyssinia.14 days = 4 }
			#country_event = { id = abyssinia.15 days = 8 }
		}
	}
}
country_event = { #New year flavor event
	id = abyssinia.11
	immediate = {log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event abyssinia.11"}
	title = abyssinia.11.t
	desc = abyssinia.11.d
	picture = GFX_event_green_mountain
	is_triggered_only = yes

	option = {
		name = abyssinia.11.a
		add_stability = 0.05
		add_political_power = 25
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_country_flag = ABY_mental_stab_enabled
				OR = {
					has_government = neutrality
					has_government = democratic
				}
			}
			ABY_mental_stab_add_1 = yes
		}
	}
}

		}
		name = abyssinia.12.a

				factor = 0

					has_country_flag = ABY_AI_COMMUNIST

						rule = ABY_ai_behavior
						option = ABY_COMMUNIST_ALTERNATE
					}
					has_country_flag = ABY_AI_FASCIST
					has_game_rule = {
						rule = ABY_ai_behavior
						option = ABY_FASCIST_ALTERNATE
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = abyssinia.12.b
		hidden_effect = {
			country_event = { id = abyssinia.13 days = 8 }
		}
		ai_chance = {
			base = 1
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				OR = {
					AND = {
						is_historical_focus_on = yes
						has_game_rule = {
							rule = ABY_ai_behavior
							option = DEFAULT
						}
					}
					has_country_flag = ABY_AI_HISTORICAL
					has_game_rule = {
						rule = ABY_ai_behavior
						option = HISTORICAL
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}

		}

			ideology = conservatism
		}

			character = ABY_queen_morticia

				expire = "1965.1.1"

					popular_queen
				}
			}

				country_event = { id = abyssinia.37 days = 175 }
			}
		}
	}

			character = ABY_taile_sehissie_clawomonid
			traits = { cat_race_trait substance_abuser defensive_doctrine organisational_leader }
			skill = 2
			attack_skill = 1
			defense_skill = 2
			planning_skill = 2
			logistics_skill = 2
			visible = {
				NOT = {
					has_country_flag = ABY_gomez_absent
				}
				OR = {
					has_government = neutrality
					has_government = democratic
				}
			}
		}
		custom_effect_tooltip = ABY_taile_sehissie_clawomonid_stats
		add_political_power = 100
		unlock_decision_category_tooltip = ABY_mental_stability_category
		set_country_flag = ABY_mental_stab_enabled
		set_variable = {
			var = ABY_gomez_mental_stability
			value = 35
		}
		set_variable = {
			var = ABY_stability_reduction
			value = 1
		}
		set_power_balance = {
			id = ABY_neutral_harmony
			left_side = neutrality_left_side
			right_side = harmony_right_side
			set_value = -0.85
		}
		effect_tooltip = {
			swap_ruler_traits = { remove = ABY_melancholic add = ABY_slightly_less_melancholic }
		}
		remove_ideas = ABY_paralyzed_leadership
		activate_advisor = ABY_queen_morticia
		activate_advisor = ABY_sourpuss_dejen
		hidden_effect = {
			ABY_taile_sehissie_clawomonid = {
			 swap_country_leader_traits = { remove = ABY_melancholic add = ABY_slightly_less_melancholic ideology = conservatism }
			 swap_country_leader_traits = { remove = ABY_melancholic add = ABY_slightly_less_melancholic ideology = harmonic_constitutionalism }
			 swap_country_leader_traits = { remove = ABY_melancholic add = ABY_slightly_less_melancholic ideology = despotism }
			}
		}
	}

			}

		trigger = {

		}

		}
	}

	trigger = {

		is_subject = no

				has_government = fascism
			}

			custom_effect_tooltip = ABY_retard_alert

			}
			damage_building = {
				type = industrial_complex
				damage = 1
			}
			damage_building = {
				type = infrastructure
				damage = 1
			}
			add_dynamic_modifier = {
				modifier = ABY_slave_controlled_state
			}
		}
		hidden_effect = {
			if = {
				limit = {
					OR = {
						has_government = neutrality
						has_government = democratic
					}
				}
				country_event = { id = abyssinia.66 days = 200 }
			}
		}
	}

				has_government = neutrality
				has_government = democratic
			}

				has_country_flag = ABY_gomez_absent
			}
		}

	desc = {

			has_government = fascism
		}
	}

		}
	}
	picture = GFX_event_zebrica_3
	is_triggered_only = yes
	fire_only_once = yes
	option = {
		name = abyssinia.39.a
		if = {
			limit = {
				count_triggers = {
					amount = 3
					has_country_flag = ABY_famine_reduction_1
					OR = {

						has_idea = ABY_WNG_food_imports

					}

				}

					776 = {

							modifier = ABY_slave_controlled_state
						}
					}
				}
			}
			custom_effect_tooltip = ABY_famine_avoided
			add_political_power = 150
			if = {
				limit = {
					has_country_flag = ABY_mental_stab_enabled
					OR = {
						has_government = neutrality
						has_government = democratic
					}
				}
				ABY_mental_stab_add_5 = yes
			}
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = {
				OR = {
					AND = {
						count_triggers = {
							amount = 2
							has_country_flag = ABY_famine_reduction_1

								has_idea = ABY_WNG_food_imports

								has_tech = tech_cat_culture3
							}
							has_country_flag = ABY_famine_reduction_3
						}
						NOT = {
							776 = {
								has_dynamic_modifier = {
									modifier = ABY_slave_controlled_state
								}
							}
						}
					}
					AND = {
						count_triggers = {
							amount = 3
							has_country_flag = ABY_famine_reduction_1
							OR = {
								has_idea = ABY_HIP_food_imports
								has_idea = ABY_WNG_food_imports
								has_idea = ABY_KLG_food_imports
								has_tech = tech_cat_culture3
							}
							has_country_flag = ABY_famine_reduction_3
						}
						776 = {
							has_dynamic_modifier = {
								modifier = ABY_slave_controlled_state
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
			swap_ideas = {
			  remove_idea = ABY_risk_of_famine
			  add_idea = ABY_mild_famine
			  days = 365
			}
			hidden_effect = {
				country_event = { id = abyssinia.43 days = 365 }
				every_neighbor_country = {
					country_event = { id = abyssinia.64 days = 1 }
				}
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					has_country_flag = ABY_mental_stab_enabled
					OR = {
						has_government = neutrality
						has_government = democratic
					}
				}
				ABY_mental_stab_reduce_5 = yes
			}
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = {
				OR = {
					AND = {
						count_triggers = {
							amount = 1
							has_country_flag = ABY_famine_reduction_1
							OR = {
								has_idea = ABY_HIP_food_imports
								has_idea = ABY_WNG_food_imports
								has_idea = ABY_KLG_food_imports
								has_tech = tech_cat_culture3
							}
							has_country_flag = ABY_famine_reduction_3
						}
						NOT = {
							776 = {
								has_dynamic_modifier = {
									modifier = ABY_slave_controlled_state
								}
							}
						}
					}
					AND = {
						count_triggers = {
							amount = 2
							has_country_flag = ABY_famine_reduction_1
							OR = {
								has_idea = ABY_HIP_food_imports
								has_idea = ABY_WNG_food_imports
								has_idea = ABY_KLG_food_imports
								has_tech = tech_cat_culture3
							}
							has_country_flag = ABY_famine_reduction_3
						}
						776 = {
							has_dynamic_modifier = {
								modifier = ABY_slave_controlled_state
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}

			swap_ideas = {
			  remove_idea = ABY_risk_of_famine
			  add_idea = ABY_famine
			  days = 365
			}
			hidden_effect = {
				country_event = { id = abyssinia.43 days = 365 }
				every_neighbor_country = {
					country_event = { id = abyssinia.64 days = 1 }
				}
			}
			if = {

						has_government = neutrality
						has_government = democratic
					}
				}

			}
		}

			  remove_idea = ABY_risk_of_famine

			  days = 365

				}

		name = abyssinia.45.a
		trigger = {
			NOT = {
				has_government = fascism
			}
		}

		add_manpower = -2500
		add_war_support = 0.05
		add_political_power = -100
		if = {
			limit = {

					id = ABY_neutral_harmony
				}
			}
			add_power_balance_value = {
				id = ABY_neutral_harmony
				value = 0.1
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = {

					exists = no
				}

		}

					is_subject_of = ROOT
				}
			}
			end_puppet = MDL
		}

			limit = {

					is_in_faction_with = ROOT
				}
			}

				leave_faction = yes
			}
		}

			MDL = {
				ABY = { MDL = { transfer_technology = yes } }
				load_oob = "MDL_army"
				set_politics = {
					ruling_party = neutrality
				}
			}

					is_subject_of = ROOT
				}
			}
			end_puppet = MDL
		}
		if = {
			limit = {

					is_in_faction_with = ROOT
				}
			}
			MDL = {
				leave_faction = yes
			}
		}

			MDL = {
				ABY = { MDL = { transfer_technology = yes } }
				load_oob = "MDL_army"
				set_politics = {
					ruling_party = neutrality
				}
			}

						exists = yes
					}

				}
			}

				target = MDL

				}
			}

				id = ABY_neutral_harmony
				value = -0.1
			}
		}

						exists = yes
					}
				}
				MGY = {
					country_event = abyssinia.46
				}
			}
		}
		hidden_effect = {
			create_wargoal = {
				type = annex_everything
				target = MDL
			}
		}
		declare_war_on = {
			type = annex_everything
			target = MDL
		}
	}
}
country_event = { #MGY reacts to Manedalusian independence
	id = abyssinia.46
	immediate = {log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event abyssinia.46"}
	title = abyssinia.46.t
	desc = abyssinia.46.d
	picture = GFX_event_pony_protest
	is_triggered_only = yes
	option = {#guarantee independence
		name = abyssinia.46.a
		every_owned_state = {
			limit = {
				is_core_of = MDL
				NOT = {
					is_core_of = ROOT
				}
			}
			add_compliance = -2.5
			add_resistance_target = 5
		}
		give_guarantee = MDL
		ai_chance = {
			base = 1
		}
	}
	option = {#invade
		name = abyssinia.46.b
		every_owned_state = {
			limit = {
				is_core_of = MDL
				NOT = {
					is_core_of = ROOT
				}
			}
			add_compliance = -15
			add_resistance_target = 15
		}
		hidden_effect = {
			create_wargoal = {
				type = annex_everything
				target = MDL
			}
		}
		declare_war_on = {
			type = annex_everything
			target = MDL
		}
		ai_chance = {
			base = 1
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				has_government = democratic
			}
		}
	}
	option = {#do nothing
		name = abyssinia.46.c
		every_owned_state = {
			limit = {
				is_core_of = MDL
				NOT = {
					is_core_of = ROOT
				}
			}
			add_compliance = -5
			add_resistance_target = 5
		}
		ai_chance = {
			base = 1
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				has_government = fascism
			}
		}
	}
}

country_event = { #In which gomez gets scammed by Games Workshop
	id = abyssinia.56
	immediate = {log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event abyssinia.56"}
	title = abyssinia.56.t
	desc = abyssinia.56.d
	picture = GFX_event_zebrica_1

	is_triggered_only = yes

	option = { #stamp collection
		name = abyssinia.56.a
		ABY_mental_stab_add_5 = yes
		effect_tooltip = { add_country_leader_trait = ABY_stamp_collector }
		if = {
			limit = {
				WNG = {
					OR = {
						has_country_leader = { ruling_only = yes character = WNG_garibald_talonuel_iii }
						has_idea = WNG_garibald_talonuel_iii
					}
				}
			}
			WNG = {
				add_opinion_modifier = { target = ROOT modifier = made_friends }
			}
			add_opinion_modifier = { target = WNG modifier = made_friends }
		}
		hidden_effect = {
			ABY_taile_sehissie_clawomonid = {
				add_country_leader_trait = { ideology = despotism trait = ABY_stamp_collector }
				add_country_leader_trait = { ideology = conservatism trait = ABY_stamp_collector }
				add_country_leader_trait = { ideology = harmonic_constitutionalism trait = ABY_stamp_collector }
			}
		}
	}
	option = { #miniature painting
		name = abyssinia.56.b
		ABY_mental_stab_add_5 = yes
		effect_tooltip = { add_country_leader_trait = ABY_miniature_painter }
		ABY_taile_sehissie_clawomonid = {
			add_planning = 1
		}
		hidden_effect = {
			ABY_taile_sehissie_clawomonid = {
				add_country_leader_trait = { ideology = despotism trait = ABY_miniature_painter }
				add_country_leader_trait = { ideology = conservatism trait = ABY_miniature_painter }
				add_country_leader_trait = { ideology = harmonic_constitutionalism trait = ABY_miniature_painter }
			}
		}
	}
	option = { #cooking_show
		name = abyssinia.56.c
		trigger = {
			has_tech = radio
		}
		ABY_mental_stab_add_5 = yes
		effect_tooltip = { add_country_leader_trait = ABY_cooker }
		add_popularity = { ideology = neutrality popularity = 0.05 }
		add_popularity = { ideology = democratic popularity = 0.05 }
		hidden_effect = {
			ABY_taile_sehissie_clawomonid = {
				add_country_leader_trait = { ideology = despotism trait = ABY_cooker }
				add_country_leader_trait = { ideology = conservatism trait = ABY_cooker }
				add_country_leader_trait = { ideology = harmonic_constitutionalism trait = ABY_cooker }
			}
		}
	}

	immediate = {log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event abyssinia.67"}

	desc = {
		text = abyssinia.67.d_gomez
		trigger = {
			OR = {
				has_government = neutrality
				has_government = democratic
			}
			NOT = {
				has_country_flag = ABY_gomez_absent
			}
		}
	}
	desc = {
		text = abyssinia.67.d_catrina
		trigger = {
			has_government = fascism
		}
	}
	desc = {
		text = abyssinia.67.d_gomez_absent
		trigger = {
			has_country_flag = ABY_gomez_absent
		}
	}
	picture = GFX_event_pony_riot
	trigger = {
		ABY_has_slave_unrest = yes
		is_subject = no
	}
	is_triggered_only = yes
	option = {
		name = abyssinia.67.a
		set_party_name = {
			ideology = communism
			long_name = ABY_communist_party_organized_long
			name = ABY_communist_party_organized
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_country_flag = ABY_mental_stab_enabled
				OR = {
					has_government = neutrality
					has_government = democratic
				}
			}
			ABY_mental_stab_reduce_5 = yes
		}
		add_stability = -0.05
		add_popularity = { ideology = communism popularity = 0.05 }
		add_manpower = -2190
		782 = {
			damage_building = {
				type = arms_factory
				damage = 1
			}
			damage_building = {
				type = industrial_complex
				damage = 1
			}
			damage_building = {
				type = infrastructure
				damage = 1
			}
			add_dynamic_modifier = {
				modifier = ABY_slave_controlled_state
			}
		}
		786 = {
			damage_building = {
				type = arms_factory
				damage = 1
			}
			damage_building = {
				type = industrial_complex
				damage = 1
			}
			damage_building = {
				type = infrastructure
				damage = 1
			}
			add_dynamic_modifier = {
				modifier = ABY_slave_controlled_state
			}
		}
		hidden_effect = {
			if = {
				limit = {
					OR = {
						has_government = neutrality
						has_government = democratic
					}
				}
				country_event = { id = abyssinia.68 days = 200 }
			}
		}
	}

country_event = { #Slave revolt 5 aka shit hits the fan
	id = abyssinia.68
	immediate = {log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event abyssinia.68"}
	title = abyssinia.68.t
	desc = {
		text = abyssinia.68.d_gomez
		trigger = {
			OR = {
				has_government = neutrality
				has_government = democratic
			}
			NOT = {
				has_country_flag = ABY_gomez_absent
			}
		}
	}
	desc = {
		text = abyssinia.68.d_catrina
		trigger = {
			has_government = fascism
		}
	}
	desc = {
		text = abyssinia.68.d_gomez_absent
		trigger = {
			has_country_flag = ABY_gomez_absent
		}
	}
	picture = GFX_event_pony_riot
	trigger = {
		#bandaid fix
		#has_war = no
		is_subject = no
		ABY_has_slave_unrest = yes
	}
	is_triggered_only = yes
	option = {
		name = abyssinia.68.a
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_country_flag = ABY_mental_stab_enabled
				OR = {
					has_government = neutrality
					has_government = democratic
				}
			}
			ABY_mental_stab_reduce_10 = yes
		}
		add_stability = -0.1
		add_popularity = { ideology = communism popularity = 0.1 }
		add_political_power = -100
		add_manpower = -3456
		785 = {
			damage_building = {
				type = arms_factory
				damage = 1
			}
			damage_building = {
				type = industrial_complex
				damage = 1
			}
			damage_building = {
				type = infrastructure
				damage = 1
			}
			add_dynamic_modifier = {
				modifier = ABY_slave_controlled_state
			}
		}
		hidden_effect = {
			if = {
				limit = {
					WNG = {
						exists = yes
						NOT = {
							has_war_with = ROOT
						}
					}
				}
				WNG = {
					country_event = { id = abyssinia.207 days = 1 }
				}
			}
		}
		start_civil_war = {
			ideology = communism
			size = 0.1
			states = all
			states_filter = {
				has_dynamic_modifier = {
					modifier = ABY_slave_controlled_state
				}
			}
			capital = 785
			keep_unit_leaders_trigger = { always = yes }
			keep_all_characters = yes
			hidden_effect = {
				if = {
					limit = {
						ROOT = {
							has_country_flag = ABY_gomez_dead
						}
					}
					set_country_flag = ABY_gomez_dead
				}
				if = {
					limit = {
						ROOT = {
							has_country_flag = ABY_queen_dead
						}
					}
					set_country_flag = ABY_queen_dead
				}
				if = {
					limit = {
						ROOT = {
							has_country_flag = ABY_gomez_abdicated
						}
					}
					set_country_flag = ABY_gomez_abdicated
				}
				if = {
					limit = {
						ROOT = {
							has_country_flag = ABY_airforce_founded
						}
					}
					set_country_flag = ABY_airforce_founded
				}
				if = {
					limit = {
						ROOT = {
							has_country_flag = refit_convoy_ships_flag
						}
					}
					set_country_flag = refit_convoy_ships_flag
				}
				if = {
					limit = {
						ROOT = {
							has_country_flag = ABY_motorized_army
						}
					}
					set_country_flag = ABY_motorized_army
				}
				if = {
					limit = {
						ROOT = {
							has_country_flag = ABY_modernized_navy
						}
					}
					set_country_flag = ABY_modernized_navy
				}
				if = {
					limit = {
						ROOT = {
							has_country_flag = ABY_roads_built
						}
					}
					set_country_flag = ABY_roads_built
				}
				if = {
					limit = {
						ROOT = {
							has_country_flag = ABY_expanded_mines
						}
					}
					set_country_flag = ABY_expanded_mines
				}

				PREV = {
					ABY_slave_leader = {
						set_nationality = PREV.PREV
					}
					ABY_pizdoz = {
						set_nationality = PREV.PREV
					}
					ABY_meow_skulls = {
						set_nationality = PREV.PREV
					}
				}
				promote_character = ABY_slave_leader
				load_focus_tree = {
					tree = ABY_cummunism_tree
					keep_completed = yes
				}
				swap_ideas = {
					remove_idea = slavery_economy
					add_idea = civilian_economy
				}
				set_cosmetic_tag = ABY_slave_revolt_cosmetic
				#bug workaround
				add_ideas = {
					cat_race
					limited_conscription
					low_economic_mobilisation
					limited_exports
				}
				# bug workaround
				delete_unit_template_and_units = {
					division_template = "Mountaineer-Division"
					disband = yes
				}
				delete_unit_template_and_units = {
					division_template = "Highlander Regiment"
					disband = yes
				}
				delete_unit_template_and_units = {
					division_template = "Crown Guard"
					disband = yes
				}
				division_template = {
					name = "Highlander Regiment"
					division_names_group = ABY_MNT_01
					regiments = {
						mountaineers = { x = 0 y = 0 }
						mountaineers = { x = 0 y = 1 }
						mountaineers = { x = 0 y = 2 }
						mountaineers = { x = 0 y = 3 }
						mountaineers = { x = 1 y = 0 }
					}
				}
				division_template = {
					name = "Rebellious Slaves"
					priority = 0
					is_locked = yes
					regiments = {
						irregular_infantry = { x = 0 y = 0 }
						irregular_infantry = { x = 0 y = 1 }
						irregular_infantry = { x = 0 y = 2 }
					}
				}
				every_owned_state = {
					create_unit = {
						division = "name = \"Rebellious Slaves\" division_template = \"Rebellious Slaves\" start_experience_factor = 0.1 start_equipment_factor = 0.5"
						owner = PREV
					}
					create_unit = {
						division = "name = \"Rebellious Slaves\" division_template = \"Rebellious Slaves\" start_experience_factor = 0.05 start_equipment_factor = 0.5"
						owner = PREV
					}
				}
				785 = {
					create_unit = {
						division = "name = \"Rebellious Slaves\" division_template = \"Rebellious Slaves\" start_experience_factor = 0.1 start_equipment_factor = 0.5"
						owner = PREV
						count = 3
					}
				}
				add_manpower = 25000
				add_equipment_to_stockpile = {
					type = melee_equipment_1
					amount = 500
				}
				add_equipment_to_stockpile = {
					type = melee_equipment_0
					amount = 1000
				}
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_character = ABY_slave_leader
					}
					add_field_marshal_role = {
						character = ABY_slave_leader
						traits = { pony_race_trait inspirational_leader organisational_leader offensive_doctrine }
						skill = 3
						attack_skill = 3
						defense_skill = 2
						planning_skill = 3
						logistics_skill = 2
						desc = ABY_slave_leader_desc
					}
				}
				generate_character = {
					token_base = ABY_oc_general
					name = ABY_oc_general
				}
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_character = ABY_oc_general
					}
					set_portraits = {
						character = ABY_oc_general
						army = {
							large ="gfx/leaders/ABY/uppity_slave.tga"
							small ="gfx/interface/ideas/Advisors/ABY/uppity_slave.tga"
						}
					}
					add_corps_commander_role = {
						character = ABY_oc_general
						traits = { pony_race_trait infantry_leader ambusher }
						skill = 2
						attack_skill = 1
						defense_skill = 2
						planning_skill = 2
						logistics_skill = 2
						desc = ABY_oc_general_desc
					}

						}
					}

					attack_skill = 1
					defense_skill = 2
					planning_skill = 2
					logistics_skill = 2
					desc = ABY_oc_general_desc
				}
			}
			generate_character = {
				token_base = ABY_donkey_general
				name = ABY_donkey_general
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					has_character = ABY_donkey_general
				}
				set_portraits = {
					character = ABY_donkey_general
					army = {
						large ="gfx/leaders/ABY/donke.tga"
						small ="gfx/interface/ideas/Advisors/ABY/ABY_sennacherib.tga"
					}
				}
				add_corps_commander_role = {
					character = ABY_donkey_general
					traits = { donkey_race_trait harsh_leader desert_fox trickster }
					skill = 2
					attack_skill = 2
					defense_skill = 1
					planning_skill = 3
					logistics_skill = 1
					desc = ABY_donkey_general_desc
				}
			}
			generate_character = {
				token_base = ABY_horse_general
				name = ABY_horse_general
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					has_character = ABY_horse_general
				}
				set_portraits = {
					character = ABY_horse_general
					army = {
						large ="gfx/leaders/ABY/Himbo_horse.tga"
						small ="gfx/interface/ideas/Advisors/ABY/ABY_fahd_alkasaar.tga"
					}
				}
				add_corps_commander_role = {
					character = ABY_horse_general
					traits = { horse_race_trait politically_connected trait_mountaineer heat_specialist  }
					skill = 2
					attack_skill = 4
					defense_skill = 1
					planning_skill = 1
					logistics_skill = 1
					desc = ABY_horse_general_desc
				}
			}
		}
	}
}

		trigger = {

				has_government = neutrality
				has_government = democratic
			}
			NOT = {
				has_country_flag = ABY_gomez_absent
			}
		}
	}

		trigger = {
			has_government = fascism
		}
	}
	desc = {
		text = abyssinia.69.d_gomez_absent
		trigger = {
			has_country_flag = ABY_gomez_absent
		}
	}
	picture = GFX_event_zebrica_8
	is_triggered_only = yes
	trigger = {
		NOT = {
			has_government = communism
			has_country_flag = ABY_MDL_crushed
		}
		has_country_flag = ABY_unlock_noble_loyalty
		741 = {
			is_owned_and_controlled_by = ROOT
			NOT = {
				is_core_of = ROOT
			}
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = abyssinia.69.a
		trigger = {
			NOT = {
				has_government = fascism
			}
		}
		custom_effect_tooltip = ABY_disloyalty_warning
		ABY_bingus_disloyal = yes
		ABY_update_number_of_loyal_disloyal = yes
		add_political_power = -25
		every_owned_state = {
			limit = {
				is_core_of = MDL
				NOT = {
					is_core_of = ROOT
				}
			}
			add_compliance = 5
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_power_balance = {
					id = ABY_neutral_harmony
				}
			}
			add_power_balance_value = {
				id = ABY_neutral_harmony
				value = 0.05
			}
		}
		hidden_effect = {
			country_event = { id = abyssinia.70 days = 30 }
			country_event = { id = abyssinia.72 days = 230 }
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = abyssinia.69.b
		custom_effect_tooltip = ABY_loyalty_notification
		ABY_bingus_loyal = yes
		ABY_update_number_of_loyal_disloyal = yes
		add_political_power = 25
		every_owned_state = {
			limit = {
				is_core_of = MDL
				NOT = {
					is_core_of = ROOT
				}
			}
			add_compliance = -5
			add_resistance_target = -5
			add_dynamic_modifier = {
				modifier = ABY_no_manedalusians_in_army
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_power_balance = {
					id = ABY_neutral_harmony
				}
			}
			add_power_balance_value = {
				id = ABY_neutral_harmony
				value = -0.05
			}
		}
		hidden_effect = {
			country_event = { id = abyssinia.72 days = 230 }
		}
	}
}

	title = abyssinia.73.t
	desc = {
		text = abyssinia.73.d_dam
		trigger = {
			FROM = {
				has_completed_focus = ABY_panthera_dam
			}
		}
	}
	desc = {
		text = abyssinia.73.d_irrigation
		trigger = {
			FROM = {
				has_completed_focus = ABY_desert_irrigation
			}
		}
	}
	desc = {
		text = abyssinia.73.d_double_dam
		trigger = {
			FROM = {
				has_country_flag = ABY_double_dam
			}
		}
	}
	picture = GFX_event_zebrica_3

	is_triggered_only = yes

	option = {
		name = abyssinia.73.a
		add_timed_idea = {
			idea = ABY_lack_of_water
			days = 365
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_idea = ABY_trade_deal
			}
			remove_ideas = ABY_trade_deal
		}
		remove_opinion_modifier = {
			target = FROM
			modifier = trade_treaty
		}
		add_opinion_modifier = { target = FROM modifier = CHN_Embargo }
		add_opinion_modifier = { target = FROM modifier = distrustful_relations }
		FROM = {
			country_event = { id = abyssinia.74 days = 2 }
		}
	}
}

		trigger = {
			OR = {
				has_completed_focus = ABY_panthera_dam
				has_country_flag = ABY_double_dam
			}
			NOT = {
				has_government = communism
			}
		}
	}
	desc = {
		text = abyssinia.74.d_irrigation
		trigger = {
			has_completed_focus = ABY_desert_irrigation
		}
	}
	desc = {
		text = abyssinia.74.d_gommie
		trigger = {
			has_country_flag = ABY_double_dam
			has_government = communism
		}
	}
	picture = GFX_event_zebrica_3
	fire_only_once = yes
	is_triggered_only = yes

	option = {
		name = abyssinia.74.a
		effect_tooltip = {
			FROM = {
				add_timed_idea = {
					idea = ABY_lack_of_water
					days = 365
				}
				add_opinion_modifier = { target = ROOT modifier = CHN_Embargo }
				add_opinion_modifier = { target = ROOT modifier = distrustful_relations }
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_idea = ABY_ASS_trade_deal
				ASS = {
					NOT = {
						has_idea = ABY_trade_deal
					}
				}
			}
			remove_opinion_modifier = {
				target = ASS
				modifier = trade_treaty
			}
			remove_ideas = ABY_ASS_trade_deal
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_idea = ABY_ANS_trade_deal
				ANS = {
					NOT = {
						has_idea = ABY_trade_deal
					}
				}
			}
			remove_opinion_modifier = {
				target = ANS
				modifier = trade_treaty
			}
			remove_ideas = ABY_ANS_trade_deal
		}
	}

		}
	}
	desc = {

			}
		}
	}

			}

				}
			}
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = abyssinia.80.b
		effect_tooltip = {

				}
			}

		}

	id = abyssinia.82

	title = abyssinia.82.t
	desc = abyssinia.82.d
	picture = GFX_event_zebrica_1
	is_triggered_only = yes
	option = {
		name = abyssinia.82.a
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_idea = ABY_wingbardian_concessions
			}
			remove_ideas = ABY_wingbardian_concessions
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = {
				has_idea = ABY_wingbardian_concessions_2
			}
			remove_ideas = ABY_wingbardian_concessions_2
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = {
				has_idea = ABY_wingbardian_concessions_3
			}
			remove_ideas = ABY_wingbardian_concessions_3
		}
		1201 = {
			set_demilitarized_zone = no
		}
		WNG = { remove_resource_rights = 1201 }
		ABY_mental_stab_add_5 = yes
	}
}

			NOT = {
				has_government = communism
			}
			NOT = {
				has_country_flag = ABY_gomez_absent
			}
		}
	}
	desc = {
		text = abyssinia.85.d_gomez_absent
		trigger = {
			NOT = {
				has_government = communism
			}
			has_country_flag = ABY_gomez_absent
		}
	}
	desc = {
		text = abyssinia.85.d_gommie
		trigger = {
			has_government = communism
		}
	}
	picture = GFX_event_zebrica_1
	is_triggered_only = yes
	option = {
		name = abyssinia.85.a

			limit = {
				1201 = {
					is_demilitarized_zone = yes
				}
			}
			1201 = {
				set_demilitarized_zone = no
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				FROM = {
					owns_state = 1201
				}
			}
			transfer_state = 1201
		}
		transfer_state = 1200
		add_political_power = 50

		if = {
			limit = {
				has_country_flag = ABY_mental_stab_enabled
			}
			ABY_mental_stab_add_5 = yes
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_country_flag = ABY_unlock_noble_loyalty
			}
			custom_effect_tooltip = ABY_loyalty_notification
			ABY_duchess_loyal = yes
			ABY_update_number_of_loyal_disloyal = yes
		}
	}

		}

			}

				limit = {

						array = ABY_noble_loyalties
						value = v
						index = i

						check_variable = { v = -1 }
					}
				}
				add_dynamic_modifier = {
					modifier = ABY_disloyal_local_noble
				}
			}
			ABY_update_number_of_loyal_disloyal = yes
		}
	}

		if = {
			limit = {
				764 = {
					is_claimed_by = ROOT
				}
			}
			remove_state_claim = 764
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				740 = {
					is_core_of = ROOT
				}
			}
			remove_state_core = 740
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				741 = {
					is_core_of = ROOT
				}
			}
			remove_state_core = 741
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				738 = {
					is_core_of = ROOT
				}
			}
			remove_state_core = 738
		}
		if = {

					is_core_of = ROOT
				}
			}
			remove_state_core = 764
		}
		FROM = {

		}
		ai_chance = {
			base = 1
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = abyssinia.97.b
		FROM = {
			country_event = { id = abyssinia.99 days = 3 }
		}
		ai_chance = {
			base = 0
			modifier = {
				add = 2

						is_core_of = ROOT

					741 = {
						is_core_of = ROOT

					value = v
					index = i
					check_variable = { i = 15 }
					check_variable = { v = 0 }
				}
			}
		}
	}

		trigger = {

			}
			any_of = {

		}

		}

			}
			ABY_apf_opposes = yes
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				740 = {
					is_claimed_by = ROOT
				}
			}
			remove_state_claim = 740
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				741 = {
					is_claimed_by = ROOT
				}
			}
			remove_state_claim = 741
		}

					is_claimed_by = ROOT
				}
			}
			remove_state_claim = 738
		}
		if = {
			limit = {

					is_claimed_by = ROOT
				}
			}
			remove_state_claim = 764
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				740 = {
					is_core_of = ROOT
				}
			}
			remove_state_core = 740
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				741 = {
					is_core_of = ROOT
				}
			}
			remove_state_core = 741
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				738 = {
					is_core_of = ROOT
				}
			}
			remove_state_core = 738
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				764 = {
					is_core_of = ROOT
				}
			}
			remove_state_core = 764
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				MDL = {
					exists = no
				}
			}
			release = MDL
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = {
				MDL = {
					is_subject = yes
				}
			}
			end_puppet = MDL
		}
		MDL = {
			if = {
				limit = {
					NOT = {
						owns_state = 740
					}
				}
				transfer_state = 740
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					NOT = {
						owns_state = 741
					}
				}
				transfer_state = 741
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					NOT = {
						owns_state = 738
					}
				}
				transfer_state = 738
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					NOT = {
						owns_state = 764
					}
				}
				transfer_state = 764
			}
		}
		give_guarantee = MDL
		FROM = {
			give_guarantee = MDL
		}
		diplomatic_relation = {
			country = FROM
			relation = non_aggression_pact
			active = yes
		}
		hidden_effect = {
			MDL = {
				ABY = { MDL = { transfer_technology = yes } }
				load_oob = "MDL_army"
				set_politics = {
					ruling_party = neutrality
				}
			}
			news_event = { id = abyssinia_news.4 hours = 12 }
		}
	}
}

	id = abyssinia.99
	immediate = {log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event abyssinia.99"}
	title = abyssinia.99.t
	desc = {
		text = abyssinia.99.d_gomez
		trigger = {
			NOT = {
				has_country_flag = ABY_gomez_absent
			}
			NOT = {
				has_government = communism
			}
		}
	}
	desc = {
		text = abyssinia.99.d_gomez_absent
		trigger = {
			has_country_flag = ABY_gomez_absent
			NOT = {
				has_government = communism
			}
		}
	}
	desc = {
		text = abyssinia.99.d_gommie
		trigger = {
			has_government = communism
		}
	}
	picture = GFX_event_pony_soldiers_sunset
	is_triggered_only = yes
	option = {
		name = abyssinia.99.a
		add_war_support = 0.15
		if = {
			limit = {
				MDL = {
					exists = no
				}
			}
			custom_effect_tooltip = ABY_limited_MDL_war_tt
			set_country_flag = ABY_limited_MDL_war_flag
			if = {
				limit = {
					NOT = {
						owns_state = 740
					}
				}
				declare_war_on = {
					type = take_state_focus
					target = 740.owner
					generator = { 740 }
				}
				hidden_effect = {
					create_wargoal = {
						type = take_state_focus
						target = 740.owner
						generator = { 740 }
					}
				}
			}
			else_if = {
				limit = {
					NOT = {
						owns_state = 740
					}
				}
				declare_war_on = {
					type = take_state_focus
					target = 738.owner
					generator = { 738 }
				}
				hidden_effect = {
					create_wargoal = {
						type = take_state_focus
						target = 738.owner
						generator = { 738 }
					}
				}
			}
			else_if = {
				limit = {
					NOT = {
						owns_state = 741
					}
				}
				declare_war_on = {
					type = take_state_focus
					target = 741.owner
					generator = { 741 }
				}
				hidden_effect = {
					create_wargoal = {
						type = take_state_focus
						target = 741.owner
						generator = { 741 }
					}
				}
			}
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = {
				MDL = {
					exists = yes
					NOT = {
						is_subject_of = ROOT
						is_in_faction_with = ROOT
					}
				}
			}
			declare_war_on = {
				type = annex_everything
				target = MDL
			}
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = abyssinia.99.b
		add_political_power = -50
		add_stability = 0.05
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_country_flag = ABY_mental_stab_enabled
			}
			ABY_mental_stab_add_5 = yes
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_government = communism
			}
			ABY_apf_opposes = yes
		}
		FROM = {
			country_event = abyssinia.96
		}

	}
}

country_event = { #Ovingoland uprising
	id = abyssinia.109
	immediate = {
		log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event abyssinia.109"
		hidden_effect = {
			release = MKS
			MKS = {
				if = {
					limit = {
						ABY = {
							OR = {
								has_government = neutrality
								has_government = democratic
							}
						}
					}
					give_military_access = ABY
				}
				inherit_technology = MGY
				set_politics = {
					ruling_party = neutrality
				}

				load_focus_tree = { tree = generic_zebra_focus keep_completed = no }
				division_template = {
					name = "Ovingoland Infantry"
					regiments = {
						infantry = { x = 0 y = 0 }
						infantry = { x = 0 y = 1 }
						infantry = { x = 0 y = 2 }
						infantry = { x = 0 y = 3 }
						infantry = { x = 1 y = 0 }
						infantry = { x = 1 y = 1 }
						infantry = { x = 1 y = 2 }
						infantry = { x = 1 y = 3 }
					}
				}
				every_owned_state = {
					create_unit = {
						division = "name = \"Ovingoland Infantry\" division_template = \"Ovingoland Infantry\" start_experience_factor = 0.1 start_equipment_factor = 0.8"
						owner = PREV
					}
					create_unit = {
						division = "name = \"Ovingoland Infantry\" division_template = \"Ovingoland Infantry\" start_experience_factor = 0.05 start_equipment_factor = 0.8"
						owner = PREV
						count = 2
					}
				}
			}
			ABY = {
				if = {
					limit = {
						OR = {
							has_government = neutrality
							has_government = democratic
						}
					}
					puppet = MKS
					set_autonomy = { target = MKS autonomy_state = autonomy_dominion }
				}
			}
		}
	}
	title = abyssinia.109.t
	desc = abyssinia.109.d
	picture = GFX_event_zebrica_3
	is_triggered_only = yes
	option = {
		name = abyssinia.109.a
		hidden_effect = {
			create_wargoal = {
				type = annex_everything
				target = MKS
			}
		}
		declare_war_on = {
			type = annex_everything
			target = MKS
		}
		ai_chance = {
			base = 10
			modifier = {
				factor = 2
				has_government = fascism
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				has_war = yes
			}
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = abyssinia.109.b
		ai_chance = {
			base = 1
		}

	}
}

country_event = { #ABY-HIP military cooperation
	id = abyssinia.114
	immediate = {
		log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event abyssinia.114"
	}
	title = abyssinia.114.t
	desc = abyssinia.114.d
	picture = GFX_event_aris_and_beach
	is_triggered_only = yes
	option = {
		name = abyssinia.114.a
		navy_experience = 50
		air_experience = 50
		if = {
			limit = {
				NOT = {
					has_tech = marines
				}
			}
			set_technology = {
				marines = 1
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				NOT = {
					has_tech = tech_engineers
				}
			}
			set_technology = {
				tech_engineers = 1
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				NOT = {
					has_tech = tech_logistics_company
				}
			}
			set_technology = {
				tech_logistics_company = 1
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				NOT = {
					has_tech = tech_recon
				}
			}
			set_technology = {
				tech_recon = 1
			}
		}
		division_template = {
			name = "Marine Brigade"
			division_names_group = HIP_MAR_02

			regiments = {
				marine = { x = 0 y = 0 }
				marine = { x = 0 y = 1 }
				marine = { x = 0 y = 2 }
				marine = { x = 1 y = 0 }
				marine = { x = 1 y = 1 }
				marine = { x = 1 y = 2 }
				marine = { x = 2 y = 0 }
			}
			support = {
				engineer = { x = 0 y = 0 }
				logistics_company = { x = 0 y = 1 }
				recon = { x = 0 y = 2 }
			}
		}
		capital_scope = {
			create_unit = {
				division = "name = \"Hippogriffian Marines\" division_template = \"Marine Brigade\" start_experience_factor = 0.5 start_equipment_factor = 1.0"
				owner = PREV
			}
		}
		add_opinion_modifier = { target = HIP modifier = made_friends }
	}
}

				add_country_leader_trait = { ideology = conservatism trait = ABY_emperor_of_abyssinia }

			}
		}
		drop_cosmetic_tag = yes

country_event = { #EARTHQUAKE
	id = abyssinia.121
	immediate = {
		log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event abyssinia.121"
	}
	title = abyssinia.121.t
	desc = abyssinia.121.d
	picture = GFX_event_green_mountain
	is_triggered_only = yes
	fire_only_once = yes
	option = {
		name = abyssinia.121.a
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_country_flag = ABY_unlock_noble_loyalty
			}
			custom_effect_tooltip = ABY_loyalty_notification
			ABY_cat_in_the_hat_loyal = yes
			ABY_update_number_of_loyal_disloyal = yes
		}
		add_political_power = -50
		save_current_manpower = yes
		779 = {
			damage_building = {
				type = arms_factory
				damage = 5
			}
			damage_building = {
				type = industrial_complex
				damage = 5
			}
			damage_building = {
				type = infrastructure
				damage = 5
			}
			damage_building = {
				type = supply_node
				damage = 1
			}
			damage_building = {
				type = rail_way
				damage = 5
			}
			damage_building = {
				type = dockyard
				damage = 5
			}
			damage_building = {
				type = synthetic_refinery
				damage = 5
			}
			damage_building = {
				type = radar_station
				damage = 5
			}
			damage_building = {
				type = nuclear_reactor
				damage = 5
			}
			damage_building = {
				type = anti_air_building
				damage = 5
			}
			add_manpower = -21766
		}
		restore_previous_manpower = yes
		ai_chance = {
			base = 1
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = abyssinia.121.b
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_country_flag = ABY_unlock_noble_loyalty
			}
			custom_effect_tooltip = ABY_disloyalty_warning
			ABY_cat_in_the_hat_disloyal = yes
			ABY_update_number_of_loyal_disloyal = yes
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				779 = {
					is_core_of = ROOT
				}
			}
			add_stability = -0.05
		}
		save_current_manpower = yes
		779 = {
			damage_building = {
				type = arms_factory
				damage = 5
			}
			damage_building = {
				type = industrial_complex
				damage = 5
			}
			damage_building = {
				type = infrastructure
				damage = 5
			}
			damage_building = {
				type = supply_node
				damage = 1
			}
			damage_building = {
				type = rail_way
				damage = 5
			}
			damage_building = {
				type = dockyard
				damage = 5
			}
			damage_building = {
				type = synthetic_refinery
				damage = 5
			}
			damage_building = {
				type = radar_station
				damage = 5
			}
			damage_building = {
				type = nuclear_reactor
				damage = 5
			}
			damage_building = {
				type = anti_air_building
				damage = 5
			}
			add_manpower = -48152
		}
		restore_previous_manpower = yes
		ai_chance = {
			base = 1
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				NOT = {
					has_government = fascism
				}
			}
		}
	}
}

##########CATRINA PATH
country_event = { #Catrina intro
	id = abyssinia.123
	immediate = {log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event abyssinia.123"}
	title = abyssinia.123.t
	desc = abyssinia.123.d
	picture = GFX_event_catrina

	is_triggered_only = yes

	option = {
		name = abyssinia.123.a
		add_advisor_role = {
			character = ABY_rep
			advisor = {
				slot = political_advisor
				idea_token = ABY_rep

				traits = { ABY_assistant }
				can_be_fired = no
			}
			activate = yes
		}
		add_political_power = 150
		set_country_flag = ABY_potion_machine_unlocked
		unlock_decision_category_tooltip = ABY_witchweed_cat
		set_variable = {
			var = ABY_catrina_slaves
			value = 50
		}
		set_variable = {
			var = ABY_catrina_slaves_cap
			value = 5000
		}
		set_variable = {
			var = ABY_machine_efficiency
			value = 0.01
		}
		set_variable = {
			var = ABY_slaves_multiplied_by_efficiency
			value = 0.5
		}
		set_variable = {
			var = ABY_potion_doses_ready
			value = 3.5
		}
	}
}

######### NOT CATRINA PATH, UNRELATED
country_event = { #Uprising
	id = abyssinia.124
	immediate = {
		log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event abyssinia.124"
	}
	title = abyssinia.124.t
	desc = abyssinia.124.d
	picture = GFX_event_attacked_convoy
	is_triggered_only = yes
	fire_only_once = yes
	option = {
		name = abyssinia.124.a
		if = {
			limit = {
				ABY = {
					exists = no
				}
				any_occupied_country = {
					original_tag = ABY
				}
				owns_state = 775
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					779 = {
						is_owned_and_controlled_by = ROOT
					}
				}
				ABY = {
					transfer_state = 779
				}
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					777 = {
						is_owned_and_controlled_by = ROOT
					}
				}
				ABY = {
					transfer_state = 777
				}
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					778 = {
						is_owned_and_controlled_by = ROOT
					}
				}
				ABY = {
					transfer_state = 778
				}
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					780 = {
						is_owned_and_controlled_by = ROOT
					}
				}
				ABY = {
					transfer_state = 780
				}
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					774 = {
						is_owned_and_controlled_by = ROOT
					}
				}
				ABY = {
					transfer_state = 774
				}
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					782 = {
						is_owned_and_controlled_by = ROOT
					}
				}
				ABY = {
					transfer_state = 782
				}
			}
			hidden_effect = {
				ABY = {
					inherit_technology = ABY
					set_technology = {
						cat_race = 1
					}
					drop_cosmetic_tag = yes
					set_cosmetic_tag = ABY_patriotic_revolt
					set_country_flag = ABY_no_peace
					set_party_name = {
						ideology = neutrality
						long_name = ABY_patriotic_front_party_long
						name = ABY_patriotic_front_party
					}
					add_war_support = 0.5
					set_politics = {
						ruling_party = neutrality
						elections_allowed = no
					}
					ABY_the_patriot = {
						add_country_leader_role = {
							country_leader = {
								expire = "1965.1.1"
								ideology = khakistocracy
								traits = { veteran_guerrilla_fighter }
								desc = ABY_the_patriot_desc
							}
							promote_leader = yes
						}
					}
					add_ideas = {
						extensive_conscription
						war_economy
						cat_race
						pre_industrial_society
					}
					remove_ideas = {
						ABY_wingbardian_concessions
						ABY_angry_slaves
						ABY_somewhat_less_angry_slaves
						ABY_way_less_angry_slaves
						ABY_paralyzed_leadership
						ABY_risk_of_famine
						ABY_clawomonid_resistance
						ABY_weak_clawomonid_resistance
						ABY_HIP_trade_deal
						ABY_ASS_trade_deal
						ABY_ANS_trade_deal
						ABY_HIP_food_imports
						ABY_WNG_food_imports
						ABY_KLG_food_imports
						ABY_mild_famine
						ABY_famine
						ABY_apocalyptic_famine
						ABY_wingbardian_concessions_2
						ABY_wingbardian_concessions_3
						ABY_a_good_friend
						ABY_new_economic_plan
						ABY_new_economic_plan_2
						ABY_loan
					}
					add_popularity = { ideology = neutrality popularity = 0.5 }
					add_political_power = 100
					add_command_power = 100
					#might add a unique tree idk
					load_focus_tree = { tree = generic_zebra_focus keep_completed = no }
					division_template = {
						name = "Patriotic Guerillas"
						priority = 0
						is_locked = yes
						regiments = {
							irregular_infantry = { x = 0 y = 0 }
						}
					}
					division_template = {
						name = "Patriotic Highlanders"
						regiments = {
							mountaineers = { x = 0 y = 0 }
							mountaineers = { x = 0 y = 1 }
							mountaineers = { x = 0 y = 2 }
							mountaineers = { x = 0 y = 3 }
							mountaineers = { x = 1 y = 0 }
						}
					}
					every_owned_state = {
						limit = {
							NOT = {
								impassable = yes
							}
						}
						teleport_armies = {
							to_state = 775
						}
						create_unit = {
							division = "name = \"Patriotic Guerillas\" division_template = \"Patriotic Guerillas\" start_experience_factor = 0.2 start_equipment_factor = 1.0"
							owner = ABY
							count = 5
						}
						create_unit = {
							division = "name = \"Patriotic Highlanders\" division_template = \"Patriotic Highlanders\" start_experience_factor = 0.4 start_equipment_factor = 1.0"
							owner = ABY
						}
					}
					declare_war_on = {
						target = ROOT
						type = annex_everything
					}
				}
			}
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = {
				ABY = {
					is_subject_of = ROOT
					has_capitulated = no
				}
			}
			ABY = {
				set_country_flag = ABY_uprising_puppet
			}
			create_dynamic_country = {
				original_tag = ABY
				inherit_technology = WNG
				transfer_state = 779
				transfer_state = 777
				transfer_state = 778
				transfer_state = 780
				transfer_state = 774
				transfer_state = 782
				#every_state = {
				#	limit = {
				#		is_core_of = ABY
				#	}
				#	add_core_of = PREV
				#}
				set_politics = {
					ruling_party = neutrality
					elections_allowed = no
				}
				set_popularities = {
					democratic = 10
					neutrality = 68
					communism = 12
					fascism = 10
				}
				ABY = {
					ABY_the_patriot = {
						set_nationality = PREV.PREV
					}
				}
				ABY_the_patriot = {
					add_country_leader_role = {
						country_leader = {
							expire = "1965.1.1"
							ideology = khakistocracy
							traits = { veteran_guerrilla_fighter }
							desc = ABY_the_patriot_desc
						}
						promote_leader = yes
					}
				}
				drop_cosmetic_tag = yes
				set_cosmetic_tag = ABY_patriotic_revolt
				set_country_flag = ABY_no_peace
				set_party_name = {
					ideology = neutrality
					long_name = ABY_patriotic_front_party_long
					name = ABY_patriotic_front_party
				}
				add_war_support = 0.5
				add_ideas = {
					extensive_conscription
					war_economy
				}
				load_focus_tree = { tree = generic_zebra_focus keep_completed = no }
				division_template = {
					name = "Patriotic Guerillas"
					priority = 0
					is_locked = yes
					regiments = {
						irregular_infantry = { x = 0 y = 0 }
					}
				}
				division_template = {
					name = "Patriotic Highlanders"
					regiments = {
						mountaineers = { x = 0 y = 0 }
						mountaineers = { x = 0 y = 1 }
						mountaineers = { x = 0 y = 2 }
						mountaineers = { x = 0 y = 3 }
						mountaineers = { x = 1 y = 0 }
					}
				}
				every_owned_state = {
					teleport_armies = {
						to_state = 775
					}
					create_unit = {
						division = "name = \"Patriotic Guerillas\" division_template = \"Patriotic Guerillas\" start_experience_factor = 0.2 start_equipment_factor = 1.0"
						owner = PREV
						count = 5
					}
					create_unit = {
						division = "name = \"Patriotic Highlanders\" division_template = \"Patriotic Highlanders\" start_experience_factor = 0.4 start_equipment_factor = 1.0"
						owner = ABY
					}
				}
				ABY = {
					transfer_units_fraction = {
						target = PREV
						size = 0.5
						stockpile_ratio = 0.5
						army_ratio = 0.5
						navy_ratio = 0.5
						air_ratio = 0.5
					}
				}
				declare_war_on = {
					target = ABY
					type = civil_war
				}
				add_civil_war_target = ABY
				set_country_flag = ABY_uprising_puppet
				reserve_dynamic_country = yes
			}
			set_AI_strategies_on_every_possible_country_delayed = yes
		}
		hidden_effect = {
			news_event = { id = abyssinia_news.6 hours = 12 }
		}
	}
}

					}
				}
			}

					modifier = ABY_slave_controlled_state
				}
			}
		}
	}

				ABY_clawomonid_resistance

					}
				}

				}
			}

				limit = {
					has_country_flag = ABY_gomez_dead

						has_country_flag = ABY_queen_dead
					}
				}

					character = ABY_queen_morticia

	desc = abyssinia.128.d

		name = abyssinia.128.a

			limit = {
				NOT = {
					has_country_flag = ABY_unlock_slave_pacification
				}
			}
			set_country_flag = ABY_unlock_slave_pacification
		}

		custom_effect_tooltip = ABY_slave_revolt_warning

			if = {
				limit = {
					NOT = {
						AND = {
							is_ai = yes
							OR = {
								has_country_flag = ABY_AI_COMMUNIST
								has_game_rule = {
									rule = ABY_ai_behavior
									option = ABY_COMMUNIST_ALTERNATE
								}
							}
						}
					}
				}
				if = {
					limit = {
						NOT = {
							has_template = "Local Militia"
						}
					}
					division_template = {
						name = "Local Militia"
						is_locked = yes
						regiments = {
							militia = { x = 0 y = 0 }
							militia = { x = 0 y = 1 }
							militia = { x = 0 y = 2 }
						}
					}
				}
				every_owned_state = {
					limit = {
						NOT = {
							state = 1200
							state = 775
							impassable = yes
						}
						OR = {
							is_core_of = ROOT
							is_core_of = MDL
						}
						#NOT = {
						#	has_dynamic_modifier = {
						#		modifier = ABY_disloyal_local_noble

						division = "name = \"Local Militia\" division_template = \"Local Militia\" start_experience_factor = 0.15 start_equipment_factor = 0.7"
						owner = ROOT
					}
				}
			}
		}
		custom_effect_tooltip = ABY_disloyalty_warning
		ABY_tardar_disloyal = yes
		ABY_thurston_disloyal = yes
		ABY_gumball_disloyal = yes
		ABY_update_number_of_loyal_disloyal = yes
		add_to_variable = {
			var = ABY_catrina_slaves
			value = 1000
			tooltip = ABY_add_20k_slaves
		}
		ABY_witchweed_recalculate_production = yes
		hidden_effect = {
			country_event = { id = abyssinia.68 days = 35 }
		}
	}
}
country_event = { #This technically isnt just catrina
	id = abyssinia.129
	immediate = {log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event abyssinia.129"}
	title = abyssinia.129.t
	desc = abyssinia.129.d
	picture = GFX_event_pony_trench

	is_triggered_only = yes

	option = {
		name = abyssinia.129.a
		every_possible_country = {
			limit = {
				has_character = ABY_slave_leader
			}
			ABY_slave_leader = {
				retire = yes
			}
		}
		add_stability = 0.2
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_idea = ABY_angry_slaves
			}
			swap_ideas = {
				remove_idea = ABY_angry_slaves
				add_idea = ABY_way_less_angry_slaves
			}
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = {
				has_idea = ABY_somewhat_less_angry_slaves
			}
			swap_ideas = {
				remove_idea = ABY_somewhat_less_angry_slaves
				add_idea = ABY_way_less_angry_slaves
			}
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = {
				has_idea = ABY_more_angry_slaves
			}
			swap_ideas = {
				remove_idea = ABY_more_angry_slaves
				add_idea = ABY_way_less_angry_slaves
			}
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = {
				has_idea = ABY_even_more_angry_slaves
			}
			swap_ideas = {
				remove_idea = ABY_even_more_angry_slaves
				add_idea = ABY_way_less_angry_slaves
			}
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = {
				has_idea = ABY_extremely_angry_slaves
			}
			swap_ideas = {
				remove_idea = ABY_extremely_angry_slaves
				add_idea = ABY_way_less_angry_slaves
			}
		}
		add_popularity = { ideology = communism popularity = -0.1 }
		add_timed_idea = {
			idea = ABY_civil_war_devastation
			days = 365
		}
		hidden_effect = {
			set_capital = {
			  state = 775
			  remember_old_capital = no
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_government = fascism
			}
			hidden_effect = {
				country_event = { id = abyssinia.130 days = 1 }
			}
		}
	}
}

		mark_focus_tree_layout_dirty = yes
		unlock_decision_tooltip = ABY_distribute_potions_to_army
		#more decisions
		set_country_leader_ideology = magocracy
		add_country_leader_trait = ABY_magocrat
		drop_cosmetic_tag = yes
		set_cosmetic_tag = ABY_bitchdom

	}
}

	id = abyssinia.150
	immediate = {log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event abyssinia.150"}
	title = abyssinia.150.t

	picture = GFX_event_pony_riot
	is_triggered_only = yes
	fire_only_once = yes

		name = abyssinia.150.a
		add_war_support = 0.1
		if = {
			limit = {
				NOT = {
					has_template = "Feline Militia"
				}
			}
			division_template = {
				name = "Feline Militia"
				is_locked = yes
				regiments = {
					militia = { x = 0 y = 0 }
					militia = { x = 0 y = 1 }
					militia = { x = 0 y = 2 }
					militia = { x = 0 y = 3 }
					militia = { x = 1 y = 0 }
					militia = { x = 1 y = 1 }
					militia = { x = 1 y = 2 }
					militia = { x = 1 y = 3 }
				}
			}
		}
		capital_scope = {
			create_unit = {
				division = "name = \"Republican Militia\" division_template = \"Feline Militia\" start_experience_factor = 0.5 start_equipment_factor = 1.0"
				owner = PREV
			}
			create_unit = {
				division = "name = \"Socialist Militia\" division_template = \"Feline Militia\" start_experience_factor = 0.5 start_equipment_factor = 1.0"
				owner = PREV
			}
		}
	}
}

					days = 14
				}
			}
		}
		hidden_effect = {
			every_possible_country = {
				limit = {
					has_character = ABY_spymaster
				}
				ABY_spymaster = {
					set_nationality = ROOT
				}
			}
			every_possible_country = {
				limit = {
					has_character = ABY_unsinkable_sam
				}
				ABY_unsinkable_sam = {
					set_nationality = ROOT
				}
			}
			every_possible_country = {
				limit = {
					has_character = ABY_ras_gordon_sootyilu
				}
				ABY_ras_gordon_sootyilu = {
					set_nationality = ROOT
				}
			}
			every_possible_country = {
				limit = {
					has_character = ABY_rep
				}
				ABY_rep = {
					set_nationality = ROOT
				}
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					ABY_rep = {
						is_character_slot = political_advisor
					}
				}
				remove_advisor_role = {
					character = ABY_rep
					slot = political_advisor
				}
				add_advisor_role = {
					character = ABY_rep
					advisor = {
						slot = political_advisor
						idea_token = ABY_rep

						traits = { ABY_assistant }
					}
				}
			}
		}
		set_country_flag = ABY_com_integrate_cats
		custom_effect_tooltip = ABY_com_integrate_cats_tt
	}
	option = {
		name = abyssinia.164.b
		add_stability = -0.05
	}
	option = {
		name = abyssinia.164.c
		save_current_manpower = yes
		capital_scope = {
			add_manpower = -3000
		}
		restore_previous_manpower = yes
		add_stability = -0.1
		add_political_power = 100
		add_popularity = { ideology = neutrality popularity = -0.025 }
		add_popularity = { ideology = democratic popularity = -0.025 }
		add_popularity = { ideology = fascism popularity = -0.025 }
		add_to_variable = { ABY_the_fun_meter = 1 }
		if = {
			limit = {
				check_variable = {
					ABY_the_fun_meter > 3
				}
				has_war = no
			}
			hidden_effect = {
				country_event = {
					id = abyssinia.169
					days = 14
				}
			}
		}
	}

						infantry = { x = 0 y = 1 }
						infantry = { x = 0 y = 2 }
						infantry = { x = 0 y = 3 }
						artillery_brigade = { x = 1 y = 0 }
					}
				}
				every_owned_state = {
					teleport_armies = {
						to_state = 775
					}
					create_unit = {
						division = "name = \"Free Donkey Battalions\" division_template = \"Free Donkey Battalions\" start_experience_factor = 0.2 start_equipment_factor = 0.75"
						owner = PREV
					}
				}
				capital_scope = {
					create_unit = {
						division = "name = \"Asstyrian Volunteers\" division_template = \"Asstyrian Volunteers\" start_experience_factor = 0.5 start_equipment_factor = 1.0"
						owner = PREV
						count = 3
					}
				}
				declare_war_on = {
					target = ROOT
					type = civil_war
				}
				add_civil_war_target = ROOT
				#set_country_flag = ABY_uprising_puppet
				set_variable = {
					global.donkey_revolt_var = THIS
				}
				reserve_dynamic_country = yes
			}
			set_AI_strategies_on_every_possible_country_delayed = yes
			if = {
				limit = {
					is_ai = yes
				}
				if = {
					limit = {
						NOT = {
							has_template = "Liberation War Veterans"
						}
					}
					division_template = {
						name = "Liberation War Veterans"
						is_locked = yes
						regiments = {
							irregular_infantry = { x = 0 y = 0 }
							irregular_infantry = { x = 0 y = 1 }
							irregular_infantry = { x = 0 y = 2 }
							irregular_infantry = { x = 0 y = 3 }
						}
					}
				}
				capital_scope = {
					create_unit = {
						division = "name = \"Liberation War Veterans\" division_template = \"Liberation War Veterans\" start_experience_factor = 0.5 start_equipment_factor = 1.0"
						owner = ROOT
						count = 10
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}
}

	is_triggered_only = yes
	option = {
		name = abyssinia.189.a
		hidden_effect = {
			every_possible_country = {
				limit = {
					has_character = ABY_taile_sehissie_clawomonid
				}
				ABY_taile_sehissie_clawomonid = {
					set_nationality = ROOT
				}
			}
		}
		swap_ruler_traits = { remove = provisional add = ABY_chief_minister }
		set_country_flag = ABY_has_chief_minister
		set_portraits = {
			character = ABY_slave_leader
			civilian = {
				large ="gfx/leaders/ABY/Happy_mare.tga"
			}
			army = {
				large ="gfx/leaders/ABY/Happy_mare.tga"
				small ="gfx/interface/ideas/Advisors/ABY/ABY_sharp_spear_2.tga"
			}
		}
		add_popularity = { ideology = neutrality popularity = 0.025 }
		add_political_power = 25
		add_ideas = ABY_monsoc_gomez
	}
}

country_event = { #I love democracy
	id = abyssinia.195
	immediate = {
		log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event abyssinia.195"
		ABY_calculate_seats = yes
	}
	title = abyssinia.195.t
	desc = abyssinia.195.d
	picture = GFX_event_vote_pony
	is_triggered_only = yes
	option = {
		name = abyssinia.195.a
		custom_effect_tooltip = ABY_election_result_explanation
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_country_flag = ABY_urf_split
			}
			custom_effect_tooltip = ABY_election_result_urf_split
		}
		else = {
			custom_effect_tooltip = ABY_election_result_urf
		}
		set_country_flag = ABY_unlock_parliament_cat
		unlock_decision_category_tooltip = ABY_parliament_cat
		hidden_effect = {
			ABY_initiate_parliament = yes
		}
		ABY_set_parliament_xy = yes
		hidden_effect = {
			country_event = { id = abyssinia.196 days = 1095 }
		}
		ABY_recalculate_election_date = yes

		meta_effect = {
			text = {
				set_politics = {
					ruling_party = communism
					elections_allowed = yes
					last_election = "[DYNAMIC_DATE]"
					election_frequency = 36
				}
			}
			DYNAMIC_DATE = "[?global.date.GetDateStringNoHour]"
		}
		set_party_name = {
			ideology = democratic
			long_name = ABY_pla_party_long
			name = ABY_pla_party
		}
		#set_politics = {
		#	ruling_party = communism
		#	elections_allowed = yes
		#	last_election = "1935.12.17"
		#	election_frequency = 36
		#}
	}
}
country_event = { #Elections
	id = abyssinia.196
	immediate = {
		log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event abyssinia.196"
		ABY_calculate_seats = yes
	}
	title = abyssinia.196.t
	desc = abyssinia.196.d
	picture = GFX_event_vote_pony
	is_triggered_only = yes
	option = {
		name = abyssinia.196.a
		custom_effect_tooltip = ABY_election_result_explanation
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_country_flag = ABY_urf_split
			}
			custom_effect_tooltip = ABY_election_result_urf_split
			custom_effect_tooltip = ABY_coalitions_gone
			clear_array = ABY_coalitions_array
			clr_country_flag = ABY_asp_alliance
			clr_country_flag = ABY_pla_alliance
			remove_from_array = { ABY_coalitions_array = 1 }
			remove_from_array = { ABY_coalitions_array = 3 }
			ABY_PLMT_re_render = yes
		}
		else = {
			custom_effect_tooltip = ABY_election_result_urf
		}
		custom_effect_tooltip = ABY_apf_support_gone
		set_variable = { ABY_apf_support = 0 }
		ABY_initiate_parliament = yes
		ABY_recalculate_election_date = yes
		hidden_effect = {
			country_event = abyssinia.197
			if = {
				limit = {
					NOT = {
						has_country_flag = ABY_minority_event_triggered
					}
					NOT = {
						ABY_PLMT_has_majority = yes
					}
				}
				set_country_flag = ABY_minority_event_triggered
				country_event = { id = abyssinia.213 days = 1 }
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					NOT = {
						has_country_flag = ABY_majority_event_triggered
					}
					ABY_PLMT_has_majority = yes
				}
				set_country_flag = ABY_majority_event_triggered
				country_event = { id = abyssinia.214 days = 30 }
			}
		}
	}
}

	is_triggered_only = yes

	}

country_event = { #Donkey decimation
	id = abyssinia.198
	immediate = {log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event abyssinia.198"}
	title = abyssinia.198.t
	desc = abyssinia.198.d
	picture = GFX_event_zebrica_1
	is_triggered_only = yes
	option = {
		name = abyssinia.198.a
		add_political_power = 50
		add_stability = -0.05
		every_possible_country = {
			limit = {
				has_character = ABY_donkey_general
			}
			ABY_donkey_general = {
				retire = yes
			}
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = abyssinia.198.b
		add_political_power = 25
		trigger = {
			OR = {
				ANS = {
					exists = yes
				}
				ASS = {
					exists = yes
				}
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				ASS = {
					exists = yes
				}
			}
			effect_tooltip = {
				every_possible_country = {
					limit = {
						has_character = ABY_donkey_general
					}
					ABY_donkey_general = {
						set_nationality = ASS
					}
				}
			}
			ASS = {
				country_event = abyssinia.199
			}
		}
		else = {
			effect_tooltip = {
				every_possible_country = {
					limit = {
						has_character = ABY_donkey_general
					}
					ABY_donkey_general = {
						set_nationality = ANS
					}
				}
			}
			ANS = {
				country_event = abyssinia.199
			}
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = abyssinia.198.c
		add_stability = 0.05
	}
}

country_event = { #Organizing provinces
	id = abyssinia.202
	immediate = {log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event abyssinia.202"}
	title = abyssinia.202.t
	desc = abyssinia.202.d
	picture = GFX_event_zebrica_1
	is_triggered_only = yes
	option = {
		name = abyssinia.202.a
		ABY_apf_opposes = yes
		set_country_flag = ABY_big_provinces
		#Setup arrays
		#Big provinces:
			#1. 775, 777, 785, 776, 786 urban
			#2. 773, 772, 771, 778, 774, (1208) rural
			#3. 779, 780, 1201, (1200), 782, 783, (784) rural
			#4. 741, 740, 738 urban
			#5. 737, 734, 733, 731, 732, 736, 735 urban
			#6. 760, 761, 759, 758 rural
			#7. 766, 770, 763 rural
			#8. 792, 801, 790, 795, 799 urban
			#9. 807, 808, 810, 812, 828, 827 rural
			#10. 788, 789, 955, 954, 956, 958, 957 urban

		for_loop_effect = {
			start = 1
			end = 11
			value = i

			add_to_array = { ABY_prov_list = i }
		}

		add_to_array = { ABY_prov_1 = 775 }
		add_to_array = { ABY_prov_1 = 777 }
		add_to_array = { ABY_prov_1 = 785 }
		add_to_array = { ABY_prov_1 = 776 }
		add_to_array = { ABY_prov_1 = 786 }

		add_to_array = { ABY_prov_2 = 778 }

		add_to_array = { ABY_prov_6 = 760 }
		add_to_array = { ABY_prov_6 = 761 }
		add_to_array = { ABY_prov_6 = 759 }
		add_to_array = { ABY_prov_6 = 758 }

		add_to_array = { ABY_prov_7 = 766 }
		add_to_array = { ABY_prov_7 = 770 }
		add_to_array = { ABY_prov_7 = 763 }

		add_to_array = { ABY_prov_8 = 792 }
		add_to_array = { ABY_prov_8 = 801 }

		add_to_array = { ABY_prov_8 = 799 }

		add_to_array = { ABY_prov_9 = 807 }
		add_to_array = { ABY_prov_9 = 808 }
		add_to_array = { ABY_prov_9 = 810 }
		add_to_array = { ABY_prov_9 = 812 }
		add_to_array = { ABY_prov_9 = 828 }
		add_to_array = { ABY_prov_9 = 827 }

		add_to_array = { ABY_prov_10 = 788 }
		add_to_array = { ABY_prov_10 = 789 }
		add_to_array = { ABY_prov_10 = 955 }
		add_to_array = { ABY_prov_10 = 954 }
		add_to_array = { ABY_prov_10 = 956 }
		add_to_array = { ABY_prov_10 = 958 }
		add_to_array = { ABY_prov_10 = 957 }

		custom_effect_tooltip = ABY_explain_province_mechanic
		ABY_provincial_elections = yes
		activate_mission = ABY_provincial_elections
	}
	option = {
		name = abyssinia.202.b
		ABY_asp_opposes = yes
		set_country_flag = ABY_medium_provinces
		#Setup arrays
		#Medium provinces:
			#1. 775, 785 urban
			#2. 776, 786 urban
			#3. 772, 773, 771, (1208) rural
			#4. 777, 779, 780 rural
			#5. 778, 774, 782 rural
			#6. 783, 1201, (1200), (784) rural
			#7. 741, 740, 738 urban
			#8. 737, 734 urban
			#9. 733, 732, 731 urban
			#10. 736, 735 urban
			#11. 759, 758 rural
			#12. 760, 761 rural
			#13. 766, 770, 763 rural
			#14. 792, 801, 790 urban

			#18. 788, 789, 955 rural

			#20. 957, 958 urban

		for_loop_effect = {
			start = 1
			end = 21
			value = i

			add_to_array = { ABY_prov_list = i }

		custom_effect_tooltip = ABY_explain_small_provinces
		custom_effect_tooltip = ABY_explain_province_mechanic
		ABY_provincial_elections = yes
		activate_mission = ABY_provincial_elections
	}
}
