country_event = { #WNG live reaction
	id = abyssinia.207
	immediate = {log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event abyssinia.207"}
	title = abyssinia.207.t
	desc = {
		text = abyssinia.207.d_no_cw
		trigger = {
			ABY = {
				has_government = communism
				has_civil_war = no
			}
		}
	}
	desc = {
		text = abyssinia.207.d_wng_is_conservative
		trigger = {
			OR = {
				has_government = fascism
				has_government = neutrality
			}
		}
	}
	desc = {
		text = abyssinia.207.d_wng_is_pogressive
		trigger = {
			OR = {
				has_government = democratic
				has_government = communism
			}
		}
	}
	picture = GFX_event_pony_riot
	is_triggered_only = yes
	option = { #Help them
		name = abyssinia.207.a
		trigger = {
			OR = {
				has_government = democratic
				has_government = communism
			}
		}
		effect_tooltip = {
			if = {
				limit = {
					owns_state = 1200
				}
				ABY = {
					transfer_state = 1200
				}
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					owns_state = 1201
				}
				ABY = {
					transfer_state = 1201
				}
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				1200 = {
					is_claimed_by = ROOT
				}
			}
			remove_state_claim = 1200
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				1201 = {
					is_claimed_by = ROOT
				}
			}
			remove_state_claim = 1201
		}
		random_other_country = {
			limit = {
				original_tag = ABY
				has_government = communism
			}
			country_event = abyssinia.208
			ROOT = {
				add_opinion_modifier = { target = PREV modifier = common_cause }
				send_equipment = {
					target = PREV
					type = infantry_equipment
					amount = 1500
				}
			}
		}
		ai_chance = {
			base = 2
		}
	}
	option = { #Nows our chance
		name = abyssinia.207.b
		trigger = {
			has_government = fascism
			owns_state = 1200
			NOT = {
				owns_state = 1201
			}
			1201 = {
				owner = {
					has_war = yes
				}
			}
		}
		1201 = {
			owner = {
				country_event = wingbardy.60
			}
		}
		ai_chance = {
			base = 2
		}
	}
	option = { #Do nothing
		name = abyssinia.207.c
		trigger = {
			OR = {
				has_government = neutrality
				NOT = {
					owns_state = 1200
				}
				1201 = {
					owner = {
						has_war = no
					}
				}
			}
		}

		ai_chance = {
			base = 1
		}
	}
}
country_event = { #WNG helps us
	id = abyssinia.208
	immediate = {log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event abyssinia.208"}
	title = abyssinia.208.t
	desc = abyssinia.208.d
	picture = GFX_event_griffon_para
	is_triggered_only = yes
	option = {
		name = abyssinia.208.a
		if = {
			limit = {
				1201 = {
					is_demilitarized_zone = yes
				}
			}
			1201 = {
				set_demilitarized_zone = no
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				FROM = {
					owns_state = 1201
				}
			}
			transfer_state = 1201
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				FROM = {
					owns_state = 1200
				}
			}
			transfer_state = 1200
		}
		add_opinion_modifier = { target = FROM modifier = sent_equipment }
		effect_tooltip = {
			FROM = {
				send_equipment = {
					target = ROOT
					type = infantry_equipment
					amount = 1500
				}
			}
		}
		hidden_effect = {
			add_equipment_to_stockpile = {
				type = infantry_equipment
				amount = 500
				producer = WNG
			}
		}
	}
}

country_event = { #ABY offers alliance to MDL
	id = abyssinia.217
	immediate = {log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event abyssinia.217"}
	title = abyssinia.217.t
	desc = abyssinia.217.d
	picture = GFX_event_zebrica_1
	is_triggered_only = yes
	option = {
		name = abyssinia.217.a
		trigger = {
			AND = {
				owns_state = 741
				owns_state = 738
				owns_state = 740
			}
		}
		FROM = {
			country_event = { id = abyssinia.218 days = 3 }
		}
		ai_chance = {
			base = 2
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = abyssinia.217.b
		trigger = {
			NOT = {
				owns_state = 741
				owns_state = 738
				owns_state = 740
			}
		}
		FROM = {
			country_event = { id = abyssinia.219 days = 3 }
		}
		ai_chance = {
			base = 2
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = abyssinia.217.c
		FROM = {
			country_event = { id = abyssinia.220 days = 3 }
		}
		ai_chance = {
			base = 1
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				OR = {
					has_government = democratic
					has_government = communism
				}
			}
		}
	}
}
country_event = { #Manedalusia agrees
	id = abyssinia.218
	immediate = {log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event abyssinia.218"}
	title = abyssinia.218.t
	desc = abyssinia.218.d
	picture = GFX_event_zebrica_1
	is_triggered_only = yes
	option = {
		name = abyssinia.218.a
		if = {
			limit = {
				is_in_faction = no
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					FROM = {
						is_faction_leader = yes
					}
				}
				FROM = {
					country_event = generic.2
				}
			}
			else = {
				create_faction_from_template = faction_template_aby_com_alliance
				#Unfortunately i have to copy the code twice so the tooltip generates properly
				FROM = {
					country_event = generic.5
				}
			}
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = {
				is_faction_leader = yes
			}
			FROM = {
				country_event = generic.5
			}
		}
	}
}
country_event = { #Manedalusia agrees on one condition
	id = abyssinia.219
	immediate = {log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event abyssinia.219"}
	title = abyssinia.219.t
	desc = abyssinia.219.d
	picture = GFX_event_zebrica_1
	is_triggered_only = yes
	option = {
		name = abyssinia.219.a
		set_country_flag = ABY_agreed_to_liberate_mdl
		unlock_decision_tooltip = ABY_ally_with_mdl
		if = {
			limit = {
				owns_state = 741
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					741 = {
						is_claimed_by = ROOT
					}
				}
				remove_state_claim = 741
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					741 = {
						is_core_of = ROOT
					}
				}
				remove_state_core = 741
			}
			MDL = {
				transfer_state = 741
			}
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = {
				FROM = {
					NOT = {
						owns_state = 741
					}
				}
			}
			create_wargoal = {
				type = take_state_focus
				target = 741.owner
				generator = { 741 }
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				owns_state = 740
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					740 = {
						is_claimed_by = ROOT
					}
				}
				remove_state_claim = 740
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					740 = {
						is_core_of = ROOT
					}
				}
				remove_state_core = 740
			}
			MDL = {
				transfer_state = 740
			}
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = {
				FROM = {
					NOT = {
						owns_state = 740
					}
				}
			}
			create_wargoal = {
				type = take_state_focus
				target = 740.owner
				generator = { 740 }
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				owns_state = 738
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					738 = {
						is_claimed_by = ROOT
					}
				}
				remove_state_claim = 738
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					738 = {
						is_core_of = ROOT
					}
				}
				remove_state_core = 738
			}
			MDL = {
				transfer_state = 738
			}
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = {
				FROM = {
					NOT = {
						owns_state = 738
					}
				}
			}
			create_wargoal = {
				type = take_state_focus
				target = 738.owner
				generator = { 738 }
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				owns_state = 764
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					764 = {
						is_claimed_by = ROOT
					}
				}
				remove_state_claim = 764
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					764 = {
						is_core_of = ROOT
					}
				}
				remove_state_core = 764
			}
			MDL = {
				transfer_state = 764
			}
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = abyssinia.219.b
		FROM = {
			country_event = abyssinia.221
		}
	}
}

country_event = { #Basically a repeat of 167 but im lazy and copy pasting the code
	id = abyssinia.222
	immediate = {log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event abyssinia.222"}
	title = abyssinia.222.t
	desc = abyssinia.222.d
	picture = GFX_event_zebrica_1
	is_triggered_only = yes
	option = {
		name = abyssinia.222.a
		ABY_apf_opposes = yes
		if = {
			limit = {
				740 = {
					is_claimed_by = ROOT
				}
			}
			remove_state_claim = 740
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				741 = {
					is_claimed_by = ROOT
				}
			}
			remove_state_claim = 741
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				738 = {
					is_claimed_by = ROOT
				}
			}
			remove_state_claim = 738
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				764 = {
					is_claimed_by = ROOT
				}
			}
			remove_state_claim = 764
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				740 = {
					is_core_of = ROOT
				}
			}
			remove_state_core = 740
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				741 = {
					is_core_of = ROOT
				}
			}
			remove_state_core = 741
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				738 = {
					is_core_of = ROOT
				}
			}
			remove_state_core = 738
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				764 = {
					is_core_of = ROOT
				}
			}
			remove_state_core = 764
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				MDL = {
					exists = no
				}
			}
			release = MDL
		}
		MDL = {
			if = {
				limit = {
					NOT = {
						owns_state = 740
					}
					ROOT = {
						owns_state = 740
					}
				}
				transfer_state = 740
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					NOT = {
						owns_state = 741
					}
					ROOT = {
						owns_state = 741
					}
				}
				transfer_state = 741
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					NOT = {
						owns_state = 738
					}
					ROOT = {
						owns_state = 738
					}
				}
				transfer_state = 738
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					NOT = {
						owns_state = 764
					}
					ROOT = {
						owns_state = 764
					}
				}
				transfer_state = 764
			}
		}
		give_guarantee = MDL
		diplomatic_relation = {
			country = MDL
			relation = non_aggression_pact
			active = yes
		}
		hidden_effect = {
			MDL = {
				ABY = { MDL = { transfer_technology = yes } }
				load_oob = "MDL_army"
				set_politics = {
					ruling_party = neutrality
				}
			}
		}
	}
	option = {

country_event = { #Multiracial Empire/Union
	id = abyssinia.234
	immediate = {log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event abyssinia.234"}
	title = abyssinia.234.t
	desc = abyssinia.234.d
	picture = GFX_event_feast
	is_triggered_only = yes
	option = {
		name = abyssinia.234.a
		add_political_power = 300
		add_popularity = { ideology = communism popularity = 0.05 }
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_country_leader_with_trait = ABY_first_citizen
			}
			swap_ruler_traits = { remove = ABY_first_citizen add = ABY_first_citizen_2 }
			clr_country_flag = ABY_has_first_citizen
			set_country_flag = ABY_has_first_citizen_2
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = {
				has_country_leader_with_trait = ABY_empress_of_abyssinians
			}
			swap_ruler_traits = { remove = ABY_empress_of_abyssinians add = ABY_empress_of_liberty }
			clr_country_flag = ABY_has_emperor_of_aby
			set_country_flag = ABY_has_emperor_of_lib
		}

		if = {
			limit = {
				OR = {
					has_cosmetic_tag = ABY_monsoc_cosmetic
					has_cosmetic_tag = ABY_empire_2
				}
			}
			drop_cosmetic_tag = yes
			set_cosmetic_tag = ABY_liberty_empire
		}
		else = {
			drop_cosmetic_tag = yes
			set_cosmetic_tag = ABY_five_race_union
		}
	}
}

				has_country_flag = ABY_urf_split

			retire = yes
		}

			character = ABY_com_hc1

				ideology = democratic_socialism
				traits = {
					ABY_veteran_warrior
				}
				desc = ABY_com_hc1_desc
			}

			limit = {
				has_country_flag = ABY_has_first_citizen
			}

			}
			add_country_leader_trait = ABY_first_citizen_2
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = {
				has_country_flag = ABY_has_chief_minister
			}
			add_country_leader_trait = ABY_chief_minister
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = {
				has_country_flag = ABY_has_emperor_of_aby
			}
			add_country_leader_trait = ABY_emperor_of_abyssinians
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = {
				has_country_flag = ABY_has_emperor_of_lib
			}
			add_country_leader_trait = ABY_emperor_of_liberty
		}
		custom_effect_tooltip = ABY_another_game_over_tooltip
	}
	option = {
		name = abyssinia.241.b
		ABY_caretaker_gov = {
			retire = yes
		}
		add_country_leader_role = {
			character = ABY_com_hc2
			promote_leader = yes
			country_leader = {
				expire = "1965.1.1"
				ideology = democratic_socialism
				traits = {
					ABY_socialist_priest
				}
				desc = ABY_com_hc2_desc
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_country_flag = ABY_has_first_citizen
			}
			add_country_leader_trait = ABY_first_citizen
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = {
				has_country_flag = ABY_has_first_citizen_2
			}
			add_country_leader_trait = ABY_first_citizen_2
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = {
				has_country_flag = ABY_has_chief_minister
			}
			add_country_leader_trait = ABY_chief_minister
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = {
				has_country_flag = ABY_has_emperor_of_aby
			}
			add_country_leader_trait = ABY_empress_of_abyssinians
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = {
				has_country_flag = ABY_has_emperor_of_lib
			}
			add_country_leader_trait = ABY_empress_of_liberty
		}
		custom_effect_tooltip = ABY_another_game_over_tooltip
	}
	option = {
		name = abyssinia.241.c
		ABY_caretaker_gov = {
			retire = yes
		}
		add_country_leader_role = {
			character = ABY_com_hc3
			promote_leader = yes
			country_leader = {
				expire = "1965.1.1"
				ideology = democratic_socialism
				traits = {
					ABY_charismatic_and_corrupt
				}
				desc = ABY_com_hc3_desc
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_country_flag = ABY_has_first_citizen
			}
			add_country_leader_trait = ABY_first_citizen
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = {
				has_country_flag = ABY_has_first_citizen_2
			}
			add_country_leader_trait = ABY_first_citizen_2
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = {
				has_country_flag = ABY_has_chief_minister
			}
			add_country_leader_trait = ABY_chief_minister
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = {
				has_country_flag = ABY_has_emperor_of_aby
			}
			add_country_leader_trait = ABY_emperor_of_abyssinians
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = {
				has_country_flag = ABY_has_emperor_of_lib
			}
			add_country_leader_trait = ABY_emperor_of_liberty
		}
		custom_effect_tooltip = ABY_another_game_over_tooltip
	}
}
country_event = { #WAIT THAT GUY ISNT A SOCIALIST STOP
	id = abyssinia.242
	immediate = {log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event abyssinia.242"}
	title = abyssinia.242.t
	desc = abyssinia.242.d
	picture = GFX_event_zebrica_1
	is_triggered_only = yes
	fire_only_once = yes
	option = {
		name = abyssinia.242.a
		hidden_effect = {
			#Failsafe
			if = {
				limit = {
					NOT = {
						has_character = ABY_the_patriot
					}
				}
				every_possible_country = {
					limit = {
						has_character = ABY_the_patriot
					}
					ABY_the_patriot = {
						set_nationality = ROOT
					}
				}
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					NOT = {
						ABY_the_patriot = {
							can_be_country_leader = yes
						}
					}
				}
				ABY_the_patriot = {
					add_country_leader_role = {
						country_leader = {
							expire = "1965.1.1"
							ideology = khakistocracy
							traits = { veteran_guerrilla_fighter }
							desc = ABY_the_patriot_desc
						}
						promote_leader = yes
					}
				}
			}
			else = {
				ABY_the_patriot = {
					promote_character = khakistocracy
				}
			}
		}
		set_politics = {
			ruling_party = neutrality
		}
		ABY_caretaker_gov = {
			retire = yes
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_country_flag = ABY_has_first_citizen
			}
			add_country_leader_trait = ABY_first_citizen
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = {
				has_country_flag = ABY_has_first_citizen_2
			}
			add_country_leader_trait = ABY_first_citizen_2
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = {
				has_country_flag = ABY_has_chief_minister
			}
			add_country_leader_trait = ABY_chief_minister
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = {
				has_country_flag = ABY_has_emperor_of_aby
			}
			add_country_leader_trait = ABY_emperor_of_abyssinians
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = {
				has_country_flag = ABY_has_emperor_of_lib
			}
			add_country_leader_trait = ABY_emperor_of_liberty
		}
		custom_effect_tooltip = ABY_another_game_over_tooltip
	}
}
###########################
# Ace pilots Events
###########################

add_namespace = ace_promoted
add_namespace = ace_died
add_namespace = ace_killed_by_ace
add_namespace = ace_killed_other_ace
add_namespace = aces_killed_each_other

# New ace has been promoted
country_event = {
	id = ace_promoted.1
	immediate = {log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event ace_promoted.1"}
	title = ace_promoted.1.t
	desc = {
		text = ace_promoted.1.d
		trigger = {
			is_major = no
		}
	}
	desc = {
		text = ace_promoted.1.d_major
		trigger = {
			is_major = yes
		}
	}
	picture = GFX_report_event_ace_promoted
	minor_flavor = yes

	is_triggered_only = yes

	option = {
		name = ace_promoted.1.a
		add_war_support = 0.02
	}
}

country_event = {
	id = ace_promoted.2
	immediate = {log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event ace_promoted.2"}
	title = ace_promoted.2.t
	desc = {
		text = ace_promoted.1.d
		trigger = {
			is_major = no
		}
	}
	desc = {
		text = ace_promoted.1.d_major
		trigger = {
			is_major = yes
		}
	}
	picture = GFX_report_event_ace_promoted

	option = {
		name = ace_promoted.1.a

	}
}

# Ace died
country_event = {
	id = ace_died.1
	immediate = {log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event ace_died.1"}
	title = ace_died.1.t
	desc = {
		text = ace_died.1.d
		trigger = {
			is_major = no
		}
	}
	desc = {
		text = ace_died.1.d_major
		trigger = {
			is_major = yes
		}
	}
	picture = GFX_report_event_ace_died
	minor_flavor = yes

	is_triggered_only = yes

	option = {
		name = ace_died.1.a
		add_war_support = -0.02
	}
}

# Ace killed by other Ace
country_event = {
	id = ace_killed_by_ace.1
	immediate = {log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event ace_killed_by_ace.1"}
	title = ace_killed_by_ace.1.t
	desc = {
		text = ace_killed_by_ace.1.d
		#Don't show equipment name for countried with default names, e.g. Fighter I
		trigger = {
			OR = {
				NOT = {
					PREV = {
						OWNER = {
							is_major = yes
						}
					}
				}
				NOT = {
					FROM = {
						OWNER = {
							is_major = yes
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}
	desc = {
		text = ace_killed_by_ace.1.d_major
		#We're only showing wing name for the countries that have nicely named planes
		trigger = {
			PREV = {
				OWNER = {
					is_major = yes
				}
			}
			FROM = {
				OWNER = {
					is_major = yes
				}
			}
		}
	}
	picture = GFX_report_event_ace_died
	minor_flavor = yes

	is_triggered_only = yes

	option = {
		name = ace_killed_by_ace.1.a
		add_war_support = -0.03
	}
}

# Ace killed other nations Ace

#Adelart#
add_namespace = adelart
add_namespace = adelart_flavor
add_namespace = adelart_news

country_event = {
	id = adelart.1 #Merlock Calls Up Everyone to Celebrate
	title = adelart.1.t
	desc = adelart.1.d

	picture = GFX_event_forest_celebration
	is_triggered_only = yes

	option = { #Come one, come all!
		name = adelart.1.a
		add_stability = 0.05
		swap_ideas = {
			remove_idea = volunteer_only
			add_idea = limited_conscription
		}
		swap_ideas = {
			remove_idea = civilian_economy
			add_idea = low_economic_mobilisation
		}
		hidden_effect = { country_event = { id = adelart.2 days = 3 } }
	}

}

country_event = { #The Old and the New
	id = adelart.2
	title = adelart.2.t
	desc = adelart.2.d

	picture = GFX_event_shanty_town
	is_triggered_only = yes

	option = { #Awww why are you all fighting
		name = adelart.2.a
		add_stability = -0.05
		hidden_effect = { country_event = { id = adelart.6 days = 3 } }
	}

}

country_event = { #Descieux Offer First
	id = adelart.3
	title = adelart.3.t
	desc = adelart.3.d

	picture = GFX_event_forest_mysterious
	is_triggered_only = yes

	option = {
		name = adelart.3.a
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 33
			modifier = {
				OR = {
					has_country_flag = HEL_AI_EYRITE
					has_game_rule = {
						rule = HEL_ai_behavior
						option = EYRITE
					}
					has_country_flag = HEL_AI_CONFEDERAL_RED
					has_game_rule = {
						rule = HEL_ai_behavior
						option = CONFEDERAL_RED
					}
					has_country_flag = HEL_AI_CONFEDERAL_GREEN
					has_game_rule = {
						rule = HEL_ai_behavior
						option = CONFEDERAL_GREEN
					}
					has_country_flag = HEL_AI_OIL_DEM
					has_game_rule = {
						rule = HEL_ai_behavior
						option = OIL_DEM
					}
					has_country_flag = HEL_AI_HISTORICAL
					has_game_rule = {
						rule = HEL_ai_behavior
						option = HISTORICAL
					}
					AND = {
						has_game_rule = {
							rule = HEL_ai_behavior
							option = DEFAULT
						}
						is_historical_focus_on = yes
					}
					has_country_flag = HEL_AI_OIL_DEM
					has_country_flag = HEL_AI_SHERIFF
					has_game_rule = {
						rule = HEL_ai_behavior
						option = SHERIFF
					}
				}
				factor = 0
			}
		}
		trigger = {
			NOT = { has_country_flag = HEL_commit_prelate }
			NOT = { has_country_flag = HEL_commit_jaume }
		}
		add_political_power = 60
		#custom_effect_tooltip = HEL_commit_descieux_tt
		set_country_flag = HEL_commit_descieux
	}

	option = {
		name = adelart.3.b
		trigger = {
			NOT = { has_country_flag = HEL_commit_prelate }
		}
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 33
			modifier = {
				OR = {
					has_country_flag = HEL_AI_VANGUARD
					has_game_rule = {
						rule = HEL_ai_behavior
						option = VANGUARD
					}
					has_country_flag = HEL_AI_EYRITE
					has_game_rule = {
						rule = HEL_ai_behavior
						option = EYRITE
					}
					has_country_flag = HEL_AI_CONFEDERAL_RED
					has_game_rule = {
						rule = HEL_ai_behavior
						option = CONFEDERAL_RED
					}
					has_country_flag = HEL_AI_CONFEDERAL_GREEN
					has_game_rule = {
						rule = HEL_ai_behavior
						option = CONFEDERAL_GREEN
					}
					has_country_flag = HEL_AI_OIL_DEM
					has_game_rule = {
						rule = HEL_ai_behavior
						option = OIL_DEM
					}
					has_country_flag = HEL_AI_SHERIFF
					has_game_rule = {
						rule = HEL_ai_behavior
						option = SHERIFF
					}
				}
				factor = 0
			}
		}
		add_political_power = 30
		#custom_effect_tooltip = HEL_commit_moderate_descieux_tt
		set_country_flag = HEL_commit_moderate_descieux
	}

	option = {
		name = adelart.3.c
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 33
			modifier = {
				OR = {
					has_country_flag = HEL_AI_VANGUARD
					has_game_rule = {
						rule = HEL_ai_behavior
						option = VANGUARD
					}
					has_country_flag = HEL_AI_HISTORICAL
					has_game_rule = {
						rule = HEL_ai_behavior
						option = HISTORICAL
					}
					AND = {
						has_game_rule = {
							rule = HEL_ai_behavior
							option = DEFAULT
						}
						is_historical_focus_on = yes
					}
				}
				factor = 0
			}
		}
		#custom_effect_tooltip = HEL_refuse_descieux_tt
		set_country_flag = HEL_refuse_descieux
	}

}

		}
		#custom_effect_tooltip = HEL_refuse_jaume_tt
		set_country_flag = HEL_refuse_jaume
	}
}

country_event = { #The Sheriff Lurks
	id = adelart.10
	title = adelart.10.t
	desc = adelart.10.d

	picture = GFX_event_autumn_forest

	is_triggered_only = yes

	option = {
		name = adelart.10.a # Flowenans will help us, he threatens their business!
		trigger = { has_completed_focus = HEL_of_bankers_and_bandits }
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 25
			modifier = {
				OR = {
					has_country_flag = HEL_AI_VANGUARD
					has_game_rule = {
						rule = HEL_ai_behavior
						option = VANGUARD
					}
					has_country_flag = HEL_AI_HISTORICAL
					has_game_rule = {
						rule = HEL_ai_behavior
						option = HISTORICAL
					}
					AND = {
						has_game_rule = {
							rule = HEL_ai_behavior
							option = DEFAULT
						}
						is_historical_focus_on = yes
					}
					has_country_flag = HEL_AI_CONFEDERAL_GREEN
					has_game_rule = {
						rule = HEL_ai_behavior
						option = CONFEDERAL_GREEN
					}
					has_country_flag = HEL_AI_CONFEDERAL_RED
					has_game_rule = {
						rule = HEL_ai_behavior
						option = CONFEDERAL_RED
					}
					has_country_flag = HEL_AI_EYRITE
					has_game_rule = {
						rule = HEL_ai_behavior
						option = EYRITE
					}
					has_country_flag = HEL_AI_SHERIFF
					has_game_rule = {
						rule = HEL_ai_behavior
						option = SHERIFF
					}
				}
				factor = 0
			}
		}
		hidden_effect = { country_event = { id = adelart.16 days = 4 } }
	}

	option = {
		name = adelart.10.b # the People will help us, they stand with Wood!
		trigger = {
			NOT = { has_completed_focus = HEL_grovel_for_loans }
		}
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 25
			modifier = {
				OR = {
					has_country_flag = HEL_AI_VANGUARD
					has_game_rule = {
						rule = HEL_ai_behavior
						option = VANGUARD
					}
					has_country_flag = HEL_AI_OIL_DEM
					has_game_rule = {
						rule = HEL_ai_behavior
						option = OIL_DEM
					}
					has_country_flag = HEL_AI_EYRITE
					has_game_rule = {
						rule = HEL_ai_behavior
						option = EYRITE
					}
					has_country_flag = HEL_AI_HISTORICAL
					has_game_rule = {
						rule = HEL_ai_behavior
						option = HISTORICAL
					}
					AND = {
						has_game_rule = {
							rule = HEL_ai_behavior
							option = DEFAULT
						}
						is_historical_focus_on = yes
					}
					has_country_flag = HEL_AI_SHERIFF
					has_game_rule = {
						rule = HEL_ai_behavior
						option = SHERIFF
					}
				}
				factor = 0
			}
		}

		if = {
			limit = {
				OR = {
				has_completed_focus = HEL_advance_the_revolution
				has_completed_focus = HEL_revoke_the_privileges
				}
			}
			hidden_effect = { country_event = { id = adelart.23 days = 3 } }
		}
		else = {
			hidden_effect = { country_event = { id = adelart.24 days = 3 } }
		}

	}

	option = {
		name = adelart.10.c # Our Bandit Militias will root him out at last!
		trigger = {
			has_completed_focus = HEL_disarm_dispossess_distribute
		}
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 25
			modifier = {
				OR = {
					has_country_flag = HEL_AI_EYRITE
					has_game_rule = {
						rule = HEL_ai_behavior
						option = EYRITE
					}
					has_country_flag = HEL_AI_OIL_DEM
					has_game_rule = {
						rule = HEL_ai_behavior
						option = OIL_DEM
					}
					has_country_flag = HEL_AI_VANGUARD
					has_game_rule = {
						rule = HEL_ai_behavior
						option = VANGUARD
					}
					has_country_flag = HEL_AI_CONFEDERAL_RED
					has_game_rule = {
						rule = HEL_ai_behavior
						option = CONFEDERAL_RED
					}
					has_country_flag = HEL_AI_CONFEDERAL_GREEN
					has_game_rule = {
						rule = HEL_ai_behavior
						option = CONFEDERAL_GREEN
					}
					has_country_flag = HEL_AI_SHERIFF
					has_game_rule = {
						rule = HEL_ai_behavior
						option = SHERIFF
					}
				}
				factor = 0
			}
		}

		if = {
			limit = { has_completed_focus = HEL_advance_the_revolution }
			hidden_effect = { country_event = { id = adelart.23 days = 3 } }
		}
		else = {
			hidden_effect = { country_event = { id = adelart.46 days = 4 } }
		}
	}

	option = {
		name = adelart.10.e # Descieux's Partisans will prove their loyalty and crush him!
		trigger = { has_completed_focus = HEL_revolutionary_central_command }

		ai_chance = {
			base = 25
			modifier = {
				OR = {
					has_country_flag = HEL_AI_EYRITE
					has_game_rule = {
						rule = HEL_ai_behavior
						option = EYRITE
					}
					has_country_flag = HEL_AI_OIL_DEM
					has_game_rule = {
						rule = HEL_ai_behavior
						option = OIL_DEM
					}
					has_country_flag = HEL_AI_HISTORICAL
					has_game_rule = {
						rule = HEL_ai_behavior
						option = HISTORICAL
					}
					AND = {
						has_game_rule = {
							rule = HEL_ai_behavior
							option = DEFAULT
						}
						is_historical_focus_on = yes
					}
					has_country_flag = HEL_AI_CONFEDERAL_RED
					has_game_rule = {
						rule = HEL_ai_behavior
						option = CONFEDERAL_RED
					}
					has_country_flag = HEL_AI_CONFEDERAL_GREEN
					has_game_rule = {
						rule = HEL_ai_behavior
						option = CONFEDERAL_GREEN
					}

					has_game_rule = {
						rule = HEL_ai_behavior
						option = SHERIFF
					}
				}
				factor = 0
			}
		}

		}
	}

							rule = HEL_ai_behavior
							option = DEFAULT

					}
					has_country_flag = HEL_AI_CONFEDERAL_RED
					has_game_rule = {
						rule = HEL_ai_behavior

					}

			HEL_jean_weineg = { retire = yes }
		}

			limit = {
				NOT = { has_completed_focus = HEL_loyal_leagues_of_green }
			}
			hidden_effect = {
				load_focus_tree = adelart_sheriff_focus
				mark_focus_tree_layout_dirty = yes
			}
			swap_ideas = {
				remove_idea = HEL_unstable_government
				add_idea = HEL_chaotic_government
			}
		}
		else = {
			hidden_effect = {
				country_event = { id = adelart.19 days = 5 }
			}
		}
		set_politics = { ruling_party = fascism }
	}
}

			}

				ideology = neutrality
				long_name = HEL_neu_temp_party_long
				name = HEL_neu_temp_party
			}
		}
	}

		name = adelart.22.a

	option = {

		}

			country_event = { id = adelart.22 days = 3 }
		}
	}

			NOT = { has_completed_focus = HEL_the_outlaw_in_chief }
		}
		hidden_effect = {
			country_event = { id = adelart.19 days = 3 }
		}
	}

	}
	option = {
		name = adelart.681.b
		ai_chance = { factor = 0 }
		HEL = { country_event = {id = adelart.701 days = 5 } }
	}
}

	}
	option = {
		name = adelart.86.b #No thanks
		FROM = {
			country_event = { id = adelart.88 days = 1 }
		}
		ai_chance = { factor = 10 }
	}
}

country_event =	{ #Loan given from Adelart
	id = adelart.87
	immediate = {log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event adelart.87"}
	title = adelart.87.t
	desc = adelart.87.d
	picture = GFX_event_bank_vault
	is_triggered_only = yes
	option = {
		name = adelart.87.a
		if = {
			limit = { original_tag = TRD }
			custom_effect_tooltip = TRD_1_GAIN_BANK
			add_to_variable = {
				var = bank
				value = 1
			}
		}
		else = {
			add_timed_idea = { idea = HEL_shittier_loan_idea	days = 720 }
		}
		set_country_flag = HEL_loan_taken
	}
}

country_event =	{
	id = adelart.90 #Mercenaries Killed
	immediate = {log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event adelart.90"}
	title = adelart.90.t
	desc = adelart.90.d
	picture = GFX_event_autumn_forest
	is_triggered_only = yes
	option = {
		name = adelart.90.a
			if = {
			limit = { has_dlc = "By Blood Alone" }
			set_technology = {
				iw_small_airframe = 1
				iw_medium_airframe = 1
				aa_lmg = 1
				engines_1 = 1
				early_bombs = 1
			}
			generic_early_fighter = yes
			generic_early_tac_bomber = yes
			add_equipment_to_stockpile = {
				type = small_plane_airframe
				amount = 50
				producer = HEL
				variant_name = "Early Fighter"
			}
			add_equipment_to_stockpile = {
				type =	medium_plane_airframe
				amount = 25
				producer = HEL
				variant_name = "Early Tactical Bomber"
			}
		}
		else = {
			set_technology = {
				early_fighter = 1
				early_bomber = 1
			}
			add_equipment_to_stockpile = {
				type = small_plane_airframe
				amount = 50
				producer = HEL
			}
			add_equipment_to_stockpile = {
				type =	medium_plane_airframe
				amount = 25
				producer = HEL
			}
		}
		HEL_promote_blacktalon = yes
	}
}

country_event =	{
	id = adelart.103 #Sheriff Deals With Luca
	immediate = {log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event adelart.103"}
	title = adelart.103.t
	desc = adelart.103.d
	picture = GFX_event_forest_bridge
	is_triggered_only = yes
	option = {
		name = adelart.103.a
				if = {
			limit = { has_idea = HEL_moderate_church_support }
			remove_ideas = HEL_moderate_church_support
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = { has_idea = HEL_moderate_church_anger }
			remove_ideas = HEL_moderate_church_anger
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = { has_idea = HEL_large_church_anger }
			remove_ideas = HEL_large_church_anger
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = { has_idea = HEL_large_church_support }
			remove_ideas = HEL_large_church_support
		}
		else = {
			remove_ideas = HEL_autonomous_religious_communities
		}
	}
}

country_event = {
	id = adelart.104 #Avenge the Count!
	immediate = {log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event adelart.104"}
	title = adelart.104.t
	desc = adelart.104.d
	picture = GFX_event_forest_pond
	is_triggered_only = yes
	option = {
		name = adelart.104.a
		if = {
			limit = { has_idea = HEL_fairly_stable_government }
			swap_ideas = {
				remove_idea = HEL_fairly_stable_government
				add_idea = HEL_stable_government
			}
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = { has_idea = HEL_unstable_government }
			swap_ideas = {
				remove_idea = HEL_unstable_government
				add_idea = HEL_fairly_stable_government
			}
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = { has_idea = HEL_chaotic_government }
			swap_ideas = {
				remove_idea = HEL_chaotic_government
				add_idea = HEL_unstable_government
			}
		}
		add_ideas = HEL_count_charel_idea
	}
}

country_event =	{
	id = adelart.108 #Auctioning off the Land
	immediate = {log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event adelart.108"}
	title = adelart.108.t
	desc = adelart.108.d
	picture = GFX_event_forest_bridge
	is_triggered_only = yes

	option = {
			name = adelart.108.a
		one_random_industrial_complex = yes
		random_owned_state = {
			add_extra_state_shared_building_slots = 1
			add_building_construction = {
				type = infrastructure
				level = 2
				instant_build = yes
			}
		}
	}
}

country_event =	{
	id = adelart.109 #March of the Oilgriffs
	immediate = {log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event adelart.109"}
	title = adelart.109.t
	desc = adelart.109.d
	picture = GFX_event_forest_bridge
	is_triggered_only = yes
	option = {
		name = adelart.109.a
		every_owned_state = { add_extra_state_shared_building_slots = 1 }
	}
}

country_event =	{
	id = adelart.110 #Sheriff's Service Flavor #1 - Citizenry
	immediate = {log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event adelart.110"}
	title = adelart.110.t
	desc = adelart.110.d
	picture = GFX_event_forest_bridge
	is_triggered_only = yes
	option = {
		name = adelart.110.a
		save_current_manpower = yes
		494 = {
			add_extra_state_shared_building_slots = 1
			add_manpower = -1000
		}
		493 = {
			add_extra_state_shared_building_slots = 1
			add_manpower = -1000
		}
		495 = {
			add_extra_state_shared_building_slots = 1
			add_manpower = -1000
		}
		restore_previous_manpower = yes
	}
}

country_event =	{
	id = adelart.111 #Sheriff's Service Flavor #2 - Religious
	immediate = {log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event adelart.110"}
	title = adelart.111.t
	desc = adelart.111.d
	picture = GFX_event_forest_bridge
	is_triggered_only = yes
	option = {
		name = adelart.111.a
		every_owned_state = {
			limit = {
				NOT = { is_core_of = HEL }
			}
			add_resistance = -10
			add_compliance = 10
		}
	}
}

country_event =	{
	id = adelart.112 #Sheriff's Service Flavor #3 - Inner Circle
	immediate = {log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event adelart.112"}
	title = adelart.112.t
	desc = adelart.112.d
	picture = GFX_event_forest_mysterious
	is_triggered_only = yes
	option = {
		name = adelart.112.a
		add_popularity = {
			ideology = fascism
			popularity = 0.1
		}
		create_operative_leader = {
			name = "Colonel Andr"
			GFX = GFX_portrait_HEL_Colonel_Andre
			traits = { operative_infiltrator operative_web_of_lies griffon_race_trait }
			bypass_recruitment = yes
			nationalities = { ERI EYR HEL AET JER JEB JFT JES JRR AVI POM VIN FLO FEZ MER }
		}
	}
}

country_event =	{
	id = adelart.113 #We Do a Little Timeline Editing
	immediate = {log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event adelart.113"}
	title = adelart.113.t
	desc = adelart.113.d
	picture = GFX_event_forest_bridge
	is_triggered_only = yes
	option = {
		name = adelart.113.a
		if = {
			limit = { has_idea = HEL_count_charel_idea }
			swap_ideas = {
				remove_idea = HEL_count_charel_idea
				add_idea = HEL_king_charel_idea
			}
		}
		else = {
			swap_ideas = {
				remove_idea = HEL_count_idea
				add_idea = HEL_king_cloudet_idea
			}
		}
	}
}

	}

news_event = {
	id = adelart_news.1
	title = adelart_news.1.t
	desc = adelart_news.1.d

	picture = GFX_news_griffon_mountain_2
	is_triggered_only = yes

	option = {
		name = adelart_news.1.a
		trigger = {
			NOT = { tag = HEL }
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = adelart_news.1.b
		trigger = { tag = HEL }
	}
}
#Angriver#
add_namespace = angriver
add_namespace = angriver_news

country_event = { #People Moving In
	id = angriver.1
	immediate = {log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event angriver.1"}
	title = angriver.1.t
	desc = angriver.1.d

	picture = GFX_farm_event
	is_triggered_only = yes

	option = {
		name = angriver.1.a
		add_political_power = 25
		add_stability = 0.02
		411 = {
			add_manpower = 15000
			}
		547 = {
			add_manpower = 15000
		}
	}
}

country_event = { #Dorflehrer-Programm Paying Off
	id = angriver.8
	immediate = {log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event angriver.8"}
	title = angriver.8.t
	desc = angriver.8.d

	picture = GFX_event_school
	is_triggered_only = yes

	option = {
		name = angriver.8.a
		add_stability = 0.02
		if = {
		limit = { has_government = neutrality }
		add_popularity = { ideology = neutrality popularity = 0.02 }
		}
		else_if = {
		limit = { has_government = fascism }
		add_popularity = { ideology = fascism popularity = 0.02 }
		}
		else_if = {
		limit = { has_government = communism }
		add_popularity = { ideology = communism popularity = 0.02 }
		}
		else_if = {
		limit = { has_government = democratic }
		add_popularity = { ideology = democratic popularity = 0.02 }
		}
	}
}

country_event = { #Looting the Zentralbank
	id = angriver.9
	immediate = {log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event angriver.9"}
	title = angriver.9.t
	desc = angriver.9.d

	picture = GFX_event_bank_vault
	trigger = {
		original_tag = ANG
		has_government = communism
	    has_idea = ANG_national_bank_idea
	}
	mean_time_to_happen = { days = 3 }
	fire_only_once = yes

	option = {
		name = angriver.9.a
		add_manpower = -500
		add_political_power = 75
		add_popularity = { ideology = communism popularity = 0.03 }
		remove_ideas = ANG_national_bank_idea
	}
}

country_event = { #GRI informed its shit got stolen
	id = angriver.10
	immediate = {log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event angriver.10"}
	title = angriver.10.t
	desc = angriver.10.d

	picture = GFX_event_griffon_royal_guard
	is_triggered_only = yes

	option = {
		name = angriver.10.a
		effect_tooltip = {
			if = {
				limit = {
					has_government = neutrality
				}
				transfer_units_fraction = {
					target = FROM          # the recipient
					target_organization = 1
					source_organization = 1
					size = 0.1             # [0,1] Default value for the ratio below if they are not specified
					stockpile_ratio = 0  # [0,1] Overrides size modifier for the stockpiled equipment and fuel
					army_ratio = 0.1       # [0,1] Overrides size modifier for army
					navy_ratio = 0       # [0,1] Overrides size modifier for navy
					air_ratio = 0.1        # [0,1] Overrides size modifier for air
					keep_unit_leaders_trigger = {
						always = yes
					}
				}
			}
			else = {
				transfer_units_fraction = {
					target = FROM          # the recipient
					target_organization = 1
					source_organization = 1
					size = 0.15             # [0,1] Default value for the ratio below if they are not specified
					stockpile_ratio = 0.15  # [0,1] Overrides size modifier for the stockpiled equipment and fuel
					army_ratio = 0.15       # [0,1] Overrides size modifier for army
					navy_ratio = 0       # [0,1] Overrides size modifier for navy
					air_ratio = 0.15        # [0,1] Overrides size modifier for air
					keep_unit_leaders_trigger = {
						always = yes
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}
}

	desc = angriver.11.d

	picture = GFX_event_gothic_interior
	is_triggered_only = yes

	option = {
		name = angriver.11.a
		add_political_power = 50
		add_stability = 0.03
		add_popularity = { ideology = fascism popularity = 0.03 }
		GRI = {
			GRI_ferdinand_dawnclaw = {
				retire = yes
			}
		}
		hidden_effect = {
			country_event = {
				id = angriver.12
				days = 1
			}
		}
	}
}

country_event = { #Our Enemies Strike!
	id = angriver.21
	immediate = {log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event angriver.21"}
	title = angriver.21.t
	desc = angriver.21.d

	picture = GFX_event_griffon_with_gun
	is_triggered_only = yes

	option = { #The Baron Retains Control
		name = angriver.21.a
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 60
			modifier = {
				OR = {
					has_country_flag = ANG_AI_COMMUNIST
					has_game_rule = {
						rule = ANG_ai_behavior
						option = COMMUNIST
					}
					has_country_flag = ANG_AI_NEUTRALITY
					has_game_rule = {
						rule = ANG_ai_behavior
						option = NEUTRALITY
					}
					has_country_flag = ANG_AI_DEMOCRATIC
					has_game_rule = {
						rule = ANG_ai_behavior
						option = DEMOCRATIC
					}
				}
				factor = 0
			}
		}
		custom_effect_tooltip = ANG_political_tree_tp
		add_political_power = 50
		add_stability = 0.03
		set_party_name = {
		    ideology = neutrality
		    name = ANG_republicans
		    long_name = ANG_republicans_long
		}
		hidden_effect = {
			set_country_flag = ANG_the_barons_country
			load_focus_tree = { tree = angriver_focus_baron keep_completed = yes }
		}
		ANG_marc_kippenberger = {
			retire = yes
		}
	}

	option = { #The Revolutionaries Succeed!
		name = angriver.21.b
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 40
			modifier = {
				OR = {
					AND = {
						is_historical_focus_on = yes
						has_game_rule = {
							rule = ANG_ai_behavior
							option = DEFAULT
						}
					}
					has_country_flag = ANG_AI_HISTORICAL
					has_game_rule = {
						rule = ANG_ai_behavior
						option = HISTORICAL
					}
				}
				factor = 0
			}
		}
		add_political_power = -100
		add_stability = -0.10
		add_war_support = -0.10
		set_politics = {
			ruling_party = neutrality
			elections_allowed = no
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				ANG = { is_subject_of = GRI }
			}
			end_puppet_this = yes
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				ANG = {
					is_in_faction = yes
				}
			}
			ANG = {
				leave_faction = yes
			}
		}
		ANG_baron_leer_the_vicious = {
			remove_unit_leader_role = yes
		}
		set_party_name = {
		    ideology = neutrality
		    name = ANG_republicans
		    long_name = ANG_republicans_long
		}
		hidden_effect = {
			country_event = { days = 7 id = angriver.22 }
			fire_GRD_cosmetic_handling = yes
		}
	}
}

country_event = { #The Grand Marshal's Stand
	id = angriver.22
	immediate = {log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event angriver.22"}
	title = angriver.22.t
	desc = angriver.22.d

	picture = GFX_event_griffon_soldier
	is_triggered_only = yes

	option = { #The Revolutionary Commitee Defeats the Marshal
		name = angriver.22.a
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 80
			modifier = {
				OR = {
					has_country_flag = ANG_AI_DEMOCRATIC
					has_game_rule = {
						rule = ANG_ai_behavior
						option = DEMOCRATIC
					}
				}
				factor = 0
			}
		}
		ANG_grossmarschall_othmar_stoiber = {
			retire = yes
		}
		hidden_effect = {
			country_event = { days = 7 id = angriver.23 }
		}
	}
	option = { #The Grand Marshal Defeats the Revolutionaries!
		name = angriver.22.b
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 20
			modifier = {
				OR = {
					has_country_flag = ANG_AI_COMMUNIST
					has_game_rule = {
						rule = ANG_ai_behavior
						option = COMMUNIST
					}
					has_country_flag = ANG_AI_NEUTRALITY
					has_game_rule = {
						rule = ANG_ai_behavior
						option = NEUTRALITY
					}
				}
				factor = 0
			}
		}
		hidden_effect = {
			country_event = { days = 7 id = angriver.24 }
		}
	}
}

country_event = { #Who Shall Lead the Nation?
	id = angriver.23
	immediate = {log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event angriver.23"}
	title = angriver.23.t
	desc = angriver.23.d

	picture = GFX_event_medieval_city_3
	is_triggered_only = yes

	option = { #The Anarchists
		name = angriver.23.a
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 50
			modifier = {
				OR = {
					has_country_flag = ANG_AI_NEUTRALITY
					has_game_rule = {
						rule = ANG_ai_behavior
						option = NEUTRALITY
					}
				}
				factor = 0
			}
		}
		custom_effect_tooltip = ANG_political_tree_tp
		add_popularity = { ideology = communism popularity = 0.10 }
		set_politics = {
			ruling_party = communism
			elections_allowed = no
		}
		add_corps_commander_role = {
			character = ANG_willie_scherler
			traits = { infantry_leader ranger commando griffon_race_trait }
			skill = 3
			attack_skill = 3
			defense_skill = 3
			planning_skill = 3
			logistics_skill = 1
			desc = willie_scherler_desc
		}
		custom_effect_tooltip = willie_scherler_stats_tp
		remove_ideas = ANG_republican_sentiments_idea
		remove_ideas = ANG_anarchists
		set_country_flag = ANG_republic
		set_cosmetic_tag = ANG_republic
		hidden_effect = {
			clr_country_flag = herzland_diplomacy_blocked
			set_country_flag = have_regular_puppets
			set_country_flag = ANG_anarcho_takeover
			load_focus_tree = { tree = angriver_focus_anarchists keep_completed = yes }
		}
	}

	option = { #The Republicans
		name = angriver.23.b
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 50
			modifier = {
				OR = {
					has_country_flag = ANG_AI_COMMUNIST
					has_game_rule = {
						rule = ANG_ai_behavior
						option = COMMUNIST
					}
				}
				factor = 0
			}
		}
		custom_effect_tooltip = ANG_political_tree_tp
		add_popularity = { ideology = neutrality popularity = 0.05 }
		add_popularity = { ideology = democratic popularity = 0.05 }
		add_country_leader_role = {
			character = ANG_hera_eichberg
			country_leader = {
				expire = "1965.1.1"
				desc = hera_eichberg_desc
				ideology = socialism
				traits = {  }
			}
			promote_leader = yes
		}
		set_party_name = {
		    ideology = democratic
		    name = ANG_socdems
		    long_name = ANG_socdems_long
		}
		add_field_marshal_role = {
			character = ANG_Gerhard_Bluhm
			desc = little_kemerskai_short_desc
			traits = { inspirational_leader war_hero old_guard brilliant_strategist logistics_wizard griffon_race_trait }
			skill = 3
			attack_skill = 2
			defense_skill = 3
			planning_skill = 2
			logistics_skill = 3
			legacy_id = 247590
		}
		custom_effect_tooltip = gerhard_bluhm_stats_tp
		remove_ideas = ANG_republican_sentiments_idea
		remove_ideas = ANG_anarchists
		set_country_flag = ANG_republic
		set_cosmetic_tag = ANG_republic
		hidden_effect = {
		clr_country_flag = herzland_diplomacy_blocked
		set_country_flag = have_regular_puppets
		set_country_flag = ANG_democratic_takeover
		load_focus_tree = { tree = angriver_focus_republicans keep_completed = yes }
		}
	}
}

country_event = { #Black Claw Takeover
	id = angriver.38
	immediate = {log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event angriver.38"}
	title = angriver.38.t
	desc = angriver.38.d

	picture = GFX_event_feast
	is_triggered_only = yes

	option = {
		name = angriver.38.a
		add_political_power = -100
		add_popularity = { ideology = neutrality popularity = -0.05 }
		add_popularity = { ideology = communism popularity = -0.05 }
		add_popularity = { ideology = fascism popularity = 0.1 }
		set_politics = {
			ruling_party = fascism
			elections_allowed = no
		}
		clr_country_flag = have_regular_puppets
		add_country_leader_role = {
			character = ANG_hera_eichberg
			country_leader = {
				expire = "1965.1.1"
				ideology = neofeudalism
				desc = hera_eichberg_desc_long
				traits = {  }
			}
			promote_leader = yes
		}
		add_country_leader_role = {
			character = ANG_Saskia_Meckler
			country_leader = {
				desc = saskia_meckler_desc
				expire = "1965.1.1"
				ideology = socialism
				traits = {  }
			}
			promote_leader = yes
		}
		save_current_manpower = yes
		411 = {
		    add_manpower = -7500
		}
		422 = {
		    add_manpower = -7500
		}
		547 = {
		    add_manpower = -7500
		}
		restore_previous_manpower = yes
		swap_ideas = {
			remove_idea = ANG_cults
			add_idea = ANG_resistance
		}
		set_party_name = {
		    ideology = fascism
		    name = ANG_black_claw
		    long_name = ANG_black_claw_long
		}
		ANG_Gerhard_Bluhm = {
			retire = yes
		}
		ANG_marc_kippenberger = {
			retire = yes
		}
		leave_faction = yes
		hidden_effect = {
			set_country_flag = ANG_black_claw_takeover
			set_country_flag = herzland_diplomacy_blocked
			load_focus_tree = { tree = angriver_focus_blackclaw keep_completed = yes }
		}
	}
}

country_event = { #Examples
	id = angriver.39
	immediate = {log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event angriver.39"}
	title = angriver.39.t
	desc = angriver.39.d

	picture = GFX_event_forest_depression
	is_triggered_only = yes

	option = {
		name = angriver.39.a
		add_popularity = { ideology = communism popularity = -0.1 }
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_idea = ANG_resistance_2
			}
			swap_ideas = {
				remove_idea = ANG_resistance_2
				add_idea = ANG_resistance_3
			}
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = {
				has_idea = ANG_resistance_3_2
			}
			remove_ideas = ANG_resistance_3_2
		}

		save_current_manpower = yes
		411 = {
		    add_manpower = -10000
		}
		422 = {
		    add_manpower = -10000
		}
		547 = {
		    add_manpower = -10000
		}
		restore_previous_manpower = yes
	}
}

country_event = { #Dead Rangers
	id = angriver.40
	immediate = {log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event angriver.40"}
	title = angriver.40.t
	desc = angriver.40.d

	picture = GFX_event_medieval_city
	is_triggered_only = yes

	option = {
		name = angriver.40.a
		add_popularity = { ideology = neutrality popularity = -0.1 }
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_idea = ANG_resistance_2
			}
			swap_ideas = {
				remove_idea = ANG_resistance_2
				add_idea = ANG_resistance_3_2
			}
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = {
				has_idea = ANG_resistance_3
			}
			remove_ideas = ANG_resistance_3
		}

		save_current_manpower = yes
		411 = {
		    add_manpower = -20000
		}
		422 = {
		    add_manpower = -5000
		}
		547 = {
		    add_manpower = -10000
		}
		restore_previous_manpower = yes
	}
}

		set_party_name = {
		    ideology = democratic
		    name = ANG_socdems
		    long_name = ANG_socdems_long
		}
		add_country_leader_role = {
			character = ANG_Saskia_Meckler
			country_leader = {
				desc = saskia_meckler_desc
				expire = "1965.1.1"
				ideology = socialism
				traits = {  }
			}
			promote_leader = yes
		}
	}
}

	id = angriver.48
	immediate = {log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event angriver.48"}
	title = angriver.48.t
	desc = angriver.48.d
	picture = GFX_event_griffenheim
	is_triggered_only = yes
	option = {
		name = angriver.48.a
		ai_chance = {
			base = 60
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				has_opinion = { target = ANG value < -25 }
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0.2
				has_opinion = { target = ANG value < 0 }
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 1.2
				has_opinion = { target = ANG value < 25 }
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 1.4
				has_opinion = { target = ANG value > 50 }
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 1.6
				ROOT = { has_government = communism }
				FROM = { has_government = communism }
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 1.6
				ROOT = { has_government = fascism }
				FROM = { has_government = fascism }
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 1.6
				ROOT = { has_government = democratic }
				FROM = { has_government = democratic }
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 1.6
				ROOT = { has_government = neutrality }
				FROM = { has_government = neutrality }
			}
		}
		custom_effect_tooltip = GAME_OVER_TT
		FROM = { annex_country = { target = ROOT transfer_troops = yes } }
	}
	option = {
		name = angriver.48.b
		ai_chance = { factor = 40 }
		if = {
			limit = {
				is_in_faction_with = FROM
			}
			leave_faction = yes
		}
		FROM = {
			country_event = { id = angriver.49 days = 7 }
			}
		}
	}

	desc = angriver.70.d

	picture = GFX_event_griffenheim
	fire_only_once = yes
	trigger = {
		tag = ANG
		date > 1021.5.21
		has_completed_focus = ANG_adopt_grover_vi
	}
	mean_time_to_happen = {
		days = 12
	}

	option = {
		name = angriver.70.a
		remove_ideas = GRI_grover_vi
		add_political_power = 200
		add_stability = 0.05
		GRI_emperor_grover_vi = {
			set_character_name = ANG_king_grover
		}
		set_portraits = {
			character = GRI_emperor_grover_vi
			civilian = { large ="gfx/leaders/GRI/Grover_VI_good.tga" }
		}
		add_country_leader_role = {
			character = GRI_emperor_grover_vi
			country_leader = {
				expire = "1965.1.1"
				ideology = harmonic_constitutionalism
				traits = { chosen_one }
			}
			promote_leader = yes
		}
	}
}

country_event = { #The Revolution Triumphant
	id = angriver.71
	immediate = {log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event angriver.71"}
	title = angriver.71.t
	desc = angriver.71.d

	picture = GFX_event_feast
	is_triggered_only = yes

	option = {
		name = angriver.71.a
		trigger = {
	        FAT = {
	           exists = yes
	        }
	    }
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 95
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				is_ai = no
				FAT = { is_ai = yes }
			}
			FAT = { change_tag_from = ROOT	}
		}
		else = {
			custom_effect_tooltip = GAME_OVER_TT
		}
		hidden_effect = {
			FAT = { country_event = { days = 1 id = angriver.72 } }
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = angriver.71.b
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 5
		}
		custom_effect_tooltip = ANG_political_tree_tp
		add_stability = -0.35
		add_war_support = -0.35
		add_political_power = -300
		hidden_effect = {
		FAT = { country_event = { days = 1 id = angriver.73 } }
        set_country_flag = ANG_revisionism
		load_focus_tree = { tree = angriver_focus_republicans_imperial keep_completed = yes }
		mark_focus_tree_layout_dirty = yes
		}
	}
}

country_event = { #FAT annexes ANG
	id = angriver.72
	immediate = {log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event angriver.72"}
	title = angriver.72.t
	desc = angriver.72.d

	picture = GFX_event_griffenheim
	is_triggered_only = yes

	option = {
		name = angriver.72.a
		add_political_power = 200
		add_stability = 0.20
		annex_country = { target = FROM transfer_troops = yes }
		every_possible_country = {
			limit = {
				has_character = ANG_Gerhard_Bluhm
			}
			ANG_Gerhard_Bluhm = {
				set_nationality = ROOT
			}
		}
		FROM = {
			every_character = {
				limit = {
					is_country_leader = no
					is_unit_leader = yes
				}
				set_nationality = ROOT
			}
		}
		hidden_effect = {
			for_each_scope_loop = {
				array = FROM.core_states
				add_core_of = FAT
			}
		}
	}
}

country_event = { #NPP Coup
	id = angriver.81
	immediate = {log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event angriver.81"}
	title = angriver.81.t
	desc = angriver.81.d

	picture = GFX_event_griffenheim
	is_triggered_only = yes

	option = {
		name = angriver.81.a
		add_political_power = 50
		add_stability = 0.05
		add_war_support = 0.05
		set_politics = {
			ruling_party = democratic
			elections_allowed = no
		}
		add_popularity = { ideology = democratic popularity = 0.03 }
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_dlc = "La Resistance"
			}
			swap_ideas = {
				remove_idea = ANG_republican_secret_police_lar
				add_idea = ANG_republican_secret_police_enemy_lar
			}
		}
		else ={
			swap_ideas = {
				remove_idea = ANG_republican_secret_police
				add_idea = ANG_republican_secret_police_enemy
			}
		}
		custom_effect_tooltip = ANG_political_tree_tp
		hidden_effect = {
		   set_country_flag = ANG_bluhm_is_dead
		   load_focus_tree = { tree = angriver_focus_finale keep_completed = yes }
		}
	}
}

country_event = { #The Elections
	id = angriver.84
	immediate = {log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event angriver.84"}
	title = angriver.84.t
	desc = angriver.84.d

	picture = GFX_event_griffenheim
	is_triggered_only = yes

	option = {
	ai_chance = {
		    factor = 25
		}
		name = angriver.84.a
		add_political_power = 25
		add_stability = 0.05
		add_war_support = 0.05
		add_popularity = { ideology = neutrality popularity = 0.06 }
		every_possible_country = {
			limit = {
				has_character = JER_theodore_verany
			}
			JER_theodore_verany = {
				set_nationality = ROOT
			}
		}
		promote_character = {
			character = JER_theodore_verany
			ideology = liberalism
		}
	}

	option = {
	ai_chance = {
			factor = 25
		}
		name = angriver.84.b
		add_political_power = 25
		add_stability = 0.05
		add_war_support = 0.05
		add_popularity = { ideology = democratic popularity = 0.05 }
	}

	option = {
    ai_chance = {
			factor = 25
		}
		name = angriver.84.c
		add_political_power = 25
		add_stability = 0.05
		add_war_support = 0.05
		add_popularity = { ideology = neutrality popularity = 0.05 }
		set_politics = {
			ruling_party = neutrality
			elections_allowed = no
		}
		every_possible_country = {
			limit = {
				has_character = FAT_heinrich_kingfeather
			}
			FAT_heinrich_kingfeather = {
				set_nationality = ROOT
			}
		}
		FAT_heinrich_kingfeather = {
			add_country_leader_role = {
				country_leader = {
					expire = "1965.1.1"
					ideology = republicanism
					traits = {  }
				}
				promote_leader = yes
			}
		}
		set_party_name = {
		    ideology = neutrality
		    name = ANG_pdr
		    long_name = ANG_pdr_long
		}
	}

	option = {
    ai_chance = {
			factor = 25
		}
		name = angriver.84.e
		add_political_power = 25
		add_stability = 0.05
		add_war_support = 0.05
		add_popularity = { ideology = neutrality popularity = 0.05 }
		set_politics = {
			ruling_party = neutrality
			elections_allowed = no
		}
		add_country_leader_role = {
			character = ANG_Fiona_Schmitz
			country_leader = {
				desc = lawyer_bird_desc
				expire = "1965.1.1"
				ideology = republicanism
				traits = {  }
			}
			promote_leader = yes
		}
		set_party_name = {
		    ideology = neutrality
		    name = ANG_liberal_party
		    long_name = ANG_liberal_party_long
		}
	}
}

		add_political_power = 100
		add_stability = 0.10
		set_capital = {
			state = 389
			remember_old_capital = no
		}
		389 = {
		    add_extra_state_shared_building_slots = 4
			add_building_construction = {
			type = industrial_complex
			level = 2
			instant_build = yes
			}
			add_building_construction = {
			type = arms_factory
			level = 2
			instant_build = yes
			}
			add_building_construction = {
			type = infrastructure
			level = 4
			instant_build = yes
			}
		}
	}
}

	immediate = {log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event angriver.92"}
	title = angriver.92.t
	desc = angriver.92.d

	picture = GFX_event_griffon_royal_guard
	is_triggered_only = yes

	option = {
		name = angriver.92.a
		transfer_units_fraction = {
			target = FROM          # the recipient
			target_organization = 1
			source_organization = 1
			size = 0.05             # [0,1] Default value for the ratio below if they are not specified
			stockpile_ratio = 0  # [0,1] Overrides size modifier for the stockpiled equipment and fuel
			army_ratio = 0.05       # [0,1] Overrides size modifier for army
			navy_ratio = 0.05       # [0,1] Overrides size modifier for navy
			air_ratio = 0.05        # [0,1] Overrides size modifier for air
			keep_unit_leaders_trigger = {
				always = yes
			}
		}
	}
}

###JER###
add_namespace = aquileia
add_namespace = aquileia_two
add_namespace = aquileia_news
country_event = { #Arming the Loyalists in Rila
	id = aquileia.1
	immediate = {log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event aquileia.1"}
	title = aquileia.1.t
	desc = aquileia.1.d
	picture = GFX_event_medieval_castle_on_hill
	fire_only_once = yes
	is_triggered_only = yes
	option = {
		name = aquileia.1.a
		custom_effect_tooltip = JER_monarchist_support4
		add_equipment_to_stockpile = {
			type = infantry_equipment
			amount = 1000
			producer = JER
		}
		hidden_effect = {
			add_to_variable = {
				var = monarchist_support
				value = 5
			}
			subtract_from_variable = {
				var = revolutionary_support
				value = 5
			}
			clamp_variable = {
				var = monarchist_support
				min = 0
				max = 100
			}
			clamp_variable = {
				var = revolutionary_support
				min = 0
				max = 100
			}
		}
	}
}

				var = monarchist_support

	picture = GFX_event_medieval_castle_on_hill
	fire_only_once = yes
	is_triggered_only = yes
	option = {
		name = aquileia.6.a
		custom_effect_tooltip = JER_monarchist_support4
		add_political_power = -30
		376 = {
			add_manpower = -15000
		}
		add_popularity = {
			ideology = neutrality
			popularity = 0.03
		}
		hidden_effect = {
			add_to_variable = {
				var = monarchist_support
				value = 5
			}
			subtract_from_variable = {
				var = revolutionary_support
				value = 5
			}
			clamp_variable = {
				var = monarchist_support
				min = 0
				max = 100
			}
			clamp_variable = {
				var = revolutionary_support
				min = 0
				max = 100
			}
		}
	}
}

country_event = { #Monarchists Control Rila
	id = aquileia.9
	immediate = {log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event aquileia.9"}
	title = aquileia.9.t
	desc = aquileia.9.d
	picture = GFX_event_medieval_castle_on_hill
	fire_only_once = yes
	is_triggered_only = yes
	option = {
		name = aquileia.9.a
		add_stability = 0.15
		add_political_power = 50
		add_popularity = {
			ideology = neutrality
			popularity = 0.15
		}
		hidden_effect = {
			if = {
			    limit = {
				    JER = {
					    has_completed_focus = JER_fight_for_freedom
					}
				}
			    JER = {
				    end_puppet = JEB
				}
			    JEB = {
				    drop_cosmetic_tag = yes
				}
			    if = {
				    limit = {
					    JEB = {
						    is_in_faction_with = JER
					    }
				    }
				    JEB = {
					    leave_faction = yes
				    }
			    }
		    }
			if = {
				limit = {
					JER = {
						has_completed_focus = JER_fight_for_freedom
					}
				}
				declare_war_on = {
					target = JER
					type = annex_everything
				}
			}
		}
	}
}

country_event = { #Revolutionaries Take Control of Rila
	id = aquileia.10
	immediate = {log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event aquileia.10"}
	title = aquileia.10.t
	desc = aquileia.10.d
	picture = GFX_event_griffon_back
	fire_only_once = yes
	is_triggered_only = yes
	option = {
		name = aquileia.10.a
		add_stability = 0.05
		add_war_support = 0.15
		set_politics = {
			ruling_party = democratic
			elections_allowed = no
		}
		add_popularity = {
			ideology = democratic
			popularity = 0.15
		}
		add_field_marshal_role={
			character = JEB_boreas_babeuf
			traits={ trait_reckless griffon_race_trait }
			skill=2
			attack_skill=3
			defense_skill=1
			planning_skill=2
			logistics_skill=1
			legacy_id=22250
		}
		custom_effect_tooltip = JER_boreas_stats_tp

		add_corps_commander_role = {
			character = JEB_annejosephine_de_mericourt
			traits={ media_personality griffon_race_trait }
			skill=2
			attack_skill=2
			defense_skill=2
			planning_skill=1
			logistics_skill=2
			legacy_id=22251
		}
		custom_effect_tooltip = JER_anne_stats_tp

		add_corps_commander_role={
			character = JEB_aquilin_dumouriez
			traits={ politically_connected griffon_race_trait }
			skill=1
			attack_skill=2
			defense_skill=2
			planning_skill=1
			logistics_skill=2
			legacy_id=22252
		}
		custom_effect_tooltip = JER_aquilin_stats_tp

		add_corps_commander_role={
			character = JEB_gerard_simon_de_berger
			traits={ career_officer trait_reckless griffon_race_trait trickster }
			skill=3
			attack_skill=2
			defense_skill=3
			planning_skill=3
			logistics_skill=2
			legacy_id=22254
		}
		custom_effect_tooltip = JER_gerad_stats_tp
		hidden_effect = {
			if = {
			    limit = {
				    JER = {
					    has_completed_focus = JER_state_of_aquileia
					}
				}
			    JER = {
				    end_puppet = JEB
				}
			    JEB = {
				    drop_cosmetic_tag = yes
				}
			    if = {
				    limit = {
					    JEB = {
						    is_in_faction_with = JER
					    }
				    }
				    JEB = {
					    leave_faction = yes
				    }
			    }
		    }
			if = {
			    limit = {
				    JER = {
					    has_completed_focus = JER_fight_for_freedom
					}
				}
				drop_cosmetic_tag = yes
				set_cosmetic_tag = JER_JEB_REPUBLIC_PUPPET
		    }
			if = {
			    limit = {
				    has_character = JEB_jeanantoine_rossignol
				}
			    JEB_jeanantoine_rossignol = {
					retire = yes
				}
		    }
		    if = {
			    limit = {
				    has_character = JEB_beau_harnais
				}
			    JEB_beau_harnais = {
					retire = yes
				}
		    }
			if = {
			    limit = {
				    has_character = JEB_athanase_charette_de_la_perdrix
				}
				JEB_athanase_charette_de_la_perdrix = {
					set_character_flag = JEB_exiled_monarchist
				}
		    }
			if = {
			    limit = {
				    has_character = JEB_roche_verger
				}
			    JEB_roche_verger = {
					retire = yes
				}
		    }
			if = {
			    limit = {
				    has_character =  JEB_charles_de_loupoigne
				}
			    JEB_charles_de_loupoigne = {
					set_character_flag = JEB_exiled_monarchist
				}
		    }
		}
	}
}

			character = JRR_sylvian_bassot

			country_leader = {
			expire = "1965.1.1"
			ideology = nazism
			traits = { }
			}
			promote_leader = yes
		}
		add_stability = 0.15
		add_political_power = 50
		add_popularity = {
			ideology = neutrality
			popularity = 0.10
		}
		hidden_effect = {
			if = {
			    limit = {
				    JER = {
					    has_completed_focus = JER_fight_for_freedom
					}
				}
			    JER = {
				    end_puppet = JRR
				}
			    JRR = {
				    drop_cosmetic_tag = yes
				}
			    if = {
				    limit = {
					    JRR = {
						    is_in_faction_with = JER
					    }
				    }
				    JRR = {
					    leave_faction = yes
				    }
			    }
		    }
			if = {
				limit = {
					JER = {
						has_completed_focus = JER_fight_for_freedom
					}
				}
				declare_war_on = {
					target = JER
					type = annex_everything
				}
			}

		}
	}
}

country_event = { #Monarchists Retain Control of Vinovia
	id = aquileia.13
	immediate = {log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event aquileia.13"}
	title = aquileia.13.t
	desc = aquileia.13.d
	picture = GFX_event_medieval_castle_on_hill
	fire_only_once = yes
	is_triggered_only = yes
	option = {
		name = aquileia.13.a
		add_stability = 0.15
		add_political_power = 50
		add_popularity = {
			ideology = neutrality
			popularity = 0.10
		}
		hidden_effect = {
			if = {
			    limit = {
				    JER = {
					    has_completed_focus = JER_fight_for_freedom
					}
				}
			    JER = {
				    end_puppet = VIN
				}
			    VIN = {
				    drop_cosmetic_tag = yes
				}
			    if = {
				    limit = {
					    VIN = {
						    is_in_faction_with = JER
					    }
				    }
				    VIN = {
					    leave_faction = yes
				    }
			    }
		    }
			if = {
				limit = {
					JER = {
						has_completed_focus = JER_fight_for_freedom
					}
				}
				declare_war_on = {
					target = JER
					type = annex_everything
				}
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_war_with = JRR
						JRR = {
							is_subject = no
						}
					}
					set_country_flag = { flag = bypass_on_peaceconference_ended days = 1 value = 1 }
					white_peace = JRR
				}
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_war_with = JFT
						JFT = {
							is_subject = no
						}
					}
					set_country_flag = { flag = bypass_on_peaceconference_ended days = 1 value = 1 }
					white_peace = JFT
				}
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_war_with = JEB
						JEB = {
							is_subject = no
						}
					}
					set_country_flag = { flag = bypass_on_peaceconference_ended days = 1 value = 1 }
					white_peace = JEB
				}
			}
		}
	}
}

				}

country_event = { #Aquileian Revolution (Revolutionaries)
	id = aquileia.16
	immediate = {log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event aquileia.16"}
	title = aquileia.16.t
	desc = aquileia.16.d
	picture = GFX_event_griffon_back
	fire_only_once = yes
	is_triggered_only = yes

	option = {
		name = aquileia.16.a
		set_politics = {
			ruling_party = democratic
			elections_allowed = no
		}
		add_popularity = {
			ideology = democratic
			popularity = 0.10
		}
		swap_ideas = {
		    remove_idea = JER_memories
		    add_idea = JER_revolutionary
		}
		custom_effect_tooltip = JER_new_general_staff_tp
		custom_effect_tooltip = JER_cores_tp
		hidden_effect = {
		    set_country_flag = JER_democracy_established
			clr_country_flag = JER_is_monarchist
		    set_faction_name = griffonian_democratic_faction
			end_puppet = MER
			MER = {
				drop_cosmetic_tag = yes
			}
			if = {
                limit = {
                    MER = {
                        is_in_faction_with = JER
                    }
                }
                MER = {
                    leave_faction = yes
					add_ideas = JER_MER_vivienne_fled
                }
            }
		    add_popularity = {
				ideology = neutrality
				popularity = -1.00
		    }
			clr_country_flag = JER_cant_do_war_focuses
		    add_field_marshal_role = {
			    character = JER_victor_moreau
			    traits = { fast_planner inspirational_leader griffon_race_trait }
			    skill = 3
			    attack_skill = 4
			    defense_skill = 3
			    planning_skill = 1
			    logistics_skill = 2
			    legacy_id=-1
		    }
		    custom_effect_tooltip = JER_victor_stats_tp
			add_corps_commander_role = {
				character = JER_felix_murat
				traits = { trickster griffon_race_trait }
				skill = 3
				attack_skill = 2
				defense_skill = 3
				planning_skill = 3
				logistics_skill = 2
				legacy_id=-1
			}
		    custom_effect_tooltip = JER_felix_stats_tp
		    add_corps_commander_role = {
		    	character = JER_jean_lafitte
		    	traits = { trait_engineer griffon_race_trait }
		    	skill = 3
		    	attack_skill = 3
		    	defense_skill = 2
		    	planning_skill = 2
		    	logistics_skill = 3
				legacy_id=-1
		    }
		    custom_effect_tooltip = JER_jean_stats_tp
		    add_corps_commander_role = {
		    	character = JER_voss_corsair
		    	traits = { organizer war_hero griffon_race_trait }
		    	skill = 2
		    	attack_skill = 2
		    	defense_skill = 1
		    	planning_skill = 1
		    	logistics_skill = 3
				legacy_id = 22244
		    }
		    custom_effect_tooltip = JER_voss_stats_tp
		    add_corps_commander_role = {
		    	character = JER_claire_lacolombe
		    	traits = { artillery_expert  trait_engineer griffon_race_trait }
		    	skill = 2
		    	attack_skill = 2
		    	defense_skill = 2
		    	planning_skill = 2
		    	logistics_skill = 1
				legacy_id = 22245
		    }
		    custom_effect_tooltip = JER_claire_stats_tp
		    add_corps_commander_role = {
		    	character = JER_krayt_de_belanger
		    	traits = { commando promising_general griffon_race_trait }
		    	skill = 2
		    	attack_skill = 4
		    	defense_skill = 1
		    	planning_skill = 1
		    	logistics_skill = 1
				legacy_id = 22246
		    }
		    custom_effect_tooltip = JER_michel_stats_tp
		    add_corps_commander_role = {
		    	character = JER_jean_chevalier_bargette
		    	traits = { career_officer harsh_leader griffon_race_trait }
		    	skill = 2
		    	attack_skill = 1
		    	defense_skill = 2
		    	planning_skill = 2
		    	logistics_skill = 2
				legacy_id = 22247
		    }
		    custom_effect_tooltip = JER_jeanne_stats_tp
		    add_corps_commander_role = {
		    	character = JER_gilbert_la_fauvette
		    	traits = { media_personality war_hero infantry_leader griffon_race_trait }
		    	skill = 3
		    	attack_skill = 2
		    	defense_skill = 2
		    	planning_skill = 3
		    	logistics_skill = 3
				legacy_id = 22248
		    }
		    custom_effect_tooltip = JER_gilbert_stats_tp
		    add_corps_commander_role = {
		    	character = JER_fier_chouquette
		    	traits = { trickster pony_race_trait }
		    	skill = 2
		    	attack_skill = 2
		    	defense_skill = 2
		    	planning_skill = 2
		    	logistics_skill = 1
				legacy_id = 22249
		    }
		    custom_effect_tooltip = JER_fier_stats_tp
			add_corps_commander_role = {
	            character = JER_morning_star
	            traits = { infantry_leader pony_race_trait }
	            skill = 2
	            attack_skill = 1
	            defense_skill = 2
	            planning_skill = 2
	            logistics_skill = 2
			    legacy_id = 22253
            }
			custom_effect_tooltip = JER_agnes_stats_tp
			add_corps_commander_role = {
				character = JER_soleil_moonshadow
				desc = "JER_SOLEIL_DESC"
				traits = { pony_race_trait panzer_leader trait_engineer }
				skill = 3
				attack_skill = 3
				defense_skill = 2
				planning_skill = 3
				logistics_skill = 2
			}
			custom_effect_tooltip = JER_soleil_stats_tp
			add_corps_commander_role = {
	            character = JER_louis_debois
	            traits = { artillery_officer ranger brilliant_strategist griffon_race_trait }
	            skill = 1
	            attack_skill = 1
	            defense_skill = 1
	            planning_skill = 1
	            logistics_skill = 1
            }
			add_corps_commander_role = {
				character = JER_himir_oncrena
				traits = { griffon_race_trait heat_specialist trickster }
				skill = 2
				attack_skill = 2
				defense_skill = 2
				planning_skill = 1
				logistics_skill = 3
				desc = JER_char_himir_desc
			}
			set_cosmetic_tag = JER_REPUBLIC
			if = {
			    limit = { has_character = JER_king_moriset_discret }
			    JER_king_moriset_discret = {
					retire = yes
				}
		    }
		    if = {
			    limit = { has_character = JER_albert_berthelot }
			    JER_albert_berthelot = {
					retire = yes
				}
		    }
			if = {
			    limit = { has_character = JER_charlesguillaumeferdinand_de_greifenwaldstrawberry }
			    JER_charlesguillaumeferdinand_de_greifenwaldstrawberry = {
					retire = yes
				}
		    }
			if = {
			    limit = { has_character = JER_gunnar_sable }
			    JER_gunnar_sable = {
					retire = yes
				}
		    }
			if = {
			    limit = { has_character = JER_genevieve_artigue }
			    JER_genevieve_artigue = {
					retire = yes
				}
		    }
			if = {
			    limit = { has_character = JER_foulque_cathelineau }
				effect_tooltip = {
			    	retire_character = JER_foulque_cathelineau
				}
				hidden_effect = {
					JER_foulque_cathelineau = {
						set_character_flag = JER_exiled_monarchist
					}
				}
		    }
			if = {
			    limit = {
				    has_character = JER_gabriel_duval
					JER_gabriel_duval = {
						NOT = { has_character_flag = JER_convince_officers_flag }
					}
				}
				JER_gabriel_duval = {
					retire = yes
				}
		    }
			if = {
			    limit = {
				    has_character = JER_cecilia_dutertre
					JER_cecilia_dutertre = {
						NOT = { has_character_flag = JER_convince_officers_flag }
					}
				}
			    JER_cecilia_dutertre = {
					retire = yes
				}
		    }
			if = {
			    limit = { has_character = JER_lionella_brochard }
				effect_tooltip = {
					retire_character = JER_lionella_brochard
				}
				hidden_effect = {
					JER_lionella_brochard = {
						set_character_flag = JER_exiled_monarchist
					}
				}
		    }
			if = {
			    limit = { has_character = JER_seva_shako }
			    JER_seva_shako = {
					retire = yes
				}
		    }
			JEB = {
				every_core_state = {
					add_core_of = JER
				}
			}
			JRR = {
				every_core_state = {
					add_core_of = JER
				}

			}
			JFT = {
				every_core_state = {
					add_core_of = JER
				}

			}
			VIN ={
				every_core_state = {
					add_core_of = JER
				}

			}
			set_country_flag = have_regular_puppets
			if = {
			    limit = {
				    is_ai = yes
				}
			    load_oob = "JER_revolutionaries"
			}
			if = {
			    limit = {
				    has_country_flag = JER_has_donated_factories
				}
				add_equipment_to_stockpile = {
			        type = infantry_equipment
			        amount = 2000
		        }
			}
			if = {
			    limit = {
				    has_country_flag = JER_extra_units_1_flag
				}
				load_oob = "JER_revolutionaries_2"
			}
			if = {
			    limit = {
				    has_country_flag = JER_extra_units_2_flag
				}
				load_oob = "JER_revolutionaries_3"
			}
			if = {
			    limit = {
				    NOT = {
					    OR = {
						    has_country_flag = JER_moriset_60
							has_country_flag = JER_moriset_70
							has_country_flag = JER_moriset_80
						}
					}
				}
			    random_list = {
				    40 = { #King Captured
					    country_event = {
							id = aquileia.31
							days = 2
						}
				    }
				    60 = { #King Escapes
					    country_event = {
						    id = aquileia.32
							days = 2
						}
				    }
			    }
			}
			if = {
			    limit = {
					has_country_flag = JER_moriset_60
				}
			    random_list = {
				    60 = { #King Captured
					    country_event = {
							id = aquileia.31
							days = 2
						}
				    }
				    40 = { #King Escapes
					    country_event = {
						    id = aquileia.32
							days = 2
						}
				    }
			    }
			}
			if = {
			    limit = {
					has_country_flag = JER_moriset_70
				}
			    random_list = {
				    70 = { #King Captured
					    country_event = {
							id = aquileia.31
							days = 2
						}
				    }
				    30 = { #King Escapes
					    country_event = {
						    id = aquileia.32
							days = 2
						}
				    }
			    }
			}
			if = {
			    limit = {
					has_country_flag = JER_moriset_80
				}
			    random_list = {
				    80 = { #King Captured
					    country_event = {
							id = aquileia.31
							days = 2
						}
				    }
				    20 = { #King Escapes
					    country_event = {
						    id = aquileia.32
							days = 2
						}
				    }
			    }
			}
			news_event = {
			    id = aquileia_news.1
				days = 4
				hours = 1
			}
		}
	}
}

country_event = { #Revolution Succeeds Completely
	id = aquileia.17
	immediate = {log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event aquileia.17"}
	title = aquileia.17.t
	desc = aquileia.17.d

	fire_only_once = yes
	is_triggered_only = yes
	picture = GFX_event_griffon_mountain
	option = {
		name = aquileia.17.a
		set_politics = {
			ruling_party = democratic
			elections_allowed = no
		}
		if = {
			limit = { has_character = JER_king_moriset_discret }
			JER_king_moriset_discret = {
				retire = yes
			}
		}
		custom_effect_tooltip = JER_new_general_staff_tp
		custom_effect_tooltip = JER_cores_tp
		add_stability = 0.35
		add_political_power = 200
		set_popularities = {
			democratic = 48
			fascism = 22
			communism = 30
			neutrality = 0
		}
		remove_ideas = JER_memories
		hidden_effect = {
		    set_country_flag = JER_democracy_established
			set_country_flag = have_regular_puppets
			clr_country_flag = JER_is_monarchist
			set_faction_name = griffonian_democratic_faction

				limit = {

				}

					level = -3
				}
			}

			    limit = { has_template = "Division de La Milice" }

			VIN = {
				every_core_state = {
					add_core_of = JER
				}

			}
		}
	}
}

country_event = { #Revolution Succeeds
	id = aquileia.18
	immediate = {log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event aquileia.18"}
	title = aquileia.18.t
	desc = aquileia.18.d

	fire_only_once = yes
	is_triggered_only = yes
	trigger = {
		NOT = {
			has_global_flag = JER_revolution_ended_2
		}
	}
	picture = GFX_event_griffon_mountain
	option = {
		name = aquileia.18.a
		custom_effect_tooltip = JER_cores_tp
		add_stability = 0.25
		add_political_power = 100
		remove_ideas = JER_revolutionary
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_country_flag = JER_has_donated_factories
			}
			add_offsite_building = {
			    type = arms_factory
				level = -3
			}
		}
		hidden_effect = {
			news_event = { id = aquileia_news.3 hours = 1 }
			clr_global_flag = JER_revolution_begun
			set_global_flag = JER_revolution_ended_2
			JEB = {
				every_core_state = {
					add_core_of = JER
				}
			}
			JRR = {
				every_core_state = {
					add_core_of = JER
				}

			}
			JFT = {
				every_core_state = {
					add_core_of = JER
				}

			}
			VIN = {
				every_core_state = {
					add_core_of = JER
				}

			}
			if = {
				limit = { has_template = "Division de La Milice" }
				delete_unit_template_and_units = { division_template = "Division de La Milice" }
			}
		}
	}
}

		name = aquileia.19.a
		custom_effect_tooltip = JER_monarchist_support2
		add_stability = 0.035
		add_equipment_to_stockpile = {
			type = infantry_equipment
			amount = -750
		}
		hidden_effect = {
			add_to_variable = {
				var = monarchist_support
				value = 3
			}
			subtract_from_variable = {
				var = revolutionary_support
				value = 3
			}
			clamp_variable = {
				var = monarchist_support
				min = 0
				max = 100
			}
			clamp_variable = {
				var = revolutionary_support
				min = 0
				max = 100
			}
		}
	}
}

country_event = { #Dreyfuss Affair
	id = aquileia.41
	immediate = {log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event aquileia.41"}
	title = aquileia.41.t
	desc = aquileia.41.d

	fire_only_once = yes
	picture = GFX_event_griffon_mountain
	is_triggered_only = yes
	option = {
		name = aquileia.41.a
		add_stability = -0.02
		add_political_power = -25
		add_popularity = {
			ideology = fascism
			popularity = 0.02
		}
		hidden_effect = {
			country_event = { days = 365 id = aquileia.42 }
		}
	}
}
