country_event = { #Revolutionaries Take Control of Pridea
	id = aquileia.45
	immediate = {log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event aquileia.45"}
	title = aquileia.45.t
	desc = aquileia.45.d
	picture = GFX_event_griffon_back
	fire_only_once = yes
	is_triggered_only = yes
	option = {
		name = aquileia.45.a
		add_stability = 0.05
		add_war_support = 0.15
		set_politics = {
			ruling_party = communism
			elections_allowed = no
		}
		add_popularity = {
			ideology = communism
			popularity = 0.15
		}
		add_field_marshal_role={
			character = JFT_guillaume_marronne
			traits={ brilliant_strategist griffon_race_trait }
			skill=2
			attack_skill=1
			defense_skill=1
			planning_skill=2
			logistics_skill=3
			legacy_id=22265
		}
		custom_effect_tooltip = JER_guillaume_2_stats_tp
		add_corps_commander_role={
			character = JFT_pain_leve
			traits={ trait_cautious politically_connected pony_race_trait }
			skill=3
			attack_skill=2
			defense_skill=2
			planning_skill=3
			logistics_skill=3
			legacy_id=22266
		}
		custom_effect_tooltip = JER_pain_stats_tp
		add_corps_commander_role={
			character = JFT_anne_dieuxleveulent
			traits={ trait_reckless griffon_race_trait }
			skill=2
			attack_skill=3
			defense_skill=1
			planning_skill=2
			logistics_skill=1
			legacy_id=22267
		}
		custom_effect_tooltip = JER_dieux_stats_tp
		add_corps_commander_role={
			character = JFT_berty_albatros
			traits={ trait_cautious griffon_race_trait infantry_leader }
			skill=2
			attack_skill=1
			defense_skill=1
			planning_skill=3
			logistics_skill=2
			legacy_id=22268
		}
		custom_effect_tooltip = JER_berty_stats_tp
		add_corps_commander_role={
			character = JFT_vin_gai
			traits={ brilliant_strategist career_officer armor_officer pony_race_trait }
			skill=1
			attack_skill=1
			defense_skill=1
			planning_skill=1
			logistics_skill=1
			legacy_id=22269
		}
		custom_effect_tooltip = JER_vin_stats_tp
		hidden_effect = {
		    if = {
			    limit = {
				    JER = {
					    has_completed_focus = JER_state_of_aquileia
					}
				}
			    JER = {
				    end_puppet = JFT
				}
			    JFT = {
				    drop_cosmetic_tag = yes
				}
			    if = {
				    limit = {
					    JFT = {
						    is_in_faction_with = JER
					    }
				    }
				    JFT = {
					    leave_faction = yes
				    }
			    }
		    }
			if = {
			    limit = {
				    JER = {
					    has_completed_focus = JER_fight_for_freedom
					}
				}
				drop_cosmetic_tag = yes
				set_cosmetic_tag = JER_JFT_REPUBLIC_PUPPET
		    }
			if = {
			    limit = {
				    has_character = JFT_maurice_gamelinotte
				}
				JFT_maurice_gamelinotte = {
					retire = yes
				}
		    }
		    if = {
			    limit = {
				    has_character = JFT_fleur_bloom
				}
				effect_tooltip = {
			    	retire_character = JFT_fleur_bloom
				}
				hidden_effect = {
					JFT_fleur_bloom = {
						set_character_flag = JFT_exiled_monarchist
					}
				}
		    }
			if = {
				limit = {
					has_character = JFT_marie_anne_darmond
				}
				effect_tooltip = {
					retire_character = JFT_marie_anne_darmond
				}
				hidden_effect = {
					JFT_marie_anne_darmond = {
						set_character_flag = JFT_exiled_monarchist
					}
				}
			}
			if = {
			    limit = {
				    has_character = JFT_jacques_pivert
				}
			    JFT_jacques_pivert = {
					retire = yes
				}
		    }
			if = {
			    limit = {
				    has_character = JFT_jeanne_de_belleville
				}
			    JFT_jeanne_de_belleville = {
					retire = yes
				}
		    }
			if = {
			    limit = {
				    has_character = JFT_andre_abeille
				}
			    JFT_andre_abeille = {
					retire = yes
				}
		    }
	    }
    }
}

country_event = { #Revolution (Monarchists)
	id = aquileia.46
	immediate = {log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event aquileia.46"}
	title = aquileia.46.t
	desc = aquileia.46.d

	fire_only_once = yes
	is_triggered_only = yes
	picture = GFX_event_griffon_mountain
	option = {
		name = aquileia.46.a
		add_stability = 0.05
		add_war_support = 0.15
		add_political_power = 50
		hidden_effect = {
			end_puppet = MER
			MER = {
				drop_cosmetic_tag = yes
                if = {
                    limit = {
                        is_in_faction_with = JER
                    }
                    leave_faction = yes
                }
			}
			JEB = {
				if = {
					limit = {
						NOT = {
						    is_subject_of = JER
						}
					}
					declare_war_on = {
						target = JER
						type = annex_everything
					}
				}
			}
			JRR = {
				if = {
					limit = {
						NOT = {
						    is_subject_of = JER
						}
					}
					declare_war_on = {
						target = JER
						type = annex_everything
					}
				}
			}
			VIN = {
				if = {
					limit = {
						NOT = {
						    is_subject_of = JER
						}
					}
					declare_war_on = {
						target = JER
						type = annex_everything
					}
				}
			}
			JFT = {
				if = {
					limit = {
						NOT = {
						    is_subject_of = JER
						}
					}
					declare_war_on = {
						target = JER
						type = annex_everything
					}
				}
			}
			clr_country_flag = JER_cant_do_war_focuses
		}
		hidden_effect = {
			news_event = { id = aquileia_news.1 hours = 1 }
			if = {
				limit = {
					is_ai = yes
				}
				add_manpower = 30000
				load_oob = "JER_royalist_militia"
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					check_variable = { JER_monarchist_units = 1 }
				}
				load_oob = "JER_2_extra_units"
			}
			else_if = {
				limit = {
					check_variable = { JER_monarchist_units = 2 }
				}
				load_oob = "JER_4_extra_units"
			}
			else_if = {
				limit = {
					check_variable = { JER_monarchist_units = 3 }
				}
				load_oob = "JER_6_extra_units"
			}
			else_if = {
				limit = {
					check_variable = { JER_monarchist_units = 4 }
				}
				load_oob = "JER_8_extra_units"
			}
		}
	}
}

country_event = { #Revolution Fails utterly
	id = aquileia.47
	immediate = {log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event aquileia.47"}
	title = aquileia.47.t
	desc = aquileia.47.d

	fire_only_once = yes
	is_triggered_only = yes
	picture = GFX_event_griffon_mountain
	option = {
		name = aquileia.47.a
		custom_effect_tooltip = JER_cores_tp
		add_stability = 0.20
		add_political_power = 200
		if = {
			limit = { has_template = "Division de La Milice" }
			delete_unit_template_and_units = { division_template = "Division de La Milice" }
		}
		hidden_effect = {
			country_event = { id = aquileia_news.4 hours = 1 }
			set_global_flag = JER_revolution_ended
			JRR = {
				add_country_leader_role = {
					character = JRR_sylvian_bassot

					country_leader = {
					expire = "1965.1.1"
					ideology = nazism
					traits = { }
					}
					promote_leader = yes
				}
			}
			JEB = {
				every_core_state = {
					add_core_of = JER
				}
			}
			JRR = {
				every_core_state = {
					add_core_of = JER
				}

			}
			JFT = {
				every_core_state = {
					add_core_of = JER
				}

			}
			VIN = {
				every_core_state = {
					add_core_of = JER
				}

			}
			clr_country_flag = JER_cant_do_war_focuses
			if = {
				limit = {
					check_variable = { JER_monarchist_units = 1 }
				}
				load_oob = "JER_2_extra_units"
			}
			else_if = {
				limit = {
					check_variable = { JER_monarchist_units = 2 }
				}
				load_oob = "JER_4_extra_units"
			}
			else_if = {
				limit = {
					check_variable = { JER_monarchist_units = 3 }
				}
				load_oob = "JER_6_extra_units"
			}
			else_if = {
				limit = {
					check_variable = { JER_monarchist_units = 4 }
				}
				load_oob = "JER_8_extra_units"
			}
		}
	}
}

country_event = { #Revolution Fails
	id = aquileia.48
	immediate = {log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event aquileia.48"}
	title = aquileia.48.t
	desc = aquileia.48.d

	fire_only_once = yes
	is_triggered_only = yes
	picture = GFX_event_griffon_mountain
	trigger = {
		NOT = {
			has_global_flag = JER_revolution_ended
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = aquileia.48.a
		custom_effect_tooltip = JER_cores_tp
		add_stability = 0.10
		add_political_power = 100
		hidden_effect = {
			country_event = { id = aquileia_news.4 hours = 1 }
			clr_global_flag = JER_revolution_begun
			set_global_flag = JER_revolution_ended
			JEB = {
				every_core_state = {
					add_core_of = JER
				}
			}
			JRR = {
				every_core_state = {
					add_core_of = JER
				}

			}
			JFT = {
				every_core_state = {
					add_core_of = JER
				}

			}
			VIN = {
				every_core_state = {
					add_core_of = JER
				}

			}
			if = {
				limit = { has_template = "Division de La Milice" }
				delete_unit_template_and_units = { division_template = "Division de La Milice" }
			}
		}
	}
}

	id = aquileia.49
	immediate = {log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event aquileia.49"}

	desc = aquileia.49.d

	option = {
		name = aquileia.49.a
		add_stability = -0.10
		add_political_power = -75

			limit = {
				has_character = JER_king_moriset_discret
			}
			JER_king_moriset_discret = {
				retire = yes
			}
		}
		promote_character = JER_vivienne_discret
		add_field_marshal_role = {
			character = JER_vivienne_discret
			traits={ brilliant_strategist griffon_race_trait logistics_wizard thorough_planner }
			skill=3
			attack_skill=4
			defense_skill=2
			planning_skill=4
			logistics_skill=3
			legacy_id=75652
		}
		custom_effect_tooltip = vivienne_discret_stats_tp
	}
}

country_event = { #Aquileia Demands Annexation
	id = aquileia.54
	immediate = {log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event aquileia.54"}
	title = aquileia.54.t
	desc = aquileia.54.d
	picture = GFX_event_griffon_back
	is_triggered_only = yes
	option = {
		name = aquileia.54.a
		ai_chance = { factor = 98 }
		custom_effect_tooltip = GAME_OVER_TT
		hidden_effect = {
			if = {
				limit = {
				   has_template = "Griffon Infantry Division"
				}
				delete_unit_template_and_units = {
					division_template = "Griffon Infantry Division"
				}
			}
		}
		FROM = { annex_country = { target = ROOT transfer_troops = no } }
	}
	option = {
		name = aquileia.54.b
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 2
			modifier = {
				factor = 100
				original_tag = JFT
				}
		}
		add_political_power = 50
		add_stability = 0.10
		end_puppet_this = yes
		if = {
			limit = {
				is_in_faction_with = FROM
			}
			leave_faction = yes
		}
		FROM = {
			add_ai_strategy = {
				type = antagonize
				id = ROOT
				value = 200
			}
			add_ai_strategy = {
				type = conquer
				id = ROOT
				value = 100
			}
			add_ai_strategy = {
				type = alliance
				id = ROOT
				value = -500
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					ROOT = { tag = JEB }
				}
				country_event = { id = aquileia.55 days = 5 }
			}
			else_if = {
				limit = {
					ROOT = { tag = JRR }
				}
				country_event = { id = aquileia.56 days = 5 }
			}
			else_if = {
				limit = {
					ROOT = { tag = VIN }
				}
				country_event = { id = aquileia.57 days = 5 }
			}
			else_if = {
				limit = {
					ROOT = { tag = JFT }
				}
				country_event = { id = aquileia.58 days = 5 }
			}
		}
	}
}

country_event = { #Rila Refuses
	id = aquileia.55
	immediate = {log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event aquileia.55"}
	title = aquileia.55.t
	desc = aquileia.55.d
	picture = GFX_event_western_griffon_city
	fire_only_once = yes
	is_triggered_only = yes

	option = {
		name = aquileia.55.a
		add_stability = -0.025
		add_war_support = 0.04
		if = {
			limit = { has_non_aggression_pact_with = FROM }
			diplomatic_relation = {
				country = FROM
				relation = non_aggression_pact
				active = no
			}
		}
		declare_war_on = { target = JEB type = annex_everything }
	}
}

country_event = { #Honouring the Ponies
	id = aquileia.60
	immediate = {log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event aquileia.60"}
	title = aquileia.60.t
	desc = aquileia.60.d

	picture = GFX_event_griffon_mountain
	is_triggered_only = yes

	option = {
		name = aquileia.60.a
		add_stability = 0.075
		add_political_power = 50
		add_popularity = {
			ideology = neutrality
			popularity = 0.05
		}
	}
}

country_event = { #State Visit to Rila
	id = aquileia.61
	immediate = {log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event aquileia.61"}
	title = aquileia.61.t
	desc = aquileia.61.d
	picture = GFX_event_medieval_castle_on_hill
	fire_only_once = no
	is_triggered_only = yes
	option = {
		name = aquileia.61.a
		custom_effect_tooltip = JER_increase_support_8
		add_stability = 0.03
		add_popularity = {
			ideology = neutrality
			popularity = 0.02
		}
		hidden_effect = {
			add_to_variable = {
				var = monarchist_support
				value = 2
			}
			subtract_from_variable = {
				var = revolutionary_support
				value = 2
			}
			clamp_variable = {
				var = monarchist_support
				min = 0
				max = 100
			}
			clamp_variable = {
				var = revolutionary_support
				min = 0
				max = 100
			}
		}
	}
}

			subtract_from_variable = {
				var = revolutionary_support
				value = 10
			}

				min = 0
				max = 100
			}
			clamp_variable = {
				var = revolutionary_support
				min = 0
				max = 100
			}
		}
	}

		add_stability = -0.03
		add_political_power = -25
		add_popularity = {
			ideology = democratic
			popularity = 0.02
		}
		add_popularity = {
			ideology = communism
			popularity = 0.02
		}
		hidden_effect = {
			add_to_variable = {
				var = revolutionary_support
				value = 2
			}
			subtract_from_variable = {
				var = monarchist_support
				value = 2
			}
			clamp_variable = {
				var = monarchist_support
				min = 0
				max = 100
			}
			clamp_variable = {
				var = revolutionary_support
				min = 0
				max = 100
			}
		}
	}
}

	desc = aquileia.109.d
	picture = GFX_event_medieval_castle_on_hill
	fire_only_once = yes
	is_triggered_only = yes
	option = {
		name = aquileia.109.a
		set_party_name = {
		    ideology = neutrality
			name = JER_national_party_name
			long_name = JER_national_party_name_long
		}
		set_politics = {
			ruling_party = neutrality
			elections_allowed = no
		}
		add_popularity = {
			ideology = neutrality
			popularity = 0.25
		}
		hidden_effect = {
		    add_country_leader_role = {
	            character = JER_theodore_verany

				country_leader = {
	            	desc = "JER_POLITICS_VERANY_DESC"
	            	expire = "1965.1.1"
	            	ideology = republicanism
	            	traits = {
		            	JER_verany_trait
	            	}
				}
				promote_leader = yes
            }
			country_event = {
				id = aquileia.110
				days = 7
			}
		}
	}
}

country_event = { #The Election
	id = aquileia.113
	immediate = {log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event aquileia.113"}
	title = aquileia.113.t
	desc = aquileia.113.d

	picture = GFX_event_medieval_castle_on_hill
	is_triggered_only = yes

	option = {
	    ai_chance = {
		    base = party_popularity@communism
		    modifier = {
				OR = {
					AND = {
						is_historical_focus_on = yes
						has_game_rule = {
							rule = JER_ai_behavior
							option = DEFAULT
						}
					}
					has_country_flag = JER_AI_JER_GAUDREAU_P
					has_game_rule = {
						rule = JER_ai_behavior
						option = JER_GAUDREAU_P
					}
					has_country_flag = JER_AI_JER_RODIER_P
					has_game_rule = {
						rule = JER_ai_behavior
						option = JER_RODIER_P
					}
					has_country_flag = JER_AI_HISTORICAL
					has_game_rule = {
						rule = JER_ai_behavior
						option = HISTORICAL
					}
				}
				factor = 0
			}
		}
		name = aquileia.113.a
		set_politics = {
			ruling_party = communism
			elections_allowed = no
		}
		add_popularity = {
			ideology = communism
			popularity = 0.075
		}
		hidden_effect = {
		    complete_national_focus = JER_PAT_victory
			set_variable = {
			    var = JER.communist_support
				value = 70
			}
			set_variable = {
			    var = JER.democratic_support
				value = 30
			}
			set_variable = {
			    var = JER.fascist_support
				value = 10
			}
			set_variable = {
			    var = JER.neutrality_support
				value = 10
			}
			clamp_variable = {
			    var = JER.communist_support
				min = 0
				max = JER.communist_max
			}
			clamp_variable = {
			    var = JER.democratic_support
				min = 0
				max = JER.democratic_max
			}
			clamp_variable = {
			    var = JER.fascist_support
				min = 0
				max = JER.fascist_max
			}
			clamp_variable = {
			    var = JER.neutrality_support
				min = 0
				max = JER.neutrality_max
			}
			update_JER_parliament_max = yes
			if = {
			    limit = {
				    is_ai = no #AI is too dumb to deal with the system properly
				}
			    activate_JER_parliament_lose_support_mission = yes
			}
		}
	}
	option = {
	    ai_chance = {
		    base = party_popularity@democratic
		    modifier = {
				OR = {
					AND = {
						is_historical_focus_on = yes
						has_game_rule = {
							rule = JER_ai_behavior
							option = DEFAULT
						}
					}
					has_country_flag = JER_AI_JER_CRU_P
					has_game_rule = {
						rule = JER_ai_behavior
						option = JER_CRU_P
					}
					has_country_flag = JER_AI_JER_RODIER_P
					has_game_rule = {
						rule = JER_ai_behavior
						option = JER_RODIER_P
					}
					has_country_flag = JER_AI_HISTORICAL
					has_game_rule = {
						rule = JER_ai_behavior
						option = HISTORICAL
					}
				}
				factor = 0
			}
		}
		name = aquileia.113.b
		set_politics = {
			ruling_party = democratic
			elections_allowed = no
		}
		add_popularity = {
			ideology = democratic
			popularity = 0.025
		}
		hidden_effect = {
		    complete_national_focus = JER_FJA_victory
			set_variable = {
			    var = JER.communist_support
				value = 20
			}
			set_variable = {
			    var = JER.democratic_support
				value = 100
			}
			set_variable = {
			    var = JER.fascist_support
				value = 15
			}
			set_variable = {
			    var = JER.neutrality_support
				value = 15
			}
			clamp_variable = {
			    var = JER.communist_support
				min = 0
				max = JER.communist_max
			}
			clamp_variable = {
			    var = JER.democratic_support
				min = 0
				max = JER.democratic_max
			}
			clamp_variable = {
			    var = JER.fascist_support
				min = 0
				max = JER.fascist_max
			}
			clamp_variable = {
			    var = JER.neutrality_support
				min = 0
				max = JER.neutrality_max
			}
			update_JER_parliament_max = yes
			if = {
			    limit = {
				    is_ai = no #AI is too dumb to deal with the system properly
				}
			    activate_JER_parliament_lose_support_mission = yes
			}
		}
	}
	option = {
	    ai_chance = {
		    base = party_popularity@fascism
		    modifier = {
				OR = {
				    has_country_flag = JER_AI_JER_CRU_P
					has_game_rule = {
						rule = JER_ai_behavior
						option = JER_CRU_P
					}
					AND = {
						is_historical_focus_on = yes
						has_game_rule = {
							rule = JER_ai_behavior
							option = DEFAULT
						}
					}
					has_country_flag = JER_AI_JER_GAUDREAU_P
					has_game_rule = {
						rule = JER_ai_behavior
						option = JER_GAUDREAU_P
					}
					has_country_flag = JER_AI_HISTORICAL
					has_game_rule = {
						rule = JER_ai_behavior
						option = HISTORICAL
					}
				}
				factor = 0
			}
		}
		name = aquileia.113.c
		set_politics = {
			ruling_party = fascism
			elections_allowed = no
		}
		add_popularity = {
			ideology = fascism
			popularity = 0.075
		}
		hidden_effect = {
		    complete_national_focus = JER_MPA_victory
			set_variable = {
			    var = JER.communist_support
				value = 30
			}
			set_variable = {
			    var = JER.democratic_support
				value = 20
			}
			set_variable = {
			    var = JER.fascist_support
				value = 60
			}
			set_variable = {
			    var = JER.neutrality_support
				value = 20
			}
			clamp_variable = {
			    var = JER.communist_support
				min = 0
				max = JER.communist_max
			}
			clamp_variable = {
			    var = JER.democratic_support
				min = 0
				max = JER.democratic_max
			}
			clamp_variable = {
			    var = JER.fascist_support
				min = 0
				max = JER.fascist_max
			}
			clamp_variable = {
			    var = JER.neutrality_support
				min = 0
				max = JER.neutrality_max
			}
			update_JER_parliament_max = yes
			if = {
			    limit = {
				    is_ai = no #AI is too dumb to deal with the system properly
				}
			    activate_JER_parliament_lose_support_mission = yes
			}
		}
	}
	option = {
	    ai_chance = {
		    base = party_popularity@neutrality
		    modifier = {
				OR = {
				    has_country_flag = JER_AI_JER_CRU_P
					has_game_rule = {
						rule = JER_ai_behavior
						option = JER_CRU_P
					}
					has_country_flag = JER_AI_JER_GAUDREAU_P
					has_game_rule = {
						rule = JER_ai_behavior
						option = JER_GAUDREAU_P
					}
					has_country_flag = JER_AI_JER_RODIER_P
					has_game_rule = {
						rule = JER_ai_behavior
						option = JER_RODIER_P
					}
				}
				factor = 0
			}
		}
		name = aquileia.113.e
		set_politics = {
			ruling_party = neutrality
			elections_allowed = no
		}
		add_popularity = {
			ideology = neutrality
			popularity = 0.075
		}
		hidden_effect = {
		    complete_national_focus = JER_national_party
			set_variable = {
			    var = JER.communist_support
				value = 10
			}
			set_variable = {
			    var = JER.democratic_support
				value = 20
			}
			set_variable = {
			    var = JER.fascist_support
				value = 10
			}
			set_variable = {
			    var = JER.neutrality_support
				value = 70
			}
			clamp_variable = {
			    var = JER.communist_support
				min = 0
				max = JER.communist_max
			}
			clamp_variable = {
			    var = JER.democratic_support
				min = 0
				max = JER.democratic_max
			}
			clamp_variable = {
			    var = JER.fascist_support
				min = 0
				max = JER.fascist_max
			}
			clamp_variable = {
			    var = JER.neutrality_support
				min = 0
				max = JER.neutrality_max
			}
			update_JER_parliament_max = yes
			if = {
			    limit = {
				    is_ai = no #AI is too dumb to deal with the system properly
				}
			    activate_JER_parliament_lose_support_mission = yes
			}
		}
	}

country_event = { #Illieracy Event 1
	id = aquileia.114
	immediate = {log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event aquileia.114"}
	title = aquileia.114.t
	desc = aquileia.114.d
	picture = GFX_event_western_griffon_city
	is_triggered_only = yes #moved to GRI_education_effort

	option = {
		name = aquileia.114.a
		custom_effect_tooltip = JER_commie_5_democratic_5_fascism_5_neutrality_5_tp
		add_political_power = 25
		decrease_illiteracy = yes
	    add_to_variable = {
		    var = JER.communist_support
			value = 5
		}
		add_to_variable = {
		    var = JER.democratic_support
			value = 5
		}
		add_to_variable = {
		    var = JER.fascist_support
			value = 5
		}
		add_to_variable = {
		    var = JER.neutrality_support
			value = 5
		}
		clamp_variable = {
		    var = JER.communist_support
			min = 0
			max = JER.communist_max
		}
		clamp_variable = {
		    var = JER.democratic_support
			min = 0
			max = JER.democratic_max
		}
		clamp_variable = {
		    var = JER.fascist_support
			min = 0
			max = JER.fascist_max
		}
		clamp_variable = {
		    var = JER.neutrality_support
			min = 0
			max = JER.neutrality_max
		}
		update_JER_parliament_max = yes
		hidden_effect = {
			country_event = { id = aquileia.115 days = 140 }
		}
	}
}

		    var = JER.democratic_support
			value = 5
		}
		add_to_variable = {
		    var = JER.fascist_support
			value = 5
		}
		add_to_variable = {
		    var = JER.neutrality_support
			value = 5
		}
		clamp_variable = {
		    var = JER.communist_support
			min = 0
			max = JER.communist_max
		}
		clamp_variable = {
		    var = JER.democratic_support
			min = 0
			max = JER.democratic_max
		}
		clamp_variable = {
		    var = JER.fascist_support
			min = 0
			max = JER.fascist_max
		}
		clamp_variable = {
		    var = JER.neutrality_support
			min = 0
			max = JER.neutrality_max
		}
		update_JER_parliament_max = yes
	}
}

		text = aquileia.119.d_enemy
		trigger = {
			NOT = {
				is_in_faction_with = FROM
				is_subject_of = FROM
				is_guaranteed_by = FROM
				has_guaranteed = FROM
				has_non_aggression_pact_with = FROM
			}
		}
	}
	desc = {
		text = aquileia.119.d_ally
		trigger = {
			OR = {
				is_in_faction_with = FROM
				is_subject_of = FROM
				is_guaranteed_by = FROM
				has_guaranteed = FROM
				has_non_aggression_pact_with = FROM
			}
		}
	}
	picture = GFX_event_medieval_castle_on_hill
	is_triggered_only = yes
	option = { #Give in to their demands
		name = aquileia.119.a
		add_political_power = -100
		add_stability = -0.1
		add_war_support = 0.1
		FROM = { country_event = { id = aquileia.120 days = 3 }}
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 30
			modifier = {
				factor = 0.5
				is_in_faction_with = WNG
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				has_government = fascism
			}
		}
	}
	option = { #Refuse
		name = aquileia.119.b
		add_political_power = 50
		add_stability = -0.05
		add_war_support = 0.05
		FROM = { country_event = { id = aquileia.121 days = 3 }}
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 40
			modifier = {
				factor = 0.5
				is_in_faction_with = FROM
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				is_subject_of = FROM
			}
		}
	}
}

			modifier = made_friends
		}

		add_stability = 0.025
		effect_tooltip = {
			transfer_state = 487
			transfer_state = 652
			transfer_state = 521
		}

			FROM = {
				if = {
					limit = {
						owns_state = 487
					}
					ROOT = {
						transfer_state = 487
					}
				}
				if = {
					limit = {
						owns_state = 652
					}
					ROOT = {
						transfer_state = 652
					}
				}
				if = {
					limit = {
						owns_state = 521
					}
					ROOT = {
						transfer_state = 521
					}
				}
			}
			country_event = {
				id = aquileia.255
				days = 120
			}
		}
	}

			NOT = {
				is_in_faction_with = FROM
				FROM = {
					is_subject_of = ROOT
				}
				is_guaranteed_by = FROM
				has_guaranteed = FROM
				has_non_aggression_pact_with = FROM
			}
		}
	}
	desc = {
		text = aquileia.121.d_ally
		trigger = {
			OR = {
				is_in_faction_with = FROM
				FROM = {
					is_subject_of = ROOT
				}
				is_guaranteed_by = FROM
				has_guaranteed = FROM
				has_non_aggression_pact_with = FROM
			}
		}
	}
	picture = GFX_event_medieval_castle_on_hill
	is_triggered_only = yes

		name = aquileia.121.a
		if = {
			limit = {
				FROM = {
					NOT = {
						is_in_faction_with = ROOT
						is_subject_of = ROOT
						is_guaranteed_by = ROOT
						has_guaranteed = FROM
						has_non_aggression_pact_with = ROOT
					}
				}
			}
			custom_effect_tooltip = JER_tarrin_borderwars_unlocked
		}
		add_opinion_modifier = {
			target = FROM
			modifier = distrustful_relations
		}
		set_country_flag = JER_tarrin_demand_refused
		add_political_power = -25
		add_war_support = 0.1
		add_stability = -0.05
	}
}

country_event = { #Aquileia Proposes Full Freedom Of Mobility Between The Karthin Pact and the Entete
	id = aquileia.157
	immediate = {log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event aquileia.157"}
	title = aquileia.157.t
	desc = aquileia.157.d
	picture = GFX_event_griffon_diplomacy

	is_triggered_only = yes

	option = { #Agree
	    ai_chance = {
			base = 70
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				has_opinion = { target = JER value < -25 }
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0.2
				has_opinion = { target = JER value < 0 }
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0.4
				has_opinion = { target = JER value < 25 }
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 1.4
				has_opinion = { target = JER value > 50 }
			}
		}
		name = aquileia.157.a
		every_country = {
            limit = {
                OR = {
                    original_tag = WNG
                    is_in_faction_with = WNG
					is_subject_of = WNG
                }
            }
            ROOT = {
			    give_military_access = PREV
			}
        }
		JER = {
			country_event = {
				id = aquileia.158
			}
		}
	}

	option = { #Don't Agree
	    ai_chance = {
			base = 30
		}
		name = aquileia.157.b
		add_political_power = 50
		add_stability = 0.05
		JER = {
			country_event = {
				id = aquileia.159
			}
		}
	}
}

country_event = { #Wingbardy Agrees
	id = aquileia.165
	immediate = {log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event aquileia.165"}
	title = aquileia.165.t
	desc = aquileia.165.d
	picture = GFX_event_griffon_diplomacy

	is_triggered_only = yes

	option = {
		name = aquileia.165.a
		every_country = {
            limit = {
                is_subject = no
                OR = {
                    original_tag = WNG
                    is_in_faction_with = WNG
                }
            }
			leave_faction = yes
			add_ai_strategy = {
				type = alliance
				id = ROOT
				value = 200
			}
            ROOT = {
				add_to_faction = PREV
				add_ai_strategy = {
					type = alliance
					id = PREV
					value = 200
				}
			}
        }
	}
}

country_event = { #The Matter Of Herzland
	id = aquileia.171
	immediate = {log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event aquileia.171"}
	title = aquileia.171.t
	desc = aquileia.171.d
	picture = GFX_event_griffenheim

	is_triggered_only = yes

	option = { #Negotiate With Aquileia for full Aquileian Indepenence and offer them our part of the Herzland
	    ai_chance = {
			factor = 95
		}
		name = aquileia.171.a
		hidden_effect = {
		    FAT = {
				country_event = {
				    id = aquileia.174
					days = 7
				}
			}
		}
	}

	option = { #Betray The Republicans
	    ai_chance = {
			factor = 5
		}
		name = aquileia.171.b
		custom_effect_tooltip = JER_lose_all_neutrality_2_tp
		hidden_effect = {
			set_temp_variable = {
				var = ban_ideology_var
				value = party_popularity@neutrality
			}
			multiply_temp_variable = {
				var = ban_ideology_var
				value = -1
			}
			multiply_temp_variable = {
				var = ban_ideology_var
				value = 0.75
			}
		}
		add_stability = ban_ideology_var
		hidden_effect = {
			set_variable = {
			    var = JER.neutrality_support
				value = 0
			}
			clamp_variable = {
			    var = JER.neutrality_support
				min = 0
				max = JER.neutrality_max
			}
			update_JER_parliament_max = yes
		}
		update_JER_parliament_max = yes
		hidden_effect = {
		    complete_national_focus = JER_the_concordant_fails
			FAT = {
				country_event = {
				    id = aquileia.178
					days = 7
				}
			}
		}
	}
}

				min = 0

country_event = { #The Aquileian Offer
	id = aquileia.174
	immediate = {log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event aquileia.171"}
	title = aquileia.174.t
	desc = aquileia.174.d
	picture = GFX_event_griffenheim

	is_triggered_only = yes

	option = { #Refute Their Offer
	    ai_chance = {
			factor = 20
		}
		name = aquileia.174.a
		add_stability = -0.10
		add_war_support = -0.10
		add_political_power = -100
		hidden_effect = {
		    JER = {
				country_event = {
				    id = aquileia.175
				}
			}
		}
	}

	option = { #Agree to their terms
	    trigger = {
		    is_in_faction_with = JER
		}
	    ai_chance = {
			factor = 80
		}
		name = aquileia.174.b
		add_stability = 0.10
		add_political_power = 100
		hidden_effect = {
		    JER = {
				country_event = {
				    id = aquileia.176
				}
			}
		}
	}

	option = { #Agree to their terms
	    trigger = {
		    NOT = {
		        is_in_faction_with = JER
			}
		}
	    ai_chance = {
			factor = 80
		}
		name = aquileia.174.b
		add_stability = 0.10
		add_political_power = 100
		hidden_effect = {
		    JER = {
				country_event = {
				    id = aquileia.177
				}
			}
		}
	}
}

country_event = { #The Republicans have betrayed us!
	id = aquileia.175
	immediate = {log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event aquileia.175"}
	title = aquileia.175.t
	desc = aquileia.175.d
	picture = GFX_event_griffenheim

	is_triggered_only = yes

	option = {
		name = aquileia.175.a
		add_war_support = 0.10
		add_popularity = {
			ideology = neutrality
			popularity = -0.10
		}
		update_JER_parliament_max = yes
		JHZ = {
			add_opinion_modifier = {
				target = FAT
				modifier = sworn_enemies
			}
			add_opinion_modifier = {
				target = FAT
				modifier = CHN_Embargo
			}
		}
		JER = {
			add_opinion_modifier = {
				target = FAT
				modifier = sworn_enemies
			}
			add_opinion_modifier = {
				target = FAT
				modifier = CHN_Embargo
			}
		}
		FAT = {
			add_opinion_modifier = {
				target = JER
				modifier = sworn_enemies
			}
			add_opinion_modifier = {
				target = JER
				modifier = CHN_Embargo
			}
			add_opinion_modifier = {
				target = JHZ
				modifier = sworn_enemies
			}
			add_opinion_modifier = {
				target = JHZ
				modifier = CHN_Embargo
			}
		}
		hidden_effect = {
		    complete_national_focus = JER_the_concordant_fails
		}
	}
}

	id = aquileia.178
	immediate = {log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event aquileia.178"}
	title = aquileia.178.t
	desc = aquileia.178.d
	picture = GFX_event_griffenheim

	is_triggered_only = yes

	option = {
		name = aquileia.178.a
		add_war_support = 0.10
		JHZ = {
			add_opinion_modifier = {
				target = FAT
				modifier = sworn_enemies
			}
			add_opinion_modifier = {
				target = FAT
				modifier = CHN_Embargo
			}
		}
		JER = {
			add_opinion_modifier = {
				target = FAT
				modifier = sworn_enemies
			}
			add_opinion_modifier = {
				target = FAT
				modifier = CHN_Embargo
			}
		}
		FAT = {
			add_opinion_modifier = {
				target = JER
				modifier = sworn_enemies
			}
			add_opinion_modifier = {
				target = JER
				modifier = CHN_Embargo
			}
			add_opinion_modifier = {
				target = JHZ
				modifier = sworn_enemies
			}
			add_opinion_modifier = {
				target = JHZ
				modifier = CHN_Embargo
			}
		}
	}
}

country_event = { #The Aquileians give us airforce
	id = aquileia.179
	immediate = {log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event aquileia.179"}
	title = aquileia.179.t
	desc = aquileia.179.d
	picture = GFX_event_river_city_2

	is_triggered_only = yes

	option = {
		name = aquileia.179.a
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_dlc = "By Blood Alone"
				has_tech = iw_small_airframe
			}
			set_technology = {
				aa_lmg = 1
				engines_1 = 1
			}
			generic_early_fighter = yes
			add_equipment_to_stockpile = {
				type = small_plane_airframe_1
				variant_name = "Early Fighter"
				amount = 500
			}
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = {
				has_dlc = "By Blood Alone"
				NOT = {
					has_tech = iw_small_airframe
				}
			}
			set_technology = {
				iw_small_airframe = 1
				aa_lmg = 1
				engines_1 = 1
			}
			generic_early_fighter = yes
			add_equipment_to_stockpile = {
				type = small_plane_airframe_1
				variant_name = "Early Fighter"
				amount = 500
			}
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = {
				has_tech = early_fighter
			}
			add_equipment_to_stockpile = {
				type = small_plane_airframe
				amount = 500
			}
		}
		else = {
			set_technology = {
				early_fighter = 1
			}
			add_equipment_to_stockpile = {
				type = small_plane_airframe
				amount = 500
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_dlc = "By Blood Alone"
				has_tech = iw_medium_airframe
			}
			set_technology = {
				early_bombs = 1
				engines_1 = 1
			}
			generic_early_tac_bomber = yes
			add_equipment_to_stockpile = {
				type = medium_plane_airframe_0
				variant_name = "Early Tactical Bomber"
				amount = 300
			}
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = {
				has_dlc = "By Blood Alone"
				NOT = {
					has_tech = iw_medium_airframe
				}
			}
			set_technology = {
				iw_medium_airframe = 1
				early_bombs = 1
				engines_1 = 1
			}
			generic_early_tac_bomber = yes
			add_equipment_to_stockpile = {
				type = medium_plane_airframe_0
				variant_name = "Early Tactical Bomber"
				amount = 300
			}
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = {
				has_tech = early_bomber
			}
			add_equipment_to_stockpile = {
				type = medium_plane_airframe
				amount = 300
			}
		}
		else = {
			set_technology = {
				early_bomber = 1
			}
			add_equipment_to_stockpile = {
				type = medium_plane_airframe
				amount = 300
			}
		}
	}
}

country_event = { #Gadreeanu retires and leaves Sugar Crepe to inherit
	id = aquileia.184
	immediate = {log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event aquileia.184"}
	title = aquileia.184.t
	desc = aquileia.184.d
	picture = GFX_event_griffon_diplomacy

	is_triggered_only = yes

	option = {
		name = aquileia.184.a
		custom_effect_tooltip = JER_lose_all_neutrality_and_fascist_tp
		add_country_leader_role = {
	        character = JER_sugar_crepe
	        country_leader={
				desc="JER_POLITICS_CREPE_DESC"
				ideology=socialism
				traits={ JER_uncouth }
				expire="1965.1.1.1"
				id=-1
			}
			promote_leader = yes
        }
		hidden_effect = {
			set_temp_variable = {
				var = ban_ideology_var
				value = party_popularity@fascism
			}
			multiply_temp_variable = {
				var = ban_ideology_var
				value = -1
			}
			multiply_temp_variable = {
				var = ban_ideology_var
				value = 0.75
			}
		}
		add_stability = ban_ideology_var
		hidden_effect = {
		    set_variable = {
			    var = JER.fascist_support
				value = 0
			}
			clamp_variable = {
			    var = JER.fascist_support
				min = 0
				max = JER.fascist_max
			}
			set_variable = {
			    var = JER.neutrality_support
				value = 0
			}
			clamp_variable = {
			    var = JER.neutrality_support
				min = 0
				max = JER.neutrality_max
			}
			update_JER_parliament_max = yes
		}
	}
}

country_event = { #Picking A New Doctrine (Navy)
    id = aquileia.189
	immediate = {log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event aquileia.189"}
	title = aquileia.189.t
	desc = aquileia.189.d
	picture = GFX_event_griffons_machine_gun

	is_triggered_only = yes

	option = {
		name = aquileia.189.a
		ai_chance = {
		    factor = 33
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				OR = {
					has_doctrine = new_fleet_in_being
					has_doctrine = new_convoy_raiding
				}
			}
		}
		navy_experience = 25
		add_doctrine_cost_reduction = {
			name = cat_base_strike
			cost_reduction = 0.5
			uses = 1
			category = naval_doctrine #was cat_base_strike
		}
		add_mastery_bonus = {
			bonus = 0.2
			days = 180
			grand_doctrine = new_base_strike
			name = JER_reforming_the_admirality
		}
	}

	option = {
		name = aquileia.189.b
		ai_chance = {
		    factor = 34
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				OR = {
					has_doctrine = new_base_strike
					has_doctrine = new_convoy_raiding
				}
			}
		}
		navy_experience = 25
		add_doctrine_cost_reduction = {
			name = cat_fleet_in_being
			cost_reduction = 0.5
			uses = 1
			category = naval_doctrine #was cat_fleet_in_being
		}
		add_mastery_bonus = {
			bonus = 0.2
			days = 180
			grand_doctrine = new_fleet_in_being
			name = JER_reforming_the_admirality
		}
	}

	option = {
		name = aquileia.189.c
		ai_chance = {
		    factor = 33
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				OR = {
					has_doctrine = new_fleet_in_being
					has_doctrine = new_base_strike
				}
			}
		}
		navy_experience = 25
		add_doctrine_cost_reduction = {
			name = cat_trade_interdiction
			cost_reduction = 0.5
			uses = 1
			category = naval_doctrine #was cat_trade_interdiction
		}
		add_mastery_bonus = {
			bonus = 0.2
			days = 180
			grand_doctrine = new_convoy_raiding
			name = JER_reforming_the_admirality
		}
	}

country_event = { #The Third Step of the Revolution - Grand Cru essentially kicks the MPA and the PnDA out of the Assemble and rules by decree... It goes as well as you'd expect
	id = aquileia.192
	immediate = {log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event aquileia.192"}
	title = aquileia.192.t
	desc = aquileia.192.d
	picture = GFX_event_griffon_diplomacy

	is_triggered_only = yes

	option = {
		name = aquileia.192.a
		custom_effect_tooltip = JER_assembly_disabled_tp
		add_stability = -0.30
		add_war_support = -0.30
		add_ideas = JER_fascist_resistance
		add_ideas = JER_neutrality_resistance
		hidden_effect = {
		    set_country_flag = JER_no_assembly
			clr_country_flag = JER_fight_for_freedom_flag
			clr_country_flag = hide_surpress_fascism
			clr_country_flag = hide_surpress_democratic
			clr_country_flag = hide_surpress_communism
			clr_country_flag = hide_surpress_neutral
			clr_country_flag = hide_censor_press
			set_cosmetic_tag = JER_REPUBLIC_3
			remove_dynamic_modifier = {
			    modifier = JER_deputies_stability_pp
			}
            remove_dynamic_modifier = {
			    modifier = JER_stability_weekly_mod
			}
		}
	}
}

		    factor = 50

	        character = JER_thibault_devereux
	        country_leader={
				desc="JER_POLITICS_THIBAULT_DESC"
				ideology=democratic_socialism
				traits={ JER_thibault_trait }
				expire="1965.1.1.1"

			}
			promote_leader = yes
        }

		    complete_national_focus = JER_socialist_assembly
		}
	}

		    factor = 50
		}
		name = aquileia.194.b
		add_country_leader_role = {
	        character = JER_victor_allard

	}

country_event = { #The Nuclear Research Committee
	id = aquileia.211
	immediate = {log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event aquileia.211"}
	title = aquileia.211.t
	desc = aquileia.211.d
	picture = GFX_event_unicorn_worker

	is_triggered_only = yes

	option = {
		name = aquileia.211.a
		add_ideas = JER_joint_nuclear_research_idea
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_tech = atomic_research
			}
			add_breakthrough_progress = {
				specialization = specialization_nuclear
				value = 1.5
			}
		}
		else = {
			add_tech_bonus = {
				name = RCT_nuclear_bonus
				bonus = 3.0
				uses = 1
				category = nuclear
			}
		}
	}
}

country_event = { #Aquileia wishes to unite our two Republics under their flag - This is only if Aquileia holds Griffonheim, aka if they have genuinely contributed more to the war effort than the Republic has
	id = aquileia.229
	immediate = {log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event aquileia.229"}
	title = aquileia.229.t
	desc = aquileia.229.d
	picture = GFX_event_griffon_diplomacy

	is_triggered_only = yes

			option = { #Make them a counter-offer (This event choice is for the player only so they can keep playing the Republic)
		trigger = {
			JER = { is_ai = no }
		}
	    ai_chance = {
		    factor = 0 #Player Only Option
		}
		name = aquileia.229.a
		custom_effect_tooltip = JER_a_new_focus_branch_tp
		every_country = {
            limit = {
				is_subject_of = JER
			    is_griffon_continent_griffon_country = yes
			}
            ROOT = {
				annex_country = {
					target = PREV
					transfer_troops = yes
				}
			}
        }
		every_core_state = {
			add_core_of = ROOT
		}
		FAT = {
			annex_country = {
				target = JER
				transfer_troops = yes
			}
		}
		hidden_effect = {
		    save_global_event_target_as = griffonian_empire
			set_variable = {
				global.griffonian_empire_var = THIS
			}
		    JER = {
			every_character = {
				limit = {
					OR = {
						is_unit_leader = yes
						has_character_flag = FAT_advisor_from_JER
					}
				}
				set_nationality = FAT
			}
			FAT = { transfer_technology = yes }
			}
			every_state = {
				limit = {
					has_state_flag = JHZ_cores
				}
				add_core_of = FAT
			}
			JER = {
				every_core_state = {
					add_core_of = FAT
				}
			}
		}
	}


	option = { #Make them a counter-offer (This event choice is for the AI republic when there is an AI verany)
		trigger = {
			JER = { is_ai = yes }
		}
	    ai_chance = {
		    factor = 100  #AI Only Option
		}
		name = aquileia.229.a2
		custom_effect_tooltip = JER_a_new_focus_branch_tp
		every_country = {
            limit = {
				is_subject_of = JER
			    is_griffon_continent_griffon_country = yes
			}
            ROOT = {
				annex_country = {
					target = PREV
					transfer_troops = yes
				}
			}
        }
		every_core_state = {
			add_core_of = ROOT
		}
		FAT = {
			annex_country = {
				target = JER
				transfer_troops = yes
			}
		}
		hidden_effect = {
		    save_global_event_target_as = griffonian_empire
			set_variable = {
				global.griffonian_empire_var = THIS
			}
		    JER = {
			every_character = {
				limit = {
					OR = {
						is_unit_leader = yes
						has_character_flag = FAT_advisor_from_JER
					}
				}
				set_nationality = FAT
			}
			FAT = { transfer_technology = yes }
			}
			every_state = {
				limit = {
					has_state_flag = JHZ_cores
				}
				add_core_of = FAT
			}
			JER = {
				every_core_state = {
					add_core_of = FAT
				}
			}
		}
	}

	option = { #We accept - Aquileia Annexes The Republic
	    ai_chance = {
		    factor = 100
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				JER = { is_ai = yes }
			}
		}
	    name = aquileia.229.b
		JER = {
			country_event = {
				id = aquileia.230
			}
		}
	}
}

country_event = { #The New Republic - Unification with the Republic
	id = aquileia.230
	immediate = {log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event aquileia.230"}
	title = aquileia.230.t
	desc = aquileia.230.d
	picture = GFX_event_griffon_diplomacy

	is_triggered_only = yes

	option = {
		name = aquileia.230.a
		custom_effect_tooltip = JER_a_new_focus_branch_tp
		drop_cosmetic_tag = yes
		set_cosmetic_tag = JER_GRIFFONIAN_REPUBLIC
		hidden_effect = {
		    save_global_event_target_as = griffonian_empire
			set_variable = {
				global.griffonian_empire_var = THIS
			}
		    FAT = {
		    	every_character = {
					limit = {
						is_country_leader = no
						is_unit_leader = yes
					}
					set_nationality = JER
				}
			}
			every_country = {
                limit = {
				    OR = {
				        is_subject_of = JER
					    is_subject_of = FAT
					}
					is_griffon_continent_griffon_country = yes
			    }
                ROOT = {
				    annex_country = {
					    target = PREV
					    transfer_troops = yes
				    }
			    }
            }
			every_core_state = {
				add_core_of = ROOT
			}
			JER = {
			    annex_country = {
				    target = FAT
				    transfer_troops = yes
			    }
		    }
			every_state = {
				limit = {
					has_state_flag = JHZ_cores
				}
				add_core_of = JER
			}
			FAT ={
				every_core_state = {
					add_core_of = JER
				}
			}
			load_focus_tree = {
			    tree = aquileian_pan_griffonian_victory
			    keep_completed = yes
		    }
			set_capital = {
				state = 382
				remember_old_capital = no
			}
		}
	}
}

country_event = { #The New Republic - Without the Republic
	id = aquileia.231
	immediate = {log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event aquileia.231"}
	title = aquileia.231.t
	desc = aquileia.231.d
	picture = GFX_event_griffon_diplomacy

	is_triggered_only = yes

	option = {
		name = aquileia.231.a
		custom_effect_tooltip = JER_a_new_focus_branch_tp
		drop_cosmetic_tag = yes
		set_cosmetic_tag = JER_GRIFFONIAN_REPUBLIC
		hidden_effect = {
		    save_global_event_target_as = griffonian_empire
			set_variable = {
				global.griffonian_empire_var = THIS
			}
			every_country = {
                limit = {
				    is_subject_of = JER
					is_griffon_continent_griffon_country = yes
			    }
                ROOT = {
				    annex_country = {
					    target = PREV
					    transfer_troops = yes
				    }
			    }
            }
			every_core_state = {
				add_core_of = ROOT
			}
			every_state = {
				limit = {
					has_state_flag = JHZ_cores
				}
				add_core_of = JER
			}
			load_focus_tree = {
			    tree = aquileian_pan_griffonian_victory
			    keep_completed = yes
		    }
			set_capital = {
				state = 382
				remember_old_capital = no
			}
		}
	}
}

			long_name = JER_pan_griffonian_neutrality_party_name_long
		}

			name = JER_pan_griffonian_democratic_party_name
			long_name = JER_pan_griffonian_democratic_party_name_long
		}
		set_party_name = {
		    ideology = communism
			name = JER_pan_griffonian_communism_party_name
			long_name = JER_pan_griffonian_communism_party_name_long
		}
		set_party_name = {
		    ideology = fascism
			name = JER_pan_griffonian_fascism_party_name

			set_country_flag = JER_JEB_monarchist
		}
	}

		name = aquileia_two.1.b
		ai_chance = { factor = 10 }
		hidden_effect = {
			set_country_flag = JER_JEB_revolutionary
			set_variable = {
				var = JEB_moderate_revolutionary_clubs
				value = 58
			}
			set_variable = {
				var = JEB_michel
				value = 27
			}
			set_variable = {
				var = JEB_extremist_revolutionary_clubs
				value = 102
			}
			set_variable = {
				var = JEB_other_clubs
				value = 39
			}
			clamp_variable = {
				var = JEB_moderate_revolutionary_clubs
				min = 0
				max = 226
			}
			clamp_variable = {
				var = JEB_michel
				min = 0
				max = 226
			}
			clamp_variable = {
				var = JEB_extremist_revolutionary_clubs
				min = 0
				max = 226
			}

		}
		hidden_effect = {
			add_to_variable = {
				var = revolutionary_support
				value = 4
			}
			subtract_from_variable = {
				var = monarchist_support
				value = 4
			}
			clamp_variable = {
				var = monarchist_support
				min = 0
				max = 100
			}
			clamp_variable = {
				var = revolutionary_support
				min = 0
				max = 100
			}
			add_to_variable = {
				var = JEB_extremist_revolutionary_clubs
				value = 4
			}
			subtract_from_variable = {
				var = JEB_moderate_revolutionary_clubs
				value = 2
			}
			subtract_from_variable = {
				var = JEB_other_clubs
				value = 2
			}
			clamp_variable = {
				var = JEB_moderate_revolutionary_clubs
				min = 0
				max = 226
			}
			clamp_variable = {
				var = JEB_michel
				min = 0
				max = 226
			}
			clamp_variable = {
				var = JEB_extremist_revolutionary_clubs
				min = 0
				max = 226
			}
			clamp_variable = {
				var = JEB_other_clubs
				min = 0
				max = 226
			}
		}
	}
}

country_event = { #Guarantee Republicanism
	id = aquileia_two.7
	immediate = {log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event aquileia_two.7"}
	title = aquileia_two.7.t
	desc = aquileia_two.7.d
	picture = GFX_event_gothic_interior
	fire_only_once = yes
	is_triggered_only = yes
	option = {
		name = aquileia_two.7.a
		ai_chance = { factor = 50 }
		custom_effect_tooltip = JER_revolutionary_support5
		add_popularity = {
			ideology = communism
			popularity = 0.05
		}
		add_popularity = {
			ideology = democratic
			popularity = 0.05
		}
		hidden_effect = {
			add_to_variable = {
				var = revolutionary_support
				value = 10
			}
			subtract_from_variable = {
				var = monarchist_support
				value = 10
			}
			clamp_variable = {
				var = monarchist_support
				min = 0
				max = 100
			}
			clamp_variable = {
				var = revolutionary_support
				min = 0
				max = 100
			}
		}
	}
}

news_event = { #Revolution Began
	id = aquileia_news.1
	immediate = {log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event aquileia_news.1"}
	title = aquileia_news.1.t
	desc = aquileia_news.1.d
	picture = GFX_news_aquiliea_revolution
	major = yes
	is_triggered_only = yes
	option = {
		name = aquileia_news.1.a
		trigger = {
			OR = {
				tag = JER
				is_in_faction_with = JER
				is_griffon_continent_country = no
			}
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = aquileia_news.1.b
		trigger = {
			has_war_with = JER
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = aquileia_news.1.c
		trigger = {
			is_griffon_continent_country = yes
			NOT = {
				tag = JER
				tag = JEB
				tag = JFT
				tag = JES
				tag = VIN
				tag = JRR
				has_government = communism
				has_country_flag = have_regular_puppets
			}
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = aquileia_news.1.e
		trigger = {
			NOT = { tag = JER }
			is_griffon_continent_country = yes
			OR = {
				has_government = communism
				has_country_flag = have_regular_puppets
			}
		}
	}
}

country_event = { #Revolution Won
	id = aquileia_news.2
	immediate = {log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event aquileia_news.2"}
	hidden = yes
	is_triggered_only = yes
	fire_only_once = yes
	option = {
		name = aquileia_news.2.a
		news_event = { id = aquileia_news.3 hours = 10 }
	}
}

news_event = { #Revolution Won
	id = aquileia_news.3
	immediate = {log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event aquileia_news.3"}
	title = aquileia_news.3.t
	desc = aquileia_news.3.d
	picture = GFX_news_happy_aquileians
	major = yes
	is_triggered_only = yes
	option = {
		name = aquileia_news.3.a
		trigger = {
			OR = {
				tag = JER
				is_griffon_continent_country = no
			}
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = aquileia_news.3.c
		trigger = {
			is_griffon_continent_country = yes
			OR = {
				AND = {
					has_government = neutrality
					NOT = { has_country_flag = have_regular_puppets }
				}
				has_government = fascism
			}
			NOT = {
				tag = JER
			}
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = aquileia_news.3.e
		trigger = {
			NOT = { tag = JER }
			is_griffon_continent_country = yes
			OR = {
				AND = {
					has_government = neutrality
					has_country_flag = have_regular_puppets
				}
				has_government = democratic
				has_government = communism
			}
		}
	}
}

			OR = {
				owns_state = 487

			}
			NOT = {
				tag = JER
				tag = JEB
				tag = JFT

				tag = VIN
				tag = JRR
			}
		}
	}

			OR = {
				tag = JER
				tag = JEB

				tag = VIN

				owns_state = 487

###########################
# Capitulation Events
###########################

add_namespace = country_capitulated

# 	# FROM.FROM is winner
news_event = {
	id = country_capitulated.0
	title = country_capitulated.0.t
	#Good news
	desc = {
		text = country_capitulated.0.d_positive_collab_diff_ideology
		trigger = {
			NOT = { tag = ROOT }
			NOT = {
				OR = {
					AND = {
						ROOT = { has_government = fascism }
						FROM.FROM = { has_government = fascism }
					}
					AND = {
						ROOT = { has_government = democratic }
						FROM.FROM = { has_government = democratic }
					}
					AND = {
						ROOT = { has_government = communism }
						FROM.FROM = { has_government = communism }
					}
					AND = {
						ROOT = { has_government = neutrality }
						FROM.FROM = { has_government = neutrality }
					}
				}
			}
			FROM.FROM = {
				has_collaboration = {
					target = ROOT
					value > 0.6
				}
			}
		}
	}
	desc = {
		text = country_capitulated.0.d_positive_collab_invaded_same_ideology
		trigger = {
			OR = {
				AND = {
					ROOT = { has_government = fascism }
					FROM.FROM = { has_government = fascism }
				}
				AND = {
					ROOT = { has_government = communism }
					FROM.FROM = { has_government = communism }
				}
			}
			FROM.FROM = {
				has_collaboration = {
					target = ROOT
					value > 0.6
				}
			}
		}
	}
	desc = {
		text = country_capitulated.0.d_positive_both_no_faction
		trigger = {
			OR = {
				has_war_with = ROOT
				any_allied_country = { has_war_with = ROOT }
			}
			NOT = {
				FROM.FROM = {
					has_collaboration = {
						target = ROOT
						value > 0.6
					}
				}
			}
			ROOT = { is_in_faction = no }
			FROM = { FROM = { NOT = { any_allied_country = { has_war_with = ROOT } } } }
		}
	}
	desc = {
		text = country_capitulated.0.d_positive_prev_no_faction
		trigger = {
			OR = {
				has_war_with = ROOT
				any_allied_country = { has_war_with = ROOT }
			}
			NOT = {
				FROM.FROM = {
					has_collaboration = {
						target = ROOT
						value > 0.6
					}
				}
			}
			ROOT = { is_in_faction = yes }
			FROM = { FROM = { NOT = { any_allied_country = { has_war_with = ROOT } } } }
		}
	}
	desc = {
		text = country_capitulated.0.d_positive_prev_faction
		trigger = {
			OR = {
				has_war_with = ROOT
				any_allied_country = { has_war_with = ROOT }
			}
			NOT = {
				FROM.FROM = {
					has_collaboration = {
						target = ROOT
						value > 0.6
					}
				}
			}
			ROOT = { is_in_faction = yes }
			FROM = { FROM = { any_allied_country = { has_war_with = ROOT } } }
		}
	}
	#Bad news
	desc = {
		text = country_capitulated.0.d_negative_collab_diff_ideology
		trigger = {
			tag = ROOT
			NOT = {
				OR = {
					AND = {
						ROOT = { has_government = fascism }
						FROM.FROM = { has_government = fascism }
					}
					AND = {
						ROOT = { has_government = democratic }
						FROM.FROM = { has_government = democratic }
					}
					AND = {
						ROOT = { has_government = communism }
						FROM.FROM = { has_government = communism }
					}
					AND = {
						ROOT = { has_government = neutrality }
						FROM.FROM = { has_government = neutrality }
					}
				}
			}
			FROM.FROM = {
				has_collaboration = {
					target = ROOT
					value > 0.6
				}
			}
		}
	}
	desc = {
		text = country_capitulated.0.d_negative_both_no_faction
		trigger = {
			OR = {
				has_war_together_with = ROOT
				is_in_faction_with = ROOT
				tag = ROOT
			}
			NOT = {
				FROM.FROM = {
					has_collaboration = {
						target = ROOT
						value > 0.6
					}
				}
			}
			ROOT = { is_in_faction = no }
			FROM = { FROM = { NOT = { any_allied_country = { has_war_with = ROOT } } } }
		}
	}
	desc = {
		text = country_capitulated.0.d_negative_prev_no_faction
		trigger = {
			OR = {
				is_in_faction_with = ROOT
				tag = ROOT
			}
			NOT = {
				FROM.FROM = {
					has_collaboration = {
						target = ROOT
						value > 0.6
					}
				}
			}
			ROOT = { is_in_faction = yes }
			FROM = { FROM = { NOT = { any_allied_country = { has_war_with = ROOT } } } }
		}
	}
	desc = {
		text = country_capitulated.0.d_negative_prev_faction
		trigger = {
			OR = {
				is_in_faction_with = ROOT
				tag = ROOT
			}
			NOT = {
				FROM.FROM = {
					has_collaboration = {
						target = ROOT
						value > 0.6
					}
				}
			}
			ROOT = { is_in_faction = yes }
			FROM = { FROM = { any_allied_country = { has_war_with = ROOT } } }
		}
	}
	#Neutral news
	desc = {
		text = country_capitulated.0.d_neutral_both_no_faction
		trigger = {
			NOT = { has_war_together_with = ROOT }
			NOT = { is_in_faction_with = ROOT }
			NOT = { has_war_with = ROOT }
			NOT = { any_allied_country = { has_war_with = ROOT } }
			ROOT = { is_in_faction = no }
			NOT = {
				FROM.FROM = {
					has_collaboration = {
						target = ROOT
						value > 0.6
					}
				}
			}
			FROM = { FROM = { NOT = { any_allied_country = { has_war_with = ROOT } } } }
		}
	}
	desc = {
		text = country_capitulated.0.d_neutral_prev_no_faction
		trigger = {
			NOT = { is_in_faction_with = ROOT }
			NOT = { has_war_with = ROOT }
			NOT = { any_allied_country = { has_war_with = ROOT } }
			ROOT = { is_in_faction = yes }
			NOT = {
				FROM.FROM = {
					has_collaboration = {
						target = ROOT
						value > 0.6
					}
				}
			}
			FROM = { FROM = { NOT = { any_allied_country = { has_war_with = ROOT } } } }
		}
	}
	desc = {
		text = country_capitulated.0.d_neutral_prev_faction
		trigger = {
			NOT = { is_in_faction_with = ROOT }
			NOT = { has_war_with = ROOT }
			NOT = { any_allied_country = { has_war_with = ROOT } }
			ROOT = { is_in_faction = yes }
			NOT = {
				FROM.FROM = {
					has_collaboration = {
						target = ROOT
						value > 0.6
					}
				}
			}
			FROM = { FROM = { any_allied_country = { has_war_with = ROOT } } }
		}
	}

	picture = GFX_news_event_generic_sign_treaty2

	major = yes

	is_triggered_only = yes

	hidden = no

	fire_only_once = no

	option = {
		name = country_capitulated.0.a
	}
}

country_event = { #Close Hoi4
	id = country_capitulated.1
	immediate = {
		log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event country_capitulated.1 THIS IS MEANT TO CRASH THE GAME"
		country_event = country_capitulated.1
	}
	picture = GFX_event_pdxpls
	hidden = yes
	is_triggered_only = yes
	option = {

	}
}

add_namespace = cityfall
# The Fall of Vaverfront (Changelings)
news_event = {
	id = cityfall.1
	immediate = {log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event cityfall.1"}
	title = cityfall.1.t
	desc = cityfall.1.d
	picture = GFX_news_event_vanhoover_surrenders

	major = yes

	immediate = {
		set_global_flag = fall_of_vaverfront_CHN
	}

	is_triggered_only = yes

	option = {
		name = cityfall.1.a
		trigger = {
			NOT = {
				TAG = CHN
				TAG = OLE
			}
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = cityfall.1.b
		trigger = { TAG = CHN }
	}
	option = {
		name = cityfall.1.c
		trigger = { TAG = OLE }
	}
}

# The Fall of River City
news_event = {
	id = cityfall.5
	immediate = {log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event cityfall.5"}
	title = cityfall.5.t
	desc = cityfall.5.d
	picture = GFX_news_fall_of_river_city

	major = yes
	is_triggered_only = yes

	immediate = {
		set_global_flag = fall_of_river_city
		619 = { set_state_flag = state_has_fallen }
		FROM.FROM = { save_event_target_as = old_controller }
		ROOT = { save_event_target_as = new_controller }
	}

	option = { #One city does not make a Federation!
		name = cityfall.5.a
		trigger = {
			tag = event_target:old_controller
		}
	}

	option = { #The Federation Shall Fall.
		name = cityfall.5.b
		trigger = {
			tag = event_target:new_controller
		}
	}

	option = { #The sun begins to set on the eastern ponies.
		name = cityfall.5.c
		trigger = {
			NOT = {
				tag = event_target:old_controller
				tag = event_target:new_controller
			}
		}
	}
}
# The Fall of Sunset
news_event = {
	id = cityfall.6
	immediate = {log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event cityfall.6"}
	title = cityfall.6.t
	desc = {
		text = cityfall.6.d.maresoc_take
		trigger = { event_target:new_controller = { has_country_flag = is_maresoc } }
	}
	desc = {
		text = cityfall.6.d.maresoc_loose
		trigger = { event_target:old_controller = { has_country_flag = is_maresoc } }
	}
	desc = {
		text = cityfall.6.d.other
		trigger = {
			event_target:new_controller = { NOT = { has_country_flag = is_maresoc } }
			event_target:old_controller = { NOT = { has_country_flag = is_maresoc } }
		}
	}
	picture = GFX_news_sunset_city

	major = yes
	is_triggered_only = yes

	immediate = {
		set_global_flag = fall_of_sunset_city
		356 = { set_state_flag = state_has_fallen }
		FROM.FROM = { save_event_target_as = old_controller }
		ROOT = { save_event_target_as = new_controller }
	}

	option = { #The madness of MARESOC cannot be allowed to win!
		name = cityfall.6.a.maresoc_take
		trigger = {
			tag = event_target:old_controller
			event_target:new_controller = { has_country_flag = is_maresoc }
		}
	}
	option = { #They can have the ashes.
		name = cityfall.6.a.maresoc_loose
		trigger = {
			tag = event_target:old_controller
			event_target:old_controller = { has_country_flag = is_maresoc }
		}
	}
	option = { #Give it time and the sun will rise over Sunset once again.
		name = cityfall.6.a
		trigger = {
			tag = event_target:old_controller
			event_target:new_controller = { NOT = { has_country_flag = is_maresoc } }
			event_target:old_controller = { NOT = { has_country_flag = is_maresoc } }
		}
	}

	option = { #This is a great victory for the party.
		name = cityfall.6.b.maresoc_take
		trigger = {
			tag = event_target:new_controller
			event_target:new_controller = { has_country_flag = is_maresoc }
		}
	}
	option = { #The corruption of MARESOC is washing away.
		name = cityfall.6.b.maresoc_loose
		trigger = {
			tag = event_target:new_controller
			event_target:old_controller = { has_country_flag = is_maresoc }
		}
	}
	option = { #Time to have a barby on the beach.
		name = cityfall.6.b
		trigger = {
			tag = event_target:new_controller
			event_target:new_controller = { NOT = { has_country_flag = is_maresoc } }
			event_target:old_controller = { NOT = { has_country_flag = is_maresoc } }
		}
	}

	option = { #And thus darkness falls over New Mareland.
		name = cityfall.6.c.maresoc_take
		trigger = {
			event_target:new_controller = { has_country_flag = is_maresoc }
			NOT = {
				tag = event_target:old_controller
				tag = event_target:new_controller
			}
		}
	}
	option = { #The sun rises over Sunset once again.
		name = cityfall.6.c.maresoc_loose
		trigger = {
			event_target:old_controller = { has_country_flag = is_maresoc }
			NOT = {
				tag = event_target:old_controller
				tag = event_target:new_controller
			}
		}
	}
	option = { #With the end of Sunset, darkness has fallen over New Mareland.
		name = cityfall.6.c
		trigger = {
			event_target:new_controller = { NOT = { has_country_flag = is_maresoc } }
			event_target:old_controller = { NOT = { has_country_flag = is_maresoc } }
			NOT = {
				tag = event_target:old_controller
				tag = event_target:new_controller
			}
		}
	}
}

	}

	option = {
		name = cityfall.14.a
		trigger = {
			NOT = {
				tag = CHN
				original_tag = EQS
				is_in_faction_with = EQS
				is_subject_of = EQS
			}
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = cityfall.14.b
		trigger = {
			OR = {
				original_tag = EQS
				is_in_faction_with = EQS
				is_subject_of = EQS
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				owns_state = 3
			}
			add_stability = -0.035
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = cityfall.14.c
		trigger = { tag = CHN }
	}
}

news_event = { # Liberation of Acornage
	id = cityfall.22

	}

	desc = cityfall.22.d
	picture = GFX_news_equestria_field

	is_triggered_only = yes
	option = {
		name = cityfall.22.a
		add_stability = 0.01
	}
}
## Liberation of Tall Tales
news_event = {
	id = cityfall.23
	immediate = {log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event cityfall.23" }
	title = cityfall.23.t
	desc = cityfall.23.d
	picture = GFX_news_equestria_field
	fire_only_once = yes
	is_triggered_only = yes
	option = {
		name = cityfall.23.a
		add_stability = 0.01
	}
}
## Liberation of Vanhoover
news_event = {
	id = cityfall.24
	immediate = {log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event cityfall.24" }
	title = cityfall.24.t
	desc = {
		text = cityfall.24.d_princess
		trigger = {
			OR = {
				has_country_leader = { ruling_only = yes character = EQS_princess_celestia }
				has_country_leader = { ruling_only = yes character = EQS_princess_luna }
			}
		}
	}
	desc = {
		text = cityfall.24.d_com
		trigger = { has_government = communism }
	}
	desc = {
		text = cityfall.24.d_rest
		trigger = {
			NOT = {
				has_country_leader = { ruling_only = yes character = EQS_princess_celestia }
				has_country_leader = { ruling_only = yes character = EQS_princess_luna }
				has_government = communism
			}
		}
	}
	picture = GFX_news_equestria_field
	fire_only_once = yes
	is_triggered_only = yes
	option = {
		name = cityfall.24.a_princess
		trigger = {
			OR = {
				has_country_leader = { ruling_only = yes character = EQS_princess_celestia }
				has_country_leader = { ruling_only = yes character = EQS_princess_luna }
			}
		}
		add_stability = 0.01
	}
	option = {
		name = cityfall.24.a_com
		trigger = { has_government = communism }
		add_stability = 0.01
	}
	option = {
		name = cityfall.24.a_rest
		trigger = {
			NOT = {
				has_country_leader = { ruling_only = yes character = EQS_princess_celestia }
				has_country_leader = { ruling_only = yes character = EQS_princess_luna }
				has_government = communism
			}
		}
		add_stability = 0.01
	}
}
# The Fall of Vesalipolis
news_event = {
	id = cityfall.25
	immediate = {log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event cityfall.25"}
	title = cityfall.25.t
	desc = cityfall.25.d
	picture = GFX_news_event_changeling_hive

	major = yes
	is_triggered_only = yes

	immediate = {
		set_global_flag = fall_of_vesalipolis
		251 = { set_state_flag = state_has_fallen }
		FROM.FROM = { save_event_target_as = old_controller }
		ROOT = { save_event_target_as = new_controller }
	}

	option = {
		name = cityfall.25.a
		trigger = {
			tag = event_target:old_controller
		}
	}

	option = {
		name = cityfall.25.b
		trigger = {
			tag = event_target:new_controller
		}
	}

	option = {
		name = cityfall.25.c
		trigger = {
			NOT = {
				tag = event_target:old_controller
				tag = event_target:new_controller
			}
		}
	}
}

# The Fall of Griffenheim
news_event = {
	id = cityfall.29
	immediate = {log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event cityfall.29"}
	title = cityfall.29.t
	desc = {
		text = cityfall.29.d
		trigger = {
			ROOT = { NOT = { tag = BRZ } }
		}
	}
	desc = {
		text = cityfall.29.d_bronzehill
		trigger = {
			ROOT = {
				tag = BRZ
				NOT = { has_country_flag = BRZ_revenge_tree_loaded }
			}
		}
	}
	desc = {
		text = cityfall.29.d_bronzehill_revenge
		trigger = {
			ROOT = {
				tag = BRZ
				has_country_flag = BRZ_revenge_tree_loaded
			}
		}
	}
	picture = GFX_news_griffenheim

	major = yes
	is_triggered_only = yes

	immediate = {
		set_global_flag = fall_of_griffenheim
		382 = { set_state_flag = state_has_fallen }
		FROM.FROM = { save_event_target_as = old_controller }
		ROOT = { save_event_target_as = new_controller }
	}

	option = {
		name = cityfall.29.a
		trigger = {
			tag = event_target:old_controller
		}
	}

	option = {
		name = cityfall.29.b
		trigger = {
			is_griffon_continent_griffon_country = yes
			tag = event_target:new_controller
			NOT = {
				tag = BRZ
			}
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = cityfall.29.c
		trigger = {
			NOT = {
				tag = event_target:old_controller
				AND = {
					is_griffon_continent_griffon_country = yes
					tag = event_target:new_controller
				}
			}
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = cityfall.29.e
		trigger = {
			is_griffon_continent_griffon_country = yes
			tag = event_target:new_controller
			tag = BRZ
			NOT = { has_country_flag = BRZ_revenge_tree_loaded }
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = cityfall.29.e
		trigger = {
			is_griffon_continent_griffon_country = yes
			tag = event_target:new_controller
			tag = BRZ
			has_country_flag = BRZ_revenge_tree_loaded
		}
	}
}

# Bronzecross
news_event = {
	id = cityfall.37
	immediate = {log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event cityfall.37"}
	title = cityfall.37.t
	desc = cityfall.37.d
	picture = GFX_news_bronzhill_fighting

	is_triggered_only = yes

	immediate = {
		set_global_flag = fall_of_bronzecross
		492 = { set_state_flag = state_has_fallen }
		FROM.FROM = { save_event_target_as = old_controller }
		ROOT = { save_event_target_as = new_controller }
	}

	major = yes
	show_major = {
		OR = {
			is_griffon_empire_country = yes
			any_neighbor_country = {
				is_griffon_empire_country = yes
			}
		}
	}

	option = {
		name = cityfall.37.a
		trigger = {
			tag = event_target:old_controller
		}
	}

	option = {
		name = cityfall.37.b
		trigger = {
			tag = event_target:new_controller
		}
	}

	option = {
		name = cityfall.37.c
		trigger = {
			NOT = {
				tag = event_target:old_controller
				tag = event_target:new_controller
			}
		}
	}
}

news_event = {
	id = cityfall.300 ## liberation of manehattan by the ELF ##
	immediate = {log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event cityfall.300"}
	title = cityfall.300.t
	desc = cityfall.300.d
	picture = GFX_news_event_manehattan

	immediate = {
		set_global_flag = ELF_liberation_of_manehattan
		75 = { set_state_flag = state_has_fallen }
		FROM.FROM = { save_event_target_as = old_controller }
		ROOT = { save_event_target_as = new_controller }
	}

	major = yes
	is_triggered_only = yes

	option = {
		name = cityfall.300.a
		trigger = { tag = event_target:new_controller }
		add_political_power = 70
		add_war_support = 0.025
		ELF = {
			transfer_state = 75
			add_state_core = 75
			set_capital = { state = 75 }
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = cityfall.300.b
		trigger = { tag = event_target:old_controller }
		add_political_power = -30
	}
	option = {
		name = cityfall.300.c
		trigger = {
			NOT = {
				tag = event_target:old_controller
				tag = event_target:new_controller
			}
		}
	}
}
news_event = {
	id = cityfall.301 ## liberation of fillydelphia by the ELF ##
	immediate = {log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event cityfall.301"}
	title = cityfall.301.t
	desc = cityfall.301.d
	picture = GFX_news_ponies_urben

	immediate = {
		set_global_flag = ELF_liberation_of_fillydelphia
		12 = { set_state_flag = state_has_fallen }
		FROM.FROM = { save_event_target_as = old_controller }
		ROOT = { save_event_target_as = new_controller }
	}

	major = yes
	is_triggered_only = yes

	option = {
		name = cityfall.301.a
		trigger = { tag = event_target:new_controller }
		add_political_power = 70
		add_war_support = 0.025
	}
	option = {
		name = cityfall.301.b
		trigger = { tag = event_target:old_controller }
		add_political_power = -30
	}
	option = {
		name = cityfall.301.c
		trigger = {
			NOT = {
				tag = event_target:old_controller
				tag = event_target:new_controller
			}
		}
	}

news_event = {
	id = cityfall.510
	immediate = {log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event cityfall.510"}
	title = cityfall.510.t
	desc = cityfall.510.d
	picture = GFX_news_ponies_advance #placeholder

	immediate = {
		set_global_flag = changelings_takeover_fragrance
		#1071 = { set_state_flag = state_has_fallen }
		FROM.FROM = { save_event_target_as = old_controller }
		ROOT = { save_event_target_as = new_controller }
		hidden_effect = {
			create_dynamic_country = { ##CFR
				original_tag = CHN
				save_event_target_as = CHN_FRV_flag_target
				set_country_flag = CHN_FRV_flag
				transfer_state = 1071
				every_core_state = {
					limit = {
						NOT = { state = 1071 }
					}
					remove_core_of = PREV
				}
				1071 = {
					#add_core_of = PREV
					set_demilitarized_zone = no
					add_manpower = 8000
					teleport_armies = {
						limit = {
							NOT = {
								original_tag = PREV
							}
						}
					}
				}
				if = {
					limit = {
						CHN = {
							NOT = {
								surrender_progress > 0.5
								any_enemy_country = {
									OR = {
										controls_state = 251
										controls_state = 259
										controls_state = 309
										controls_state = 252
										controls_state = 262
									}
								}
							}
						}
					}
					CHN = {
						#puppet = PREV - Fine.
						add_to_faction = PREV
					}
				}
				set_politics = {
					ruling_party = neutrality
					elections_allowed = no
				}
				set_popularities = {
					democratic = 8
					neutrality = 60
					fascism = 20
					communism = 12
				}
				set_party_name = {
					ideology = fascism
					long_name = CFR_fascism_name_long
					name = CFR_fascism_name
				}
				set_party_name = {
					ideology = neutrality
					long_name = CFR_neutrality_name_long
					name = CFR_neutrality_name
				}
				set_party_name = {
					ideology = democratic
					long_name = KIR_democratic_party_2_long
					name = KIR_democratic_party_2
				}
				set_party_name = {
					ideology = communism
					long_name = KIR_communism_party_A_long
					name = KIR_communism_party_A
				}
				CHN = { PREV = { transfer_technology = yes  } }
				set_technology = { tech_infiltrators = 1 }
				fix_weapon_techs = yes
				KIR_Give_CHN_Starting_Tech = yes
				add_equipment_to_stockpile = { type = infantry_equipment amount = 2500 }
				add_manpower = 15000
				add_stability = -0.5
				add_war_support = -0.5
				add_political_power = -150
				set_cosmetic_tag = FRV_CHN
				every_possible_country = {
					limit = {
						has_character = CHN_FRV_cheli_cerae
					}
					CHN_FRV_cheli_cerae = {
						set_nationality = PREV.PREV
					}
				}
				every_possible_country = {
					limit = {
						has_character = KIS_sciaridae
					}
					KIS_sciaridae = {
						set_nationality = PREV.PREV
					}
				}
				add_country_leader_role = {
					character = "KIS_sciaridae"
					promote_leader = yes
					country_leader = {
						desc = "KIS_sciaridae_desc"
						ideology = khakistocracy
						expire = "1965.1.1.1"
						traits = { KIR_military_governor }
					}
				}
				if = {
					limit = {
						KIS = {
							NOT = {
								has_country_flag = KIS_recruited_changeling_mercenary_general
							}
						}
					}
					add_corps_commander_role = {
						Character = KIS_sciaridae
						skill = 4
						attack_skill = 3
						defense_skill = 3
						planning_skill = 3
						logistics_skill = 3
						traits = { changeling_race_trait organizer urban_assault_specialist }
					}
					set_country_flag = KIS_recruited_changeling_mercenary_general
				}
				every_possible_country = {
					limit = {
						has_character = CFR_adv_1
					}
					CFR_adv_1 = {
						set_nationality = PREV.PREV
					}
				}
				every_possible_country = {
					limit = {
						has_character = CFR_adv_2
					}
					CFR_adv_2 = {
						set_nationality = PREV.PREV
					}
				}
				every_possible_country = {
					limit = {
						has_character = CFR_adv_3
					}
					CFR_adv_3 = {
						set_nationality = PREV.PREV
					}
				}
				every_possible_country = {
					limit = {
						has_character = CFR_adv_4
					}
					CFR_adv_4 = {
						set_nationality = PREV.PREV
					}

					}

				every_possible_country = {
					limit = {
						has_character = CFR_pellucid
					}
					CFR_pellucid = {
						set_nationality = PREV.PREV
					}
				}
				every_possible_country = {
					limit = {
						has_character = CFR_vespad
					}
					CFR_vespad = {
						set_nationality = PREV.PREV
					}
				}
				add_corps_commander_role = {
					Character = CFR_vespad
					skill = 3
					attack_skill = 3
					defense_skill = 3
					planning_skill = 4
					logistics_skill = 4
					traits = { changeling_race_trait inflexible_strategist }
				}
				every_possible_country = {
					limit = {
						has_character = CFR_ovix
					}
					CFR_ovix = {
						set_nationality = PREV.PREV
					}
				}
				add_corps_commander_role = {
					Character = CFR_ovix
					skill = 3
					attack_skill = 4
					defense_skill = 2
					planning_skill = 3
					logistics_skill = 2
					traits = { changeling_race_trait ranger desert_fox }
				}
				every_possible_country = {
					limit = {
						has_character = KIS_high_command_CHN
					}
					KIS_high_command_CHN = {
						set_nationality = PREV.PREV
					}
				}
				set_country_flag = KIR_militarist_focus_7c_flag
				add_country_leader_role = {
					character = "CFR_communist_leader"
					promote_leader = yes
					country_leader = {
						desc = ""
						ideology = syndicalism
						expire = "1965.1.1.1"
						traits = { }
					}
				}
				add_country_leader_role = {
					character = "CFR_harmonist_leader"
					promote_leader = yes
					country_leader = {
						desc = ""
						ideology = liberalism
						expire = "1965.1.1.1"
						traits = { }
					}
				}
				load_oob = CHN_FRV_changeling_expedition
				add_ideas = modern_society
				add_ideas = proper_science_base
				add_ideas = no_lack_of_scientists
				add_ideas = no_poverty
				add_ideas = partial_economic_mobilisation
				add_ideas = limited_exports
				add_ideas = limited_conscription
				add_ideas = changeling_race
				load_focus_tree = CFR_Focus_Tree
				mark_focus_tree_layout_dirty = yes
				add_dynamic_modifier = { modifier = KIR_CFR_mandate }
				subtract_from_variable = { KIR_CFR_resistance_growth = 0.05 }
				subtract_from_variable = { KIR_CFR_supply_consumption_factor = 0.05 }
				set_variable = { KIR_CFR_local_resources_factor = 0.05 }
				set_variable = { KIR_CFR_research_sharing_per_country_bonus_factor = 0.05 }
				set_variable = { KIR_CFR_trade_opinion_factor = 0.05 }
				if = {
					limit = {
						air_base < 1
					}
					1071 = {
						add_building_construction = {
							type = air_base
							level = 1
							instant_build = yes
						}
					}
				}
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_dlc = "By Blood Alone"
					}

					if = {
						limit = {
							NOT = {
								has_tech = iw_medium_airframe
							}
						}
						set_technology = {
							iw_medium_airframe = 1
						}
					}
					add_equipment_to_stockpile = { type = transport_plane_equipment_1 amount = 5 }

					generic_early_tac_bomber = yes
					add_equipment_to_stockpile = {
						type = medium_plane_airframe_0
						variant_name = "Early Tactical Bomber"
						amount = 5
					}
					generic_early_fighter = yes
					add_equipment_to_stockpile = {
						type = small_plane_airframe_1
						variant_name = "Basic Fighter"
						amount = 15
					}
				}
				else = {
					add_equipment_to_stockpile = { type = small_plane_airframe amount = 15 }
					add_equipment_to_stockpile = { type = medium_plane_airframe amount = 5 }
					add_equipment_to_stockpile = { type = transport_plane_equipment amount = 5 }
				}
				add_equipment_to_stockpile = { type = convoy amount = 25 }
				country_event = { id = kirin_council.747 days = 14 }
				set_rule = {
					desc = KIR_masquerade
					can_decline_call_to_war = yes
				}
				reserve_dynamic_country = yes
				set_AI_strategies_on_every_possible_country_delayed = yes
			}
		}
	}

	major = yes
	is_triggered_only = yes

	option = {
		name = cityfall.510.a
		trigger = { tag = event_target:new_controller }
	}
	option = {
		name = cityfall.510.b
		trigger = { tag = event_target:old_controller }
		if = {
			limit = {
				original_tag = KIS
			}
			add_timed_idea = {
				idea = KIS_CFR_debuff_1
				days = 365
			}
			add_timed_idea = {
				idea = KIS_CFR_debuff_2
				days = 365
			}
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = cityfall.510.c
		trigger = {
			NOT = {
				tag = event_target:old_controller
				tag = event_target:new_controller
			}
		}
	}
}

			type = infrastructure
			level = 10
			}

		}
		restore_previous_manpower = yes
		set_victory_points = {
			province = 14466
			value = 0
		}
		set_victory_points = {
			province = 14384
			value = 0
		}
	}
}
