#New event that will fire if EQS is at war with a non pony country (eg. Changelings) and with a minor civil war faction offering a ceasefire
country_event = {
	id = civwar.100
	immediate = {log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event civwar.100"}
	hidden = yes

	trigger = {
		original_tag = EQS
		has_war = yes
		#has_completed_focus = All_ponies_front
		OR = {
			has_government = democratic
			has_government = communism
		}
		any_enemy_country = {
			NOT = { is_pony_race = yes }
			strength_ratio = { tag = ROOT ratio > 0.33 }
		}
		any_enemy_country = {
			NOT = { has_country_flag = refused_eqs_ceasefire }
			NOT = { tag = NLR }
			NOT = { tag = EQS }
			NOT = { tag = NMS }
			is_eqs_civil_war_tag = yes
			has_defensive_war_with = ROOT
		}
	}

	mean_time_to_happen = {
		days = 15
	}

	immediate = {
		random_enemy_country = {
			limit = {
				NOT = { has_country_flag = refused_eqs_ceasefire }
				NOT = { tag = NLR }
				NOT = { tag = NMS }
				is_eqs_civil_war_tag = yes
				has_defensive_war_with = ROOT
			}
			save_event_target_as = ceasefire_target
		}
	}

	option = {
		country_event = { id = civwar.101 }
	}
}

country_event = {
	id = civwar.101
	immediate = {log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event civwar.101"}
	title = civwar.101.t
	desc = civwar.101.d
	picture = GFX_event_ponies_in_battle

	is_triggered_only = yes

	#Sure, ceasefire sounds nice
	option = {
		name = civwar.101.a
		event_target:ceasefire_target = {country_event = { id = civwar.102 days = 2 } }
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 35
		}
	}

	#Try to get them on our side
	option = {
		name = civwar.101.b
		add_political_power = -100
		event_target:ceasefire_target = {country_event = { id = civwar.103 days = 2 } }
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 30
			modifier = {
				factor = 3
				OR = {
					AND = {
						has_government = democratic
						event_target:ceasefire_target = { has_government = democratic }
					}
					AND = {
						has_government = communism
						event_target:ceasefire_target = { has_government = communism }
					}
				}
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0.5
				OR = {
					strength_ratio = { tag = event_target:ceasefire_target ratio < 1 }
					event_target:ceasefire_target = { surrender_progress > 0.15 }
				}
			}
		}
	}

	#Nah, let's fuck em up
	option = {
		name = civwar.101.c
		event_target:ceasefire_target = { set_country_flag = refused_eqs_ceasefire }
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 35
			modifier = {
				factor = 2
				OR = {
					event_target:ceasefire_target = { surrender_progress > 0.6 }
				}
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				OR = {
					strength_ratio = { tag = event_target:ceasefire_target ratio < 0.7 }
					surrender_progress > 0.2
					has_manpower < 50000
				}
			}
		}
	}
}

country_event = {
	id = civwar.102
	immediate = {log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event civwar.102"}
	title = civwar.102.t
	desc = civwar.102.d
	picture = GFX_event_ponies_in_battle

	is_triggered_only = yes

	#Sure, ceasefire sounds nice
	option = {
		name = civwar.102.a
		hidden_effect = { set_country_flag = eqs_ceasefire }
		set_truce = { target = FROM days = 36000 }

		ai_chance = {
			factor = 50
			modifier = {
				factor = 0.5
				strength_ratio = { tag = FROM ratio > 0.7 }
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				strength_ratio = { tag = FROM ratio > 0.9 }
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0.5
				any_enemy_country = {
					NOT = { tag = FROM }
					has_war_with = ROOT
				}
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				any_enemy_country = {
					NOT = { tag = FROM }
					has_war_with = ROOT
					strength_ratio = { tag = ROOT ratio > 0.8 }
				}
			}
		}
	}

	#Nah, let's fuck em up
	option = {
		name = civwar.102.b
		set_country_flag = refused_eqs_ceasefire
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 35
			modifier = {
				factor = 2
				has_government = fascism
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0.5
				strength_ratio = { tag = FROM ratio < 0.6 }
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				strength_ratio = { tag = FROM ratio < 0.4 }
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				surrender_progress > 0.4
			}
		}
	}
}

country_event = {
	id = civwar.105
	immediate = {log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event civwar.105"}
	title = civwar.105.t
	desc = civwar.105.d
	picture = GFX_event_pony_soldiers_sunset

	trigger = {
		has_country_flag = eqs_ceasefire
		NOT = {
			any_enemy_country = {
				NOT = { tag = EQS }
			}
		}
	}

	mean_time_to_happen = {
		days = 30
	}

	immediate = {
		clr_country_flag = eqs_ceasefire
	}

	option = {
		name = civwar.105.a
		trigger = { country_exists = EQS }
		hidden_effect = { EQS = { set_truce = { target = ROOT days = 1 } } }
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 50
			modifier = {
				factor = 2
				has_government = fascism
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 2
				strength_ratio = { tag = EQS ratio > 0.9 }
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0.5
				strength_ratio = { tag = EQS ratio < 0.7 }
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				strength_ratio = { tag = EQS ratio < 0.5 }
			}
		}
	}

	option = {
		name = civwar.105.b
		hidden_effect = {
			set_country_flag = eqs_kept_ceasefire
			set_country_flag = { flag = eqs_kept_ceasefire_cooldown days = 120 value = 1 }
		}
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 50
			modifier = {
				factor = 1.5
				OR = {
					AND = {
						has_government = democratic
						FROM = { has_government = democratic }
					}
					AND = {
						has_government = communism
						FROM = { has_government = communism }
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}
}

country_event = {
	id = civwar.103
	immediate = {log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event civwar.103"}
	title = civwar.103.t
	desc = civwar.103.d
	picture = GFX_event_pony_soldiers_sunset

	is_triggered_only = yes

	#Yep, let's join
	option = {
		name = civwar.103.a
		set_country_flag = { flag = bypass_on_peaceconference_ended days = 1 value = 1 }
		white_peace = FROM
		hidden_effect = {
			FROM = {save_event_target_as = faction_lead}
			country_event = { id = civwar.104 days = 7 }
		}
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 50
			modifier = {
				factor = 0.5
				strength_ratio = { tag = FROM ratio > 0.7 }
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				strength_ratio = { tag = FROM ratio > 0.9 }
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 2
				OR = {
					AND = {
						has_government = democratic
						FROM = { has_government = democratic }
					}
					AND = {
						has_government = communism
						FROM = { has_government = communism }
					}
				}
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 2
				any_enemy_country = {
					NOT = { tag = FROM }
					has_war_with = ROOT
				}
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 2
				any_enemy_country = {
					NOT = { tag = FROM }
					has_war_with = ROOT
					strength_ratio = { tag = ROOT ratio > 0.8 }
				}
			}
		}
	}

	#Sure, ceasefire sounds nice
	option = {
		name = civwar.103.b
		hidden_effect = { set_country_flag = eqs_ceasefire }
		set_truce = { target = FROM days = 36000 }
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 50
			modifier = {
				factor = 0.5
				strength_ratio = { tag = FROM ratio > 0.7 }
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				strength_ratio = { tag = FROM ratio > 0.9 }
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0.5
				any_enemy_country = {
					NOT = { tag = FROM }
					has_war_with = ROOT
				}
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				any_enemy_country = {
					NOT = { tag = FROM }
					has_war_with = ROOT
					strength_ratio = { tag = ROOT ratio > 0.8 }
				}
			}
		}
	}

	#Nah, let's fuck em up
	option = {
		name = civwar.103.c
		set_country_flag = refused_eqs_ceasefire
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 35
			modifier = {
				factor = 2
				has_government = fascism
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0.5
				strength_ratio = { tag = FROM ratio < 0.6 }
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				strength_ratio = { tag = FROM ratio < 0.4 }
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				surrender_progress > 0.4
			}
		}
	}
}

country_event = {
	id = civwar.4
	immediate = {log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event civwar.4"}

	is_triggered_only = yes
	hidden = yes

	option = {
		hidden_effect = {
			add_ideas = {
				CES_disorganized CES_old_factory }
			country_event = civwar.110
			load_oob = "CES_Civil_War"
			add_manpower = 50000
			if = {
				limit = { country_exists = NMS NOT = { has_war_with = NMS } }
				hidden_effect = {
					create_wargoal = {
						type = civil_war
						target = NMS
					}
				}
				declare_war_on = {
					target = NMS type = civil_war
				}
				add_civil_war_target = NMS
			}
			if = {
				limit = { country_exists = JUN NOT = { has_war_with = JUN } }
				hidden_effect = {
					create_wargoal = {
						type = civil_war
						target = JUN
					}
				}
				declare_war_on = {
					target = JUN type = civil_war
				}
				add_civil_war_target = JUN
			}
			EQS = { add_opinion_modifier = { target = CES modifier = besties } reverse_add_opinion_modifier = { target = CES modifier = besties } }
			NMS = { add_opinion_modifier = { target = CES modifier = enemies } reverse_add_opinion_modifier = { target = CES modifier = enemies } }
		}
	}
}
country_event = {
	id = civwar.5
	immediate = {log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event civwar.5"}

	is_triggered_only = yes
	hidden = yes

	option = {
		hidden_effect = {
			NMS = {
				country_event = civwar.110
			}
			load_oob = "NMS_Civil_War"
			load_oob = "NMS_Civil_War2"
			add_manpower = 60000
			NLR = { add_opinion_modifier = { target = NMS modifier = besties } reverse_add_opinion_modifier = { target = NMS modifier = besties } }
			CES = { add_opinion_modifier = { target = NMS modifier = enemies } reverse_add_opinion_modifier = { target = NMS modifier = enemies } }
		}
	}
}
country_event = {
	id = civwar.6
	immediate = {log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event civwar.6"}

	is_triggered_only = yes
	hidden = yes

	option = {
		hidden_effect = {
			load_oob = "JUN_Civil_War"
			add_manpower = 50000
			if = {
				limit = { country_exists = NMS NOT = { has_war_with = NMS } }
				hidden_effect = {
					create_wargoal = {
						type = civil_war
						target = NMS
					}
				}
				declare_war_on = {
					target = NMS type = civil_war
				}
				add_civil_war_target = NMS
			}
			if = {
				limit = { country_exists = BAL NOT = { has_war_with = BAL } }
				hidden_effect = {
					create_wargoal = {
						type = civil_war
						target = BAL
					}
				}
				declare_war_on = {
					target = BAL type = civil_war
				}
				add_civil_war_target = BAL
			}
		}
	}
}
country_event = {
	id = civwar.7
	immediate = {log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event civwar.7"}

	is_triggered_only = yes
	hidden = yes

	option = {
		hidden_effect = {
			load_oob = "BAL_Civil_War"
			add_manpower = 50000
			if = {
				limit = { country_exists = NMS NOT = { has_war_with = NMS } }
				hidden_effect = {
					create_wargoal = {
						type = civil_war
						target = NMS
					}
				}
				declare_war_on = {
					target = NMS type = civil_war
				}
				add_civil_war_target = NMS
			}
			if = {
				limit = { country_exists = CES NOT = { has_war_with = CES } }
				hidden_effect = {
					create_wargoal = {
						type = civil_war
						target = CES
					}
				}
				declare_war_on = {
					target = CES type = civil_war
				}
				add_civil_war_target = CES
			}
			STG = { add_opinion_modifier = { target = ROOT modifier = besties } reverse_add_opinion_modifier = { target = ROOT modifier = besties } }
			NMS = { add_opinion_modifier = { target = ROOT modifier = enemies } reverse_add_opinion_modifier = { target = ROOT modifier = enemies } }
			if = {
				limit = { CHN = { has_completed_focus = demand_equestria } }
				country_event = { id = changelings.11 days = 1 }
			}
		}
	}
}

	title = civwar.9.t
	desc = civwar.9.d
	picture = GFX_event_celestia_poster

	is_triggered_only = yes

	option = {
		name = civwar.9.a
		ai_chance = { factor = 100 }
		FROM = { puppet = ROOT }
	}
	option = {
		name = civwar.9.b
		FROM = { country_event = equestria.113 }
		ai_chance = { factor = 0 }
	}
}

	}

country_event = { # BALTIMARE GETS OFFER
	id = civwar.12
	immediate = {log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event civwar.12"}
	title = civwar.12.t
	desc = civwar.12.d
	picture = GFX_event_celestia_poster

	fire_only_once = yes

	is_triggered_only = yes

	option = {
		name = civwar.12.a
		FROM = { country_event = { id = equestria.121 days = 1 } }
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 85
			modifier = {
				is_in_faction_with = FROM
				factor = 0
			}
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = civwar.12.b
		FROM = { country_event = { id = equestria.122 days = 1 } }
		FROM = { puppet = ROOT }
		ai_chance = { factor = 15 }
	}
}

country_event = { # SCS GETS OFFER
	id = civwar.16
	immediate = {log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event civwar.16"}
	title = civwar.16.t
	desc = civwar.16.d
	picture = GFX_event_celestia_poster

	is_triggered_only = yes

	option = {  #### Resist EQS
		name = civwar.16.a
		hidden_effect = {
			FROM = { country_event = { id = equestria.121 days = 1 } }
			effect_tooltip = {
				FROM = {
					create_wargoal = {
						target = ROOT type = civil_war
					}
				}
			}
			add_political_power = 500
			EQS_remove_civil_war_ideas = yes
			#load_oob = "SCS_Civil_War"
		}
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 75
			modifier = {
				is_in_faction_with = FROM
				factor = 0
			}
			modifier = {
				has_country_flag = SCS_loyalist_win
				factor = 0
			}
			modifier = {
				has_country_flag = SCS_coltlumbia_win
				factor = 100
			}
		}
	}
	option = {  ## Give in
		name = civwar.16.b
		#load_oob = "SCS_Civil_War"
		FROM = { country_event = { id = equestria.123 days = 1 } }
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 25
		}
	}
}

country_event = { # LSP gets offer to be puppeted by EQS
	id = civwar.160
	immediate = {log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event civwar.160"}
	title = civwar.160.t
	desc = civwar.160.d
	picture = GFX_event_celestia_poster

	is_triggered_only = yes

	option = {
		name = civwar.160.a
		hidden_effect = {
			FROM = { country_event = { id = equestria.121 days = 1 } }
			effect_tooltip = {
				FROM = {
					create_wargoal = {
						target = ROOT type = civil_war
					}
				}
			}
			add_political_power = 500
		}
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 99
			modifier = {
				is_in_faction_with = FROM
				factor = 0
			}
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = civwar.160.b
		FROM = { country_event = { id = equestria.122 days = 1 } }
		FROM = { puppet = ROOT }
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 1
		}
	}
}

country_event = { # FOR CES
	id = civwar.21
	immediate = {log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event civwar.21"}
	title = civwar.21.t
	desc = civwar.21.d
	picture = GFX_event_celestia_poster

	is_triggered_only = yes

	option = { ## agree to be annexed
		name = civwar.21.a
		ai_chance = { base = 50
			modifier = {
				add = 30
				FROM = {
					num_of_factories > 5
				}
			}
			modifier = {
				add = 15
				FROM = {
					num_of_factories > 10
				}
			}
			modifier = {
				add = 15
				FROM = {
					owns_state = 24
				}
			}
		}
		FROM = {
			country_event = { id = baltimare.21 days = 1 }
		}
	}
	option = { ## disagree
		name = civwar.21.b
		ai_chance = { base = 50
			modifier = {
				add = 30
				FROM = {
					num_of_factories < 5
				}
			}
			modifier = {
				add = 15
				NOT = {
					FROM = {
						owns_state = 24
					}
				}
			}
		}
		FROM = {
			country_event = { id = baltimare.19 days = 1 }
		}
	}
}
country_event = { # FOR JUN
	id = civwar.22
	immediate = {log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event civwar.22"}
	title = civwar.22.t
	desc = civwar.22.d
	picture = GFX_event_celestia_poster

	is_triggered_only = yes

	option = { ## agree to be annexed
		name = civwar.22.a
		ai_chance = { base = 50
			modifier = {
				add = 40
				FROM = {
					num_of_factories > 5
				}
			}
			modifier = {
				add = 30
				FROM = {
					num_of_factories > 10
				}
			}
			modifier = {
				add = 15
				FROM = {
					owns_state = 24
				}
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 100
				FROM = {
					owns_state = 15
					owns_state = 24
					owns_state = 88
				}
			}
		}
		FROM = {
			country_event = { id = baltimare.20 days = 1 }
		}
	}
	option = { ## disagree
		name = civwar.22.b
		ai_chance = { base = 50
			modifier = {
				add = 30
				FROM = {
					num_of_factories < 5
				}
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 30
				OR = {
					ROOT = { is_subject_of = EQS }
					ROOT = { is_subject_of = NLR }
				}
			}
			modifier = {
				add = 15
				NOT = {
					FROM = {
						owns_state = 24
					}
				}
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				FROM = {
					owns_state = 88
				}
			}
		}
		FROM = {
			country_event = { id = baltimare.18 days = 1 }
		}
	}
}

country_event = {#LSP loading their initial troops
	id = civwar.23
	immediate = {log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event civwar.23"}
	title = civwar.23.t
	desc = civwar.23.d
	picture = GFX_event_ponies_in_battle
	is_triggered_only = yes

	option = {
		name = civwar.23.a
		hidden_effect = {
			add_manpower = 10000
			load_oob = "LSP_Civil_War"
		    random_list = {
                50 = { set_country_flag = LSP_NEUTRAL }
                25 = { set_country_flag = LSP_FASCIST }
                25 = { set_country_flag = LSP_COMMUNIST }
                    }
        }
	}
}

country_event = { # Delete tribal templates
	id = civwar.24
	immediate = {log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event civwar.24"}
	title = civwar.24.t
	desc = civwar.24.d
	picture = GFX_event_jungles_2

	is_triggered_only = yes

	trigger = {
		OR = {
			tag = CES
			tag = JUN
			tag = NMS
		}
		has_war = no
		exists = yes
		#only one of those tags must exist (ROOT)
		NOT = {
			count_triggers = {
				amount = 2 #at least 2 triggers are true
				country_exists = CES
				country_exists = JUN
				country_exists = NMS
			}
		}
		OR = {
			has_template = "Tribal Warband"
			has_template = "Tribal War Party"
		}
	}

	option = {
		name = civwar.24.a
		if = {
			limit = { has_template = "Tribal Warband" }
			delete_unit_template_and_units = {
				division_template = "Tribal Warband"
				disband = yes #will refund equipment and manpower
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = { has_template = "Tribal War Party" }
			delete_unit_template_and_units = {
				division_template = "Tribal War Party"
			 	disband = yes #will refund equipment and manpower
			}
		}
	}
}
add_namespace = decisions

# Recruit general for civil war event
country_event = {
	id = decisions.1
	immediate = {log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event decisions.1"}
	title = decisions.1.t
	desc = decisions.1.desc
	picture = GFX_report_event_hitler_handshake

	is_triggered_only = yes

	immediate = {
		hidden_effect = {
			if = {
				limit = {
					any_army_leader = {
						average_stats < 2
						is_field_marshal = no
						NOT = { has_unit_leader_flag = hidden_sympathies }
						NOT = { has_trait = hidden_sympathies }
					}
				}
				random_army_leader = {
					limit = {
						average_stats < 2
						is_field_marshal = no
						NOT = { has_unit_leader_flag = hidden_sympathies }
						NOT = { has_trait = hidden_sympathies }
					}
					set_unit_leader_flag = hidden_sympathies
				}
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					any_army_leader = {
						NOT = { average_stats < 2 }
						average_stats < 3
						is_field_marshal = no
						NOT = { has_unit_leader_flag = hidden_sympathies }
						NOT = { has_trait = hidden_sympathies }
					}
				}
				random_army_leader = {
					limit = {
						NOT = { average_stats < 2 }
						average_stats < 3
						is_field_marshal = no
						NOT = { has_unit_leader_flag = hidden_sympathies }
						NOT = { has_trait = hidden_sympathies }
					}
					set_unit_leader_flag = hidden_sympathies
				}
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					any_army_leader = {
						NOT = { average_stats < 3 }
						average_stats < 4
						is_field_marshal = no
						NOT = { has_unit_leader_flag = hidden_sympathies }
						NOT = { has_trait = hidden_sympathies }
					}
				}
				random_army_leader = {
					limit = {
						NOT = { average_stats < 3 }
						average_stats < 4
						is_field_marshal = no
						NOT = { has_unit_leader_flag = hidden_sympathies }
						NOT = { has_trait = hidden_sympathies }
					}
					set_unit_leader_flag = hidden_sympathies
				}
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					any_army_leader = {
						NOT = { average_stats < 4 }
						NOT = { has_unit_leader_flag = hidden_sympathies }
						is_field_marshal = no
						NOT = { has_unit_leader_flag = hidden_sympathies }
						NOT = { has_trait = hidden_sympathies }
					}
				}
				random_army_leader = {
					limit = {
						NOT = { average_stats < 4 }
						is_field_marshal = no
						NOT = { has_unit_leader_flag = hidden_sympathies }
						NOT = { has_trait = hidden_sympathies }
					}
					set_unit_leader_flag = hidden_sympathies
				}
			}
		}
	}

	# Recruit weak leader
	option = {
		name = decisions.1.a
		trigger = {
			any_army_leader = {
				is_field_marshal = no
				average_stats < 2
				has_unit_leader_flag = hidden_sympathies
			}
		}
		add_command_power = -1
		random_army_leader = {
			limit = {
				is_field_marshal = no
				average_stats < 2
				has_unit_leader_flag = hidden_sympathies
			}
			add_unit_leader_trait = hidden_sympathies
		}
		hidden_effect = {
			every_army_leader = {
				limit = {
					has_unit_leader_flag = hidden_sympathies
				}
				clr_unit_leader_flag = hidden_sympathies
			}
		}
	}

	# Recruit below mediocre leader
	option = {
		name = decisions.1.b
		trigger = {
			any_army_leader = {
				is_field_marshal = no
				NOT = { average_stats < 2 }
				average_stats < 3
				has_unit_leader_flag = hidden_sympathies
			}
		}
		add_command_power = -2
		add_political_power = -10
		random_army_leader = {
			limit = {
				is_field_marshal = no
				NOT = { average_stats < 2 }
				average_stats < 3
				has_unit_leader_flag = hidden_sympathies
			}
			add_unit_leader_trait = hidden_sympathies
		}
		hidden_effect = {
			every_army_leader = {
				limit = {
					has_unit_leader_flag = hidden_sympathies
				}
				clr_unit_leader_flag = hidden_sympathies
			}
		}
	}

	# Recruit above mediocre leader
	option = {
		name = decisions.1.c
		trigger = {
			any_army_leader = {
				is_field_marshal = no
				NOT = { average_stats < 3 }
				average_stats < 4
				has_unit_leader_flag = hidden_sympathies
			}
		}
		add_command_power = -3
		add_political_power = -20
		random_army_leader = {
			limit = {
				is_field_marshal = no
				NOT = { average_stats < 3 }
				average_stats < 4
				has_unit_leader_flag = hidden_sympathies
			}
			add_unit_leader_trait = hidden_sympathies
		}
		hidden_effect = {
			every_army_leader = {
				limit = {
					has_unit_leader_flag = hidden_sympathies
				}
				clr_unit_leader_flag = hidden_sympathies
			}
		}
	}

	# Recruit great leader
	option = {
		name = decisions.1.d
		trigger = {
			any_army_leader = {
				is_field_marshal = no
				NOT = { average_stats < 4 }
				has_unit_leader_flag = hidden_sympathies
			}
		}
		add_command_power = -4
		add_political_power = -30
		random_army_leader = {
			limit = {
				is_field_marshal = no
				NOT = { average_stats < 4 }
				has_unit_leader_flag = hidden_sympathies
			}
			add_unit_leader_trait = hidden_sympathies
		}
		hidden_effect = {
			every_army_leader = {
				limit = {
					has_unit_leader_flag = hidden_sympathies
				}
				clr_unit_leader_flag = hidden_sympathies
			}
		}
	}
}

# Recruit field marshal for civil war event
country_event = {
	id = decisions.2
	immediate = {log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event decisions.2"}
	title = decisions.2.t
	desc = decisions.2.desc
	picture = GFX_report_event_hitler_handshake

	is_triggered_only = yes

	immediate = {
		hidden_effect = {
			if = {
				limit = {
					any_army_leader = {
						average_stats < 2
						is_field_marshal = yes
						NOT = { has_unit_leader_flag = hidden_sympathies_marshal }
						NOT = { has_trait = hidden_sympathies }
					}
				}
				random_army_leader = {
					limit = {
						average_stats < 2
						is_field_marshal = yes
						NOT = { has_unit_leader_flag = hidden_sympathies_marshal }
						NOT = { has_trait = hidden_sympathies }
					}
					set_unit_leader_flag = hidden_sympathies_marshal
				}
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					any_army_leader = {
						NOT = { average_stats < 2 }
						average_stats < 3
						is_field_marshal = yes
						NOT = { has_unit_leader_flag = hidden_sympathies_marshal }
						NOT = { has_trait = hidden_sympathies }
					}
				}
				random_army_leader = {
					limit = {
						NOT = { average_stats < 2 }
						average_stats < 3
						is_field_marshal = yes
						NOT = { has_unit_leader_flag = hidden_sympathies_marshal }
						NOT = { has_trait = hidden_sympathies }
					}
					set_unit_leader_flag = hidden_sympathies_marshal
				}
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					any_army_leader = {
						NOT = { average_stats < 3 }
						average_stats < 4
						is_field_marshal = yes
						NOT = { has_unit_leader_flag = hidden_sympathies_marshal }
						NOT = { has_trait = hidden_sympathies }
					}
				}
				random_army_leader = {
					limit = {
						NOT = { average_stats < 3 }
						average_stats < 4
						is_field_marshal = yes
						NOT = { has_unit_leader_flag = hidden_sympathies_marshal }
						NOT = { has_trait = hidden_sympathies }
					}
					set_unit_leader_flag = hidden_sympathies_marshal
				}
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					any_army_leader = {
						NOT = { average_stats < 4 }
						is_field_marshal = yes
						NOT = { has_unit_leader_flag = hidden_sympathies_marshal }
						NOT = { has_trait = hidden_sympathies }
					}
				}
				random_army_leader = {
					limit = {
						NOT = { average_stats < 4 }
						is_field_marshal = yes
						NOT = { has_unit_leader_flag = hidden_sympathies_marshal }
						NOT = { has_trait = hidden_sympathies }
					}
					set_unit_leader_flag = hidden_sympathies_marshal
				}
			}
		}
	}

	# Recruit weak leader
	option = {
		name = decisions.1.a
		trigger = {
			any_army_leader = {
				is_field_marshal = yes
				average_stats < 2
				has_unit_leader_flag = hidden_sympathies_marshal
			}
		}
		add_command_power = -1
		random_army_leader = {
			limit = {
				is_field_marshal = yes
				average_stats < 2
				has_unit_leader_flag = hidden_sympathies_marshal
			}
			add_unit_leader_trait = hidden_sympathies
		}
		hidden_effect = {
			every_army_leader = {
				limit = {
					has_unit_leader_flag = hidden_sympathies_marshal
				}
				clr_unit_leader_flag = hidden_sympathies_marshal
			}
		}
	}

	# Recruit below mediocre leader
	option = {
		name = decisions.1.b
		trigger = {
			any_army_leader = {
				is_field_marshal = yes
				NOT = { average_stats < 2 }
				average_stats < 3
				has_unit_leader_flag = hidden_sympathies_marshal
			}
		}
		add_command_power = -2
		add_political_power = -10
		random_army_leader = {
			limit = {
				is_field_marshal = yes
				NOT = { average_stats < 2 }
				average_stats < 3
				has_unit_leader_flag = hidden_sympathies_marshal
			}
			add_unit_leader_trait = hidden_sympathies
		}
		hidden_effect = {
			every_army_leader = {
				limit = {
					has_unit_leader_flag = hidden_sympathies_marshal
				}
				clr_unit_leader_flag = hidden_sympathies_marshal
			}
		}
	}

	# Recruit above mediocre leader
	option = {
		name = decisions.1.c
		trigger = {
			any_army_leader = {
				is_field_marshal = yes
				NOT = { average_stats < 3 }
				average_stats < 4
				has_unit_leader_flag = hidden_sympathies_marshal
			}
		}
		add_command_power = -3
		add_political_power = -20
		random_army_leader = {
			limit = {
				is_field_marshal = yes
				NOT = { average_stats < 3 }
				average_stats < 4
				has_unit_leader_flag = hidden_sympathies_marshal
			}
			add_unit_leader_trait = hidden_sympathies
		}
		hidden_effect = {
			every_army_leader = {
				limit = {
					has_unit_leader_flag = hidden_sympathies_marshal
				}
				clr_unit_leader_flag = hidden_sympathies_marshal
			}
		}
	}

	# Recruit great leader
	option = {
		name = decisions.1.d
		trigger = {
			any_army_leader = {
				is_field_marshal = yes
				NOT = { average_stats < 4 }
				has_unit_leader_flag = hidden_sympathies_marshal
			}
		}
		add_command_power = -4
		add_political_power = -30
		random_army_leader = {
			limit = {
				is_field_marshal = yes
				NOT = { average_stats < 4 }
				has_unit_leader_flag = hidden_sympathies_marshal
			}
			add_unit_leader_trait = hidden_sympathies
		}
		hidden_effect = {
			every_army_leader = {
				limit = {
					has_unit_leader_flag = hidden_sympathies_marshal
				}
				clr_unit_leader_flag = hidden_sympathies_marshal
			}
		}
	}
}
add_namespace = diamond_mountain
add_namespace = diamond_mountain_news
add_namespace = diamond_mountain_balrog

### DMT cracks down on Harmony/Communism ###
country_event = {
	id = diamond_mountain.1
	immediate = {log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event diamond_mountain.1"}
	title = diamond_mountain.1.t
	desc = {
		text = diamond_mountain.1.d.communism
		trigger = { has_government = communism }
	}
	desc = {
		text = diamond_mountain.1.d.democratic
		trigger = { has_government = democratic }
	}
	picture = GFX_event_river_city_3

	is_triggered_only = yes

	trigger = {
		OR = {
			has_government = communism
			has_government = democratic
		}
	}

	option = { #Unnaceptable!
		name = diamond_mountain.1.a
		add_opinion_modifier = { target = DMT modifier = disapproves_of_crackdown }
	}
}

### DMT Slaves Fight in the Lower Levels
country_event = {
	id = diamond_mountain.2
	immediate = {log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event diamond_mountain.2"}
	title = diamond_mountain.2.t
	desc = diamond_mountain.2.d
	picture = GFX_event_cave

	is_triggered_only = yes

	option = { #Crush them!
		name = diamond_mountain.2.a
		add_political_power = -100
		add_stability = -0.15
		add_manpower = -1600
		hidden_effect = {
			country_event = { id = diamond_mountain.91 days = 5 }
		}
	}
}

### DMT Fate of the Royals
country_event = {
	id = diamond_mountain.3
	immediate = {log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event diamond_mountain.3"}
	title = diamond_mountain.3.t
	desc = diamond_mountain.3.d
	picture = GFX_event_gothic_interior

	is_triggered_only = yes

	option = { #Banish Molly
		name = diamond_mountain.3.a
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 10
		}
		DMT_rover_diamondshield = {
			retire = yes
		}
		add_political_power = 25
		if = {
			limit = {
				RCT = {
					exists = yes
					has_government = democratic
				}
			}
			RCT = {
				country_event = diamond_mountain.4
			}
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = {
				LCT = {
					exists = yes
					has_government = democratic
				}
			}
			LCT = {
				country_event = diamond_mountain.4
			}
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = {
				WIT = {
					exists = yes
					has_government = democratic
				}
			}
			WIT = {
				country_event = diamond_mountain.4
			}
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = {
				NIM = {
					exists = yes
					has_government = democratic
				}
			}
			NIM = {
				country_event = diamond_mountain.4
			}
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = {
				BAK = {
					exists = yes
					has_government = democratic
				}
			}
			BAK = {
				country_event = diamond_mountain.4
			}
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = {
				FRE = {
					exists = yes
					has_government = democratic
				}
			}
			FRE = {
				country_event = diamond_mountain.4
			}
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = {
				FBK = {
					exists = yes
					has_government = democratic
				}
			}
			FBK = {
				country_event = diamond_mountain.4
			}
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = {
				FIR = {
					exists = yes
					has_government = democratic
				}
			}
			FIR = {
				country_event = diamond_mountain.4
			}
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = {
				event_target:equestria = {
					exists = yes
					has_government = democratic
				}
			}
			event_target:equestria = {
				country_event = diamond_mountain.4
			}
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = {
				EQC = {
					exists = yes
					has_government = democratic
				}
			}
			EQC = {
				country_event = diamond_mountain.4
			}
		}
		else = {
			set_global_flag = DMT_molly_dead
		}
	}

	option = { #Banish Both
		name = diamond_mountain.3.b
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 1
		}
		set_global_flag = DMT_molly_banished
		add_stability = -0.05
		add_political_power = 25
		if = {
			limit = {
				RCT = {
					exists = yes
					has_government = democratic
				}
			}
			RCT = {
				country_event = diamond_mountain.4
			}
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = {
				LCT = {
					exists = yes
					has_government = democratic
				}
			}
			LCT = {
				country_event = diamond_mountain.4
			}
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = {
				WIT = {
					exists = yes
					has_government = democratic
				}
			}
			WIT = {
				country_event = diamond_mountain.4
			}
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = {
				NIM = {
					exists = yes
					has_government = democratic
				}
			}
			NIM = {
				country_event = diamond_mountain.4
			}
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = {
				BAK = {
					exists = yes
					has_government = democratic
				}
			}
			BAK = {
				country_event = diamond_mountain.4
			}
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = {
				FRE = {
					exists = yes
					has_government = democratic
				}
			}
			FRE = {
				country_event = diamond_mountain.4
			}
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = {
				FBK = {
					exists = yes
					has_government = democratic
				}
			}
			FBK = {
				country_event = diamond_mountain.4
			}
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = {
				FIR = {
					exists = yes
					has_government = democratic
				}
			}
			FIR = {
				country_event = diamond_mountain.4
			}
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = {
				event_target:equestria = {
					exists = yes
					has_government = democratic
				}
			}
			event_target:equestria = {
				country_event = diamond_mountain.4
			}
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = {
				EQC = {
					exists = yes
					has_government = democratic
				}
			}
			EQC = {
				country_event = diamond_mountain.4
			}
		}
		else = {
			set_global_flag = DMT_molly_dead
			DMT_princess_molly = {
				retire = yes
			}
		}
		#King
		if = {
			limit = {
				RCT = {
					exists = yes
					has_government = fascism
				}
			}
			RCT = {
				country_event = diamond_mountain.5
			}
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = {
				LCT = {
					exists = yes
					has_government = fascism
				}
			}
			LCT = {
				country_event = diamond_mountain.5
			}
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = {
				WIT = {
					exists = yes
					has_government = fascism
				}
			}
			WIT = {
				country_event = diamond_mountain.5
			}
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = {
				NIM = {
					exists = yes
					has_government = fascism
				}
			}
			NIM = {
				country_event = diamond_mountain.5
			}
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = {
				BAK = {
					exists = yes
					has_government = fascism
				}
			}
			BAK = {
				country_event = diamond_mountain.5
			}
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = {
				FRE = {
					exists = yes
					has_government = fascism
				}
			}
			FRE = {
				country_event = diamond_mountain.5
			}
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = {
				FBK = {
					exists = yes
					has_government = fascism
				}
			}
			FBK = {
				country_event = diamond_mountain.5
			}
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = {
				BAR = {
					exists = yes
					has_government = fascism
				}
			}
			BAR = {
				country_event = diamond_mountain.5
			}
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = {
				FIR = {
					exists = yes
					has_government = fascism
				}
			}
			FIR = {
				country_event = diamond_mountain.5
			}
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = {
				OLE = {
					exists = yes
					has_government = fascism
				}
			}
			OLE = {
				country_event = diamond_mountain.5
			}
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = {
				CHN = {
					exists = yes
					has_government = fascism
				}
			}
			CHN = {
				country_event = diamond_mountain.5
			}
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = {
				event_target:equestria = {
					exists = yes
					has_government = fascism
				}
			}
			event_target:equestria = {
				country_event = diamond_mountain.5
			}
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = {
				EQC = {
					exists = yes
					has_government = fascism
				}
			}
			EQC = {
				country_event = diamond_mountain.5
			}
		}
		else = {
			DMT_rover_diamondshield = {
				retire = yes
			}
		}
	}

	option = { #Execute Both
		name = diamond_mountain.3.c
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 1
		}
		add_stability = -0.1
		add_political_power = 50
		set_global_flag = DMT_molly_dead
		DMT_princess_molly = {
			retire = yes
		}
		DMT_rover_diamondshield = {
			retire = yes
		}

	}
}

### Molly in Exile
country_event = {
	id = diamond_mountain.4
	immediate = {log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event diamond_mountain.4"}
	title = diamond_mountain.4.t
	desc = {
		text = diamond_mountain.4.d
		trigger = {
			not = {
				original_tag = RCT
			}
		}
	}
	desc = {
		text = diamond_mountain.4_swirl.d
		trigger = {
			original_tag = RCT
		}
	}
	picture = GFX_event_river_city

	is_triggered_only = yes

	option = { #recieve Molly
		name = diamond_mountain.4.a
		trigger = {
			not = {
				original_tag = RCT
			}
		}
		add_ideas = DMT_molly_in_exile
		set_global_flag = DMT_molly_banished

	}
	option = { #recieve Molly as swirl
		name = diamond_mountain.4.b
		trigger = {
			original_tag = RCT
		}
		add_ideas = DMT_molly_in_exile
		set_global_flag = DMT_molly_banished

	}
}

### The King in Exile
country_event = {
	id = diamond_mountain.5
	immediate = {log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event diamond_mountain.5"}
	title = diamond_mountain.5.t
	desc = diamond_mountain.5.d
	picture = GFX_event_green_mountain

	is_triggered_only = yes

	option = { #recieve Rover
		name = diamond_mountain.5.a
		add_ideas = DMT_rover_in_exile
	}
}

#Slave leader flees
country_event = {
	id = diamond_mountain.91
	immediate = {log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event diamond_mountain.91"}
	title = diamond_mountain.91.t
	desc = diamond_mountain.91.d
	picture = GFX_event_old_mine

	is_triggered_only = yes

	option = { #Track Him Down!
		name = diamond_mountain.91.a
		ai_chance = {
			base = 10
			modifier = {
				OR = {
					has_country_flag = DMT_AI_COMMUNIST
					has_game_rule = {
						rule = DMT_ai_behavior
						option = COMMUNIST
					}
				}
				factor = 0
			}
		}
		add_political_power = -25
		hidden_effect = {
			country_event = { id = diamond_mountain.92 days = 335 random = 1440 }#days to hours applied
		}
	}
	option = { #Ignore him
		name = diamond_mountain.91.b
		ai_chance = {
			base = 7
			modifier = {
				OR = {
				    AND = {
						is_historical_focus_on = yes
						has_game_rule = {
							rule = DMT_ai_behavior
							option = DEFAULT
						}
					}
					has_country_flag = DMT_AI_DEMOCRATIC
					has_game_rule = {
						rule = DMT_ai_behavior
						option = DEMOCRATIC
					}
					has_country_flag = DMT_AI_HISTORICAL
					has_game_rule = {
						rule = DMT_ai_behavior
						option = HISTORICAL
					}
				}
				factor = 0
			}
		}
		hidden_effect = {
			country_event = { id = diamond_mountain.98 days = 30 }
		}
	}
}

#Slave leader found
country_event = {
	id = diamond_mountain.92
	immediate = {log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event diamond_mountain.92"}
	title = diamond_mountain.92.t
	desc = diamond_mountain.92.d
	picture = GFX_event_cave

	is_triggered_only = yes

	option = { #Kill them all
		name = diamond_mountain.92.a
		ai_chance = {
			base = 10
			modifier = {
				OR = {
					has_country_flag = DMT_AI_DEMOCRATIC
					has_game_rule = {
						rule = DMT_ai_behavior
						option = DEMOCRATIC
					}
				}
				factor = 0
			}
		}
		add_political_power = -50
		hidden_effect = {
			country_event = { id = diamond_mountain.93 days = 15 random = 240 }#days to hours applied
		}
	}
	option = { #listen to molly
		name = diamond_mountain.92.b
		ai_chance = {
			base = 7
			modifier = {
				OR = {
				    AND = {
						is_historical_focus_on = yes
						has_game_rule = {
							rule = DMT_ai_behavior
							option = DEFAULT
						}
					}
					has_country_flag = DMT_AI_HISTORICAL
					has_game_rule = {
						rule = DMT_ai_behavior
						option = HISTORICAL
					}
				}
				factor = 0
			}
		}
		add_stability = 0.02
		add_popularity = { ideology = democratic popularity = 0.01 }
		hidden_effect = {
			country_event = { id = diamond_mountain.94 days = 5 }
		}
	}
}

	title = diamond_mountain.99.t
	desc = diamond_mountain.99.d
	picture = GFX_event_old_mine

	fire_only_once = yes

	trigger = {
		tag = DMT
		has_idea = DMT_risk_of_rebellion
		AND = {
			communism > 0.45
			NOT = {
				has_country_leader = { ruling_only = yes character = DMT_princess_molly }
			}
		}
	}

	mean_time_to_happen = {
		days = 30
	}

	option = { #for communism
		name = diamond_mountain.99.a
		add_political_power = -50
		add_stability = -0.1
		add_manpower = -2000
		hidden_effect = {
			country_event = { id = diamond_mountain.100 days = 15 random = 240 }#days to hours applied
		}
	}
}

#Sacking of Hellquill
country_event = {
	id = diamond_mountain.102
	immediate = {log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event diamond_mountain.102"}
	title = diamond_mountain.102.t
	desc = diamond_mountain.102.d
	picture = GFX_event_bank_vault

	immediate = {
		set_global_flag = fall_of_Hellquill_city
	}

	is_triggered_only = yes

	option = { #Sack all the Gold
		name = diamond_mountain.102.a
		537 = {
			damage_building = {
				type = infrastructure
				damage = 1
			}
			damage_building = {
				type = industrial_complex
				damage = 4
			}
			damage_building = {
				type = arms_factory
				damage = 2
			}
		}
		swap_ideas = {
			remove_idea = DMT_revanchism
			add_idea = DMT_revanchism_completted
		}
	}
}

				amount = 9

#what now
country_event = {
	id = diamond_mountain_balrog.5
	immediate = {log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event diamond_mountain_balrog.5"}
	title = diamond_mountain_balrog.5.t
	desc = diamond_mountain_balrog.5.d
	picture = GFX_event_medieval_tower

	is_triggered_only = yes

	option = { #the city is lost

		ai_chance = {
			base = 2
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				FRE = {
					is_ai = no
				}
			}
		}
		add_political_power = -200
		add_stability = -0.2

		hidden_effect = {
			country_event = { id = diamond_mountain_balrog.6 days = 25 random = 240 }#days to hours applied
		}
	}
	option = { #send the army
		name = diamond_mountain_balrog.5.b
		ai_chance = {
			base = 7
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				FRE = {
					is_ai = no
				}
			}
		}
		hidden_effect = {
			set_country_flag = DMT_fight_the_demon
		}
	}
	option = { #call help
		name = diamond_mountain_balrog.5.c
		ai_chance = {
			base = 10
			modifier = {
				factor = 100
				FRE = {
					is_ai = no
				}
			}
		}
		hidden_effect = {
			FRE = {
				country_event = { id = diamond_mountain_balrog.10 days = 7 random = 24 }#days to hours applied
			}
		}
	}
}

#give up
country_event = {
	id = diamond_mountain_balrog.6
	immediate = {log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event diamond_mountain_balrog.6"}
	title = diamond_mountain_balrog.6.t
	desc = diamond_mountain_balrog.6.d
	picture = GFX_event_gothic_interior

	is_triggered_only = yes

	option = { #the city is lost
		name = diamond_mountain_balrog.6.a
		save_current_manpower = yes
		635 = {
			add_manpower = -300000
			set_state_category = wasteland
			if = {
				limit = { ROOT = { has_war = no } }
				set_demilitarized_zone = yes
			}
			remove_building = {
				type = arms_factory
				level = 10
			}
			remove_building = {
				type = industrial_complex
				level = 10
			}
			remove_building = {
				type = infrastructure
				level = 10
			}
			hidden_effect = {
				while_loop_effect = {
					limit = {
						has_resources_amount = {
							resource = crystals
							amount > 0
						}
					}
					add_resource = {
						type = crystals
						amount = -1
					}
				}
				while_loop_effect = {
					limit = {
						has_resources_amount = {
							resource = chromium
							amount > 0
						}
					}
					add_resource = {
						type = chromium
						amount = -1
					}
				}
				while_loop_effect = {
					limit = {
						has_resources_amount = {
							resource = steel
							amount > 0
						}
					}
					add_resource = {
						type = steel
						amount = -1
					}
				}
			}
		}
		restore_previous_manpower = yes
		637 = {
			add_manpower = 100000
		}
		638 = {
			add_manpower = 100000
		}
		647 = {
			add_manpower = 100000
		}
		hidden_effect = {
			add_manpower = -10000
		}
	}
}

	id = diamond_mountain_balrog.10

	desc = diamond_mountain_balrog.10.d
	picture = GFX_event_green_mountain

	is_triggered_only = yes

	option = { #help
		name = diamond_mountain_balrog.10.a

			base = 10
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				has_war_with = DMT
			}
		}
		add_political_power = 25
		add_opinion_modifier = { target = DMT modifier = DMT_help }
		reverse_add_opinion_modifier = { target = DMT modifier = DMT_help }
		hidden_effect = {
			country_event = { id = diamond_mountain_balrog.13 days = 14 random = 48 }#days to hours applied
			DMT = {
				country_event = { id = diamond_mountain_balrog.12 days = 14 random = 48 }#days to hours applied
			}
		}
	}

	option = { #don't help
		name = diamond_mountain_balrog.10.b
		ai_chance = {
			base = 3
			modifier = {
				factor = 100
				has_war_with = DMT
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				DMT = {
					has_government = democratic
				}
			}
		}
		add_political_power = -25
		add_opinion_modifier = { target = DMT modifier = DMT_refused_help }
		reverse_add_opinion_modifier = { target = DMT modifier = DMT_refused_help }
		hidden_effect = {
			DMT = {
				country_event = { id = diamond_mountain_balrog.11 days = 7 random = 24 }#days to hours applied
			}
		}
	}
}

	desc = diamond_mountain_balrog.17.d
	picture = GFX_event_feast

	is_triggered_only = yes

	option = { #Feast
		name = diamond_mountain_balrog.17.a
		add_political_power = 50
		hidden_effect = {
			DMT = {
				country_event = { id = diamond_mountain_balrog.18 hours = 12 random = 24 }#days to hours applied
			}
		}
	}
}

#victory (DMT)

	id = diamond_mountain_balrog.18
	immediate = {log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event diamond_mountain_balrog.18"}
	title = diamond_mountain_balrog.18.t
	desc = diamond_mountain_balrog.18.d
	picture = GFX_event_feast

	is_triggered_only = yes

	option = { #Feast
		name = diamond_mountain_balrog.18.a
		add_stability = 0.12
	}

	id = diamond_mountain_balrog.19
	immediate = {log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event diamond_mountain_balrog.19"}
	title = diamond_mountain_balrog.19.t
	desc = diamond_mountain_balrog.19.d
	picture = GFX_event_cave

	is_triggered_only = yes

	option = { #preparations
		name = diamond_mountain_balrog.19.a
		add_political_power = -15
		hidden_effect = {
			country_event = { id = diamond_mountain_balrog.21 days = 4 random = 24 }#days to hours applied
			DMT = {
				country_event = { id = diamond_mountain_balrog.20 hours = 12 random = 24 }#days to hours applied
			}
		}
	}
}

country_event = {
	id = diamond_mountain_balrog.21
	immediate = {log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event diamond_mountain_balrog.21"}
	title = diamond_mountain_balrog.21.t
	desc = diamond_mountain_balrog.21.d
	picture = GFX_event_forest_depression

	is_triggered_only = yes

		name = diamond_mountain_balrog.21.a
		hidden_effect = {

			}
		}
	}

#Seal is set up (DMT)
country_event = {
	id = diamond_mountain_balrog.22
	immediate = {log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event diamond_mountain_balrog.22"}
	title = diamond_mountain_balrog.22.t
	desc = diamond_mountain_balrog.22.d
	picture = GFX_event_old_mine

	is_triggered_only = yes

	option = { #city and balrog sealed up
		name = diamond_mountain_balrog.22.a
		save_current_manpower = yes
		635 = {
			add_manpower = -300000
			set_state_category = wasteland
			if = {
				limit = { ROOT = { has_war = no } }
				set_demilitarized_zone = yes
			}
			remove_building = {
				type = arms_factory
				level = 10
			}
			remove_building = {
				type = industrial_complex
				level = 10
			}
			remove_building = {
				type = infrastructure
				level = 10
			}
			hidden_effect = {
				while_loop_effect = {
					limit = {
						has_resources_amount = {
							resource = crystals
							amount > 0
						}
					}
					add_resource = {
						type = crystals
						amount = -1
					}
				}
				while_loop_effect = {
					limit = {
						has_resources_amount = {
							resource = chromium
							amount > 0
						}
					}
					add_resource = {
						type = chromium
						amount = -1
					}
				}
				while_loop_effect = {
					limit = {
						has_resources_amount = {
							resource = steel
							amount > 0
						}
					}
					add_resource = {
						type = steel
						amount = -1
					}
				}
			}
		}
		restore_previous_manpower = yes
		637 = {
			add_manpower = 100000
		}
		638 = {
			add_manpower = 100000
		}
		647 = {
			add_manpower = 100000
		}
		hidden_effect = {
			add_manpower = -10000
		}
	}
}
country_event = { #I hate you.
	id = diamond_mountain_balrog.23
	immediate = {log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event diamond_mountain_balrog.23"}
	title = diamond_mountain_balrog.23.t
	desc = diamond_mountain_balrog.23.d
	picture = GFX_event_the_sphere
	is_triggered_only = yes

	option = { #Correct answer
		name = diamond_mountain_balrog.23.a
		CCN_harmonic_gas_warfare = yes
	}
	option = { #Wrong answer
		name = diamond_mountain_balrog.23.b
		LNS_commit_genocide = yes
	}
	option = { #Wrong answer
		name = diamond_mountain_balrog.23.c
		the_correct_answer = yes
	}
}
add_namespace = diplopopup

country_event = {
	id = diplopopup.100
	immediate = {log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event diplopopup.100"}
	hidden = yes
	is_triggered_only = yes
	trigger = {
		is_ai = no
	}
	option = {
		add_to_variable = { eaw_diplo_popup_options_dirty = 1 }
	}
}

# Faction invite
country_event = {
	id = diplopopup.1
	immediate = {log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event diplopopup.1"}
	hidden = yes
	is_triggered_only = yes
	trigger = {
		FROM = { is_in_faction_with = FROM.FROM }
		country_exists = FROM
		country_exists = FROM.FROM
	}
	option = {
		every_country = {
			limit = {
				is_ai = no
				NOT = {
					tag = FROM
					tag = FROM.FROM
				}
			}
			show_faction_invited_popup = yes
		}
	}
}

# Faction join
country_event = {
	id = diplopopup.2
	immediate = {log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event diplopopup.2"}
	hidden = yes
	is_triggered_only = yes
	trigger = {
		FROM = { is_in_faction_with = FROM.FROM }
		country_exists = FROM
		country_exists = FROM.FROM
	}
	option = {
		every_country = {
			limit = {
				is_ai = no
				NOT = {
					tag = FROM
					tag = FROM.FROM
				}
			}
			show_faction_joined_popup = yes
		}
	}
}

# Puppet
country_event = {
	id = diplopopup.3
	immediate = {log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event diplopopup.3"}
	hidden = yes
	is_triggered_only = yes
	trigger = {
		FROM = { is_subject_of = FROM.FROM }
		country_exists = FROM
		country_exists = FROM.FROM
	}
	option = {
		every_country = {
			limit = {
				is_ai = no
				NOT = {
					tag = FROM
					tag = FROM.FROM
				}
			}
			show_puppeted_popup = yes
		}
	}
}

# Event to automatically make popup go away in three days
country_event = {
	id = diplopopup.99
	immediate = {
		log = "[GetDateText]: [ROOT.GetName]: event diplopopup.99"
		for_each_loop = {
			array = eaw_diplo_popup_unique_id
			value = v
			break = b
			if = {
				limit = {
					event_target:unique_id = {
						state = v
					}
				}
				set_temp_variable = { unique_id_found = 1 }
				set_temp_variable = { current_index = i }
				set_temp_variable = { b = 1 }
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				check_variable = { unique_id_found = 1 }
			}
			set_temp_variable = { close_index = current_index }
			eaw_diplo_popup_close_popup = yes
		}
	}
	is_triggered_only = yes
	hidden = yes
}

# Election Events

add_namespace = election

# Test Election Event
country_event = {
	id = election.1
	immediate = {log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event election.1"}
	title = election.1.t
	desc = election.1.d
	picture = GFX_report_event_election_vote

	is_triggered_only = yes

	option = {
		name = election.1.a
	}
}

# Public Opposes Rearmament
country_event = {
	id = election.2
	immediate = {log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event election.2"}
	title = election.2.t
	desc = election.2.d
	picture = GFX_report_event_airplane_factory

	is_triggered_only = yes

	trigger = {
		has_government = democratic
		NOT = {
			OR = {
				has_war = yes
				any_neighbor_country = {
					has_war = yes
				}
				any_allied_country = {
					has_war = yes
				}
			}
		}
		has_idea = partial_economic_mobilisation
	}

	option = {
		ai_chance = {
			base = 1
		}
		name = election.2.a
		add_ideas = low_economic_mobilisation
	}

	option = {
		name = election.2.b
		ai_chance = {
			base = 0
			modifier = {
				add = 10
				can_lose_unity = yes
			}
		}
		add_stability = -0.05
		add_war_support = -0.05
	}
}


# Public Demands Rearmament
country_event = {
	id = election.3
	immediate = {log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event election.3"}
	title = election.3.t
	desc = election.3.d
	picture = GFX_report_event_tank_factory

	is_triggered_only = yes

	trigger = {
		has_government = democratic
		has_war = no
		OR = {
			any_neighbor_country = {
				has_war = yes
			}
			any_allied_country = {
				has_war = yes
			}
		}
		OR = {
			has_idea = low_economic_mobilisation
			has_idea = civilian_economy
			has_idea = isolation
			has_idea = undisturbed_isolation
			has_idea = volunteer_only
			has_idea = disarmed_nation
		}
	}

	option = {
		name = election.3.a
		if = {
			limit = { has_idea = low_economic_mobilisation }
			add_ideas = partial_economic_mobilisation
		}
		if = {
			limit = { has_idea = civilian_economy }
			add_ideas = low_economic_mobilisation
		}
		if = {
			limit = { has_idea = isolation }
			add_ideas = civilian_economy
		}
		if = {
			limit = { has_idea = undisturbed_isolation }
			add_ideas = isolation
		}
		if = {
			limit = { has_idea = volunteer_only }
			add_ideas = limited_conscription
		}
		if = {
			limit = { has_idea = disarmed_nation }
			add_ideas = volunteer_only
		}
		add_war_support = 0.05
	}

	option = {
		name = election.3.b
		ai_chance = {
			base = 0
		}
		add_stability = -0.05
	}
}

# Fascists in Government?
country_event = {
	id = election.4
	immediate = {log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event election.4"}
	title = election.4.t
	desc = election.4.d
	picture = GFX_report_event_fascist_gathering

	is_triggered_only = yes

	trigger = {
		has_government = democratic
		NOT = { has_idea = fascism_defeated }
		fascism > 0.15
	}

	option = {
		name = election.4.a
		ai_chance = {
			base = 0
			modifier = {
				add = 2
				can_lose_democracy_support = yes
			}
			modifier = {
				add = 1
				can_lose_unity = no
			}
		}
		add_popularity = {
			ideology = fascism
			popularity = 0.1
		}
		set_country_flag = coalition_with_fascists
	}

	option = {
		name = election.4.b
		ai_chance = {
			base = 0
			modifier = {
				add = 10
				can_lose_unity = yes
			}
		}
		add_stability = -0.05
		add_popularity = {
			ideology = democratic
			popularity = 0.03
		}
		set_country_flag = government_declined_fascists
	}
}

# Democratic Parties in Minority
country_event = {
	id = election.6
	immediate = {log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event election.6"}
	title = election.6.t
	desc = election.6.d
	picture = GFX_report_event_journalists_speech

	is_triggered_only = yes

	trigger = {
		has_government = democratic
		democratic < 0.5
		fascism < 0.5
		communism < 0.5
	}

	option = {
		name = election.6.a
		ai_chance = {
			base = 0
			modifier = {
				add = 10
				can_lose_democracy_support = yes
			}
		}
		add_popularity = {
			ideology = fascism
			popularity = 0.1
		}
		set_country_flag = coalition_with_fascists
	}

	option = {
		name = election.6.b
		ai_chance = {
			base = 0
			modifier = {
				add = 10
				can_lose_democracy_support = yes
			}
		}
		add_popularity = {
			ideology = communism
			popularity = 0.1
		}
		set_country_flag = coalition_with_communists
	}

	option = {
		name = election.6.c
		ai_chance = {
			base = 0
			modifier = {
				add = 1
				can_lose_democracy_support = no
			}
		}
		add_popularity = {
			ideology = democratic
			popularity = 0.05
		}
		add_political_power = -80
	}
}

# Fascists Influence Foreign Policy
country_event = {
	id = election.7
	immediate = {log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event election.7"}
	title = election.7.t
	desc = election.7.d
	picture = GFX_report_event_fascist_gathering

	mean_time_to_happen = {
		days = 730
	}

	trigger = {
		has_government = democratic
		has_country_flag = coalition_with_fascists
		is_in_faction = yes
		is_faction_leader = no
		var:faction_leader = {
			has_government = fascism
		}
	}

	option = {
		name = election.7.a
		ai_chance = {
			base = 0
			modifier = {
				add = 2
				can_lose_democracy_support = yes
			}
			modifier = {
				add = 1
				can_lose_unity = no
			}
		}
		var:faction_leader = {
			add_opinion_modifier = {
				target = ROOT
				modifier = fascists_in_government
			}
		}
		add_popularity = {
			ideology = fascism
			popularity = 0.05
		}
	}

	option = {
		name = election.7.b
		ai_chance = {
			base = 10
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				can_lose_unity = no
			}
		}
		add_stability = -0.05
		add_popularity = {
			ideology = democratic
			popularity = 0.03
		}
	}
}

# Fascist Majority
country_event = {
	id = election.11
	immediate = {log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event election.11"}
	title = election.11.t
	desc = election.11.d
	picture = GFX_report_event_fascist_gathering

	is_triggered_only = yes

	trigger = {
		has_government = democratic
		fascism > 0.5
		is_subject = no
	}

	option = {
		name = election.11.a
		ai_chance = {
			base = 100
		}
		set_politics = {
			ruling_party = fascism
			elections_allowed = no
		}
	}

	option = {
		name = election.11.b
		ai_chance = {
			base = 0
		}
		start_civil_war = {
			ideology = fascism
			size = party_popularity@fascism
		}
	}
}

# Magnate Favors Fascism
country_event = {
	id = election.13
	immediate = {log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event election.13"}
	title = election.13.t
	desc = election.13.d
	picture = GFX_report_event_fascist_gathering

	is_triggered_only = yes

	trigger = {
		has_government = democratic
		has_idea_with_trait = motorized_equipment_manufacturer
	}

	option = {
		name = election.13.a
		ai_chance = {
			base = 0
			modifier = {
				add = 1
				can_lose_democracy_support = yes
			}
		}
		add_popularity = {
			ideology = fascism
			popularity = 0.10
		}
	}

	option = {
		name = election.13.b
		ai_chance = {
			base = 0
			modifier = {
				add = 1
				can_lose_democracy_support = no
			}
		}
		add_popularity = {
			ideology = democratic
			popularity = 0.05
		}
		remove_ideas_with_trait = motorized_equipment_manufacturer
	}
}

# Wartime Exception
country_event = {
	id = election.14
	immediate = {log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event election.14"}
	title = election.14.t
	desc = election.14.d
	picture = GFX_report_event_tank_factory

	is_triggered_only = yes

	trigger = {
		has_government = democratic
		has_war = yes
	}

	option = {
		name = election.14.a
		ai_chance = {
			base = 0
			modifier = {
				add = 10
				can_lose_unity = yes
			}
		}
		add_stability = -0.05
	}

	option = {
		ai_chance = {
			base = 0
			modifier = {
				add = 3
				can_lose_democracy_support = yes
			}
			modifier = {
				add = 1
				can_lose_unity = no
			}
		}
		name = election.14.b
		add_political_power = 20
		add_stability = 0.05
		add_popularity = {
			ideology = communism
			popularity = 0.05
		}
		add_popularity = {
			ideology = fascism
			popularity = 0.05
		}
	}
}

# Government Contested
country_event = {
	id = election.15
	immediate = {log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event election.15"}
	title = election.15.t
	desc = election.15.d
	picture = GFX_report_event_gathering_protest

	is_triggered_only = yes

	trigger = {
		has_government = democratic
		has_war = yes
		any_war_score < 20
	}

	option = {
		ai_chance = {
			base = 0
			modifier = {
				add = 3
				can_lose_democracy_support = no
			}
		}
		name = election.15.a
		add_political_power = -50
		add_stability = -0.05
	}

	option = {
		name = election.15.b
		ai_chance = {
			base = 0
			modifier = {
				add = 10
				can_lose_democracy_support = yes
			}
			modifier = {
				add = 1
				can_lose_unity = no
			}
		}
		add_political_power = 25
		add_stability = 0.05
		add_popularity = {
			ideology = communism
			popularity = 0.07
		}
		add_popularity = {
			ideology = fascism
			popularity = 0.07
		}
	}
}

	}

		add_stability = -0.05
	}

add_namespace = fantasyflavor

country_event = { #Monster preys on farmers
	id = fantasyflavor.1
	immediate = {log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event fantasyflavor.1"}
	title = fantasyflavor.1.t
	desc = fantasyflavor.1.d
	trigger = {
		has_war = no
		any_owned_state = {
			OR = {
				has_state_category = rural
				has_state_category = pastoral
				has_state_category = town
			}
		}
		NOT = {
			has_country_flag = HIP_siren_takeover
		}
	}
	picture = GFX_event_foggy_forest
	is_triggered_only = yes

	option = {
		name = fantasyflavor.1.a
		hidden_effect = {
			country_event = {
				id = fantasyflavor.2
				days = 30
			}
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = fantasyflavor.1.b
		add_political_power = -25
		add_stability = -0.025
	}
}

	id = fantasyflavor.6

	desc = fantasyflavor.6.d

	is_triggered_only = yes

	option = {
		name = fantasyflavor.6.a
		add_stability = -0.05

			limit = {
				NOT = {
					tag = FAT
					tag = FAW
					tag = GRW
					tag = BRF
					original_tag = ABY
					has_idea = GRW_risk_of_famine
				}
			}
			add_ideas = GRW_risk_of_famine
		}
		hidden_effect = {
			country_event = {
				id = fantasyflavor.7
				days = 40
			}
		}
	}
}

				has_country_flag = yes_master_i_was_in_asterion

				}

				activate_decision = RCT_rivers_of_blood
			}
		}

			export_sand = yes
		}
	}

		name = wittenland.153.b
		trigger = {
			NOT = {
				has_country_flag = a_man_chooses
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				BUF = {
					exists = yes
				}
			}
			set_country_flag = a_man_chooses
			hidden_effect = {
				activate_decision = JUN_jungle_of_death
			}
		}
		else = {
			export_sand = yes
		}
	}
	option = {
	name = wittenland.153.c
		trigger = {
			NOT = {
				has_country_flag = a_slave_obeys
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = {

					exists = yes
				}
			}
			set_country_flag = a_slave_obeys
			hidden_effect = {
				activate_decision = HIP_seas_of_slaughter
			}
		}
		else = {

		}
	}

			}

				name = "Elder Dragon"

					heavy_dragons = { x = 0 y = 0 }
				}

				}
			}
			capital_scope = {
				create_unit = {
					division = "name = \"Elder Dragon\" division_template = \"Elder Dragon\" start_experience_factor = 1 start_equipment_factor = 1"
					owner = ROOT
				}
			}
			set_technology = {
				popup = no
				dragons_heavy = 0
			}
			fix_weapon_techs = yes
		}
	}

country_event = { ###################################### Starting event that is police being raided by maf/smugglers 1 is maf/smugglers win 2 is cops win #################################
	id = fezera.100
	immediate = {log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event fezera.100"}
	title = fezera.100.t
	desc = fezera.100.d
	picture = GFX_event_fez_mafia

	fire_only_once = yes

	trigger = {
		tag = FEZ
		date > 1007.1.1
	}

	option = {
		name = fezera.100.a
		set_country_flag = FEZ_dark_side
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 5
			modifier = {
				OR = {
					has_country_flag = FEZ_AI_DEMOCRATIC
					has_game_rule = {
						rule = FEZ_ai_behavior
						option = DEMOCRATIC
					}
				}
				factor = 0
			}
		}
	}

	option = {
		name = fezera.100.b
		set_country_flag = FEZ_light_side
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 5
			modifier = {
				OR = {
					AND = {
						is_historical_focus_on = yes
						has_game_rule = {
							rule = FEZ_ai_behavior
							option = DEFAULT
						}
					}
					has_country_flag = FEZ_AI_HISTORICAL
					has_game_rule = {
						rule = FEZ_ai_behavior
						option = HISTORICAL
					}
					has_country_flag = FEZ_AI_FASCIST
					has_game_rule = {
						rule = FEZ_ai_behavior
						option = FASCIST
					}
				}
				factor = 0
			}
		}
	}
}

	id = fezera.4

	title = fezera.4.t
	desc = fezera.4.d
	picture = GFX_event_medieval_city_ugly_street

	is_triggered_only = yes

	option = {
		name = fezera.2.a
		add_timed_idea = {
			idea = FEZ_blackmarket_accepted
			days = 180
		}

		FEZ = {
			country_event = { days = 1 id = fezera.51 }
		}
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 100
		}
	}

	option = {
		name = fezera.4.b
		FEZ = {
			country_event = { days = 1 id = fezera.6 }
		}
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 10
		}
	}
}

country_event = { ############### asking griefwald to join your faction ###########
	id = fezera.12
	immediate = {log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event fezera.12"}
	title = fezera.12.t
	desc = fezera.12.d
	picture = GFX_event_griffon_diplomacy

	fire_only_once = yes
	is_triggered_only = yes

	immediate = {
		hidden_effect = {
			save_event_target_as = alliance_applicant
			FROM = {
				save_event_target_as = alliance_inviter
			}
		}
	}

	option = {
		name = fezera.12.a
		ai_chance = {
			base = 100
			modifier = {
				is_in_faction = yes
				factor = 0
			}
		}
		FROM = {
			add_to_faction = ROOT
		}
		hidden_effect = {
			set_country_flag = alliance_applicant@ROOT
			FROM = { set_country_flag = alliance_inviter@ROOT }
			news_event = { id = news.289 hours = 12 }
		}
		FEZ = {
			country_event = { days = 1 id = fezera.32 }
		}
	}

	option = {
		name = fezera.12.b
		trigger = {
			is_in_faction = no
		}
		FEZ = {
			country_event = { days = 1 id = fezera.33 }
		}
		ai_chance = { factor = 10 }
	}
}

		text = fezera.19.d_fasc

			has_government = fascism
		}
	}
	desc = {
		text = fezera.19.d_neutral
		trigger = {
			has_government = neutrality
		}
	}

		text = fezera.19.d_dem
		trigger = {
			has_government = democratic
		}

		}

		}
	}
	option = {
		name = fezera.19.a_neutral
		add_political_power = 100
		trigger = {
			has_government = neutrality
		}
		TRD = {
			every_core_state = {
				add_core_of = FEZ
			}
		}

			}
		}
		FEZ = {
			country_event = { days = 2 id = fezera.38 }
		}
	}

	option = {
		name = fezera.31.b
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 1
		}
		FEZ = {
			country_event = { days = 2 id = fezera.39 }
			set_country_flag = FEZ_fat_rejects_cops
		}
	}
}

country_event = { ############### herzlands-aquileia unification ###########
	id = fezera.132
	immediate = {log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event fezera.132"}
	title = fezera.132.t
	desc = fezera.132.d
	picture = GFX_event_fez

	fire_only_once = yes

	trigger = {
		tag = FEZ
		owns_state = 377
		owns_state = 382
	}

	option = {
		name = fezera.132.a
		set_cosmetic_tag = CRIME_griffonia
		set_capital = {
			state = 382
			remember_old_capital = no
		}
		every_state = {
			limit = {
			    OR = {
					is_core_of = GRI
					is_core_of = JER
					is_core_of = JES
					is_core_of = AVI
					is_core_of = EYR
				    is_core_of = ERI
					is_core_of = POM
					is_core_of = FLO
					is_core_of = AET
					is_core_of = HEL
					is_core_of = HLQ
					is_core_of = LNS
					is_core_of = LSC
					is_core_of = LSM
					is_core_of = HAU
					is_core_of = BOI
					is_core_of = TRD
					is_core_of = FEA
					is_core_of = STW
					is_core_of = BRZ
					is_core_of = KAT
					is_core_of = ANG
					is_core_of = YAL
					is_core_of = PYT
					is_core_of = ROU
					is_core_of = JFT
					is_core_of = VIN
					is_core_of = JRR
					is_core_of = JEB
				}
			}
			add_core_of = ROOT
		}
	}
}
add_namespace = freeponies
add_namespace = freeponies_news
add_namespace = freeponiesflavor

### Intro Event ###
country_event = {
	id = freeponies.1
	immediate = {log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event freeponies.1"}
	title = freeponies.1.t
	desc = freeponies.1.d
	#picture = GFX_event_lake_city

	is_triggered_only = yes

	option = {
		name = freeponies.1.a
	}
}

### Buy Fighters ###
country_event = {
	id = freeponies.2
	immediate = {log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event freeponies.2"}
	title = freeponies.2.t
	desc = freeponies.2.d
	picture = GFX_report_event_fighters

	is_triggered_only = yes


	option = { #Yes
		name = freeponies.2.a
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 10
		}
		FROM = { country_event = freeponies.3 }
		effect_tooltip = {
			FROM = {
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_dlc = "By Blood Alone"
						has_tech = iw_small_airframe
					}
					set_technology = {
						aa_lmg = 1
						engines_1 = 1
					}
					generic_early_fighter = yes
					add_equipment_to_stockpile = {
						type = small_plane_airframe_1
						variant_name = "Early Fighter"
						amount = 25
					}
				}
				else_if = {
					limit = {
						has_dlc = "By Blood Alone"
						NOT = {
							has_tech = iw_small_airframe
						}
					}
					set_technology = {
						iw_small_airframe = 1
						aa_lmg = 1
						engines_1 = 1
					}
					generic_early_fighter = yes
					add_equipment_to_stockpile = {
						type = small_plane_airframe_1
						variant_name = "Early Fighter"
						amount = 25
					}
				}
				else_if = {
					limit = {
						has_tech = early_fighter
					}
					add_equipment_to_stockpile = {
						type = small_plane_airframe
						amount = 25
						producer = NIM
					}
				}
				else = {
					set_technology = {
						early_fighter = 1
					}
					add_equipment_to_stockpile = {
						type = small_plane_airframe
						amount = 25
						producer = NIM
					}
				}
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_dlc = "Arms Against Tyranny"
					}
					add_equipment_subsidy = {
						cic = 500
						equipment_type = small_plane_airframe
						seller_tags = { RCT LCT NIM WIT BAK DEP DMT FBK WAT FIR }
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}

	option = { #No
		name = freeponies.2.b
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 0
		}
		FROM = { country_event = freeponies.4 }

	}
}

### Buy Fighters - Accept ###
country_event = {
	id = freeponies.3
	immediate = {log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event freeponies.3"}
	title = freeponies.3.t
	desc = freeponies.3.d
	picture = GFX_report_event_fighters

	is_triggered_only = yes


	option = { #Yes!
		name = freeponies.3.a
		add_opinion_modifier = {
			target = FROM
			modifier = FRE_sold_planes
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_dlc = "By Blood Alone"
				has_tech = iw_small_airframe
			}
			set_technology = {
				aa_lmg = 1
				engines_1 = 1
			}
			generic_early_fighter = yes
			add_equipment_to_stockpile = {
				type = small_plane_airframe_1
				variant_name = "Early Fighter"
				amount = 25
			}
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = {
				has_dlc = "By Blood Alone"
				NOT = {
					has_tech = iw_small_airframe
				}
			}
			set_technology = {
				iw_small_airframe = 1
				aa_lmg = 1
				engines_1 = 1
			}
			generic_early_fighter = yes
			add_equipment_to_stockpile = {
				type = small_plane_airframe_1
				variant_name = "Early Fighter"
				amount = 25
			}
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = {
				has_tech = early_fighter
			}
			add_equipment_to_stockpile = {
				type = small_plane_airframe
				amount = 25
				producer = NIM
			}
		}
		else = {
			set_technology = {
				early_fighter = 1
			}
			add_equipment_to_stockpile = {
				type = small_plane_airframe
				amount = 25
				producer = NIM
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_dlc = "Arms Against Tyranny"
			}
			add_equipment_subsidy = {
				cic = 500
				equipment_type = small_plane_airframe
				seller_tags = { RCT LCT NIM WIT BAK DEP DMT FBK WAT FIR }
			}
		}
	}
}

			target = FROM
			modifier = FRE_sold_planes_refused
		}
	}

### Buy Bombers ###
country_event = {
	id = freeponies.5
	immediate = {log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event freeponies.5"}
	title = freeponies.5.t
	desc = freeponies.5.d
	picture = GFX_report_event_generic_bombers

	is_triggered_only = yes


	option = { #Yes
		name = freeponies.5.a
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 10
		}
		FROM = { country_event = freeponies.6 }
		effect_tooltip = {
			FROM = {
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_dlc = "By Blood Alone"
						has_tech = iw_medium_airframe
					}
					set_technology = {
						early_bombs = 1
						engines_1 = 1
					}
					generic_early_tac_bomber = yes
					add_equipment_to_stockpile = {
						type = medium_plane_airframe_0
						variant_name = "Early Tactical Bomber"
						amount = 12
					}
				}
				else_if = {
					limit = {
						has_dlc = "By Blood Alone"
						NOT = {
							has_tech = iw_medium_airframe
						}
					}
					set_technology = {
						iw_medium_airframe = 1
						early_bombs = 1
						engines_1 = 1
					}
					generic_early_tac_bomber = yes
					add_equipment_to_stockpile = {
						type = medium_plane_airframe_0
						variant_name = "Early Tactical Bomber"
						amount = 12
					}
				}
				else_if = {
					limit = {
						has_tech = early_bomber
					}
					add_equipment_to_stockpile = {
						type = medium_plane_airframe
						amount = 12
						producer = LCT
					}
				}
				else = {
					set_technology = {
						early_bomber = 1
					}
					add_equipment_to_stockpile = {
						type = medium_plane_airframe
						amount = 12
						producer = LCT
					}
				}
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_dlc = "Arms Against Tyranny"
					}
					add_equipment_subsidy = {
						cic = 500
						equipment_type = medium_plane_airframe
						seller_tags = { RCT LCT NIM WIT BAK DEP DMT FBK WAT FIR }
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}

	option = { #No
		name = freeponies.5.b
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 0
		}
		FROM = { country_event = freeponies.7 }

	}
}

### Buy Bombers - Accept ###
country_event = {
	id = freeponies.6
	immediate = {log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event freeponies.6"}
	title = freeponies.6.t
	desc = freeponies.6.d
	picture = GFX_report_event_generic_bombers

	is_triggered_only = yes


	option = { #Yes!
		name = freeponies.6.a
		add_opinion_modifier = {
			target = FROM
			modifier = FRE_sold_planes
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_dlc = "By Blood Alone"
				has_tech = iw_medium_airframe
			}
			set_technology = {
				early_bombs = 1
				engines_1 = 1
			}
			generic_early_tac_bomber = yes
			add_equipment_to_stockpile = {
				type = medium_plane_airframe_0
				variant_name = "Early Tactical Bomber"
				amount = 12
			}
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = {
				has_dlc = "By Blood Alone"
				NOT = {
					has_tech = iw_medium_airframe
				}
			}
			set_technology = {
				iw_medium_airframe = 1
				early_bombs = 1
				engines_1 = 1
			}
			generic_early_tac_bomber = yes
			add_equipment_to_stockpile = {
				type = medium_plane_airframe_0
				variant_name = "Early Tactical Bomber"

			}
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = {
				has_tech = early_bomber
			}
			add_equipment_to_stockpile = {
				type = medium_plane_airframe
