### Breezies Protesst ###
country_event = {
	id = freeponies.8
	immediate = {log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event freeponies.8"}
	title = freeponies.8.t
	desc = freeponies.8.d
	#picture = GFX_report_event_generic_bombers

	is_triggered_only = yes #moved to FRE_welth_of_the_mountains

	option = { ## Appease them = -25% resources -pp
		name = freeponies.8.a
		add_political_power = -100
		add_timed_idea = { idea = FRE_appeased_breezies days = 1825 }
	}

	option = { #Ignore them
		name = freeponies.8.b
		hidden_effect = {
			set_country_flag = FRE_breezies_are_angry
			country_event = { id = freeponies.9 days = 110 random = 720 }#days to hours applied
		}
	}
}

### Breezies kill crops ###
country_event = {
	id = freeponies.9
	immediate = {log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event freeponies.9"}
	title = freeponies.9.t
	desc = freeponies.9.d
	#picture = GFX_report_event_generic_bombers

	is_triggered_only = yes

	option = { ## Oh on! -50% resurces -pp -stability -Monethly population
		name = freeponies.9.a
		add_political_power = -100
		add_timed_idea = { idea = FRE_breezie_famin days = 730 }
	}
}

### Anger in the Longhouse ###
country_event = {
	id = freeponies.10
	immediate = {log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event freeponies.10"}
	title = freeponies.10.t
	desc = freeponies.10.d
	#picture = GFX_report_event_generic_bombers

	trigger = {
		original_tag = FRE
		has_completed_focus = FRE_begin_rapid_industrialisation
		has_stability < 0.5
		NOT = { has_country_flag = FRE_longhouse_anger }
		NOT = {
			has_idea = FRE_slowed_industralisation
		}
	}

	mean_time_to_happen = {
		months = 10
	}

	option = { ## Give in to their demands - -Construction Speed + Consumer Goods 1100 Days
		name = freeponies.10.a
		add_timed_idea = { idea = FRE_slowed_industralisation days = 180 }
		set_country_flag = { flag = FRE_longhouse_anger days = 200 value = 1 }
	}

	option = { ## They will obay - pp -stability
		name = freeponies.10.b
		add_stability = -0.05
		add_political_power = -50
		set_country_flag = { flag = FRE_longhouse_anger days = 180 value = 1 }
	}
}

### Monks Protest ###
country_event = {
	id = freeponies.11
	immediate = {log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event freeponies.11"}
	title = freeponies.11.t
	desc = freeponies.11.d
	#picture = GFX_report_event_generic_bombers

	fire_only_once = yes

	trigger = {
		original_tag = FRE
		has_completed_focus = FRE_invite_wittenland_teachers
		has_stability < 0.5
		any_owned_state = {
			industrial_complex > 0
		}
	}

	mean_time_to_happen = {
		months = 12
	}

	option = { ## Give in to their demands - -Construction Speed + Consumer Goods 180 Days
		name = freeponies.11.a
		add_political_power = -150
		add_stability = 0.15
	}

	option = { ## They will obay - pp -stability
		name = freeponies.11.b
		add_political_power = 50
		set_country_flag = FRE_angry_monks
	}
}

### the monks destroy a factory ###
country_event = {
	id = freeponies.12
	immediate = {log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event freeponies.12"}
	title = freeponies.12.t
	desc = freeponies.12.d
	#picture = GFX_report_event_generic_bombers

	fire_only_once = yes

	trigger = {
		original_tag = FRE
		has_country_flag = FRE_angry_monks
		any_owned_state = {
			industrial_complex > 0
		}
	}

	mean_time_to_happen = {
		months = 3
	}

	option = { ## Oh no!
		name = freeponies.12.a
		random_owned_state = {
			limit = {
				industrial_complex > 0
			}
			damage_building = {
				type = industrial_complex
				damage = 0.9
			}
		}
	}
}

### Vote of No Confidence ###
country_event = {
	id = freeponies.13
	immediate = {log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event freeponies.13"}
	title = freeponies.13.t
	desc = freeponies.13.d
	#picture = GFX_report_event_generic_bombers

	fire_only_once = yes

	trigger = {
		original_tag = FRE
		has_completed_focus = FRE_begin_rapid_industrialisation
		has_stability < 0.1
	}

	mean_time_to_happen = {
		months = 2
	}

	option = { ## They're right
		name = freeponies.13.a
		add_stability = 0.25
		add_country_leader_role = {
			character = FRE_raven_cridhe_teine_nic_call
			promote_leader = yes

			country_leader = {
				desc = "POLITICS_RAVEN_NICCALL_DESC"
				expire = "1965.1.1"
				ideology = tribal_federation
				traits = { popular_leader }
			}
		}
	}

	option = { ## They will obay
		name = freeponies.13.b
		add_stability = -0.1
		set_country_flag = FRE_rebellion
	}
}

### Civil War! ###
country_event = {
	id = freeponies.14
	immediate = {log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event freeponies.14"}
	title = freeponies.14.t
	desc = freeponies.14.d
	#picture = GFX_report_event_generic_bombers

	fire_only_once = yes

	trigger = {
		original_tag = FRE
		has_completed_focus = FRE_begin_rapid_industrialisation
		has_stability < 0.01
		has_country_flag = FRE_rebellion
	}

	mean_time_to_happen = {
		months = 2
	}

	option = { ## Darn them!
		name = freeponies.14.a
		if = {
			limit = {
				NOT = { has_government = neutrality }
			}
			start_civil_war = {
				ideology = neutrality
				size = 0.6
				keep_unit_leaders = {
					1400
				}
			}
		}
		else = {
			start_civil_war = {
				ideology = democratic
				size = 0.6
			}
		}
		hidden_effect = {
			if = {
				limit = {
					has_RIV_cosmetic_tag = yes
					is_in_faction = no
				}
				drop_cosmetic_tag = yes
			}
			random_other_country = {
				limit = { original_tag = FRE }
				if = {
					limit = { is_in_faction = yes }
					RIV_set_cosmetic_tag = yes
				}
				every_other_country = {
					limit = { is_river_fed_member = yes }
					add_ai_strategy = {
						id = PREV
						type = alliance
						value = 200
					}
				}
				every_other_country = {
					limit = { is_griffon_continent_griffon_country = yes }
					add_ai_strategy = {
						id = PREV
						type = alliance
						value = -200
					}
					PREV = {
						add_ai_strategy = {
							id = PREV
							type = alliance
							value = -200
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}
}

### Dutchy's Scotts arrive ###
country_event = {
	id = freeponies.15
	immediate = {log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event freeponies.15"}
	title = freeponies.15.t
	desc = freeponies.15.d
	picture = GFX_event_medieval_tower

	fire_only_once = yes

	is_triggered_only = yes

	option = { ##  Buaidh no Bs!- Freedom or Death!!
		name = freeponies.15.a
		add_manpower = 50000
		custom_effect_tooltip = FRE_Scotts_arive_for_help_tooltip
		hidden_effect = {
			set_technology = { tech_unicorn = 1}
			set_technology = { tech_support = 1}
			load_oob = "FRE_Scotts_arive_for_help"
		}
		fix_weapon_techs = yes
	}
}

# festival check event
country_event = {
	id = freeponiesflavor.5
	immediate = {log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event freeponiesflavor.5"}
	title = freeponiesflavor.5.t
	desc = freeponiesflavor.5.d
	#picture = GFX_event_lake_city
	is_triggered_only = yes
	hidden = yes


	option = {
		name = freeponiesflavor.5.a
		trigger = {
			NOT = {
				has_idea = FRE_breezie_famin
			}
		}

		country_event = freeponiesflavor.6
		country_event = {
			id = freeponiesflavor.5
			days = 360
		}
	}

	option = {
		name = freeponiesflavor.5.b
		trigger = {
			has_idea = FRE_breezie_famin
		}

		country_event = {
			id = freeponiesflavor.5
			days = 360
		}
	}
}

# festival event

	id = freeponiesflavor.6
	immediate = {log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event freeponiesflavor.6"}
	title = freeponiesflavor.6.t
	desc = freeponiesflavor.6.d
	#picture = GFX_event_lake_city
	is_triggered_only = yes

		name = freeponiesflavor.6.a
	}
}



##################
# Train Troubles #
##################

# tribes ponies ran over by a train
country_event = {
	id = freeponiesflavor.7
	immediate = {log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event freeponiesflavor.7"}
	title = freeponiesflavor.7.t
	desc = freeponiesflavor.7.d
	#picture = GFX_event_lake_city

	is_triggered_only = yes #moved to FRE_iron_stallion

	option = {
		name = freeponiesflavor.7.a
		country_event = {
			id = freeponiesflavor.8
			days = 30
			random = 1440 #60 days
		}
	}
}

# tribes pony craftsponies losing jobs
country_event = {
	id = freeponiesflavor.8
	immediate = {log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event freeponiesflavor.8"}
	title = freeponiesflavor.8.t
	desc = freeponiesflavor.8.d
	#picture = GFX_event_lake_city

	is_triggered_only = yes

	option = {
		name = freeponiesflavor.8.a
	}
}
###########################
# turkey Events
###########################

add_namespace = generic

# President dies
country_event = {
	id = generic.1
	immediate = {log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event generic.1"}
	title = generic.1.t
	desc = {
		text = generic.1.d_neutral_good
		trigger = {
			has_government = FROM
		}
	}
	desc = {
		text = generic.1.d_bad
		trigger = {
			NOT = { has_government = FROM }
		}
	}
	picture = GFX_report_event_generic_read_write

	is_triggered_only = yes

	option = {
		name = generic.1.a
		trigger = {
			has_government = FROM
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = generic.1.b
		trigger = {
			NOT = { has_government = FROM }
		}
	}
}

# Generic request to join major Alliance
country_event = {
	id = generic.2
	immediate = {log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event generic.2"}
	title = generic.2.t
	desc = { # FROM and ROOT are Democratic
		text = generic.2.d.a
		trigger = {
			AND = {
				FROM = {
					has_government = democratic
				}
				has_government = democratic
			}
		}
	}
	desc = { # FROM and ROOT are Fascist
		text = generic.2.d.b
		trigger = {
			AND = {
				FROM = {
					has_government = fascism
				}
				has_government = fascism
			}
		}
	}
	desc = { # FROM and ROOT are Communist
		text = generic.2.d.c
		trigger = {
			AND = {
				FROM = {
					has_government = communism
				}
				has_government = communism
			}
		}
	}
	desc = { # FROM and ROOT are different ideologies
		text = generic.2.d.e
		trigger = {
			NOT = {
				AND = {
					FROM = {
						has_government = democratic
					}
					has_government = democratic
				}
				AND = {
					FROM = {
						has_government = fascism
					}
					has_government = fascism
				}
				AND = {
					FROM = {
						has_government = communism
					}
					has_government = communism
				}
			}
		}
	}
	picture = GFX_event_medieval_city_3

	immediate = {
		hidden_effect = {
			save_event_target_as = alliance_inviter
			FROM = {
				save_event_target_as = alliance_applicant
			}
		}
	}

	is_triggered_only = yes

	option = { #Agree / Both Democratic
		name = generic.2.a
		trigger = {
			AND = {
				FROM = {
					has_government = democratic
				}
				has_government = democratic
			}
		}
		ai_chance = {
			base = 100
		}
		add_to_faction = FROM
		FROM = { country_event = { id = generic.3 hours = 6 } }
		hidden_effect = {
			set_country_flag = alliance_inviter@ROOT
			FROM = { set_country_flag = alliance_applicant@ROOT }
			news_event = { id = news.289 hours = 12 }
		}
	}
	option = { #Agree / Both Fascist
		name = generic.2.b
		trigger = {
			AND = {
				FROM = {
					has_government = fascism
				}
				has_government = fascism
			}
		}
		ai_chance = {
			base = 100
		}
		add_to_faction = FROM
		FROM = { country_event = { id = generic.3 hours = 6 } }
		hidden_effect = {
			set_country_flag = alliance_inviter@ROOT
			FROM = { set_country_flag = alliance_applicant@ROOT }
			news_event = { id = news.289 hours = 12 }
		}
	}
	option = { #Agree / Both Communist
		name = generic.2.c
		trigger = {
			AND = {
				FROM = {
					has_government = communism
				}
				has_government = communism
			}
		}
		ai_chance = {
			base = 100
		}
		add_to_faction = FROM
		FROM = { country_event = { id = generic.3 hours = 6 } }
		hidden_effect = {
			set_country_flag = alliance_inviter@ROOT
			FROM = { set_country_flag = alliance_applicant@ROOT }
			news_event = { id = news.289 hours = 12 }
		}
	}
	option = { #Agree / Both different
		name = generic.2.e
		trigger = {
			NOT = {
				AND = {
					FROM = {
						has_government = democratic
					}
					has_government = democratic
				}
				AND = {
					FROM = {
						has_government = fascism
					}
					has_government = fascism
				}
				AND = {
					FROM = {
						has_government = communism
					}
					has_government = communism
				}
			}
		}
		ai_chance = {
			base = 100
		}
		add_to_faction = FROM
		FROM = { country_event = { id = generic.3 hours = 6 } }
		hidden_effect = {
			set_country_flag = alliance_inviter@ROOT
			FROM = { set_country_flag = alliance_applicant@ROOT }
			news_event = { id = news.289 hours = 12 }
		}
		FROM = {
			add_ai_strategy = {
				type = alliance
				id = ROOT
				value = 200
			}
		}
	}

	option = { #Reject
		name = generic.2.f
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 0
		}
		FROM = {
			country_event = { id = generic.4 hours = 6 }
		}
	}
}

# Generic accepted request to join major Alliance
country_event = {
	id = generic.3
	immediate = {log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event generic.3"}
	title = generic.3.t
	desc = {
		trigger = {
			NOT = {
				tag = VED
				FROM = {
					OR = {
						tag = JER
						tag = FAT
						tag = GRD
					}
				}
			}
		}
		text = generic.3.d
	}
	desc = {
		trigger = {
			tag = VED
			FROM = {
				tag = JER
			}
		}
		text = vedina.55.d
	}
	desc = {
		trigger = {
			tag = VED
			FROM = {
				tag = FAT
			}
		}
		text = vedina.59.d
	}

	desc = {
		trigger = {
			tag = VED
			FROM = {
				tag = GRD
			}
		}
		text = vedina.66.d
	}
	picture = GFX_event_medieval_city_3

	is_triggered_only = yes

	option = {
		name = generic.3.a
		trigger = {
			AND = {
				FROM = {
					has_government = democratic
				}
				has_government = democratic
			}
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = generic.3.b
		trigger = {
			AND = {
				FROM = {
					has_government = fascism
				}
				has_government = fascism
			}
		}


	}
	option = {
		name = generic.3.c
		trigger = {
			AND = {
				FROM = {
					has_government = communism
				}
				has_government = communism
			}
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = generic.3.e
		trigger = {
			NOT = {
				AND = {
					FROM = {
						has_government = democratic
					}
					has_government = democratic
				}
				AND = {
					FROM = {
						has_government = fascism
					}
					has_government = fascism
				}
				AND = {
					FROM = {
						has_government = communism
					}
					has_government = communism
				}
			}
		}
	}
}

# Generic rejected request to join major Alliance
country_event = {
	id = generic.4
	immediate = {log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event generic.4"}
	title = generic.4.t
	desc = {
		trigger = {
			NOT = {
				tag = VED
				FROM = {
					OR = {
						tag = JER
						tag = FAT
						tag = GRD
					}
				}
			}
		}
		text = generic.3.d
	}
	desc = {
		trigger = {
			tag = VED
			FROM = {
				tag = JER
			}
		}
		text = vedina.56.d
	}
	desc = {
		trigger = {
			tag = VED
			FROM = {
				tag = FAT
			}
		}
		text = vedina.60.d
	}

	desc = {
		trigger = {
			tag = VED
			FROM = {
				tag = GRD
			}
		}
		text = vedina.67.d
	}

	picture = GFX_event_medieval_city

	is_triggered_only = yes

	option = {
		name = generic.4.a
		trigger = {
			AND = {
				FROM = {
					has_government = democratic
				}
				has_government = democratic
			}
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = generic.4.b
		trigger = {
			AND = {
				FROM = {
					has_government = fascism
				}
				has_government = fascism
			}
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = generic.4.c
		trigger = {
			AND = {
				FROM = {
					has_government = communism
				}
				has_government = communism
			}
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = generic.4.e
		trigger = {
			NOT = {
				AND = {
					FROM = {
						has_government = democratic
					}
					has_government = democratic
				}
				AND = {
					FROM = {
						has_government = fascism
					}
					has_government = fascism
				}
				AND = {
					FROM = {
						has_government = communism
					}
					has_government = communism
				}
			}
		}
	}
}

# Generic invitation to join major Alliance
country_event = {
	id = generic.5
	immediate = {log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event generic.5"}
	title = generic.5.t
	desc = { # FROM and ROOT are Democratic
		text = generic.5.d.a
		trigger = {
			AND = {
				FROM = {
					has_government = democratic
				}
				has_government = democratic
			}
		}
	}
	desc = { # FROM and ROOT are Fascist
		text = generic.5.d.b
		trigger = {
			AND = {
				FROM = {
					has_government = fascism
				}
				has_government = fascism
			}
		}
	}
	desc = { # FROM and ROOT are Communist
		text = generic.5.d.c
		trigger = {
			AND = {
				FROM = {
					has_government = communism
				}
				has_government = communism
			}
		}
	}
	desc = { # FROM and ROOT are different ideologies
		text = generic.5.d.e
		trigger = {
			NOT = {
				AND = {
					FROM = {
						has_government = democratic
					}
					has_government = democratic
				}
				AND = {
					FROM = {
						has_government = fascism
					}
					has_government = fascism
				}
				AND = {
					FROM = {
						has_government = communism
					}
					has_government = communism
				}
			}
		}
	}
	picture = GFX_event_medieval_city_3

	immediate = {
		hidden_effect = {
			save_event_target_as = alliance_applicant
			FROM = {
				save_event_target_as = alliance_inviter
			}
		}
	}

	is_triggered_only = yes

	option = { #Agree / Both Democratic
		name = generic.5.a
		trigger = {
			is_in_faction = no
			AND = {
				FROM = {
					has_government = democratic
				}
				has_government = democratic
			}
		}
		ai_chance = {
			base = 100
		}
		FROM = {
			add_to_faction = ROOT
			country_event = { id = generic.6 hours = 6 }
		}
		# STG all ponies front case
		hidden_effect = {
			if = {
				limit = {
					FROM = { has_country_flag = was_in_STG_faction }
				}
				ROOT = {
					set_country_flag = was_in_STG_faction
				}
			}
		}
		add_ai_strategy = {
			type = alliance
			id = FROM
			value = 200
		}
		hidden_effect = {
			set_country_flag = alliance_applicant@ROOT
			FROM = { set_country_flag = alliance_inviter@ROOT }
			news_event = { id = news.289 hours = 12 }
		}
	}
	option = { #Agree / Both Fascist
		name = generic.5.b
		trigger = {
			is_in_faction = no
			AND = {
				FROM = {
					has_government = fascism
				}
				has_government = fascism
			}
		}
		ai_chance = {
			base = 100
		}
		FROM = {
			add_to_faction = ROOT
			country_event = { id = generic.6 hours = 6 }
		}
		# STG all ponies front case
		hidden_effect = {
			if = {
				limit = {
					FROM = { has_country_flag = was_in_STG_faction }
				}
				ROOT = {
					set_country_flag = was_in_STG_faction
				}
			}
		}
		add_ai_strategy = {
			type = alliance
			id = FROM
			value = 200
		}
		hidden_effect = {
			set_country_flag = alliance_applicant@ROOT
			FROM = { set_country_flag = alliance_inviter@ROOT }
			news_event = { id = news.289 hours = 12 }
		}
	}
	option = { #Agree / Both Communist
		name = generic.5.c
		trigger = {
			is_in_faction = no
			AND = {
				FROM = {
					has_government = communism
				}
				has_government = communism
			}
		}
		ai_chance = {
			base = 100
		}
		FROM = {
			add_to_faction = ROOT
			country_event = { id = generic.6 hours = 6 }
		}
		# STG all ponies front case
		hidden_effect = {
			if = {
				limit = {
					FROM = { has_country_flag = was_in_STG_faction }
				}
				ROOT = {
					set_country_flag = was_in_STG_faction
				}
			}
		}
		add_ai_strategy = {
			type = alliance
			id = FROM
			value = 200
		}
		hidden_effect = {
			set_country_flag = alliance_applicant@ROOT
			FROM = { set_country_flag = alliance_inviter@ROOT }
			news_event = { id = news.289 hours = 12 }
		}
	}
	option = { #Agree / Both different
		name = generic.5.e
		trigger = {
			is_in_faction = no
			NOT = {
				AND = {
					FROM = {
						has_government = democratic
					}
					has_government = democratic
				}
				AND = {
					FROM = {
						has_government = fascism
					}
					has_government = fascism
				}
				AND = {
					FROM = {
						has_government = communism
					}
					has_government = communism
				}
			}
		}
		ai_chance = {
			base = 100
		}
		FROM = {
			add_to_faction = ROOT
			country_event = { id = generic.6 hours = 6 }
		}
		# STG all ponies front case
		hidden_effect = {
			if = {
				limit = {
					FROM = { has_country_flag = was_in_STG_faction }
				}
				ROOT = {
					set_country_flag = was_in_STG_faction
				}
			}
		}
		add_ai_strategy = {
			type = alliance
			id = FROM
			value = 200
		}
		hidden_effect = {
			set_country_flag = alliance_applicant@ROOT
			FROM = { set_country_flag = alliance_inviter@ROOT }
			news_event = { id = news.289 hours = 12 }
		}
	}

	option = { #Reject
		name = generic.2.f
		trigger = {
			is_in_faction = no
		}
		ai_chance = {
			base = 0
		}
		FROM = {
			country_event = { id = generic.7 hours = 6 }
		}
	}

	option = { #Reject if in faction
		name = generic.2.g
		trigger = {
			is_in_faction = yes
		}
		FROM = {
			country_event = { id = generic.7 hours = 6 }
		}
	}
}

# Generic accepted invitation to join major Alliance
country_event = {
	id = generic.6
	immediate = {log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event generic.6"}
	title = generic.6.t
	desc = {
		trigger = {
			NOT = {
				tag = VED
				FROM = {
					tag = GRF
				}
			}
		}
		text = generic.6.d
	}
	desc = {
		trigger = {
			tag = VED
			FROM = {
				tag = GRF
			}
		}
		text = vedina.62.d
	}
	picture = GFX_event_medieval_city_3

	is_triggered_only = yes

	option = {
		name = generic.3.a
		trigger = {
			AND = {
				FROM = {
					has_government = democratic
				}
				has_government = democratic
			}
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = generic.3.b
		trigger = {
			AND = {
				FROM = {
					has_government = fascism
				}
				has_government = fascism
			}
		}


	}
	option = {
		name = generic.3.c
		trigger = {
			AND = {
				FROM = {
					has_government = communism
				}
				has_government = communism
			}
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = generic.3.e
		trigger = {
			NOT = {
				AND = {
					FROM = {
						has_government = democratic
					}
					has_government = democratic
				}
				AND = {
					FROM = {
						has_government = fascism
					}
					has_government = fascism
				}
				AND = {
					FROM = {
						has_government = communism
					}
					has_government = communism
				}
			}
		}
	}
}

# Generic rejected invitation to join major Alliance
country_event = {
	id = generic.7
	immediate = {log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event generic.7"}
	title = generic.7.t
	desc = {
		trigger = {
			NOT = {
				tag = VED
				FROM = {
					tag = GRF
				}
			}
		}
		text = generic.7.d
	}
	desc = {
		trigger = {
			tag = VED
			FROM = {
				tag = GRF
			}
		}
		text = vedina.63.d
	}

	picture = GFX_event_medieval_city

	is_triggered_only = yes

	option = {
		name = generic.7.a
		trigger = {
			AND = {
				FROM = {
					has_government = democratic
				}
				has_government = democratic
			}
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = generic.4.b
		trigger = {
			AND = {
				FROM = {
					has_government = fascism
				}
				has_government = fascism
			}
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = generic.4.c
		trigger = {
			AND = {
				FROM = {
					has_government = communism
				}
				has_government = communism
			}
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = generic.4.e
		trigger = {
			NOT = {
				AND = {
					FROM = {
						has_government = democratic
					}
					has_government = democratic
				}
				AND = {
					FROM = {
						has_government = fascism
					}
					has_government = fascism
				}
				AND = {
					FROM = {
						has_government = communism
					}
					has_government = communism
				}
			}
		}
	}
}

# Race for the Bomb success event
country_event = {
	id = generic.8
	immediate = {log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event generic.8"}
	title = generic.8.t
	desc = generic.8.d

	picture = GFX_report_event_physics_lab_01 #todo picture of Little Boy

	is_triggered_only = yes

	option = {
		name = generic.8.a
		clr_country_flag = racing_for_the_bomb
		remove_ideas = race_for_the_bomb
		add_war_support = 0.1
		every_other_country = {
			limit = {
				has_country_flag = racing_for_the_bomb
				NOT = { is_in_faction_with = ROOT }
			}
			country_event = { id = generic.9 }
		}
		every_other_country = {
			limit = {
				has_country_flag = racing_for_the_bomb
				is_in_faction_with = ROOT
			}
			country_event = { id = generic.10 }
		}
	}
}

# Race for the Bomb failure event
country_event = {
	id = generic.9
	immediate = {log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event generic.9"}
	title = generic.9.t
	desc = generic.9.d

	picture = GFX_report_event_physics_lab_01

	is_triggered_only = yes

	option = {
		name = generic.9.a
		clr_country_flag = racing_for_the_bomb
		remove_ideas = race_for_the_bomb
		add_timed_idea = { idea = race_for_the_bomb_outclassed days = 360 }
		add_stability = -0.1
	}
}

# Race for the Bomb faction member success event
country_event = {
	id = generic.10
	immediate = {log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event generic.10"}
	title = generic.10.t
	desc = generic.10.d

	picture = GFX_report_event_physics_lab_01

	is_triggered_only = yes

	option = {
		name = generic.10.a
		clr_country_flag = racing_for_the_bomb
		remove_ideas = race_for_the_bomb
		add_war_support = 0.05
	}
}

# Ideology civil war won
country_event = {
	id = generic.11
	immediate = {log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event generic.11"}
	title = generic.11.t
	desc = generic.11.d

	picture = GFX_report_event_generic_ruins

	is_triggered_only = yes

	option = {
		name = generic.11.a
		add_timed_idea = { idea = civil_war_rebuild_nation days = 180 }
		clr_country_flag = ideology_civil_war
	}
}

# Enemy attempting to destroy Suez
country_event = {
	id = generic.12
	immediate = {log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event generic.12"}
	title = generic.12.t
	desc = generic.12.d

	picture = GFX_report_event_merchant_ship_01

	is_triggered_only = yes

	option = {
		name = generic.12.a
		custom_effect_tooltip = canals_tt
	}
}

# Object to Attaches
country_event = {
	id = generic.14
	immediate = {log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event generic.14"}
	title = generic.14.t
	desc = generic.14.d

	picture = GFX_event_pony_soldiers_sunset

	is_triggered_only = yes

	# Agree - recall attache
	option = {
		name = generic.14.a
		ai_chance = {
			base = 80
			modifier = {
				factor = 1.5
				has_opinion = { target = FROM value > 50 }
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 1.5
				has_opinion = { target = FROM value > 75 }
			}
		}
		random_other_country = {
			limit = {
				has_war_with = FROM
				has_attache_from = ROOT
			}
			ROOT = {
				recall_attache = PREV
			}
			hidden_effect = {
				remove_from_attaches_arrays = yes
			}
		}
		FROM = {
			country_event = { id = generic.15 days = 1 }
		}
		clr_country_flag = object_attache_going_on
	}

	# Reject demands
	option = {
		name = generic.14.b
		ai_chance = {
			base = 20
			modifier = {
				factor = 2
				has_opinion = { target = FROM value < 0 }
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 3
				has_opinion = { target = FROM value < -20 }
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 3
				has_opinion = { target = FROM value < -50 }
			}
		}
		custom_effect_tooltip = attache_political_power_tt
		if = {
			limit = {
				NOT = { strength_ratio = { tag = FROM ratio < 3 } }
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					has_opinion = { target = FROM value > -25 }
					NOT = { has_opinion = { target = FROM value > 0 } }
				}
				add_political_power = -5
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					has_opinion = { target = FROM value > 0 }
					NOT = { has_opinion = { target = FROM value > 50 } }

				}
				add_political_power = -10
			}
			if = {
				limit = { has_opinion = { target = FROM value > 50 } }
				add_political_power = -15
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				strength_ratio = { tag = FROM ratio < 3 }
				NOT = { strength_ratio = { tag = FROM ratio < 2.5 } }
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					has_opinion = { target = FROM value > -25 }
					NOT = { has_opinion = { target = FROM value > 0 } }
				}
				add_political_power = -10
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					has_opinion = { target = FROM value > 0 }
					NOT = { has_opinion = { target = FROM value > 50 } }

				}
				add_political_power = -20
			}
			if = {
				limit = { has_opinion = { target = FROM value > 50 } }
				add_political_power = -30
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				strength_ratio = { tag = FROM ratio < 2.5 }
				NOT = { strength_ratio = { tag = FROM ratio < 2 } }
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					has_opinion = { target = FROM value > -25 }
					NOT = { has_opinion = { target = FROM value > 0 } }
				}
				add_political_power = -15
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					has_opinion = { target = FROM value > 0 }
					NOT = { has_opinion = { target = FROM value > 50 } }

				}
				add_political_power = -30
			}
			if = {
				limit = { has_opinion = { target = FROM value > 50 } }
				add_political_power = -45
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				strength_ratio = { tag = FROM ratio < 2 }
				NOT = { strength_ratio = { tag = FROM ratio < 1.5 } }
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					has_opinion = { target = FROM value > -25 }
					NOT = { has_opinion = { target = FROM value > 0 } }
				}
				add_political_power = -20
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					has_opinion = { target = FROM value > 0 }
					NOT = { has_opinion = { target = FROM value > 50 } }

				}
				add_political_power = -40
			}
			if = {
				limit = { has_opinion = { target = FROM value > 50 } }
				add_political_power = -60
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				strength_ratio = { tag = FROM ratio < 1.5 }
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					has_opinion = { target = FROM value > -25 }
					NOT = { has_opinion = { target = FROM value > 0 } }
				}
				add_political_power = -25
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					has_opinion = { target = FROM value > 0 }
					NOT = { has_opinion = { target = FROM value > 50 } }

				}
				add_political_power = -50
			}
			if = {
				limit = { has_opinion = { target = FROM value > 50 } }
				add_political_power = -75
			}
		}
		FROM = {
			add_opinion_modifier = { target = ROOT modifier = rejected_demands }
			country_event = { id = generic.16 days = 1 }
		}
		hidden_effect = {
			set_country_flag = { flag = rejected_withdrawing_attache value = 1 days = 90 }
			set_country_flag = { flag = rejected_withdrawing_attache@FROM value = 1 days = 365 }
			clr_country_flag = object_attache_going_on
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				FROM = { has_government = fascism }
				NOT = { has_government = fascism }
				fascism > 0.1
				NOT = { fascism > 0.2 }
				strength_ratio = { tag = FROM ratio < 1.2 }
			}
			custom_effect_tooltip = attache_fascism_tt
			add_stability = -0.025
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				FROM = { has_government = fascism }
				NOT = { has_government = fascism }
				fascism > 0.2
				NOT = { fascism > 0.3 }
				strength_ratio = { tag = FROM ratio < 1.2 }
			}
			custom_effect_tooltip = attache_fascism_tt
			add_stability = -0.05
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				FROM = { has_government = fascism }
				NOT = { has_government = fascism }
				fascism > 0.3
				NOT = { fascism > 0.4 }
				strength_ratio = { tag = FROM ratio < 1.2 }
			}
			custom_effect_tooltip = attache_fascism_tt
			add_stability = -0.075
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				FROM = { has_government = fascism }
				NOT = { has_government = fascism }
				fascism > 0.4
				strength_ratio = { tag = FROM ratio < 1.2 }
			}
			custom_effect_tooltip = attache_fascism_tt
			add_stability = -0.1
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				FROM = { has_government = communism }
				communism > 0.1
				NOT = { communism > 0.2 }
				strength_ratio = { tag = FROM ratio < 1.2 }
			}
			custom_effect_tooltip = attache_communism_tt
			add_stability = -0.025
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				FROM = { has_government = communism }
				NOT = { has_government = communism }
				communism > 0.2
				NOT = { communism > 0.3 }
				strength_ratio = { tag = FROM ratio < 1.2 }
			}
			custom_effect_tooltip = attache_communism_tt
			add_stability = -0.05
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				FROM = { has_government = communism }
				NOT = { has_government = communism }
				communism > 0.3
				NOT = { communism > 0.4 }
				strength_ratio = { tag = FROM ratio < 1.2 }
			}
			custom_effect_tooltip = attache_communism_tt
			add_stability = -0.075
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				FROM = { has_government = communism }
				NOT = { has_government = communism }
				communism > 0.4
				strength_ratio = { tag = FROM ratio < 1.2 }
			}
			custom_effect_tooltip = attache_communism_tt
			add_stability = -0.1
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				FROM = { has_government = democratic }
				NOT = { has_government = democratic }
				democratic > 0.1
				NOT = { democratic > 0.2 }
				strength_ratio = { tag = FROM ratio < 1.2 }
			}
			custom_effect_tooltip = attache_democratic_tt
			add_stability = -0.025
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				FROM = { has_government = democratic }
				NOT = { has_government = democratic }
				democratic > 0.2
				NOT = { democratic > 0.3 }
				strength_ratio = { tag = FROM ratio < 1.2 }
			}
			custom_effect_tooltip = attache_democratic_tt
			add_stability = -0.05
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				FROM = { has_government = democratic }
				NOT = { has_government = democratic }
				democratic > 0.3
				NOT = { democratic > 0.4 }
				strength_ratio = { tag = FROM ratio < 1.2 }
			}
			custom_effect_tooltip = attache_democratic_tt
			add_stability = -0.075
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				FROM = { has_government = democratic }
				NOT = { has_government = democratic }
				democratic > 0.4
				strength_ratio = { tag = FROM ratio < 1.2 }
			}
			custom_effect_tooltip = attache_democratic_tt
			add_stability = -0.1
		}
	}
}

# Notification event that TAG withdrew attache
country_event = {
	id = generic.15
	immediate = {log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event generic.15"}
	title = generic.15.t
	desc = generic.15.d

	picture = GFX_event_pony_soldiers_sunset

	is_triggered_only = yes

	option = {
		name = excellent
	}
}

# Notification event that TAG refused to withdraw attache
country_event = {
	id = generic.16
	immediate = {log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event generic.16"}
	title = generic.16.t
	desc = generic.16.d

	picture = GFX_event_pony_soldiers_sunset

	is_triggered_only = yes

	option = {
		name = generic.16.a
		effect_tooltip = {
			add_opinion_modifier = { target = FROM modifier = rejected_demands }
		}
	}
}

# Notification event that leader has gotten sick
unit_leader_event = {
	id = generic.17
	immediate = {log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event generic.17"}
	title = generic.17.t
	desc = generic.17.d

	picture = GFX_event_pony_trench

	is_triggered_only = yes

	immediate = {
		hidden_effect = {
			FROM = {
				set_unit_leader_flag = {
					flag = recently_sick
					value = 1
					days = 180
				}
			}
		}
	}

	option = {
		name = unfortunate
		effect_tooltip = {
			FROM = {
				add_timed_unit_leader_trait = {
					trait = sick
					days = 30
				}
			}
		}
	}
}

		}

# Notification event that FROM has sent industrial support
country_event = {
	id = generic.19
	title = generic.19.t
	desc = generic.19.d

	picture = GFX_report_event_generic_factory

	is_triggered_only = yes

	option = {
		name = excellent
		effect_tooltip = {
			add_offsite_building = { type = arms_factory level = 2 }
		}
	}
}

#Become a puppet
country_event = {
	id = generic.20
	title = generic.20.t
	desc = {
		text = generic.20.d_friends
		trigger = {
			has_opinion = {
				target = FROM
				value = 150
			}
		}
	}
	desc = {
		text = generic.20.d_enemies
		trigger = {
			NOT = {
				has_opinion = {
					target = FROM
					value = 150
				}
			}
		}
	}
	picture = GFX_report_event_generic_read_write

	is_triggered_only = yes

	option = {
		name = generic.20.a
		trigger = {
			NOT = {
				has_opinion = {
					target = FROM
					value = 150
				}
			}
		}
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 20
			modifier = {
				threat > 0.2
				factor = 2
			}
			modifier = {
				is_in_faction = no
				factor = 2
			}
			modifier = {
				is_in_faction_with = FROM
				factor = 2
			}
			modifier = {
				is_in_faction = yes
				NOT = { is_in_faction_with = FROM }
				factor = 0.5
			}
		}
		effect_tooltip = {
			FROM = { puppet = ROOT }
			if = {
				limit = {
					FROM = { is_in_faction = yes }
				}
				FROM = {
					var:faction_leader = {
						add_to_faction = ROOT
					}
				}
			}
		}
		hidden_effect = {
			FROM = { country_event = { id = generic.21 hours = 6 } }
		}
	}

	option = {
		name = generic.20.b
		trigger = {
			has_opinion = {
				target = FROM
				value = 150
			}
		}
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 25
			modifier = {
				threat > 0.2
				factor = 2
			}
			modifier = {
				is_in_faction = no
				factor = 2
			}
			modifier = {
				is_in_faction_with = FROM
				factor = 2
			}
			modifier = {
				is_in_faction = yes
				NOT = { is_in_faction_with = FROM }
				factor = 0.5
			}
		}
		effect_tooltip = {
			FROM = { puppet = ROOT }
			if = {
				limit = {
					FROM = { is_in_faction = yes }
				}
				FROM = {
					var:faction_leader = {
						add_to_faction = ROOT
					}
				}
			}
		}
		hidden_effect = {
			FROM = { country_event = { id = generic.21 hours = 6 } }
		}
	}

	option = {
		name = generic.20.c
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 30
			modifier = {
				is_in_faction = yes
				NOT = { is_in_faction_with = FROM }
				factor = 2
			}
			modifier = {
				threat < 0.2
				factor = 2
			}
		}
		effect_tooltip = {
			FROM = {
				create_wargoal = {
					type = puppet_wargoal_focus
					target = ROOT
				}
			}
		}
		hidden_effect = {
			FROM = { country_event = { id = generic.22 hours = 6 } }
		}
	}

}

#Became puppet
country_event = {
	id = generic.21
	title = generic.21.t
	desc = generic.21.d
	picture = GFX_report_event_generic_read_write

	is_triggered_only = yes

	option = {
		name = generic.21.a
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 1
		}
		ROOT = { puppet = FROM }
		if = {
			limit = {
				ROOT = { is_in_faction = yes }
			}
			var:faction_leader = {
				add_to_faction = FROM
			}
		}
	}

}

#Denied puppet

	id = generic.22

	desc = generic.22.d
	picture = GFX_report_event_generic_read_write

	is_triggered_only = yes

	option = {
		name = generic.22.a
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 1
		}
		ROOT = {
			create_wargoal = {
				type = puppet_wargoal_focus
				target = FROM
			}
		}
	}

}

# generic event for demanding territory
country_event = {
	id = generic.23
	title = generic.23.t
	desc = generic.23.d

	picture = GFX_report_event_czech_soldiers_01

	is_triggered_only = yes

	option = {
		name = generic.23.a
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 90
			modifier = { # If they stand a chance they will fight
				factor = 0
				strength_ratio = {
					tag = FROM
					ratio > 0.75
				}
				NOT = {
					any_neighbor_country = {
						NOT = { tag = FROM }
						is_in_faction_with = FROM
					}
				}
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0 #if you lead a faction, fight
				is_faction_leader = yes
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0.5 #if you are in a faction, maybe fight
				is_faction_leader = no
				is_in_faction = yes
			}
			modifier = { # Increase it again if other bordering nations are in the enemy faction
				any_neighbor_country = {
					NOT = { tag = FROM }
					is_in_faction_with = FROM
				}
				factor = 2.0
			}
		}
		effect_tooltip = {
			FROM = { transfer_state = event_target:demanded_prov_target }
			if = {
				limit = {
					event_target:demanded_prov_target = { has_state_flag = give_core_to_state_flag }
				}
			event_target:demanded_prov_target = { add_core_of = FROM }
			}
		}
		hidden_effect = {
			FROM = { country_event = generic.24 }
		}
	}

	option = {
		name = generic.23.b
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 10
			modifier = {
				factor = 0.5
				strength_ratio = {
					tag = FROM
					ratio < 0.5
				}
			}
		}
		custom_effect_tooltip = maybe_war_tt
		hidden_effect = {
			FROM = { country_event = generic.25 }
		}
	}
}

# accepted demands
country_event = {
	id = generic.24
	title = generic.24.t
	desc = generic.24.d

	picture = GFX_report_event_czech_soldiers_01

	is_triggered_only = yes

	option = {
		name = excellent
		THIS = { transfer_state = event_target:demanded_prov_target }
		if = {
			limit = {
				event_target:demanded_prov_target = { has_state_flag = give_core_to_state_flag }
			}
			event_target:demanded_prov_target = {
				add_core_of = THIS
				clr_state_flag = give_core_to_state_flag
			}
		}
		hidden_effect = { clear_global_event_target = demanded_prov_target }
	}
}

# accepted demands
country_event = {
	id = generic.25
	title = generic.25.t
	desc = generic.25.d

	picture = GFX_report_event_czech_soldiers_01

	is_triggered_only = yes

	option = {
		name = generic.25.a
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 90
		}
		create_wargoal = {
			type = annex_everything
			target = FROM
		}
		hidden_effect = { clear_global_event_target = demanded_prov_target }
	}
}

# set AI strategies
country_event = {
	id = generic.26
	hidden = yes
	is_triggered_only = yes

	trigger = {
		NOT = {
			has_global_flag = generic_26_fired
		}
	}

	immediate = {
		if = {
			limit = {
				NOT = {
					has_global_flag = generic_26_fired
				}
			}
			set_AI_strategies_on_every_possible_country = yes
			set_global_flag = { flag = generic_26_fired value = 1 days = 1 }
			country_event = { id = generic.27 hours = 1 }
		}
	}
}

country_event = {
	id = generic.27
	hidden = yes
	is_triggered_only = yes

	immediate = {
		clr_global_flag = generic_26_fired
	}
}
add_namespace = griffonian
#country_event = { #History
	#	id = griffonian.0

	#	title = griffonian.0.t
	#	desc = griffonian.0.d
	#	picture = GFX_event_griffon_mountain
	#	trigger = {
		#		is_griffon_continent_country = yes
		#		date > 1007.1.1
		#	}
	#	mean_time_to_happen = { days = 1 }
	#	fire_only_once = yes
	#	option = {
		#		name = griffonian.0.a
		#	}
	#}
country_event = {
	id = griffonian.1
	immediate = {log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event griffonian.1"}
	hidden = yes
	trigger = {
		is_subject_of = GRD
		GRD = {
			OR = {
				original_tag = GRI
				has_cosmetic_tag = GRIF_EMPIRE
				has_cosmetic_tag = FBK_GRI
				has_cosmetic_tag = YAL_grover_empire
				has_cosmetic_tag = YAL_Grover_Lord_of_Yale
			}
		}
		is_griffon_continent_griffon_country = yes
		NOT = {
			has_cosmetic_tag = GRI_SUBJECT
			has_cosmetic_tag = SRS_GRI_puppet
			has_cosmetic_tag = FAT_GRI_puppet
			has_cosmetic_tag = FAL_GRI_puppet
			has_cosmetic_tag = SIC_GRI_puppet
			has_cosmetic_tag = GRU_GRI_puppet
			has_cosmetic_tag = FLO_GRI_puppet
			has_cosmetic_tag = BRF_GRI_puppet
			has_cosmetic_tag = KAT_GRI_puppet
			has_cosmetic_tag = TRD_GRI_puppet
			has_cosmetic_tag = STW_GRI_puppet
			has_cosmetic_tag = HAU_GRI_puppet
			has_cosmetic_tag = MIT_GRI_puppet
			has_cosmetic_tag = MNC_GRI_puppet
			has_cosmetic_tag = YAL_GRI_puppet
			has_cosmetic_tag = PYT_GRI_puppet
			has_cosmetic_tag = FEA_PvdA_old_flag_GRI_Puppet
			has_cosmetic_tag = FBK_GRI
		}
	}
	is_triggered_only = yes
	option = {
		if = {
			limit = {
				original_tag = FEA
				has_cosmetic_tag = FEA_PvdA_old_flag
			}
			set_cosmetic_tag = FEA_PvdA_old_flag_GRI_Puppet
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				original_tag = SRS
			}
			set_cosmetic_tag = SRS_GRI_puppet
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				original_tag = FAT
			}
			set_cosmetic_tag = FAT_GRI_puppet
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				original_tag = SIC
			}
			set_cosmetic_tag = SIC_GRI_puppet
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				original_tag = GRU
			}
			set_cosmetic_tag = GRU_GRI_puppet
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				original_tag = FLO
			}
			set_cosmetic_tag = FLO_GRI_puppet
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				original_tag = BRF
			}
			set_cosmetic_tag = BRF_GRI_puppet
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				original_tag = KAT
			}
			set_cosmetic_tag = KAT_GRI_puppet
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				original_tag = TRD
			}
			set_cosmetic_tag = TRD_GRI_puppet
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				original_tag = STW
			}
			set_cosmetic_tag = STW_GRI_puppet
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				original_tag = FAL
			}
			set_cosmetic_tag = FAL_GRI_puppet
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				original_tag = HAU
			}
			set_cosmetic_tag = HAU_GRI_puppet
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				original_tag = MIT
			}
			set_cosmetic_tag = MIT_GRI_puppet
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				original_tag = MNC
			}
			set_cosmetic_tag = MNC_GRI_puppet
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				original_tag = YAL
			}
			set_cosmetic_tag = YAL_GRI_puppet
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				original_tag = PYT
			}
			set_cosmetic_tag = PYT_GRI_puppet
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = {
				NOT = {
					original_tag = MNC
					original_tag = MIT
					original_tag = HAU
					original_tag = FAL
					original_tag = STW
					original_tag = TRD
					original_tag = KAT
					original_tag = BRF
					original_tag = FLO
					original_tag = GRU
					original_tag = SIC
					original_tag = FAT
					original_tag = SRS
					original_tag = YAL
					original_tag = PYT
				}
			}
			set_cosmetic_tag = GRI_SUBJECT
		}
	}
}

country_event = { #Change of govt generic griffon tree fascism
	id = griffonian.3
	immediate = {log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event griffonian.3"}
	title = griffonian.3.t
	desc = {
		text = griffonian.3.d_change
		trigger = { is_griffon_race = yes NOT = { has_government = fascism } }
	}
	desc = {
		text = griffonian.3.d
		trigger = { is_griffon_race = yes has_government = fascism }
	}
	desc = {
		text = griffonian.3.d_ng_change
		trigger = { is_griffon_race = no NOT = { has_government = fascism } }
	}
	desc = {
		text = griffonian.3.d_ng
		trigger = { is_griffon_race = no has_government = fascism }
	}
	picture = GFX_event_griffon_mountain
	is_triggered_only = yes
	option = {
		name = griffonian.3.a
		trigger = { NOT = { has_government = fascism } }
		add_political_power = -150
		set_politics = { ruling_party = fascism elections_allowed = no }
	}
	option = {
		name = griffonian.3.b
		trigger = { has_government = fascism }
		add_political_power = 100
	}
}

country_event = {
	id = griffonian.6
	immediate = {log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event griffonian.6"}
	title = griffonian.6.t
	desc = griffonian.6.d
	picture = GFX_event_griffon_mountain
	fire_only_once = yes
	trigger = {
		NOT = { tag = GRW }
		is_major = yes
		GRW = {
			exists = yes
			OR = {
				has_added_tension_amount > 20
				has_country_flag = { flag = prywhen_aggressiveness value > 5 }
			}
		}
		389 = { is_controlled_by = GRW }
		#NOT = { has_country_flag = GRW_event_fired }
		NOT = { has_government = communism }
		is_griffon_continent_griffon_country = yes

	}
	mean_time_to_happen = { days = 1 }
	option = {
		name = griffonian.6.a
		create_wargoal = { target = GRW type = annex_everything }
		#set_country_flag = GRW_event_fired
		set_country_flag = wants_to_contain_GRW
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 70
			modifier = {
				factor = 0.5
				has_government = democratic
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				has_government = communism
			}
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = griffonian.6.b
		add_political_power = 100
		#set_country_flag = GRW_event_fired
		ai_chance = { factor = 30 }
	}
}
country_event = {
	id = griffonian.7
	immediate = {log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event griffonian.7"}
	title = griffonian.7.t
	desc = griffonian.7.d
	picture = GFX_event_griffon_mountain

	trigger = {
		NOT = {
			tag = GRW
			is_in_faction_with = GRW
			is_subject_of = GRW
		}
		GRW = {
			exists = yes
			OR = {
				has_war_with = GRD
				has_war_with = JER
				has_war_with = WNG
			}
		}
		is_subject = no
		is_neighbor_of = GRW
		NOT = { has_war_with = GRW }
		NOT = { has_government = communism }
		389 = { is_controlled_by = GRW }
		NOT = { has_country_flag = GRW_event_fired2 }
		is_griffon_continent_griffon_country = yes
	}
	mean_time_to_happen = { days = 2 }
	option = {
		name = griffonian.7.a
		create_wargoal = { target = GRW type = annex_everything }
		set_country_flag = GRW_event_fired2
		set_country_flag = wants_to_contain_GRW
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 5
			modifier = {
				factor = 2
				has_government = fascism
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 5
				is_major = yes
			}
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = griffonian.7.b
		add_political_power = 50
		set_country_flag = GRW_event_fired2
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 10
			modifier = {
				factor = 20
				has_government = communism
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 5
				has_government = democratic
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 3
				is_major = no
			}
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = griffonian.7.c
		trigger = {
			has_government = communism
			is_major = no
			is_subject = no
		}
		GRW = { country_event = generic.2 }
		set_country_flag = GRW_event_fired2
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 200
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				OR = {
					is_major = yes
					is_in_faction = yes
					owns_state = 382
					has_opinion = {
						target = GRW
						value < 50
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}
}


country_event = { ## Support the neighbours
	id = griffonian.8
	immediate = {log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event griffonian.8"}
	title = griffonian.8.t
	desc = griffonian.8.d
	picture = GFX_event_griffon_soldier

	trigger = {
		OR = {
			tag = LUS
			tag = GRY
			tag = GRU
		}
		NOT = { has_war_with = GRW }
		NOT = { has_government = communism }
		NOT = { has_country_flag = accepted_prywhen_communists }
		GRW = {
			OR = {
				has_offensive_war_with = LUS
				has_offensive_war_with = GRY
				has_offensive_war_with = GRU
			}
		}
	}
	fire_only_once = yes
	option = { # attack
		name = griffonian.8.a # yes
		create_wargoal = { type = puppet_wargoal_focus target = GRW }
		add_political_power = -100
	}
	option = { # attack and create faction
		name = griffonian.8.b # yes
		trigger = {
			is_in_faction = no
		}
		create_wargoal = { type = puppet_wargoal_focus target = GRW }
		create_faction_from_template = faction_template_Anti_communist_league
		every_country = {
			limit = {
				OR = {
					tag = LUS
					tag = GRY
					tag = GRU
				}
				has_war_with = GRW
				is_in_faction = no
			}
			add_to_faction = PREV
		}
		add_political_power = -130
	}
	option = { # stay out of this
		name = griffonian.8.c # yes
		add_political_power = 100
	}
}
country_event = { ## fighting prywhen flag
	id = griffonian.9
	immediate = {log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event griffonian.9"}
	hidden = yes
	trigger = {
		OR = {
			tag = GRY
			tag = GRU
			tag = LUS
		}
		has_war_with = GRW
	}
	fire_only_once = yes
	option = {
		set_country_flag = is_fighting_prywhen
	}
}

country_event = { ## Herzland country proposes alliance
	id = griffonian.10
	immediate = {log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event griffonian.10"}
	is_triggered_only = yes
	title = griffonian.10.t
	desc = griffonian.10.d
	picture = GFX_event_griffon_diplomacy
	option = {
		name = griffonian.10.a
		give_guarantee = FROM
		give_military_access = FROM
		FROM = {
			country_event = {
				id = griffonian.11
				days = 1
			}
		}
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 1
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = griffonian.10.b
		FROM = {
			country_event = {
				id = griffonian.12
				days = 1
			}
		}
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 0
		}
	}
}

country_event = { ## Poverty Removal 1
	id = griffonian.999
	immediate = {log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event griffonian.999"}
	title = griffonian.999.t
	desc = griffonian.999.d
	picture = GFX_event_griffon_mountain

	is_triggered_only = yes

	fire_only_once = yes
	option = {
		name = griffonian.999.a
		decrease_poverty = yes
		hidden_effect = { country_event = { days = 219 id = griffonian.998 } } }
}

country_event = { #Cosmetic tag removal
	id = griffonian.1001
	immediate = {log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event griffonian.1001"}
	hidden = yes

	trigger = {
		has_country_flag = holds_griffon_capital
		NOT = { owns_state = 382 }
	}
	mean_time_to_happen = { days = 2 }
	option = {
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_puppet_cosmetic_flag = no
			}
			drop_cosmetic_tag = yes
			reapply_secondary_cosmetic_tags = yes
		}
		clr_country_flag = holds_griffon_capital
		if = {
			limit = {
				OR = {
					GRD = {
						exists = no
					}
					tag = GRD
				}
			}
			GRI = {
				save_global_event_target_as = griffonian_empire
				set_variable = { global.griffonian_empire_var = THIS }
			}
		}
	}
}

#fighter competition - initial choice for Country
country_event = {
	id = griffonian.150
	immediate = {log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event griffonian.150"}
	title = griffonian.150.t
	desc = griffonian.150.desc
	picture = GFX_report_event_fighters

	is_triggered_only = yes

	option = {# light fighter
		name = griffonian.150.a
		trigger = {
			OR = {
				GRI = {
					is_available_fighter_ROOT = yes
				}
				JER = {
					is_available_fighter_ROOT = yes
				}
				WNG = {
					is_available_fighter_ROOT = yes
				}
				LCT = {
					is_available_fighter_ROOT = yes
				}
				event_target:equestria = {
					is_available_fighter_ROOT = yes
				}
			}
		}
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 50
		}
		country_event = griffonian.151

	}

	option = {# heavy fighter
		name = griffonian.150.b
		trigger = {
			OR = {
				GRI = {
					is_available_heavy_fighter_ROOT = yes
				}
				JER = {
					is_available_heavy_fighter_ROOT = yes
				}
				WNG = {
					is_available_heavy_fighter_ROOT = yes
				}
				LCT = {
					is_available_heavy_fighter_ROOT = yes
				}
				event_target:equestria = {
					is_available_heavy_fighter_ROOT = yes
				}
			}
		}
		country_event = griffonian.152
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 50
		}
	}
}

#Fighter competition - Country is looking for a light fighter
country_event = {
	id = griffonian.151
	immediate = {log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event griffonian.151"}
	title = griffonian.151.t
	desc = {
		text = griffonian.151.desc_light_fighter
		trigger = {
			NOT = {
				has_country_flag = GRI_fighter_refused
				has_country_flag = RIV_fighter_refused
				has_country_flag = EQS_fighter_refused
				has_country_flag = JER_fighter_refused
				has_country_flag = WNG_fighter_refused
			}
		}
	}
	desc = {
		text = griffonian.151.desc_light_fighter_refused
		trigger = {
			OR = {
				has_country_flag = GRI_fighter_refused
				has_country_flag = RIV_fighter_refused
				has_country_flag = EQS_fighter_refused
				has_country_flag = JER_fighter_refused
				has_country_flag = WNG_fighter_refused
			}
		}
	}
	picture = GFX_report_event_fighters

	is_triggered_only = yes

	option = {# Select Empire Plane
		name = griffonian.151.a
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 30
			modifier = {
				is_in_faction_with = GRI
				factor = 10
			}
			modifier = {
				GRI = { has_government = ROOT }
				factor = 2
			}
		}
		trigger = {
			if = {
				limit = {
					has_dlc = "By Blood Alone"
				}
				OR = {
					AND = {
						GRI = { has_tech = iw_small_airframe}
						ROOT = { NOT = { has_tech = iw_small_airframe } }
					}
					AND = {
						GRI = { has_tech = basic_small_airframe}
						ROOT = { NOT = { has_tech = basic_small_airframe } }
					}
					AND = {
						GRI = { has_tech = improved_small_airframe}
						ROOT = { NOT = { has_tech = improved_small_airframe } }
					}
				}
			}
			else = {
				OR = {
					AND = {
						GRI = { has_tech = fighter1}
						ROOT = { NOT = { has_tech = fighter1 } }
					}
					AND = {
						GRI = { has_tech = fighter2}
						ROOT = { NOT = { has_tech = fighter2 } }
					}
					AND = {
						GRI = { has_tech = fighter3}
						ROOT = { NOT = { has_tech = fighter3 } }
					}
				}
			}
			NOT = { has_war_with = GRI }
			NOT = { has_country_flag = GRI_fighter_refused }
		}
		GRI = { country_event = griffonian.153 }
	}

	option = {# select Wingbardian plane
		name = griffonian.151.b
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 30
			modifier = {
				is_in_faction_with = WNG
				factor = 10
			}
			modifier = {
				WNG = { has_government = ROOT }
				factor = 2
			}
		}
		trigger = {
			if = {
				limit = {
					has_dlc = "By Blood Alone"
				}
				OR = {
					AND = {
						WNG = { has_tech = iw_small_airframe}
						ROOT = { NOT = { has_tech = iw_small_airframe } }
					}
					AND = {
						WNG = { has_tech = basic_small_airframe}
						ROOT = { NOT = { has_tech = basic_small_airframe } }
					}
					AND = {
						WNG = { has_tech = improved_small_airframe}
						ROOT = { NOT = { has_tech = improved_small_airframe } }
					}
				}
			}
			else = {
				OR = {
					AND = {
						WNG = { has_tech = fighter1}
						ROOT = { NOT = { has_tech = fighter1 } }
					}
					AND = {
						WNG = { has_tech = fighter2}
						ROOT = { NOT = { has_tech = fighter2 } }
					}
					AND = {
						WNG = { has_tech = fighter3}
						ROOT = { NOT = { has_tech = fighter3 } }
					}
				}
			}
			NOT = { has_war_with = WNG }
			NOT = { has_country_flag = WNG_fighter_refused }
		}
		WNG = { country_event = griffonian.153 }
	}

	option = {# select Aquilian plane
		name = griffonian.151.c
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 30
			modifier = {
				is_in_faction_with = JER
				factor = 10
			}
			modifier = {
				JER = { has_government = ROOT }
				factor = 2
			}
		}
		trigger = {
			if = {
				limit = {
					has_dlc = "By Blood Alone"
				}
				OR = {
					AND = {
						JER = { has_tech = iw_small_airframe}
						ROOT = { NOT = { has_tech = iw_small_airframe } }
					}
					AND = {
						JER = { has_tech = basic_small_airframe}
						ROOT = { NOT = { has_tech = basic_small_airframe } }
					}
					AND = {
						JER = { has_tech = improved_small_airframe}
						ROOT = { NOT = { has_tech = improved_small_airframe } }
					}
				}
			}
			else = {
				OR = {
					AND = {
						JER = { has_tech = fighter1}
						ROOT = { NOT = { has_tech = fighter1 } }
					}
					AND = {
						JER = { has_tech = fighter2}
						ROOT = { NOT = { has_tech = fighter2 } }
					}
					AND = {
						JER = { has_tech = fighter3}
						ROOT = { NOT = { has_tech = fighter3 } }
					}
				}
			}
			NOT = { has_war_with = JER }
			NOT = { has_country_flag = JER_fighter_refused }

		}
		JER = { country_event = griffonian.153 }
	}
	option = {# select River Fed plane
		name = griffonian.151.g
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 30
			modifier = {
				is_river_fed_member = yes
				factor = 10
			}
			modifier = {
				is_in_faction_with = LCT
				factor = 10
			}
			modifier = {
				LCT = { has_government = ROOT }
				factor = 2
			}
		}
		trigger = {
			if = {
				limit = {
					has_dlc = "By Blood Alone"
				}
				OR = {
					AND = {
						LCT = { has_tech = iw_small_airframe}
						ROOT = { NOT = { has_tech = iw_small_airframe } }
					}
					AND = {
						LCT = { has_tech = basic_small_airframe}
						ROOT = { NOT = { has_tech = basic_small_airframe } }
					}
					AND = {
						LCT = { has_tech = improved_small_airframe}
						ROOT = { NOT = { has_tech = improved_small_airframe } }
					}
				}
			}
			else = {
				OR = {
					AND = {
						LCT = { has_tech = fighter1}
						ROOT = { NOT = { has_tech = fighter1 } }
					}
					AND = {
						LCT = { has_tech = fighter2}
						ROOT = { NOT = { has_tech = fighter2 } }
					}
					AND = {
						LCT = { has_tech = fighter3}
						ROOT = { NOT = { has_tech = fighter3 } }
					}
				}
			}
			NOT = { has_war_with = LCT }
			NOT = { has_country_flag = RIV_fighter_refused }
		}
		LCT = { country_event = griffonian.153 }
	}
	option = {# select Equestrian plane
		name = griffonian.151.e
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 30
			modifier = {
				is_in_faction_with = event_target:equestria
				factor = 10
			}
			modifier = {
				event_target:equestria = { has_government = ROOT }
				factor = 2
			}
		}
		trigger = {
			if = {
				limit = {
					has_dlc = "By Blood Alone"
				}
				OR = {
					AND = {
						event_target:equestria = { has_tech = iw_small_airframe}
						ROOT = { NOT = { has_tech = iw_small_airframe } }
					}
					AND = {
						event_target:equestria = { has_tech = basic_small_airframe}
						ROOT = { NOT = { has_tech = basic_small_airframe } }
					}
					AND = {
						event_target:equestria = { has_tech = improved_small_airframe}
						ROOT = { NOT = { has_tech = improved_small_airframe } }
					}
				}
			}
			else = {
				OR = {
					AND = {
						event_target:equestria = { has_tech = fighter1}
						ROOT = { NOT = { has_tech = fighter1 } }
					}
					AND = {
						event_target:equestria = { has_tech = fighter2}
						ROOT = { NOT = { has_tech = fighter2 } }
					}
					AND = {
						event_target:equestria = { has_tech = fighter3}
						ROOT = { NOT = { has_tech = fighter3 } }
					}
				}
			}
			NOT = { has_war_with = event_target:equestria }
			NOT = { has_country_flag = EQS_fighter_refused }
			NOT = { #to prevent overflow issues
				AND = {
					GRI = {
						is_available_fighter_ROOT = yes
					}
					JER = {
						is_available_fighter_ROOT = yes
					}
					WNG = {
						is_available_fighter_ROOT = yes
					}
					LCT = {
						is_available_fighter_ROOT = yes
					}
				}
			}
		}
		event_target:equestria = { country_event = griffonian.153 }
	}
	option = {# failsafe
		name = griffonian.151.f
		trigger = {
			OR = {
				has_country_flag = GRI_fighter_refused
				has_country_flag = WNG_fighter_refused
				has_country_flag = RIV_fighter_refused
				has_country_flag = JER_fighter_refused
				has_country_flag = EQS_fighter_refused
			}
		}
		air_experience = 50
	}

}

#Fighter competition - Country is looking for a heavy fighter
country_event = {
	id = griffonian.152
	immediate = {log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event griffonian.152"}
	title = griffonian.152.t
	desc = {
		text = griffonian.152.desc_heavy_fighter
		trigger = {
			NOT = {
				has_country_flag = GRI_heavy_fighter_refused
				has_country_flag = RIV_heavy_fighter_refused
				has_country_flag = EQS_heavy_fighter_refused
				has_country_flag = JER_heavy_fighter_refused
				has_country_flag = WNG_heavy_fighter_refused
			}
		}
	}
	desc = {
		text = griffonian.152.desc_heavy_fighter_refused
		trigger = {
			OR = {
				has_country_flag = GRI_heavy_fighter_refused
				has_country_flag = RIV_heavy_fighter_refused
				has_country_flag = EQS_heavy_fighter_refused
				has_country_flag = JER_heavy_fighter_refused
				has_country_flag = WNG_heavy_fighter_refused
			}
		}
	}
	picture = GFX_report_event_fighters

	is_triggered_only = yes

	option = {# Select Empire Plane
		name = griffonian.151.a
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 30
			modifier = {
				is_in_faction_with = GRI
				factor = 10
			}
			modifier = {
				GRI = { has_government = ROOT }
				factor = 2
			}
		}
		trigger = {
			if = {
				limit = {
					has_dlc = "By Blood Alone"
				}
				OR = {
					AND = {
						GRI = { has_tech = iw_medium_airframe}
						ROOT = { NOT = { has_tech = iw_medium_airframe } }
					}
					AND = {
						GRI = { has_tech = basic_medium_airframe}
						ROOT = { NOT = { has_tech = basic_medium_airframe } }
					}
					AND = {
						GRI = { has_tech = improved_medium_airframe}
						ROOT = { NOT = { has_tech = improved_medium_airframe } }
					}
				}
			}
			else = {
				OR = {
					AND = {
						GRI = { has_tech = heavy_fighter1}
						ROOT = { NOT = { has_tech = heavy_fighter1 } }
					}
					AND = {
						GRI = { has_tech = heavy_fighter2}
						ROOT = { NOT = { has_tech = heavy_fighter2 } }
					}
					AND = {
						GRI = { has_tech = heavy_fighter3}
						ROOT = { NOT = { has_tech = heavy_fighter3 } }
					}
				}
			}
			NOT = { has_war_with = GRI }
			NOT = { has_country_flag = GRI_heavy_fighter_refused }
		}
		GRI = { country_event = griffonian.154 }
	}

	option = {# select Wingbardian plane
		name = griffonian.151.b
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 30
			modifier = {
				is_in_faction_with = WNG
				factor = 10
			}
			modifier = {
				WNG = { has_government = ROOT }
				factor = 2
			}
		}
		trigger = {
			if = {
				limit = {
					has_dlc = "By Blood Alone"
				}
				OR = {
					AND = {
						WNG = { has_tech = iw_medium_airframe}
						ROOT = { NOT = { has_tech = iw_medium_airframe } }
					}
					AND = {
						WNG = { has_tech = basic_medium_airframe}
						ROOT = { NOT = { has_tech = basic_medium_airframe } }
					}
					AND = {
						WNG = { has_tech = improved_medium_airframe}
						ROOT = { NOT = { has_tech = improved_medium_airframe } }
					}
				}
			}
			else = {
				OR = {
					AND = {
						WNG = { has_tech = heavy_fighter1}
						ROOT = { NOT = { has_tech = heavy_fighter1 } }
					}
					AND = {
						WNG = { has_tech = heavy_fighter2}
						ROOT = { NOT = { has_tech = heavy_fighter2 } }
					}
					AND = {
						WNG = { has_tech = heavy_fighter3}
						ROOT = { NOT = { has_tech = heavy_fighter3 } }
					}
				}
			}
			NOT = { has_war_with = WNG }
			NOT = { has_country_flag = WNG_heavy_fighter_refused }
		}
		WNG = { country_event = griffonian.154 }
	}

	option = {# select Aquilian plane
		name = griffonian.151.c
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 30
			modifier = {
				is_in_faction_with = JER
				factor = 10
			}
			modifier = {
				JER = { has_government = ROOT }
				factor = 2
			}
		}
		trigger = {
			if = {
				limit = {
					has_dlc = "By Blood Alone"
				}
				OR = {
					AND = {
						JER = { has_tech = iw_medium_airframe}
						ROOT = { NOT = { has_tech = iw_medium_airframe } }
					}
					AND = {
						JER = { has_tech = basic_medium_airframe}
						ROOT = { NOT = { has_tech = basic_medium_airframe } }
					}
					AND = {
						JER = { has_tech = improved_medium_airframe}
						ROOT = { NOT = { has_tech = improved_medium_airframe } }
					}
				}
			}
			else = {
				OR = {
					AND = {
						JER = { has_tech = heavy_fighter1}
						ROOT = { NOT = { has_tech = heavy_fighter1 } }
					}
					AND = {
						JER = { has_tech = heavy_fighter2}
						ROOT = { NOT = { has_tech = heavy_fighter2 } }
					}
					AND = {
						JER = { has_tech = heavy_fighter3}
						ROOT = { NOT = { has_tech = heavy_fighter3 } }
					}
				}
			}
			NOT = { has_war_with = JER }
			NOT = { has_country_flag = JER_heavy_fighter_refused }

		}
		JER = { country_event = griffonian.154 }
	}
	option = {# select River Fed plane
		name = griffonian.151.g
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 30
			modifier = {
				is_river_fed_member = yes
				factor = 10
			}
			modifier = {
				is_in_faction_with = LCT
				factor = 10
			}
			modifier = {
				LCT = { has_government = ROOT }
				factor = 2
			}
		}
		trigger = {
			if = {
				limit = {
					has_dlc = "By Blood Alone"
				}
				OR = {
					AND = {
						LCT = { has_tech = iw_medium_airframe}
						ROOT = { NOT = { has_tech = iw_medium_airframe } }
					}
					AND = {
						LCT = { has_tech = basic_medium_airframe}
						ROOT = { NOT = { has_tech = basic_medium_airframe } }
					}
					AND = {
						LCT = { has_tech = improved_medium_airframe}
						ROOT = { NOT = { has_tech = improved_medium_airframe } }
					}
				}
			}
			else = {
				OR = {
					AND = {
						LCT = { has_tech = heavy_fighter1}
						ROOT = { NOT = { has_tech = heavy_fighter1 } }
					}
					AND = {
						LCT = { has_tech = heavy_fighter2}
						ROOT = { NOT = { has_tech = heavy_fighter2 } }
					}
					AND = {
						LCT = { has_tech = heavy_fighter3}
						ROOT = { NOT = { has_tech = heavy_fighter3 } }
					}
				}
			}
			NOT = { has_war_with = LCT }
			NOT = { has_country_flag = RIV_heavy_fighter_refused }
		}
		LCT = { country_event = griffonian.154 }
	}
	option = {# select Equestrian plane
		name = griffonian.151.e
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 30
			modifier = {
				is_in_faction_with = event_target:equestria
				factor = 10
			}
			modifier = {
				event_target:equestria = { has_government = ROOT }
				factor = 2
			}
		}
		trigger = {
			if = {
				limit = {
					has_dlc = "By Blood Alone"
				}
				OR = {
					AND = {
						event_target:equestria = { has_tech = iw_medium_airframe}
						ROOT = { NOT = { has_tech = iw_medium_airframe } }
					}
					AND = {
						event_target:equestria = { has_tech = basic_medium_airframe}
						ROOT = { NOT = { has_tech = basic_medium_airframe } }
					}
					AND = {
						event_target:equestria = { has_tech = improved_medium_airframe}
						ROOT = { NOT = { has_tech = improved_medium_airframe } }
					}
				}
			}
			else = {
				OR = {
					AND = {
						event_target:equestria = { has_tech = heavy_fighter1}
						ROOT = { NOT = { has_tech = heavy_fighter1 } }
					}
					AND = {
						event_target:equestria = { has_tech = heavy_fighter2}
						ROOT = { NOT = { has_tech = heavy_fighter2 } }
					}
					AND = {
						event_target:equestria = { has_tech = heavy_fighter3}
						ROOT = { NOT = { has_tech = heavy_fighter3 } }
					}
				}
			}
			NOT = { has_war_with = event_target:equestria }
			NOT = { has_country_flag = EQS_heavy_fighter_refused }
			NOT = { #to prevent overflow issues
				AND = {
					GRI = {
						is_available_heavy_fighter_ROOT = yes
					}
					JER = {
						is_available_heavy_fighter_ROOT = yes
					}
					WNG = {
						is_available_heavy_fighter_ROOT = yes
					}
					LCT = {
						is_available_heavy_fighter_ROOT = yes
					}
				}
			}
		}
		event_target:equestria = { country_event = griffonian.154 }
	}
	option = {# failsafe
		name = griffonian.151.f
		trigger = {
			OR = {
				has_country_flag = GRI_heavy_fighter_refused
				has_country_flag = WNG_heavy_fighter_refused
				has_country_flag = RIV_heavy_fighter_refused
				has_country_flag = JER_heavy_fighter_refused
				has_country_flag = EQS_heavy_fighter_refused
			}
		}
		air_experience = 50
	}

}

#fighter competition - light fighter competition winner gets a choice whether to permit license production
country_event = {
	id = griffonian.153
	immediate = {log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event griffonian.153"}
	title = griffonian.153.t
	desc = griffonian.153.desc
	picture = GFX_report_event_fighters

	is_triggered_only = yes

	option = {# certainly
		name = griffonian.153.a
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 90
			modifier = {
				has_war = yes
				factor = 0.5
			}
		}
		FROM = { country_event = griffonian.155 }
		air_experience = 20
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_dlc = "By Blood Alone"
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					has_tech = iw_small_airframe
					NOT = { has_tech = basic_small_airframe }
				}
				create_production_license = {
					target = FROM
					equipment = {
						type = small_plane_airframe_0

					}
					cost_factor = 0
				}
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					has_tech = basic_small_airframe
					NOT = { has_tech = improved_small_airframe }
				}
				create_production_license = {
					target = FROM
					equipment = {
						type = small_plane_airframe_1
					}
					cost_factor = 0
				}
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					has_tech = improved_small_airframe
				}
				create_production_license = {
					target = FROM
					equipment = {
						type = small_plane_airframe_2
					}
					cost_factor = 0
				}
			}
		}
		else = {
			if = {
				limit = {
					has_tech = fighter1
					NOT = { has_tech = fighter2 }
				}
				create_production_license = {
					target = FROM
					equipment = {
						type = fighter_equipment_1

					}
					cost_factor = 0
				}
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					has_tech = fighter2
					NOT = { has_tech = fighter3 }
				}
				create_production_license = {
					target = FROM
					equipment = {
						type = fighter_equipment_2
					}
					cost_factor = 0
				}
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					has_tech = fighter3
				}
				create_production_license = {
					target = FROM
					equipment = {
						type = fighter_equipment_3
					}
					cost_factor = 0
				}
			}
		}
	}

	option = {# no
		name = griffonian.153.b
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 10
			modifier = {
				is_in_faction_with = FROM
				factor = 0
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = { tag = GRI }
			FROM = { set_country_flag = GRI_fighter_refused }
		}
		if = {
			limit = { tag = WNG }
			FROM = { set_country_flag = WNG_fighter_refused }
		}
		if = {
			limit = { tag = JER }
			FROM = { set_country_flag = JER_fighter_refused }
		}
		if = {
			limit = { tag = LCT }
			FROM = { set_country_flag = RIV_fighter_refused }
		}
		if = {
			limit = { tag = event_target:equestria }
			FROM = { set_country_flag = EQS_fighter_refused }
		}
		FROM = { country_event = griffonian.151 }
		reverse_add_opinion_modifier = { target = FROM modifier = refused_help }
	}
}

#fighter competition - heavy fighter competition winner gets a choice whether to permit license production
country_event = {
	id = griffonian.154
	immediate = {log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event griffonian.154"}
	title = griffonian.153.t
	desc = griffonian.154.desc
	picture = GFX_report_event_fighters

	is_triggered_only = yes

	option = {# certainly
		name = griffonian.153.a
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 90
			modifier = {
				has_war = yes
				factor = 0.5
			}
		}
		air_experience = 20
		FROM = { country_event = griffonian.155 }if = {
			limit = {
				has_dlc = "By Blood Alone"
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					has_tech = iw_medium_airframe
					NOT = { has_tech = basic_medium_airframe }
				}
				create_production_license = {
					target = FROM
					equipment = {
						type = medium_plane_airframe_0

					}
					cost_factor = 0
				}
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					has_tech = basic_medium_airframe
					NOT = { has_tech = improved_medium_airframe }
				}
				create_production_license = {
					target = FROM
					equipment = {
						type = medium_plane_airframe_1
					}
					cost_factor = 0
				}
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					has_tech = improved_medium_airframe
				}
				create_production_license = {
					target = FROM
					equipment = {
						type = medium_plane_airframe_2
					}
					cost_factor = 0
				}
			}
		}
		else = {
			if = {
				limit = {
					has_tech = heavy_fighter1
					NOT = { has_tech = heavy_fighter2 }
				}
				create_production_license = {
					target = FROM
					equipment = {
						type = heavy_fighter_equipment_1
					}
					cost_factor = 0
				}
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					has_tech = heavy_fighter2
					NOT = { has_tech = heavy_fighter3 }
				}
				create_production_license = {
					target = FROM
					equipment = {
						type = heavy_fighter_equipment_2
					}
					cost_factor = 0
				}
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					has_tech = heavy_fighter3
				}
				create_production_license = {
					target = FROM
					equipment = {
						type = heavy_fighter_equipment_3
					}
					cost_factor = 0
				}
			}
		}
	}

	option = {# no
		name = griffonian.153.b
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 10
			modifier = {
				is_in_faction_with = FROM
				factor = 0
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = { tag = GRI }
			FROM = { set_country_flag = GRI_heavy_fighter_refused }
		}
		if = {
			limit = { tag = WNG }
			FROM = { set_country_flag = WNG_heavy_fighter_refused }
		}
		if = {
			limit = { tag = JER }
			FROM = { set_country_flag = JER_heavy_fighter_refused }
		}
		if = {
			limit = { tag = LCT }
			FROM = { set_country_flag = RIV_heavy_fighter_refused }
		}
		if = {
			limit = { tag = event_target:equestria }
			FROM = { set_country_flag = EQS_heavy_fighter_refused }
		}
		FROM = { country_event = griffonian.152 }
		reverse_add_opinion_modifier = { target = FROM modifier = refused_help }
	}
}
