#bomber competition - initial choice for Country
country_event = {
	id = griffonian.160
	immediate = {log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event griffonian.160"}
	title = griffonian.160.t
	desc = griffonian.160.desc
	picture = GFX_report_event_generic_bombers

	is_triggered_only = yes

	option = {# CAS
		name = griffonian.160.a
		trigger = {
			OR = {
				GRI = {
					is_available_cas_ROOT = yes
				}
				JER = {
					is_available_cas_ROOT = yes
				}
				WNG = {
					is_available_cas_ROOT = yes
				}
				LCT = {
					is_available_cas_ROOT = yes
				}
				event_target:equestria = {
					is_available_cas_ROOT = yes
				}
			}
		}
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 50
		}
		country_event = griffonian.161
	}

	option = {# TAC
		name = griffonian.160.b
		trigger = {
			OR = {
				GRI = {
					is_available_tac_ROOT = yes
				}
				JER = {
					is_available_tac_ROOT = yes
				}
				WNG = {
					is_available_tac_ROOT = yes
				}
				LCT = {
					is_available_tac_ROOT = yes
				}
				event_target:equestria = {
					is_available_tac_ROOT = yes
				}
			}
		}
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 50
		}
		country_event = griffonian.162
	}
}

#Bomber competition - Country is looking for a CAS
country_event = {
	id = griffonian.161
	immediate = {log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event griffonian.161"}
	title = griffonian.161.t
	desc = {
		text = griffonian.161.desc_cas
		trigger = {
			NOT = {
				has_country_flag = GRI_CAS_refused
				has_country_flag = RIV_CAS_refused
				has_country_flag = EQS_CAS_refused
				has_country_flag = JER_CAS_refused
				has_country_flag = WNG_CAS_refused
			}
		}
	}
	desc = {
		text = griffonian.161.desc_cas_refused
		trigger = {
			OR = {
				has_country_flag = GRI_CAS_refused
				has_country_flag = RIV_CAS_refused
				has_country_flag = EQS_CAS_refused
				has_country_flag = JER_CAS_refused
				has_country_flag = WNG_CAS_refused
			}
		}
	}
	picture = GFX_report_event_generic_bombers

	is_triggered_only = yes

	option = {# Select Imperial Plane
		name = griffonian.151.a
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 30
			modifier = {
				is_in_faction_with = GRI
				factor = 10
			}
			modifier = {
				GRI = { has_government = ROOT }
				factor = 2
			}
		}
		trigger = {
			if = {
				limit = {
					has_dlc = "By Blood Alone"
				}
				OR = {
					AND = {
						GRI = { has_tech = iw_small_airframe}
						ROOT = { NOT = { has_tech = iw_small_airframe } }
					}
					AND = {
						GRI = { has_tech = basic_small_airframe}
						ROOT = { NOT = { has_tech = basic_small_airframe } }
					}
					AND = {
						GRI = { has_tech = improved_small_airframe}
						ROOT = { NOT = { has_tech = improved_small_airframe } }
					}
				}
			}
			else = {
				OR = {
					AND = {
						GRI = { has_tech = CAS1}
						ROOT = { NOT = { has_tech = CAS1 } }
					}
					AND = {
						GRI = { has_tech = CAS2}
						ROOT = { NOT = { has_tech = CAS2 } }
					}
					AND = {
						GRI = { has_tech = CAS3}
						ROOT = { NOT = { has_tech = CAS3 } }
					}
				}
			}
			NOT = { has_war_with = GRI }
			NOT = { has_country_flag = GRI_CAS_refused }
		}
		GRI = { country_event = griffonian.163 }
	}

	option = {# select Wingbardian plane
		name = griffonian.151.b
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 30
			modifier = {
				is_in_faction_with = WNG
				factor = 10
			}
			modifier = {
				WNG = { has_government = ROOT }
				factor = 2
			}
		}
		trigger = {
			if = {
				limit = {
					has_dlc = "By Blood Alone"
				}
				OR = {
					AND = {
						WNG = { has_tech = iw_small_airframe}
						ROOT = { NOT = { has_tech = iw_small_airframe } }
					}
					AND = {
						WNG = { has_tech = basic_small_airframe}
						ROOT = { NOT = { has_tech = basic_small_airframe } }
					}
					AND = {
						WNG = { has_tech = improved_small_airframe}
						ROOT = { NOT = { has_tech = improved_small_airframe } }
					}
				}
			}
			else = {
				OR = {
					AND = {
						WNG = { has_tech = CAS1}
						ROOT = { NOT = { has_tech = CAS1 } }
					}
					AND = {
						WNG = { has_tech = CAS2}
						ROOT = { NOT = { has_tech = CAS2 } }
					}
					AND = {
						WNG = { has_tech = CAS3}
						ROOT = { NOT = { has_tech = CAS3 } }
					}
				}
			}
			NOT = { has_war_with = WNG }
			NOT = { has_country_flag = WNG_CAS_refused }
		}
		WNG = { country_event = griffonian.163 }
	}

	option = {# select Aquilian plane
		name = griffonian.151.c
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 30
			modifier = {
				is_in_faction_with = JER
				factor = 10
			}
			modifier = {
				JER = { has_government = ROOT }
				factor = 2
			}
		}
		trigger = {
			if = {
				limit = {
					has_dlc = "By Blood Alone"
				}
				OR = {
					AND = {
						JER = { has_tech = iw_small_airframe}
						ROOT = { NOT = { has_tech = iw_small_airframe } }
					}
					AND = {
						JER = { has_tech = basic_small_airframe}
						ROOT = { NOT = { has_tech = basic_small_airframe } }
					}
					AND = {
						JER = { has_tech = improved_small_airframe}
						ROOT = { NOT = { has_tech = improved_small_airframe } }
					}
				}
			}
			else = {
				OR = {
					AND = {
						JER = { has_tech = CAS1}
						ROOT = { NOT = { has_tech = CAS1 } }
					}
					AND = {
						JER = { has_tech = CAS2}
						ROOT = { NOT = { has_tech = CAS2 } }
					}
					AND = {
						JER = { has_tech = CAS3}
						ROOT = { NOT = { has_tech = CAS3 } }
					}
				}
			}
			NOT = { has_war_with = JER }
			NOT = { has_country_flag = JER_CAS_refused }
		}
		JER = { country_event = griffonian.163 }
	}
	option = {# select River Fed plane
		name = griffonian.151.g
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 30
			modifier = {
				is_river_fed_member = yes
				factor = 10
			}
			modifier = {
				is_in_faction_with = LCT
				factor = 10
			}
			modifier = {
				LCT = { has_government = ROOT }
				factor = 2
			}
		}
		trigger = {
			if = {
				limit = {
					has_dlc = "By Blood Alone"
				}
				OR = {
					AND = {
						LCT = { has_tech = iw_small_airframe}
						ROOT = { NOT = { has_tech = iw_small_airframe } }
					}
					AND = {
						LCT = { has_tech = basic_small_airframe}
						ROOT = { NOT = { has_tech = basic_small_airframe } }
					}
					AND = {
						LCT = { has_tech = improved_small_airframe}
						ROOT = { NOT = { has_tech = improved_small_airframe } }
					}
				}
			}
			else = {
				OR = {
					AND = {
						LCT = { has_tech = CAS1}
						ROOT = { NOT = { has_tech = CAS1 } }
					}
					AND = {
						LCT = { has_tech = CAS2}
						ROOT = { NOT = { has_tech = CAS2 } }
					}
					AND = {
						LCT = { has_tech = CAS3}
						ROOT = { NOT = { has_tech = CAS3 } }
					}
				}
			}
			NOT = { has_war_with = LCT }
			NOT = { has_country_flag = RIV_CAS_refused }
		}
		LCT = { country_event = griffonian.163 }
	}
	option = {# select Equestrian plane
		name = griffonian.151.e
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 30
			modifier = {
				is_in_faction_with = event_target:equestria
				factor = 10
			}
			modifier = {
				event_target:equestria = { has_government = ROOT }
				factor = 2
			}
		}
		trigger = {
			if = {
				limit = {
					has_dlc = "By Blood Alone"
				}
				OR = {
					AND = {
						event_target:equestria = { has_tech = iw_small_airframe}
						ROOT = { NOT = { has_tech = iw_small_airframe } }
					}
					AND = {
						event_target:equestria = { has_tech = basic_small_airframe}
						ROOT = { NOT = { has_tech = basic_small_airframe } }
					}
					AND = {
						event_target:equestria = { has_tech = improved_small_airframe}
						ROOT = { NOT = { has_tech = improved_small_airframe } }
					}
				}
			}
			else = {
				OR = {
					AND = {
						event_target:equestria = { has_tech = CAS1}
						ROOT = { NOT = { has_tech = CAS1 } }
					}
					AND = {
						event_target:equestria = { has_tech = CAS2}
						ROOT = { NOT = { has_tech = CAS2 } }
					}
					AND = {
						event_target:equestria = { has_tech = CAS3}
						ROOT = { NOT = { has_tech = CAS3 } }
					}
				}
			}
			NOT = { has_war_with = event_target:equestria }
			NOT = { has_country_flag = EQS_CAS_refused }
			NOT = { #to prevent overflow issues
				AND = {
					GRI = {
						is_available_cas_ROOT = yes
					}
					JER = {
						is_available_cas_ROOT = yes
					}
					WNG = {
						is_available_cas_ROOT = yes
					}
					LCT = {
						is_available_cas_ROOT = yes
					}
				}
			}
		}
		event_target:equestria = { country_event = griffonian.163 }
	}
	option = {# failsafe
		name = griffonian.151.f
		trigger = {
			OR = {
				has_country_flag = GRI_CAS_refused
				has_country_flag = WNG_CAS_refused
				has_country_flag = RIV_CAS_refused
				has_country_flag = JER_CAS_refused
				has_country_flag = EQS_CAS_refused
			}
		}
		air_experience = 50
	}

}
#bomber competition - Country is looking for a tacbomber
country_event = {
	id = griffonian.162
	immediate = {log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event griffonian.162"}
	title = griffonian.162.t
	desc = {
		text = griffonian.162.desc_tac
		trigger = {
			NOT = {
				has_country_flag = GRI_tactical_bomber_refused
				has_country_flag = RIV_tactical_bomber_refused
				has_country_flag = EQS_tactical_bomber_refused
				has_country_flag = JER_tactical_bomber_refused
				has_country_flag = WNG_tactical_bomber_refused
			}
		}
	}
	desc = {
		text = griffonian.162.desc_tac_refused
		trigger = {
			OR = {
				has_country_flag = GRI_tactical_bomber_refused
				has_country_flag = RIV_tactical_bomber_refused
				has_country_flag = EQS_tactical_bomber_refused
				has_country_flag = JER_tactical_bomber_refused
				has_country_flag = WNG_tactical_bomber_refused
			}
		}
	}
	picture = GFX_report_event_generic_bombers

	is_triggered_only = yes

	option = {# Select Imperial Plane
		name = griffonian.151.a
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 30
			modifier = {
				is_in_faction_with = GRI
				factor = 10
			}
			modifier = {
				GRI = { has_government = ROOT }
				factor = 2
			}
		}
		trigger = {
			if = {
				limit = {
					has_dlc = "By Blood Alone"
				}
				OR = {
					AND = {
						GRI = { has_tech = iw_medium_airframe}
						ROOT = { NOT = { has_tech = iw_medium_airframe } }
					}
					AND = {
						GRI = { has_tech = basic_medium_airframe}
						ROOT = { NOT = { has_tech = basic_medium_airframe } }
					}
					AND = {
						GRI = { has_tech = improved_medium_airframe}
						ROOT = { NOT = { has_tech = improved_medium_airframe } }
					}
				}
			}
			else = {
				OR = {
					AND = {
						GRI = { has_tech = tactical_bomber1}
						ROOT = { NOT = { has_tech = tactical_bomber1 } }
					}
					AND = {
						GRI = { has_tech = tactical_bomber2}
						ROOT = { NOT = { has_tech = tactical_bomber2 } }
					}
					AND = {
						GRI = { has_tech = tactical_bomber3}
						ROOT = { NOT = { has_tech = tactical_bomber3 } }
					}
				}
			}
			NOT = { has_war_with = GRI }
			NOT = { has_country_flag = GRI_tactical_bomber_refused }
		}
		GRI = { country_event = griffonian.164 }
	}

	option = {# select Wingbardian plane
		name = griffonian.151.b
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 30
			modifier = {
				is_in_faction_with = WNG
				factor = 10
			}
			modifier = {
				WNG = { has_government = ROOT }
				factor = 2
			}
		}
		trigger = {
			if = {
				limit = {
					has_dlc = "By Blood Alone"
				}
				OR = {
					AND = {
						WNG = { has_tech = iw_medium_airframe}
						ROOT = { NOT = { has_tech = iw_medium_airframe } }
					}
					AND = {
						WNG = { has_tech = basic_medium_airframe}
						ROOT = { NOT = { has_tech = basic_medium_airframe } }
					}
					AND = {
						WNG = { has_tech = improved_medium_airframe}
						ROOT = { NOT = { has_tech = improved_medium_airframe } }
					}
				}
			}
			else = {
				OR = {
					AND = {
						WNG = { has_tech = tactical_bomber1}
						ROOT = { NOT = { has_tech = tactical_bomber1 } }
					}
					AND = {
						WNG = { has_tech = tactical_bomber2}
						ROOT = { NOT = { has_tech = tactical_bomber2 } }
					}
					AND = {
						WNG = { has_tech = tactical_bomber3}
						ROOT = { NOT = { has_tech = tactical_bomber3 } }
					}
				}
			}
			NOT = { has_war_with = WNG }
			NOT = { has_country_flag = WNG_tactical_bomber_refused }
		}
		WNG = { country_event = griffonian.164 }
	}

	option = {# select Aquilian plane
		name = griffonian.151.c
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 30
			modifier = {
				is_in_faction_with = JER
				factor = 10
			}
			modifier = {
				JER = { has_government = ROOT }
				factor = 2
			}
		}
		trigger = {
			if = {
				limit = {
					has_dlc = "By Blood Alone"
				}
				OR = {
					AND = {
						JER = { has_tech = iw_medium_airframe}
						ROOT = { NOT = { has_tech = iw_medium_airframe } }
					}
					AND = {
						JER = { has_tech = basic_medium_airframe}
						ROOT = { NOT = { has_tech = basic_medium_airframe } }
					}
					AND = {
						JER = { has_tech = improved_medium_airframe}
						ROOT = { NOT = { has_tech = improved_medium_airframe } }
					}
				}
			}
			else = {
				OR = {
					AND = {
						JER = { has_tech = tactical_bomber1}
						ROOT = { NOT = { has_tech = tactical_bomber1 } }
					}
					AND = {
						JER = { has_tech = tactical_bomber2}
						ROOT = { NOT = { has_tech = tactical_bomber2 } }
					}
					AND = {
						JER = { has_tech = tactical_bomber3}
						ROOT = { NOT = { has_tech = tactical_bomber3 } }
					}
				}
			}
			NOT = { has_war_with = JER }
			NOT = { has_country_flag = JER_tactical_bomber_refused }
		}
		JER = { country_event = griffonian.164 }
	}
	option = {# select River Fed plane
		name = griffonian.151.g
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 30
			modifier = {
				is_river_fed_member = yes
				factor = 10
			}
			modifier = {
				is_in_faction_with = LCT
				factor = 10
			}
			modifier = {
				LCT = { has_government = ROOT }
				factor = 2
			}
		}
		trigger = {
			if = {
				limit = {
					has_dlc = "By Blood Alone"
				}
				OR = {
					AND = {
						LCT = { has_tech = iw_medium_airframe}
						ROOT = { NOT = { has_tech = iw_medium_airframe } }
					}
					AND = {
						LCT = { has_tech = basic_medium_airframe}
						ROOT = { NOT = { has_tech = basic_medium_airframe } }
					}
					AND = {
						LCT = { has_tech = improved_medium_airframe}
						ROOT = { NOT = { has_tech = improved_medium_airframe } }
					}
				}
			}
			else = {
				OR = {
					AND = {
						LCT = { has_tech = tactical_bomber1}
						ROOT = { NOT = { has_tech = tactical_bomber1 } }
					}
					AND = {
						LCT = { has_tech = tactical_bomber2}
						ROOT = { NOT = { has_tech = tactical_bomber2 } }
					}
					AND = {
						LCT = { has_tech = tactical_bomber3}
						ROOT = { NOT = { has_tech = tactical_bomber3 } }
					}
				}
			}
			NOT = { has_war_with = LCT }
			NOT = { has_country_flag = RIV_tactical_bomber_refused }
		}
		LCT = { country_event = griffonian.164 }
	}
	option = {# select Equestrian plane
		name = griffonian.151.e
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 30
			modifier = {
				is_in_faction_with = event_target:equestria
				factor = 10
			}
			modifier = {
				event_target:equestria = { has_government = ROOT }
				factor = 2
			}
		}
		trigger = {
			if = {
				limit = {
					has_dlc = "By Blood Alone"
				}
				OR = {
					AND = {
						event_target:equestria = { has_tech = iw_medium_airframe}
						ROOT = { NOT = { has_tech = iw_medium_airframe } }
					}
					AND = {
						event_target:equestria = { has_tech = basic_medium_airframe}
						ROOT = { NOT = { has_tech = basic_medium_airframe } }
					}
					AND = {
						event_target:equestria = { has_tech = improved_medium_airframe}
						ROOT = { NOT = { has_tech = improved_medium_airframe } }
					}
				}
			}
			else = {
				OR = {
					AND = {
						event_target:equestria = { has_tech = tactical_bomber1}
						ROOT = { NOT = { has_tech = tactical_bomber1 } }
					}
					AND = {
						event_target:equestria = { has_tech = tactical_bomber2}
						ROOT = { NOT = { has_tech = tactical_bomber2 } }
					}
					AND = {
						event_target:equestria = { has_tech = tactical_bomber3}
						ROOT = { NOT = { has_tech = tactical_bomber3 } }
					}
				}
			}
			NOT = { has_war_with = event_target:equestria }
			NOT = { has_country_flag = EQS_tactical_bomber_refused }
			NOT = { #to prevent overflow issues
				AND = {
					GRI = {
						is_available_tac_ROOT = yes
					}
					JER = {
						is_available_tac_ROOT = yes
					}
					WNG = {
						is_available_tac_ROOT = yes
					}
					LCT = {
						is_available_tac_ROOT = yes
					}
				}
			}
		}
		event_target:equestria = { country_event = griffonian.164 }
	}
	option = {# failsafe
		name = griffonian.151.f
		trigger = {
			OR = {
				has_country_flag = GRI_tactical_bomber_refused
				has_country_flag = WNG_tactical_bomber_refused
				has_country_flag = RIV_tactical_bomber_refused
				has_country_flag = JER_tactical_bomber_refused
				has_country_flag = EQS_tactical_bomber_refused
			}
		}
		air_experience = 50
	}

}

#bomber competition - CAS competition winner gets a choice whether to permit license production
country_event = {
	id = griffonian.163
	immediate = {log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event griffonian.163"}
	title = griffonian.163.t
	desc = griffonian.163.desc
	picture = GFX_report_event_generic_bombers

	is_triggered_only = yes

	option = {# certainly
		name = griffonian.153.a
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 90
			modifier = {
				has_war = yes
				factor = 0.5
			}
		}
		air_experience = 20
		FROM = { country_event = griffonian.165 }
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_dlc = "By Blood Alone"
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					has_tech = iw_small_airframe
					NOT = { has_tech = basic_small_airframe }
				}
				create_production_license = {
					target = FROM
					equipment = {
						type = small_plane_airframe_0

					}
					cost_factor = 0
				}
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					has_tech = basic_small_airframe
					NOT = { has_tech = improved_small_airframe }
				}
				create_production_license = {
					target = FROM
					equipment = {
						type = small_plane_airframe_1
					}
					cost_factor = 0
				}
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					has_tech = improved_small_airframe
				}
				create_production_license = {
					target = FROM
					equipment = {
						type = small_plane_airframe_2
					}
					cost_factor = 0
				}
			}
		}
		else = {
			if = {
				limit = {
					has_tech = CAS1
					NOT = { has_tech = CAS2 }
				}
				create_production_license = {
					target = FROM
					equipment = {
						type = CAS_equipment_1
					}
					cost_factor = 0
				}
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					has_tech = CAS2
					NOT = { has_tech = CAS3 }
				}
				create_production_license = {
					target = FROM
					equipment = {
						type = CAS_equipment_2
					}
					cost_factor = 0
				}
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					has_tech = CAS3
				}
				create_production_license = {
					target = FROM
					equipment = {
						type = CAS_equipment_3
					}
					cost_factor = 0
				}
			}
		}
	}

	option = {# no
		name = griffonian.153.b
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 10
			modifier = {
				is_in_faction_with = FROM
				factor = 0
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = { tag = GRI }
			FROM = { set_country_flag = GRI_CAS_refused }
		}
		if = {
			limit = { tag = WNG }
			FROM = { set_country_flag = WNG_CAS_refused }
		}
		if = {
			limit = { tag = JER }
			FROM = { set_country_flag = JER_CAS_refused }
		}
		if = {
			limit = { tag = LCT }
			FROM = { set_country_flag = RIV_CAS_refused }
		}
		if = {
			limit = { tag = event_target:equestria }
			FROM = { set_country_flag = EQS_CAS_refused }
		}
		FROM = { country_event = griffonian.161 }
		reverse_add_opinion_modifier = { target = FROM modifier = refused_help }
	}
}

#bomber competition - tac bomber competition winner gets a choice whether to permit license production
country_event = {
	id = griffonian.164
	immediate = {log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event griffonian.164"}
	title = griffonian.164.t
	desc = griffonian.164.desc
	picture = GFX_report_event_generic_bombers

	is_triggered_only = yes

	option = {# certainly
		name = griffonian.153.a
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 90
			modifier = {
				has_war = yes
				factor = 0.5
			}
		}
		FROM = { country_event = griffonian.165 }
		air_experience = 20
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_dlc = "By Blood Alone"
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					has_tech = iw_medium_airframe
					NOT = { has_tech = iw_medium_airframe }
				}
				create_production_license = {
					target = FROM
					equipment = {
						type = medium_plane_airframe_0

					}
					cost_factor = 0
				}
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					has_tech = basic_medium_airframe
					NOT = { has_tech = basic_medium_airframe }
				}
				create_production_license = {
					target = FROM
					equipment = {
						type = medium_plane_airframe_1
					}
					cost_factor = 0
				}
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					has_tech = improved_medium_airframe
				}
				create_production_license = {
					target = FROM
					equipment = {
						type = medium_plane_airframe_2
					}
					cost_factor = 0
				}
			}
		}
		else = {
			if = {
				limit = {
					has_tech = tactical_bomber1
					NOT = { has_tech = tactical_bomber2 }
				}
				create_production_license = {
					target = FROM
					equipment = {
						type = tac_bomber_equipment_1
					}
					cost_factor = 0
				}
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					has_tech = tactical_bomber2
					NOT = { has_tech = tactical_bomber3 }
				}
				create_production_license = {
					target = FROM
					equipment = {
						type = tac_bomber_equipment_2
					}
					cost_factor = 0
				}
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					has_tech = tactical_bomber3
				}
				create_production_license = {
					target = FROM
					equipment = {
						type = tac_bomber_equipment_3
					}
					cost_factor = 0
				}
			}
		}
	}

	option = {# no
		name = griffonian.153.b
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 10
			modifier = {
				is_in_faction_with = FROM
				factor = 0
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = { tag = GRI }
			FROM = { set_country_flag = GRI_tactical_bomber_refused }
		}
		if = {
			limit = { tag = WNG }
			FROM = { set_country_flag = WNG_tactical_bomber_refused }
		}
		if = {
			limit = { tag = JER }
			FROM = { set_country_flag = JER_tactical_bomber_refused }
		}
		if = {
			limit = { tag = LCT }
			FROM = { set_country_flag = RIV_tactical_bomber_refused }
		}
		if = {
			limit = { tag = event_target:equestria }
			FROM = { set_country_flag = EQS_tactical_bomber_refused }
		}
		FROM = { country_event = griffonian.162 }
		reverse_add_opinion_modifier = { target = FROM modifier = refused_help }
	}
}

# Comet Event #
country_event = {
	id = griffonian.166
	immediate = {log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event griffonian.166"}
	title = griffonian.166.t
	desc = griffonian.166.d
	picture = GFX_event_comet_sighted
	is_triggered_only = yes
	trigger = {
		is_griffon_continent_country = yes
		OR = {
			has_tribal_society = yes
			has_agrarian_society = yes
			has_pre_industrial_society = yes
			has_illiteracy = yes
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = griffonian.166.a
		add_stability = -0.025
		add_political_power = -25
	}
	option = {
		name = griffonian.166.b
		trigger = { is_griffon_race = yes }
		add_stability = -0.025
		add_political_power = -25
	}
	option = {
		name = griffonian.166.c
		trigger = { is_griffon_race = yes }
		add_stability = -0.025
		add_political_power = -25
	}
	option = {
		name = griffonian.166.e
		add_stability = -0.025
		add_political_power = -25
	}
	option = {
		name = griffonian.166.apony_1
		trigger = { is_pony_race = yes }
		add_stability = -0.025
		add_political_power = -25
	}
	option = {
		name = griffonian.166.apony_2
		trigger = { is_pony_race = yes }
		add_stability = -0.025
		add_political_power = -25
	}
}
add_namespace = marschen
add_namespace = marschen_news

country_event = { #The New Economy
	id = marschen.1
	immediate = {log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event marschen.1"}
	title = marschen.1.t
	desc = {
		text = marschen.1.d_peasant
		trigger = { NOT = { has_country_flag = PYT_established_dictatorship } }
	}
	desc = {
		text = marschen.1.d_dictatorship
		trigger = { has_country_flag = PYT_established_dictatorship }
	}
	picture = GFX_farm_event
	is_triggered_only = yes
	option = {
		name = marschen.1.a
		ai_chance = {
			base = 50
			modifier = {
				factor = 0.5
				has_government = fascism
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				has_government = communism
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 2
				has_government = democratic
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 1.5
				has_government = neutrality
			}
		}
		hidden_effect = {
			complete_national_focus = PYT_agrarianism
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = marschen.1.b
		ai_chance = {
			base = 50
			modifier = {
				factor = 2
				has_government = communism
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 1.5
				has_government = fascism
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0.5
				has_government = neutrality
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				has_government = democratic
			}
		}
		hidden_effect = {
			complete_national_focus = PYT_industrialisation
		}
	}
}

country_event = { #Derailing
	id = marschen.2
	immediate = {log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event marschen.2"}
	title = marschen.2.t
	desc = {
		text = marschen.2.d_peasant
		trigger = { NOT = { has_country_flag = PYT_established_dictatorship } }
	}
	desc = {
		text = marschen.2.d_dictatorship
		trigger = { has_country_flag = PYT_established_dictatorship }
	}
	picture = GFX_event_manehatten_explosion
	is_triggered_only = yes

	option = {
		name = marschen.2.a
		add_political_power = -10
		add_stability = -0.01
		save_current_manpower = yes
		399 = {
			add_manpower = -67
		}
		restore_previous_manpower = yes
	}
}

country_event = { #Business is Booming
	id = marschen.3
	immediate = {log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event marschen.3"}
	title = marschen.3.t
	desc = marschen.3.d

	picture = GFX_farm_event
	is_triggered_only = yes

	option = {
		name = marschen.3.a
		add_political_power = 20
		add_stability = 0.02
		random_owned_controlled_state = {
			limit = {
				free_building_slots = {
					building = industrial_complex
					size > 0
					include_locked = yes
				}
				OR = {
					is_in_home_area = yes
					NOT = {
						owner = {
							any_owned_state = {
								free_building_slots = {
									building = industrial_complex
									size > 0
									include_locked = yes
								}
								is_in_home_area = yes
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
			add_extra_state_shared_building_slots = 1
			add_building_construction = {
				type = industrial_complex
				level = 1
				instant_build = yes
			}
		}
	}
}

country_event = { #Projects
	id = marschen.4
	immediate = {log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event marschen.4"}
	title = marschen.4.t
	desc = {
		text = marschen.4.d_peasant
		trigger = { NOT = { has_country_flag = PYT_established_dictatorship } }
	}
	desc = {
		text = marschen.4.d_dictatorship
		trigger = { has_country_flag = PYT_established_dictatorship }
	}

	picture = GFX_event_medieval_city
	is_triggered_only = yes

	option = {
		name = marschen.4.a
		add_political_power = 15
		add_stability = 0.02
		if = {
			limit = { has_government = neutrality }
			add_popularity = { ideology = neutrality popularity = 0.01 }
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = { has_government = fascism }
			add_popularity = { ideology = fascism popularity = 0.01 }
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = { has_government = communism }
			add_popularity = { ideology = communism popularity = 0.01 }
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = { has_government = democratic }
			add_popularity = { ideology = democratic popularity = 0.01 }
		}
	}
}

		add_stability = 0.01

			limit = { has_government = neutrality }
			add_popularity = { ideology = neutrality popularity = 0.02 }
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = { has_government = fascism }
			add_popularity = { ideology = fascism popularity = 0.02 }
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = { has_government = communism }
			add_popularity = { ideology = communism popularity = 0.02 }
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = { has_government = democratic }
			add_popularity = { ideology = democratic popularity = 0.02 }
		}
	}

country_event = { #Tractor Panic
	id = marschen.6
	immediate = {log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event marschen.6"}
	title = marschen.6.t
	desc = marschen.6.d

	picture = GFX_farm_event
	is_triggered_only = yes

	option = {
		name = marschen.6.a
		add_political_power = -20
		add_stability = -0.02
	}
}

country_event = { #Miners Trapped
	id = marschen.7
	immediate = {log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event marschen.7"}
	title = marschen.7.t
	desc = marschen.7.d

	picture = GFX_event_cave
	is_triggered_only = yes

	option = {
		name = marschen.7.a
		add_political_power = -15
		add_stability = -0.01
		save_current_manpower = yes
		399 = {
			add_manpower = -153
		}
		restore_previous_manpower = yes
		if = {
			limit = { has_government = neutrality }
			add_popularity = { ideology = neutrality popularity = -0.01 }
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = { has_government = fascism }
			add_popularity = { ideology = fascism popularity = -0.01 }
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = { has_government = communism }
			add_popularity = { ideology = communism popularity = -0.01 }
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = { has_government = democratic }
			add_popularity = { ideology = democratic popularity = -0.01 }
		}
	}
}

country_event = { #Education Reform 1
	id = marschen.8
	immediate = {log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event marschen.8"}
	title = marschen.8.t
	desc = marschen.8.d

	picture = GFX_event_school
	is_triggered_only = yes

	option = {
		name = marschen.8.a
		add_political_power = 25
		decrease_illiteracy = yes
		if = {
			limit = { has_government = neutrality }
			add_popularity = { ideology = neutrality popularity = 0.01 }
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = { has_government = fascism }
			add_popularity = { ideology = fascism popularity = 0.01 }
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = { has_government = communism }
			add_popularity = { ideology = communism popularity = 0.01 }
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = { has_government = democratic }
			add_popularity = { ideology = democratic popularity = 0.01 }
		}
		hidden_effect = {
			country_event = { days = 230 id = marschen.9 }
		}
	}
}

country_event = { #Education Reform 2
	id = marschen.9
	immediate = {log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event marschen.9"}
	title = marschen.9.t
	desc = {
		text = marschen.9.d_peasant
		trigger = { NOT = { has_country_flag = PYT_established_dictatorship } }
	}
	desc = {
		text = marschen.9.d_dictatorship
		trigger = { has_country_flag = PYT_established_dictatorship }
	}
	picture = GFX_event_school
	is_triggered_only = yes

	option = {
		name = marschen.9.a
		add_political_power = 25
		decrease_illiteracy = yes
		if = {
			limit = { has_government = neutrality }
			add_popularity = { ideology = neutrality popularity = 0.01 }
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = { has_government = fascism }
			add_popularity = { ideology = fascism popularity = 0.01 }
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = { has_government = communism }
			add_popularity = { ideology = communism popularity = 0.01 }
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = { has_government = democratic }
			add_popularity = { ideology = democratic popularity = 0.01 }
		}
		hidden_effect = {
			country_event = { days = 220 id = marschen.10 }
		}
	}
}

country_event = { #Electing the Statthalter
	id = marschen.14
	immediate = {log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event marschen.14"}
	title = marschen.14.t
	desc = marschen.14.d

	picture = GFX_event_feast
	is_triggered_only = yes

	option = { #Harmony
		name = marschen.14.a
		trigger = {
			NOT = {
				has_country_flag = PYT_established_dictatorship
			}
		}
		ai_chance = {
			base = 10
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				democratic < 0.20
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 4
				AND = {
					democratic > 0.25
					democratic < 0.34
				}
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 6
				AND = {
					democratic > 0.33
					democratic < 0.43
				}
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 10
				AND = {
					democratic > 0.42
					democratic < 0.51
				}
			}
			modifier = {
				OR = {
					AND = {
						is_historical_focus_on = yes
						has_game_rule = {
							rule = PYT_ai_behavior
							option = DEFAULT
						}
					}
					has_country_flag = PYT_AI_FASCIST
					has_game_rule = {
						rule = PYT_ai_behavior
						option = FASCIST
					}
					has_country_flag = PYT_AI__HISTORICAL
					has_game_rule = {
						rule = PYT_ai_behavior
						option = HISTORICAL
					}
					has_country_flag = PYT_AI_COMMUNIST
					has_game_rule = {
						rule = PYT_ai_behavior
						option = COMMUNIST
					}
				}
				factor = 0
			}
		}
		set_politics = {
			ruling_party = democratic
			elections_allowed = no
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				democratic < 0.26
			}
			add_popularity = { ideology = democratic popularity = 0.05 }
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = {
				AND = {
					democratic > 0.25
					democratic < 0.34
				}
			}
			add_popularity = { ideology = democratic popularity = 0.04 }
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = {
				AND = {
					democratic > 0.33
					democratic < 0.43
				}
			}
			add_popularity = { ideology = democratic popularity = 0.03 }
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = {
				AND = {
					democratic > 0.42
					democratic < 0.51
				}
			}
			add_popularity = { ideology = democratic popularity = 0.02 }
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = {
			   democratic > 0.50
			}
			add_popularity = { ideology = democratic popularity = 0.01 }
		}
		hidden_effect = {
			if = {
				limit = { NOT = { has_country_flag = PYT_established_dictatorship } }
				country_event = { days = 90 id = marschen.63 }
			}
		}
	}

	option = { #Communism
		name = marschen.14.b
		trigger = {
			NOT = {
				has_country_flag = PYT_established_dictatorship
			}
		}
		ai_chance = {
			base = 10
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				communism < 0.20
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 4
				AND = {
					communism > 0.25
					communism < 0.34
				}
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 6
				AND = {
					communism > 0.33
					communism < 0.43
				}
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 10
				AND = {
					communism > 0.42
					communism < 0.51
				}
			}
			modifier = {
				OR = {
					AND = {
						is_historical_focus_on = yes
						has_game_rule = {
							rule = PYT_ai_behavior
							option = DEFAULT
						}
					}
					has_country_flag = PYT_AI_FASCIST
					has_game_rule = {
						rule = PYT_ai_behavior
						option = FASCIST
					}
					has_country_flag = PYT_AI_HISTORICAL
					has_game_rule = {
						rule = PYT_ai_behavior
						option = HISTORICAL
					}
					has_country_flag = PYT_AI_DEMOCRATIC
					has_game_rule = {
						rule = PYT_ai_behavior
						option = DEMOCRATIC
					}
				}
				factor = 0
			}
		}
		set_politics = {
			ruling_party = communism
			elections_allowed = no
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				communism < 0.26
			}
			add_popularity = { ideology = communism popularity = 0.05 }
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = {
				AND = {
					communism > 0.25
					communism < 0.34
				}
			}
			add_popularity = { ideology = communism popularity = 0.04 }
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = {
				AND = {
					communism > 0.33
					communism < 0.43
				}
			}
			add_popularity = { ideology = communism popularity = 0.03 }
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = {
				AND = {
					communism > 0.42
					communism < 0.51
				}
			}
			add_popularity = { ideology = communism popularity = 0.02 }
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = {
				communism > 0.50
			}
			add_popularity = { ideology = communism popularity = 0.01 }
		}
		hidden_effect = {
			if = {
				limit = { NOT = { has_country_flag = PYT_established_dictatorship } }
				country_event = { days = 90 id = marschen.63 }
			}
		}
	}

	option = { #Fascism
		name = marschen.14.c
		trigger = {
			NOT = {
				has_country_flag = PYT_established_dictatorship
			}
		}
		ai_chance = {
			base = 10
			modifier = {
				add = 90
				is_historical_focus_on = yes
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				fascism < 0.20
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 4
				AND = {
					fascism > 0.25
					fascism < 0.34
				}
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 6
				AND = {
					fascism > 0.33
					fascism < 0.43
				}
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 10
				AND = {
					fascism > 0.42
					fascism < 0.51
				}
			}
			modifier = {
				OR = {
					AND = {
						is_historical_focus_on = yes
						has_game_rule = {
							rule = PYT_ai_behavior
							option = DEFAULT
						}
					}
					has_country_flag = PYT_AI_COMMUNIST
					has_game_rule = {
						rule = PYT_ai_behavior
						option = COMMUNIST
					}
					has_country_flag = PYT_AI_HISTORICAL
					has_game_rule = {
						rule = PYT_ai_behavior
						option = HISTORICAL
					}
					has_country_flag = PYT_AI_DEMOCRATIC
					has_game_rule = {
						rule = PYT_ai_behavior
						option = DEMOCRATIC
					}
				}
				factor = 0
			}
		}
		set_politics = {
			ruling_party = fascism
			elections_allowed = no
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				fascism < 0.26
			}
			add_popularity = { ideology = fascism popularity = 0.05 }
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = {
				AND = {
					fascism > 0.25
					fascism < 0.34
				}
			}
			add_popularity = { ideology = fascism popularity = 0.04 }
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = {
				AND = {
					fascism > 0.33
					fascism < 0.43
				}
			}
			add_popularity = { ideology = fascism popularity = 0.03 }
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = {
				AND = {
					fascism > 0.42
					fascism < 0.51
				}
			}
			add_popularity = { ideology = fascism popularity = 0.02 }
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = {
				fascism > 0.50
			}
			add_popularity = { ideology = fascism popularity = 0.01 }
		}
		hidden_effect = {
			if = {
				limit = { NOT = { has_country_flag = PYT_established_dictatorship } }
				country_event = { days = 90 id = marschen.63 }
			}
		}
	}

	option = { #Neutrality
		name = marschen.14.e
		trigger = {
			NOT = {
				has_country_flag = PYT_established_dictatorship
			}
		}
		ai_chance = {
			base = 10
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				neutrality < 0.20
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 4
				AND = {
					neutrality > 0.25
					neutrality < 0.34
				}
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 6
				AND = {
					neutrality > 0.33
					neutrality < 0.43
				}
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 10
				AND = {
					neutrality > 0.42
					neutrality < 0.51
				}
			}
			modifier = {
				OR = {
					has_country_flag = PYT_AI_COMMUNIST
					has_game_rule = {
						rule = PYT_ai_behavior
						option = COMMUNIST
					}
					has_country_flag = PYT_AI_FASCIST
					has_game_rule = {
						rule = PYT_ai_behavior
						option = FASCIST
					}
					has_country_flag = PYT_AI_DEMOCRATIC
					has_game_rule = {
						rule = PYT_ai_behavior
						option = DEMOCRATIC
					}
				}
				factor = 0
			}
		}
		set_politics = {
			ruling_party = neutrality
			elections_allowed = no
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				neutrality < 0.26
			}
			add_popularity = { ideology = neutrality popularity = 0.05 }
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = {
				AND = {
					neutrality > 0.25
					neutrality < 0.34
				}
			}
			add_popularity = { ideology = neutrality popularity = 0.04 }
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = {
				AND = {
					neutrality > 0.33
					neutrality < 0.43
				}
			}
			add_popularity = { ideology = neutrality popularity = 0.03 }
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = {
				AND = {
					neutrality > 0.42
					neutrality < 0.51
				}
			}
			add_popularity = { ideology = neutrality popularity = 0.02 }
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = {
				neutrality > 0.50
			}
			add_popularity = { ideology = neutrality popularity = 0.01 }
		}
		hidden_effect = {
			if = {
				limit = { NOT = { has_country_flag = PYT_established_dictatorship } }
				country_event = { days = 90 id = marschen.63 }
			}
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = marschen.14.f
		trigger = {
			has_country_flag = PYT_established_dictatorship
		}
	}
}

country_event = { #A New Regent Chosen/Eros
	id = marschen.15
	immediate = {log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event marschen.15"}
	title = marschen.15.t
	desc = marschen.15.d

	picture = GFX_event_griffenheim
	is_triggered_only = yes

	option = {
		name = marschen.15.a
		custom_effect_tooltip = PYT_dictatorship_tp
		hidden_effect = {
			set_country_flag = PYT_dictatorship
		}
	}
}

country_event = { #A New Regent Chosen/Gabriella
	id = marschen.16
	immediate = {log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event marschen.16"}
	title = marschen.16.t
	desc = marschen.16.d

	picture = GFX_event_griffenheim
	is_triggered_only = yes

	option = {
		name = marschen.16.a
		custom_effect_tooltip = PYT_dictatorship_tp
		hidden_effect = {
			set_country_flag = PYT_dictatorship
		}
	}

country_event = { #Harmony Coup
	id = marschen.17
	immediate = {log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event marschen.17"}
	title = marschen.17.t
	desc = marschen.17.d

	picture = GFX_event_feast
	is_triggered_only = yes

	option = {
		name = marschen.17.a
		custom_effect_tooltip = ANG_political_tree_tp
		swap_ideas = {
			remove_idea = PYT_the_peasant_republic
			add_idea = PYT_the_new_regime
		}
		hidden_effect = {
			clr_country_flag = PYT_dictatorship
			set_country_flag = PYT_established_dictatorship
			clr_country_flag = hide_surpress_fascism
			clr_country_flag = hide_surpress_democratic
			clr_country_flag = hide_surpress_communism
			clr_country_flag = hide_surpress_neutral
			clr_country_flag = hide_censor_press
			load_focus_tree = { tree = greifenmarchen_focus_harmony keep_completed = yes }
		}
	}
}

country_event = { #Communism Coup
	id = marschen.18
	immediate = {log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event marschen.18"}
	title = marschen.18.t
	desc = marschen.18.d

	picture = GFX_event_feast
	is_triggered_only = yes

	option = {
		name = marschen.18.a
		custom_effect_tooltip = ANG_political_tree_tp
		swap_ideas = {
			remove_idea = PYT_the_peasant_republic
			add_idea = PYT_the_new_regime
		}
		hidden_effect = {
			clr_country_flag = PYT_dictatorship
			clr_country_flag = herzland_diplomacy_blocked
			set_country_flag = PYT_established_dictatorship
			clr_country_flag = hide_surpress_fascism
			clr_country_flag = hide_surpress_democratic
			clr_country_flag = hide_surpress_communism
			clr_country_flag = hide_surpress_neutral
			clr_country_flag = hide_censor_press
			load_focus_tree = { tree = greifenmarchen_focus_communist keep_completed = yes }
		}
	}
}

country_event = { #Fascism Coup
	id = marschen.19
	immediate = {log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event marschen.19"}
	title = marschen.19.t
	desc = marschen.19.d

	picture = GFX_event_feast
	is_triggered_only = yes

	option = {
		name = marschen.19.a
		custom_effect_tooltip = ANG_political_tree_tp
		swap_ideas = {
			remove_idea = PYT_the_peasant_republic
			add_idea = PYT_the_new_regime
		}
		hidden_effect = {
			clr_country_flag = PYT_dictatorship
			clr_country_flag = herzland_diplomacy_blocked
			set_country_flag = PYT_established_dictatorship
			clr_country_flag = hide_surpress_fascism
			clr_country_flag = hide_surpress_democratic
			clr_country_flag = hide_surpress_communism
			clr_country_flag = hide_surpress_neutral
			clr_country_flag = hide_censor_press
			load_focus_tree = { tree = greifenmarchen_focus_fascist keep_completed = yes }
		}
	}
}

	title = marschen.20.t
	desc = marschen.20.d

	picture = GFX_event_feast
	is_triggered_only = yes

		swap_ideas = {
			remove_idea = PYT_the_peasant_republic
			add_idea = PYT_the_new_regime
		}

			clr_country_flag = PYT_dictatorship
			set_country_flag = PYT_established_dictatorship
			clr_country_flag = hide_surpress_fascism
			clr_country_flag = hide_surpress_democratic
			clr_country_flag = hide_surpress_communism
			clr_country_flag = hide_surpress_neutral
			clr_country_flag = hide_censor_press

		}

			}
		}
		else_if = {

			}
		}
		else_if = {

			swap_ideas = {

		}

country_event = { #Truthahn Takes Power
	id = marschen.26
	immediate = {log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event marschen.26"}
	title = marschen.26.t
	desc = marschen.26.d

	picture = GFX_event_griffon_with_gun
	is_triggered_only = yes

	option = {
		name = marschen.26.a
		PYT_dietrich_mach = {
			retire = yes
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_dlc = "La Resistance"
			}
			add_country_leader_role = {
				character = PYT_wilke_truthahn

				country_leader={
					desc="PYT_protestant_loonie_desc"
					ideology=rexism
					traits={ eccentric_lar }
					expire="1965.1.1.1"
					id=-1
				}
				promote_leader = yes
			}
		}
		else = {
			add_country_leader_role = {
				character = PYT_wilke_truthahn

				country_leader={
					desc="PYT_protestant_loonie_desc"
					ideology=rexism
					traits={ eccentric }
					expire="1965.1.1.1"
					id=-1
				}
				promote_leader = yes
			}
		}

		hidden_effect = {
			set_country_flag = herzland_diplomacy_blocked
			set_country_flag = PYT_truthahn_takeover
		}
	}
}

country_event = { #The New Duke
	id = marschen.30
	immediate = {log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event marschen.30"}
	title = marschen.30.t
	desc = marschen.30.d

	picture = GFX_event_medieval_castle_on_hill
	is_triggered_only = yes

	option = {
		name = marschen.30.a
		PYT_erebus_whiteplume = {
			set_character_name = PYT_duke_erebus_ii
		}
		add_country_leader_role = {
			character = PYT_erebus_whiteplume
			promote_leader = yes

			country_leader={
				desc="PYT_duke_desc"
				ideology=despotism
				expire="1965.1.1.1"
				id=-1
			}
		}
		add_political_power = -100
		add_stability = -0.20
		clr_country_flag = have_regular_puppets
		if = {
			limit = { has_idea = PYT_the_new_regime }
			swap_ideas = {
				remove_idea = PYT_the_new_regime
				add_idea = PYT_the_new_regime_1
			}
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = { has_idea = PYT_the_new_regime_1 }
			swap_ideas = {
				remove_idea = PYT_the_new_regime_1
				add_idea = PYT_the_new_regime_2
			}
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = { has_idea = PYT_the_new_regime_2 }
			swap_ideas = {
				remove_idea = PYT_the_new_regime_2
				add_idea = PYT_the_new_regime_3
			}
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = { has_idea = PYT_the_new_regime_3 }
			remove_ideas = PYT_the_new_regime_3
		}
		set_party_name = {ideology = neutrality name = PYT_ducal_party long_name = PYT_ducal_party_long }
		set_country_flag = PYT_duchy
		set_cosmetic_tag = PYT_duchy
	}
}

			}
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = { has_idea = PYT_the_new_regime_3 }
			remove_ideas = PYT_the_new_regime_3
		}
	}
}

country_event = { #Legal Opposition
	id = marschen.37
	immediate = {log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event marschen.37"}
	title = marschen.37.t
	desc = marschen.37.d

	picture = GFX_event_western_griffon_city
	is_triggered_only = yes

	option = {
		name = marschen.37.a
		add_political_power = 50
		add_stability = 0.05
		add_war_support = 0.05
		add_popularity = { ideology = democratic popularity = 0.03 }
		add_popularity = { ideology = fascism popularity = 0.03 }
		add_popularity = { ideology = communism popularity = 0.03 }
		if = {
			limit = { has_idea = PYT_the_new_regime }
			swap_ideas = {
				remove_idea = PYT_the_new_regime
				add_idea = PYT_the_new_regime_1
			}
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = { has_idea = PYT_the_new_regime_1 }
			swap_ideas = {
				remove_idea = PYT_the_new_regime_1
				add_idea = PYT_the_new_regime_2
			}
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = { has_idea = PYT_the_new_regime_2 }
			swap_ideas = {
				remove_idea = PYT_the_new_regime_2
				add_idea = PYT_the_new_regime_3
			}
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = { has_idea = PYT_the_new_regime_3 }
			remove_ideas = PYT_the_new_regime_3
		}
	}
}

country_event = { #The New Principality
	id = marschen.39
	immediate = {log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event marschen.39"}
	title = marschen.39.t
	desc = marschen.39.d

	picture = GFX_event_medieval_castle_on_hill
	is_triggered_only = yes

	option = {
		name = marschen.39.a
		add_political_power = 100
		add_stability = 0.10
		add_war_support = 0.05
		clr_country_flag = herzland_diplomacy_blocked
		clr_country_flag = have_regular_puppets
		effect_tooltip = { # I dunno if this created tooltips, but keeping it here in case it did.
			set_country_leader_ideology = harmonic_constitutionalism
		}
		hidden_effect = { # This is used instead of set_country_leader_ideology so he won't lose liberalism ideology role. It is used in ROU.
			add_country_leader_role = {
				character = PYT_archibald_dawnfeather
				promote_leader = yes

				country_leader={
					desc="PYT_archibald_desc"
					ideology=harmonic_constitutionalism
					expire="1965.1.1.1"
					id=-1
				}
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = { has_idea = PYT_the_new_regime }
			swap_ideas = {
				remove_idea = PYT_the_new_regime
				add_idea = PYT_the_new_regime_1
			}
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = { has_idea = PYT_the_new_regime_1 }
			swap_ideas = {
				remove_idea = PYT_the_new_regime_1
				add_idea = PYT_the_new_regime_2
			}
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = { has_idea = PYT_the_new_regime_2 }
			swap_ideas = {
				remove_idea = PYT_the_new_regime_2
				add_idea = PYT_the_new_regime_3
			}
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = { has_idea = PYT_the_new_regime_3 }
			remove_ideas = PYT_the_new_regime_3
		}
		set_country_flag = PYT_principality
		set_cosmetic_tag = PYT_principality
	}
}

country_event = { #Annex Offer
	id = marschen.41
	immediate = {log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event marschen.41"}
	title = marschen.41.t
	desc = marschen.41.d
	picture = GFX_event_griffenheim
	is_triggered_only = yes
	option = {
		name = marschen.41.a
		ai_chance = {
			base = 60
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				has_opinion = { target = PYT value < -25 }
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0.2
				has_opinion = { target = PYT value < 0 }
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 1.2
				has_opinion = { target = PYT value < 25 }
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 1.4
				has_opinion = { target = PYT value > 50 }
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 1.6
				ROOT = { has_government = communism }
				FROM = { has_government = communism }
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 1.6
				ROOT = { has_government = fascism }
				FROM = { has_government = fascism }
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 1.6
				ROOT = { has_government = democratic }
				FROM = { has_government = democratic }
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 1.6
				ROOT = { has_government = neutrality }
				FROM = { has_government = neutrality }
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				FROM = { has_country_flag = ANG_black_claw_takeover }
			}
		}
		custom_effect_tooltip = GAME_OVER_TT
		FROM = { annex_country = { target = ROOT transfer_troops = yes } }
	}
	option = {
		name = marschen.41.b
		ai_chance = { factor = 40 }
		if = {
			limit = {
				is_in_faction_with = FROM
			}
			leave_faction = yes
		}
		FROM = {
			country_event = { id = marschen.42 days = 7 }
			}
		}
	}

			}

			long_name = PYT_HSLP_name_long
		}
		hidden_effect = {
			complete_national_focus = PYT_schmitz
		}
	}

			limit = {
				has_character = FEA_anton_moldernik
			}
			FEA_anton_moldernik = {

			}

		FEA_anton_moldernik = {

country_event = { #Hidden election trigger event
	id = marschen.63
	immediate = {log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event marschen.63"}
	title = marschen.63.t
	desc = marschen.63.d
	hidden = yes
	picture = GFX_event_griffon_back
	is_triggered_only = yes

	option = {
		name = marschen.63.a
		if = {
			limit = {
				NOT = {
					has_country_flag = PYT_established_dictatorship
				}
			}
			country_event = marschen.14
		}
	}
}

	desc = marschen.72.d
	picture = GFX_event_griffenheim
	is_triggered_only = yes

	option = {
		name = marschen.72.a
		PYT_erebus_whiteplume = {
			retire = yes
		}
		add_country_leader_role = {
			character = PYT_pan_griffonian_congress
			country_leader = {
				expire = "1965.1.1"
				ideology = republicanism
				traits = {  }
			}
			promote_leader = yes
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_idea = GRI_grover_vi
			}
			remove_ideas = GRI_grover_vi
		}
		add_political_power = -100
		add_stability = 0.10
		drop_cosmetic_tag = yes
		set_country_flag = GRIF_REPUBLIC
		set_cosmetic_tag = GRIF_REPUBLIC
		hidden_effect = {
			news_event = { id = marschen_news.4 hours = 6 }
		}
	}
}

	id = haukland.29

	title = haukland.29.t
	desc = haukland.29.d
	picture = GFX_event_griffon_with_gun

			base = 100
		}

		add_popularity = {
			ideology = neutrality
			popularity = 0.15
		}
		add_popularity = {
			ideology = democratic
			popularity = 0.15
		}
		HAU_military_council = {
			add_country_leader_role = {
				promote_leader = yes

				country_leader = {
					expire = "1965.1.1"
					ideology = despotism
				}
			}
			add_country_leader_role = {
				promote_leader = yes

				country_leader = {
					expire = "1965.1.1"
					ideology = fascism_ideology
				}
			}
			add_country_leader_role = {
				promote_leader = yes

				country_leader = {
					expire = "1965.1.1"
					ideology = liberalism
				}
			}
			add_country_leader_role = {
				promote_leader = yes

				country_leader = {
					expire = "1965.1.1"
					ideology = democratic_socialism
				}
			}
		}
		load_focus_tree = haukland_republican_focus
		if = {
			limit = { has_character = HAU_hermann_meyer }
			HAU_hermann_meyer = {
				retire = yes
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = { has_character = HAU_onyx_star }
			HAU_onyx_star = {
				retire = yes
			}
		}
		swap_ideas = {
			remove_idea = HAU_airforce_with_a_state
			add_idea = HAU_the_dream_is_not_dead
		}
		set_party_name = {
			ideology = neutrality
			long_name = HAU_republican_party_long
			name = HAU_republican_party
		}
		set_party_name = {
			ideology = democratic
			long_name = HAU_nrp_party_long
			name = HAU_nrp_party
		}
		set_country_flag = HAU_republic_tag
		set_cosmetic_tag = HAU_republic_tag
		hidden_effect = { country_event = { id = haukland.39 days = 5 } }
	}
	option = {
		name = haukland.29.a
		ai_chance = {
			base = 0
		}
		add_stability = 0.05
		add_popularity = {
			ideology = democratic
			popularity = -0.10
		}
		if = {
			limit = { has_character = HAU_erhard_frosch }
			HAU_erhard_frosch = {
				retire = yes
			}
		}
		hidden_effect = { country_event = { id = haukland.40 days = 5 } }
	}

	id = klugetown.2
	immediate = {log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event klugetown.2"}
	title = klugetown.2.t
	desc = klugetown.2.d
	#PLACEHOLDER IMAGE
	picture = GFX_news_bronclyn_bridge
	major = yes
	is_triggered_only = yes
	option = {
		name = klugetown.2.a
		trigger = {
			NOT = {
				original_tag = KLG
			}
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = klugetown.2.b
		trigger = {
			original_tag = KLG
		}
	}
}

add_namespace = lar_fake_intel_units


# delete old intel units created by script
country_event = {
	id = lar_fake_intel_units.1
	title = lar_fake_intel_units.1.t
	desc = lar_fake_intel_units.1.d

	picture = GFX_report_event_generic_factory

	is_triggered_only = yes

	hidden = yes

	immediate = {

		# delete old intel units
		# fake_intel_ids_to_delete contains the id of each unit
		# num_days_for_fake_intel_id@id contains the num hours that it is created

		clear_temp_array = ids_to_remove

		for_each_loop = {
			array = fake_intel_ids_to_delete

			set_temp_variable = { passed_days = global.num_days }
			subtract_from_temp_variable = { passed_days = num_days_for_fake_intel_id@var:v }

			if = {
				limit = { check_variable = { passed_days > 85 } }
				add_to_temp_array = { ids_to_remove = v }
				delete_unit = {
					id = v
				}
			}
		}

		for_each_loop = {
			array = ids_to_remove

			remove_from_array = { fake_intel_ids_to_delete = v }
			clear_variable = num_days_for_fake_intel_id@var:v
		}
	}

	option = {
		name = excellent
	}
}

add_namespace = occupied_countries

#instantiate a collabration government
country_event = {
	id = occupied_countries.1
	title = occupied_countries.1.title
	desc = occupied_countries.1.desc

	# todo lar
	picture = GFX_report_event_canadian_soldiers

	is_triggered_only = yes

	option = {
		name = occupied_countries.1.a

		ai_chance = {
			base = 100
		}

		if = {
			limit = {
				#has_core_occupation_modifier = {
				#	occupied_country_tag = FROM.FROM
				#	modifier = compliance_80
				#}
				NOT = {
					any_country_with_original_tag = { #copy of is_available_to_collaboration_government but from from scope because of events
						original_tag_to_check = FROM.FROM
						is_puppet_of = PREV # if already created one do not create another
						has_autonomy_state = autonomy_collaboration_government
					}
				}
			}
			set_temp_variable = { country_to_initiate = FROM.FROM }
			instantiate_collaboration_government = yes
		}
	}

	option = {
		name = occupied_countries.1.b
		# do nothing
	}
}

# create uprising
country_event = {
	id = occupied_countries.2

	is_triggered_only = yes

	hidden = yes

	immediate = {
		FROM = {
			if = {
				limit = {
					has_core_occupation_modifier = {
						occupied_country_tag = FROM
						modifier = resistance_90
					}
				}

				set_temp_variable = { occupier_country = THIS }
				set_temp_variable = { occupied_country = FROM }
				set_temp_variable = { new_occupied_country = FROM }

				#if = { #warsaw achievement
				#	limit = {
				#		var:occupied_country = { original_tag = POL }
				#	}
				#	set_global_flag = warsaw_liberated_self_flag
				#}


				set_temp_variable = { civil_war_country_picked = 0 }
				if = {
					## pick an existing civil war country
					limit = {
						FROM = {
							tag = PREV
						}
					}

					random_country_with_original_tag = {
						original_tag_to_check = var:occupier_country

						limit = {
							NOT = { tag = var:occupier_country }
							has_war_with = var:occupier_country
						}

						set_temp_variable = { civil_war_country_picked = 1 }
						set_temp_variable = { new_occupied_country = this }
					}
				}

				if = {
					## create a new country if necesarry
					limit = {
						check_variable = { civil_war_country_picked = 0 }
						FROM = {
							#if resistance country exists and not at war with occupier (whitepaced/subjected etc) create a country instead
							exists = yes
							NOT = { has_war_with = occupier_country }
						}
					}
					create_dynamic_country = {
						original_tag = FROM
						copy_tag = FROM

						set_temp_variable = { new_occupied_country = THIS }
						set_AI_strategies_on_every_possible_country_delayed = yes
					}
				}


				# change ideology if necessary
				if = {
					limit = {
						var:occupied_country = {
							#only change ideology if we are not creating a new country and old country is not existing
							OR = {
								exists = no
								NOT = { tag = new_occupied_country }
							}
						}
					}

					# booleans that will be allowed to change ideology
					set_temp_variable = { allowed_party_neutrality = 1 }
					set_temp_variable = { allowed_party_democratic = 1 }
					set_temp_variable = { allowed_party_fascism = 1 }
					set_temp_variable = { allowed_party_communism = 1 }

					# do not change ideology of occupier country
					var:occupier_country = {
						remove_from_allowed_party = yes
					}

					if = {
						# if occupied country exists and different than new country
						# it is white peaced & subject of occupier. ignore its ideology as well
						limit = { NOT = { check_variable = { new_occupied_country = occupied_country } } }
						var:occupied_country = {
							remove_from_allowed_party = yes
						}
					}

					# change government if necesarry
					var:new_occupied_country = {
						if = {
							# check if our current ideology is OK
							limit = {
								OR = {
									AND = {
										has_government = democratic
										check_variable = { allowed_party_democratic = 0 }
									}
									AND = {
										has_government = fascism
										check_variable = { allowed_party_fascism = 0 }
									}
									AND = {
										has_government = communism
										check_variable = { allowed_party_communism = 0 }
									}
									AND = {
										has_government = neutrality
										check_variable = { allowed_party_neutrality = 0 }
									}
								}
							}

							random_list = {
								allowed_party_democratic = {
									set_popularities = {
										democratic = 100
									}
									set_politics = { ruling_party = democratic elections_allowed = yes }
								}
								allowed_party_fascism = {
									set_popularities = {
										fascism = 100
									}
									set_politics = { ruling_party = fascism elections_allowed = no }
								}
								allowed_party_communism = {
									set_popularities = {
										communism = 100
									}
									set_politics = { ruling_party = communism elections_allowed = no }
								}
								allowed_party_neutrality = {
									set_popularities = {
										neutrality = 100
									}
									set_politics = { ruling_party = neutrality elections_allowed = no }
								}
							}
						}
					}
				}

				# create resistance template for armies to spawn
				var:new_occupied_country = {
					if = {
						limit = { NOT = { has_country_flag = created_civil_war_template } }
						set_country_flag = created_civil_war_template

						division_template = {
							name = "Resistance"
							is_locked = yes
							regiments = {
								infantry = { x = 0 y = 0 }
								infantry = { x = 0 y = 1 }

								infantry = { x = 1 y = 0 }
								infantry = { x = 1 y = 1 }

								infantry = { x = 2 y = 0 }
								infantry = { x = 2 y = 1 }
							}
						}
					}
				}


				clear_temp_array = checked_neighbours
				every_controlled_state = {
					limit = {
						occupied_country_tag = occupied_country
						impassable = no
					}

					# move our armies to back home
					teleport_armies = {
						limit = {
							OR = {
								is_ally_with = occupier_country
								has_military_access_to = occupier_country
							}
						}
						to_state_array = owned_controlled_states
					}

					# transfer state
					if = {
						limit = { has_resistance = yes }
						set_resistance = 0
					}
					var:new_occupied_country = {
						transfer_state = PREV
					}

					if = {
						limit = {
							var:occupier_country = {
								check_variable = { resistance_already_inited@var:occupied_country = 0 }
							}
						}

						# create resistance units, number is relative to size of industry
						set_temp_variable = { num_units_to_create = building_level@arms_factory }
						add_to_temp_variable = { num_units_to_create = building_level@industrial_complex }
						divide_temp_variable = { num_units_to_create = 3 }
						add_to_temp_variable = { num_units_to_create = 2 }
						round_temp_variable = num_units_to_create
						clamp_temp_variable = { var = num_units_to_create min = 2 max = 6 }
						for_loop_effect = {
							end = num_units_to_create

							create_unit = {
								division = "division_template = \"Resistance\" start_experience_factor = 1 start_equipment_factor = 1"
								owner = new_occupied_country
							}
						}
					}

					# also check neighbouring core states of the occupier that are not captured yet
					# move our armies so they are not surrounded/create pockets
					every_neighbor_state = {
						limit = {
							is_owned_and_controlled_by = occupied_country
							is_core_of = occupied_country
							not = { is_in_array = { checked_neighbours = this } }
						}
						add_to_temp_array = { checked_neighbours = this }

						teleport_armies = {
							limit = {
								OR = {
									is_ally_with = occupier_country
									has_military_access_to = occupier_country
								}
							}
							to_state_array = owned_controlled_states
						}

						set_state_province_controller = {
							controller = occupied_country
							limit = {
								is_ally_with = occupier_country
							}
						}
					}
				}

				# create war if necesarry
				if = {
					limit = { NOT = { has_war_with = new_occupied_country } }
					declare_war_on = { target = new_occupied_country type = annex_everything }
				}

				var:occupier_country = {
					set_variable = { resistance_already_inited@var:occupied_country = 1 }
				}

			}
		}
	}
}

add_namespace = mtg_exile_leader_added
add_namespace = mtg_exile_government

#unit leader offers his service

	title = mtg_exile_leader_added.1.t
	desc = mtg_exile_leader_added.1.desc

	is_triggered_only = yes

	option = {
		name = mtg_exile_leader_added.1.a
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 1
		}
	}
}

# Government in Exile requests permission from host to return home via decision

country_event = {
	id = mtg_exile_government.2
	immediate = {log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event mtg_exile_government.2"}
	title = mtg_exile_government.2.title
	desc = mtg_exile_government.2.desc

	picture = GFX_event_colthage_street

	is_triggered_only = yes

	option = {
		name = mtg_exile_government.2.a

		FROM = {
			add_opinion_modifier = {
				target = ROOT
				modifier = our_liberators
			}
		}
		end_exile = FROM
	}

	option = {
		name = mtg_exile_government.2.b

		FROM = {
			add_legitimacy = -10
		}
	}
}

# Host nation requesting navy from GiE
country_event = {
	id = mtg_exile_government.3
	immediate = {log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event mtg_exile_government.3"}
	title = mtg_exile_government.3.title
	desc = mtg_exile_government.3.desc

	picture = GFX_event_colthage_street

	is_triggered_only = yes

	# Yes we will
	option = {
		name = mtg_exile_government.3.a
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 1
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				has_navy_size = {
				    size > 75
				}
			}
		}
		transfer_navy = {
			target = FROM
			is_government_in_exile = yes
		}
		add_legitimacy = 10
		FROM = {
			country_event = { id = mtg_exile_government.4 hours = 6 }
		}
	}

	# No ty
	option = {
		name = mtg_exile_government.3.b
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 1
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				has_navy_size = {
				    size < 25
				}
			}
		}
		FROM = {
			country_event = { id = mtg_exile_government.5 hours = 6 }
		}
	}
}

	is_triggered_only = yes

	# Good

		name = excellent
		effect_tooltip = {
			FROM = {
				transfer_navy = {
					target = ROOT
				}
				add_legitimacy = 10
			}
		}
	}
}

# generic events
add_namespace = mtg_generic

# Notification event of changing ideology
country_event = {
	id = mtg_generic.1
	immediate = {log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event mtg_generic.1"}
	title = mtg_generic.1.title
	desc = mtg_generic.1.desc

	picture = GFX_event_colthage_street

	is_triggered_only = yes

	# Good
	option = {
		name = mtg_generic.1.a
		if = {
			limit = {
				FROM = {
					has_government = neutrality
				}
			}
			effect_tooltip = {
				add_timed_idea = {
					idea = political_turmoil
					days = 365
				}
				set_politics = {
					ruling_party = neutrality
					elections_allowed = no
				}
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				FROM = {
					has_government = democratic
				}
			}
			effect_tooltip = {
				add_timed_idea = {
					idea = political_turmoil
					days = 365
				}
				set_politics = {
					ruling_party = democratic
					elections_allowed = yes
				}
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				FROM = {
					has_government = fascism
				}
			}
			effect_tooltip = {
				add_timed_idea = {
					idea = political_turmoil
					days = 365
				}
				set_politics = {
					ruling_party = fascism
					elections_allowed = no
				}
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				FROM = {
					has_government = communism
				}
			}
			effect_tooltip = {
				add_timed_idea = {
					idea = political_turmoil
					days = 365
				}
				set_politics = {
					ruling_party = communism
					elections_allowed = no
				}
			}
		}
	}
}

	is_triggered_only = yes

	hidden = yes

	fire_only_once = yes

	immediate = {
		news_event = { id = nuke_dropped.1 days = 1 }
	}

	option = {
	}
}

# Nuclear Attack PLACEHOLDER
news_event = {
	id = nuke_dropped.1
	immediate = {log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event nuke_dropped.1"}
	title = nuke_dropped.1.t
	desc = nuke_dropped.1.d
	picture = GFX_news_event_nuke

	major = yes

	is_triggered_only = yes
	trigger = {
		NOT = {
			FROM = {
				state = 251
			}
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = nuke_dropped.1.a
		trigger = {
			NOT = { FROM = { FROM = { is_owned_by = ROOT } } }
		}
	}

	option = {
		name = nuke_dropped.1.b
		trigger = {
			FROM = { FROM = { is_owned_by = ROOT } }
		}
	}
}

# Nuclear Attack on Griffonstone
news_event = {
	id = nuke_dropped.101
	title = nuke_dropped.101.t
	desc = nuke_dropped.101.d
	picture = GFX_news_event_nuke

	major = yes

	is_triggered_only = yes

	option = {
		name = nuke_dropped.101.a
		trigger = {
			NOT = {
				owns_state = 389
				tag = event_target:griffonstone_nuker
			}
		}
	}

	option = {
		name = nuke_dropped.101.b
		trigger = {
			owns_state = 389
		}
		add_ideas = BOI_rage_on_griffonstone_nuker
	}

	option = {
		name = nuke_dropped.101.c
		trigger = {
			tag = event_target:griffonstone_nuker
			NOT = { original_tag = HIE }
		}
		custom_effect_tooltip = despicable_action
		set_country_flag = nuked_griffonstone
		add_political_power = -150
		add_stability = -0.10
		add_war_support = -0.10
		effect_tooltip = {
			FROM.FROM.OWNER = {
				add_ideas = BOI_rage_on_griffonstone_nuker
			}
		}
	}

	option = {
		name = nuke_dropped.101.e # This is why we use .desc instead of .d - Scars
		trigger = {
			tag = event_target:griffonstone_nuker
			original_tag = HIE
		}
		custom_effect_tooltip = HIE_totally_justified_action
		set_country_flag = nuked_griffonstone
		add_political_power = 150
		add_stability = 0.10
		add_war_support = 0.10
		effect_tooltip = {
			FROM.FROM.OWNER = {
				add_ideas = BOI_rage_on_griffonstone_nuker
			}
		}
	}
}

# Nuclear Attack on Greifenheim
news_event = {
	id = nuke_dropped.102
	immediate = { log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event nuke_dropped.102" }
	title = nuke_dropped.102.t
	desc = {
		trigger = {
		    From.From.Owner = {
		        tag = GRI
		    }
			NOT = {
				has_global_flag = GRI_grover_vi_dead
				From.From.Owner = {
					has_country_leader = {
						character = GRI_emperor_grover_vi
						ruling_only = yes
					}
					has_focus_tree = imperial_grover_focus
				}
			}
		}
		text = nuke_dropped.102.d.grover_alive
	}
	desc = {
		trigger = {
		    OR = {
		        NOT = {
		            From.From.Owner = {
		                tag = GRI
		            }
		        }
		        AND = {
		            has_global_flag = GRI_grover_vi_dead }
                    From.From.Owner = {
		                tag = GRI
		            }
		        }
		    }
		text = nuke_dropped.102.d.grover_ded
	}
	desc = {
		trigger = {
			From.From.Owner = {
			    tag = GRI
				OR = {
					has_country_leader = {
						character = GRI_emperor_grover_vi
						ruling_only = yes
					}
					has_focus_tree = imperial_grover_focus
				}
			}
		}
		text = nuke_dropped.102.d.grover_emperor
	}
	picture = GFX_news_event_nuke

	major = yes

	is_triggered_only = yes

	option = {
		name = nuke_dropped.102.a
		trigger = {
			NOT = { owns_state = 382 }
		}
	}

	option = {
		name = nuke_dropped.102.b
		trigger = {
			owns_state = 382
		}
	}
}

# Nuclear Attack on Crystal City
news_event = {
	id = nuke_dropped.109
	immediate = { log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event nuke_dropped.109" }
	title = nuke_dropped.109.t
	desc = {
		trigger = {
			CRY = {
				has_idea = crystal_heart
				exists = yes
			}
		}
		text = nuke_dropped.109.d.crystal_heart
	}
	desc = {
		trigger = {
			CRY = {
				OR = {
					NOT = {
						has_idea = crystal_heart
					}
					exists = no
				}
			}
		}
		text = nuke_dropped.109.d.no_crystal_heart
	}
	picture = GFX_news_event_nuke

	major = yes

	is_triggered_only = yes

	option = {
		name = nuke_dropped.109.a
		trigger = {
			NOT = { owns_state = 344 }
			CRY = {
				has_idea = crystal_heart
				exists = yes
			}
		}
	}

	option = {
		name = nuke_dropped.109.b
		trigger = {
			owns_state = 344
			CRY = {
				has_idea = crystal_heart
				exists = yes
			}
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = nuke_dropped.109.c
		trigger = {
			NOT = { owns_state = 344 }
			CRY = {
				OR = {
					NOT = {
						has_idea = crystal_heart
					}
					exists = no
				}
			}
		}
	}

	option = {
		name = nuke_dropped.109.d
		trigger = {
			owns_state = 344
			CRY = {
				OR = {
					NOT = {
						has_idea = crystal_heart
					}
					exists = no
				}
			}
		}
	}
}

news_event = { # Thunder Tiger goes nuclear
	id = nuke_dropped.115
	immediate = { log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event nuke_dropped.115" }
	immediate = {
		hidden_effect = {
			every_country = {
				limit = {
					has_idea = golden_city
				}
				swap_ideas = {
					remove_idea = golden_city
					add_idea = golden_city_ruined
				}
			}
		}
	}
	title = nuke_dropped.115.t
	desc = nuke_dropped.115.d
	picture = GFX_news_event_nuke

	major = yes

	is_triggered_only = yes

	option = {
		name = nuke_dropped.115.a
		trigger = {
			NOT = { owns_state = 1139 }
		}
		effect_tooltip = {
			every_country = {
				limit = {
					OR = {
						has_idea = golden_city
						has_idea = golden_city_ruined
					}
				}
				swap_ideas = {
					remove_idea = golden_city
					add_idea = golden_city_ruined
				}
			}
		}
	}

	option = {
		name = nuke_dropped.115.b
		trigger = {
			owns_state = 1139
		}
		effect_tooltip = {
			every_country = {
				limit = {
					OR = {
						has_idea = golden_city
						has_idea = golden_city_ruined
					}
				}
				swap_ideas = {
					remove_idea = golden_city
					add_idea = golden_city_ruined
				}
			}
		}
	}
}
add_namespace = oppaperclip


country_event = {
	id = oppaperclip.1
	immediate = {log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event oppaperclip.1"}
	hidden = yes

	is_triggered_only = yes
	option = {
		random_state = {
			limit = {
				owner = {
					OR = {
						tag = ROOT
						is_subject_of = ROOT
					}
				}
				has_state_flag = op_paperclip_state
			}
			clr_state_flag = op_paperclip_state
			every_state = {
				limit = {
					owner = {
						OR = {
							tag = ROOT
							is_subject_of = ROOT
						}
					}
					check_variable = { previous_owner = PREV.previous_owner }
				}
				add_to_variable = { PREV.total_industry_value = industrial_complex_level }
				add_to_variable = { PREV.total_industry_value = arms_factory_level }
				clr_state_flag = op_paperclip_state
			}
			set_variable = { previous_owner_industry_ratio = total_industry_value }
			divide_variable = { previous_owner_industry_ratio = previous_owner_industry_value }
			multiply_variable = { previous_owner_industry_ratio = 100 }
			if = {
				limit = { ROOT = { has_pre_industrial_society = yes } }
				multiply_variable = { previous_owner_industry_ratio = 0.8 }
			}
			else_if = {
				limit = { ROOT = { has_agrarian_society = yes } }
				multiply_variable = { previous_owner_industry_ratio = 0.7 }
			}
			else_if = {
				limit = { ROOT = { has_tribal_society = yes } }
				multiply_variable = { previous_owner_industry_ratio = 0.6 }
			}
			else_if = {
				limit = {
					ROOT = {
						has_idea = detached_country
						NOT = { has_idea = DED_Modern_Technology_idea }
					}
				}
				multiply_variable = { previous_owner_industry_ratio = 0.5 }
			}
			round_variable = previous_owner_industry_ratio
			clamp_variable = {
				var = previous_owner_industry_ratio
				min = 0
				max = 100
			}
			var:previous_owner = {
				ROOT = { paperclip_tech = yes }
			}
			every_state = {
				limit = {
					owner = {
						OR = {
							tag = ROOT
							is_subject_of = ROOT
						}
					}
					check_variable = { previous_owner = PREV.previous_owner }
				}
				clear_variable = previous_owner
				clear_variable = previous_owner_industry_value
				clear_variable = previous_owner_industry_ratio
				clear_variable = total_industry_value
				clear_variable = previous_owner
				clear_variable = previous_owner_industry_value
			}
		}
	}
}

###########################

# Class Conflicts Divide [Root.GetName]
country_event = {
	id = political.4
	immediate = {log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event political.4"}
	title = political.4.t
	desc = political.4.d
	picture = GFX_event_eqs_communists

	trigger = {
		has_idea_with_trait = communist_revolutionary
		NOT = { has_government = communism }
		communism > 0.2
		NOT = { communism > 0.59 }
		check_has_focus_tree_to_switch_to_communism = yes
	}

	mean_time_to_happen = {
		days = 365
		modifier = {
			factor = 0.5
			has_country_flag = communism_popular_movement
		}
	}

	option = {
		name = political.4.a
		add_popularity = {
			ideology = communism
			popularity = 0.05
		}
		add_stability = -0.05
	}
}

# Soldiers Desert to Communist Partisans
country_event = {
	id = political.5
	immediate = {log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event political.5"}
	title = political.5.t
	desc = political.5.d
	picture = GFX_event_eqs_communists

	trigger = {
		has_idea_with_trait = communist_revolutionary
		NOT = { has_government = communism }
		communism > 0.3
		NOT = { communism > 0.59 }
		NOT = { has_idea = communist_partisans_recruiting }
		check_has_focus_tree_to_switch_to_communism = yes
	}

	mean_time_to_happen = {
		days = 365
		modifier = {
			factor = 0.5
			has_country_flag = communism_popular_movement
		}
	}

	option = {
		name = political.5.a
		add_popularity = {
			ideology = communism
			popularity = 0.05
		}
		add_ideas = communist_partisans_recruiting
	}
}

# Fascist Assault Divisions Form
country_event = {
	id = political.11
	immediate = {log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event political.11"}
	title = political.11.t
	desc = political.11.d
	picture = GFX_event_griffon_soldier

	trigger = {
		has_idea_with_trait = fascist_demagogue
		NOT = { has_government = fascism }
		fascism > 0.3
		NOT = { fascism > 0.59 }
		NOT = { has_idea = fascist_assault_divisions }
		check_has_focus_tree_to_switch_to_fascism = yes
	}

	mean_time_to_happen = {
		days = 365
		modifier = {
			factor = 0.5
			has_country_flag = fascism_popular_movement
		}
	}

	option = {
		name = political.11.a
		add_popularity = {
			ideology = fascism
			popularity = 0.05
		}
		add_ideas = fascist_assault_divisions
	}
}

# The Threat of Communism
country_event = {
	id = political.12
	immediate = {log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event political.12"}
	title = political.12.t
	desc = political.12.d
	picture = GFX_event_griffon_para

	trigger = {
		has_idea_with_trait = fascist_demagogue
		NOT = { has_government = fascism }
		fascism > 0.25
		NOT = { fascism > 0.59 }
		check_has_focus_tree_to_switch_to_fascism = yes
		any_neighbor_country = {
			has_government = communism
		}
	}

	mean_time_to_happen = {
		days = 365
		modifier = {
			factor = 0.5
			has_country_flag = fascism_popular_movement
		}
	}

	option = {
		name = political.12.a
		add_popularity = {
			ideology = fascism
			popularity = 0.1
		}
	}
}

# Democratic Opposition Forming
country_event = {
	id = political.15
	immediate = {log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event political.15"}
	title = political.15.t
	desc = political.15.d
	picture = GFX_event_moderates_discontent

	trigger = {
		has_idea_with_trait = democratic_reformer
		NOT = { has_government = democratic }
		NOT = { has_country_flag = democracy_opposition_formed }
		is_subject = no
		NOT = { democratic > 0.59 }
		check_has_focus_tree_to_switch_to_democratic = yes
	}

	mean_time_to_happen = {
		days = 300
		modifier = {
			factor = 0.5
			has_country_flag = democracy_popular_movement
		}
	}

	option = {
		name = political.15.a
		add_popularity = {
			ideology = democratic
			popularity = 0.05
		}
		add_stability = -0.05
		set_country_flag = democracy_opposition_formed
	}
}

# Public Call for Elections
country_event = {
	id = political.16
	immediate = {log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event political.16"}
	title = political.16.t
	desc = political.16.d
	picture = GFX_event_moderates_discontent

	trigger = {
		has_idea_with_trait = democratic_reformer
		NOT = { has_government = democratic }
		has_country_flag = democracy_opposition_formed
		NOT = { has_idea = democratic_opposition_voicing_protests }
		check_has_focus_tree_to_switch_to_democratic = yes
	}

	mean_time_to_happen = {
		days = 150
	}

	option = {
		name = political.16.a
	}

	option = {
		name = political.16.b
		add_political_power = -20
		add_ideas = democratic_opposition_voicing_protests
	}
}
