### > 50% support
# political.18 Fascist

country_event = {
	id = political.18
	immediate = {log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event political.18"}
	title = political.18.t
	desc = political.18.d
	picture = GFX_event_griffon_para

	is_triggered_only = yes

	#trigger = {
		#	fascism > 0.5
		#	NOT = { has_government = fascism }
		#	NOT = { has_idea = fascist_revolutionaries }
		#	NOT = { has_idea = reign_of_terror }
		#	is_subject = no
		#	has_civil_war = no
		#}

	#mean_time_to_happen = {
		#	days = 30
		#}

	#option = {
		#	name = political.18.a
		#	add_political_power = -100
		#	add_popularity = {
			#		ideology = fascism
			#		popularity = -0.10
			#	}
		#	add_timed_idea = {
			#		idea = fascist_revolutionaries
			#		days = 365
			#	}
		#}

	#option = {
		#	name = political.18.b
		#	add_timed_idea = {
			#		idea = fascist_revolutionaries
			#		days = 365
			#	}
		#}

	option = {
		name = political.18.c
		set_politics = {
			ruling_party = fascism
			elections_allowed = no
		}
		add_stability = -0.05
	}
}

# political.19 Communist

country_event = {
	id = political.19
	immediate = {log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event political.19"}

	desc = political.19.d

# political.20 Democratic

country_event = {
	id = political.20
	immediate = {log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event political.20"}
	title = political.20.t
	desc = political.20.d
	picture = GFX_event_moderates_discontent

	is_triggered_only = yes

	#trigger = {
		#	democratic > 0.5
		#	NOT = { has_government = democratic }
		#	NOT = { has_idea = democratic_revolutionaries }
		#	NOT = { has_idea = reign_of_terror }
		#	is_subject = no
		#	has_civil_war = no
		#}

	#mean_time_to_happen = {
		#	days = 30
		#}

	#option = {
		#	name = political.20.a
		#	add_political_power = -100
		#	add_popularity = {
			#		ideology = democratic
			#		popularity = -0.10
			#	}
		#	add_timed_idea = {
			#		idea = democratic_revolutionaries
			#		days = 365
			#	}
		#}

	#option = {
		#	name = political.20.b
		#	add_timed_idea = {
			#		idea = democratic_revolutionaries
			#		days = 365
			#	}
		#}

	option = {
		name = political.20.c
		if = {
			limit = { has_government = fascism }
			add_timed_idea = { idea = fascism_defeated days = 730 }
		}
		if = {
			limit = { has_government = communism }
			add_timed_idea = { idea = communism_defeated days = 730 }
		}
		set_politics = {
			ruling_party = democratic
			elections_allowed = yes
		}
		add_stability = -0.05
	}
}


### Revolution
# political.21 Fascist
country_event = {
	id = political.21
	immediate = {log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event political.21"}
	title = political.21.t
	desc = political.21.d
	picture = GFX_event_griffon_with_gun

	trigger = {
		is_ai = no
		fascism > 0.7
		num_of_controlled_states > 1
		#has_idea = fascist_revolutionaries
		NOT = { has_government = fascism }
		has_civil_war = no
		check_has_focus_tree_to_switch_to_fascism = yes
		if = {
			limit = {
				is_ai = yes
				OR = {
					original_tag = JEB
					original_tag = JES
					original_tag = JRR
					original_tag = VIN
				}
			}
			NOT = { country_exists = JER }
		}
		NOT = {
			original_tag = KIR
			original_tag = KIS
			original_tag = KIC
		}
	}

	mean_time_to_happen = {
		days = 2
	}

	immediate = {
		hidden_effect = { remove_ideas = fascist_revolutionaries }
	}

	option = {
		name = political.21.a
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 0
		}
		start_civil_war = {
			ideology = fascism
			size = 0.5
		}
	}

	option = {
		name = political.21.b
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_government = democratic
			}
			start_civil_war = {
				ruling_party = fascism
				ideology = democratic
				size = 0.5
				keep_political_leader = yes
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_government = communism
			}
			start_civil_war = {
				ruling_party = fascism
				ideology = communism
				size = 0.5
				keep_political_leader = yes
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_government = neutrality
			}
			start_civil_war = {
				ruling_party = fascism
				ideology = neutrality
				size = 0.5
				keep_political_leader = yes
			}
		}
	}
}
# political.22 Communist
country_event = {
	id = political.22
	immediate = {log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event political.22"}
	title = political.22.t
	desc = political.22.d
	picture = GFX_event_pony_march

	trigger = {
		is_ai = no
		communism > 0.7
		num_of_controlled_states > 1
		#has_idea = communist_revolutionaries
		NOT = { has_government = communism }
		has_civil_war = no
		check_has_focus_tree_to_switch_to_communism = yes
		if = {
			limit = {
				is_ai = yes
				OR = {
					original_tag = JEB
					original_tag = JES
					original_tag = JRR
					original_tag = VIN
				}
			}
			NOT = { country_exists = JER }
		}
		NOT = {
			original_tag = KIR
			original_tag = KIS
			original_tag = KIC
		}
	}

	mean_time_to_happen = {
		days = 2
	}

	immediate = {
		hidden_effect = { remove_ideas = communist_revolutionaries }
	}

	option = {
		name = political.22.a
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 0
		}
		start_civil_war = {
			ideology = communism
			size = 0.5
		}
	}

	option = {
		name = political.22.b
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_government = democratic
			}
			start_civil_war = {
				ruling_party = communism
				ideology = democratic
				size = 0.5
				keep_political_leader = yes
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_government = fascism
			}
			start_civil_war = {
				ruling_party = communism
				ideology = fascism
				size = 0.5
				keep_political_leader = yes
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_government = neutrality
			}
			start_civil_war = {
				ruling_party = communism
				ideology = neutrality
				size = 0.5
				keep_political_leader = yes
			}
		}
	}
}
# political.23 Democratic
country_event = {
	id = political.23
	immediate = {log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event political.23"}
	title = political.23.t
	desc = political.23.d
	picture = GFX_event_democratic_protest

	trigger = {
		is_ai = no
		democratic > 0.7
		num_of_controlled_states > 1
		#has_idea = democratic_revolutionaries
		NOT = { has_government = democratic }
		has_civil_war = no
		check_has_focus_tree_to_switch_to_democratic = yes
		if = {
			limit = {
				is_ai = yes
				OR = {
					original_tag = JEB
					original_tag = JES
					original_tag = JRR
					original_tag = VIN
				}
			}
			NOT = { country_exists = JER }
		}
		NOT = {
			original_tag = KIR
			original_tag = KIS
			original_tag = KIC
		}
	}

	mean_time_to_happen = {
		days = 2
	}

	immediate = {
		hidden_effect = { remove_ideas = democratic_revolutionaries }
	}

	option = {
		name = political.23.a
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 0
		}
		start_civil_war = {
			ideology = democratic
			size = 0.5
		}
	}

	option = {
		name = political.23.b
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_government = neutrality
			}
			start_civil_war = {
				ruling_party = democratic
				ideology = neutrality
				size = 0.5
				keep_political_leader = yes
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_government = fascism
			}
			add_timed_idea = { idea = fascism_defeated days = 730 }
			start_civil_war = {
				ruling_party = democratic
				ideology = fascism
				size = 0.5
				keep_political_leader = yes
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_government = communism
			}
			add_timed_idea = { idea = communism_defeated days = 730 }
			start_civil_war = {
				ruling_party = democratic
				ideology = communism
				size = 0.5
				keep_political_leader = yes
			}
		}
	}
}

### Suppressed
# political.24 Fascist
country_event = {
	id = political.24
	immediate = {log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event political.24"}
	title = political.24.t
	desc = political.24.d
	picture = GFX_event_griffon_soldier

	trigger = {
		fascism < 0.3
		has_idea = fascist_revolutionaries
	}

	mean_time_to_happen = {
		days = 2
	}

	option = {
		name = political.24.a
		remove_ideas = fascist_revolutionaries
	}
}

# Remove neutral foreign policy if fascist or commie
country_event = {
	id = political.27
	immediate = {log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event political.27"}
	title = political.27.t
	desc = {
		text = political.27.d_fascism
		trigger = { has_government = fascism }
	}
	desc = {
		text = political.27.d_communism
		trigger = { has_government = communism }
	}
	picture = GFX_event_griffon_soldier

	trigger = {
		OR = {
			has_government = fascism
			has_government = communism
		}
		has_idea = neutrality_idea
	}

	mean_time_to_happen = {
		days = 2
	}

	option = {
		name = political.27.a
		remove_ideas = neutrality_idea
	}
}

# Country has same ideology as revolter
country_event = {
	id = political.28
	immediate = {log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event political.28"}
	title = political.28.t
	desc = political.28.d

	picture = GFX_event_griffon_royal_guard

	trigger = {
		has_civil_war = yes
		OR = {
			is_ai = no
			is_dynamic_civil_war_tag = no
		}
		any_enemy_country = {
			NOT = { tag = ROOT }
			original_tag = ROOT
			has_government = ROOT
		}
		NOT = {
			has_country_flag = EQS_april_fools
			has_country_flag = ZAI_doctrinal_conflict
			has_country_flag = ABY_uprising_puppet
		}
		NOT = {
			is_subject_of = CFR
			has_country_flag = CFR_civil_war_incited_here
		}
		NOT = {
			has_country_flag = KIR_rising_sun_breakaway_flag
			has_country_flag = KIR_winter_frost_breakaway_flag
			has_country_flag = KIR_autumn_blaze_breakaway_flag
			has_country_flag = KIR_roaring_fire_breakaway_flag
		}
	}

	mean_time_to_happen = {
		days = 2
	}

	option = {
		name = political.28.a
		random_other_country = {
			limit = {
				original_tag = ROOT
				NOT = { tag = ROOT }
			}
			ROOT = { annex_country = { target = PREV transfer_troops = yes } }
		}
	}
}

# After Peace Conference, suggest unification
country_event = {
	id = political.31
	title = political.31.t
	desc = political.31.desc

	picture = GFX_report_event_journalists_speech
	is_triggered_only = yes
	trigger = {
		is_subject = no
		NOT = { has_country_flag = yes_to_unification_flag }
		NOT = { has_country_flag = no_to_unification_flag }
		any_country_with_original_tag = {
			original_tag_to_check = ROOT
			NOT = { tag = ROOT }
			is_subject = no
			has_government = ROOT
			has_war = no
		}
	}

	immediate = {
		# LOG = "[ROOT.GetLeader]'s [ROOT.GetName] got event" #TODO_TA Remove logging
		IF = {
			limit = {
				has_global_flag = global_unification_request_sent_flag
			}
			clr_global_flag = global_unification_request_sent_flag
		}
	}

	option = {
		name = political.31.a
		set_country_flag = yes_to_unification_flag
		clr_country_flag = unification_request_sent_flag
	}
	option = {
		name = political.31.b
		ai_chance = {
			base = 0
		}
		set_country_flag = no_to_unification_flag
		clr_country_flag = unification_request_sent_flag
	}
}

# Unification event
country_event = {
	id = political.32
	title = political.32.t
	desc = political.32.desc

	picture = GFX_report_event_journalists_speech

	trigger = {
		is_subject = no
		has_country_flag = yes_to_unification_flag
		any_other_country = {
			NOT = { tag = ROOT }
			original_tag = ROOT
			has_country_flag = yes_to_unification_flag
			is_subject = no
			has_government = ROOT
			has_war = no
		}
		NOT = {
			any_other_country = {
				original_tag = ROOT
				has_government = ROOT
				has_country_flag = unification_request_sent_flag
			}
		}
	}
	mean_time_to_happen = {
		days = 2
	}
	immediate = {
		# LOG = "[ROOT.GetLeader]'s [ROOT.GetName] to unify countries" #TODO_TA Remove logging

	}

	option = {
		name = political.32.a
		trigger = {
			ROOT = { is_ai = no }
		}
		clr_country_flag = yes_to_unification_flag
		clr_country_flag = unification_request_sent_flag
		#log = "Player ROOT [ROOT.GetName] to annex"
		every_other_country = {
			limit = {
				original_tag = ROOT
				has_country_flag = yes_to_unification_flag
				is_subject = no
				has_government = ROOT
				has_war = no
			}
			clr_country_flag = yes_to_unification_flag
			ROOT = { annex_country = { target = PREV transfer_troops = yes } }
		}
		news_event = {
			id = news.350
			hours = 8
			random_hours = 8
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = political.32.b
		trigger = {
			ROOT = { is_ai = yes }
		}
		IF = {
			limit = {
				any_other_country = {
					NOT = { tag = ROOT }
					original_tag = ROOT
					has_country_flag = yes_to_unification_flag
					is_subject = no
					has_government = ROOT
					has_war = no
					is_ai = no
				}
			}
			log = "ai ROOT - Human player [ROOT.GetName] to annex"
			random_other_country = {
				limit = {
					NOT = { tag = ROOT }
					original_tag = ROOT
					has_country_flag = yes_to_unification_flag
					is_subject = no
					has_government = ROOT
					has_war = no
					is_ai = no
				}
				clr_country_flag = yes_to_unification_flag
				clr_country_flag = unification_request_sent_flag
				every_other_country = {
					limit = {
						original_tag = ROOT
						has_country_flag = yes_to_unification_flag
						is_subject = no
						has_government = ROOT
						has_war = no
					}
					clr_country_flag = yes_to_unification_flag
					PREV = { annex_country = { target = PREV transfer_troops = yes } }
				}
				news_event = {
					id = news.350
					hours = 8
					random_hours = 8
				}
			}
		}
		ELSE = {
			#log = "AI ROOT [ROOT.GetName] to annex"
			clr_country_flag = yes_to_unification_flag
			clr_country_flag = unification_request_sent_flag
			every_other_country = {
				limit = {
					original_tag = ROOT
					has_country_flag = yes_to_unification_flag
					is_subject = no
					has_government = ROOT
					has_war = no
				}
				clr_country_flag = yes_to_unification_flag
				ROOT = { annex_country = { target = PREV transfer_troops = yes } }
			}
			news_event = {
				id = news.350
				hours = 8
				random_hours = 8
			}
		}
	}
}

country_event = {
	id = political.33
	title = political.33.t
	desc = political.33.desc

	picture = GFX_event_film_propoganda

	trigger = {
	}

	is_triggered_only = yes

	immediate = {
	}

		name = political.33.a
		add_war_support = 0.1
	}
}

add_namespace = raiding

country_event = { #We are being raided!
	id = raiding.100
	immediate = {log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event raiding.100"}
	title = raiding.100.t
	desc = raiding.100.d

	picture = GFX_event_griffon_with_gun
	is_triggered_only = yes

	option = { #fight!
		name = raiding.100.a
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 10
			modifier = {
				has_war = yes
				divisions_in_state = {
					state = var:defender_state_vs_@FROM
					size < 1
				}
				any_owned_state = {
					state = var:defender_state_vs_@FROM
					any_neighbor_state = {
						ROOT = {
							divisions_in_state = {
								state = PREV
								size < 1
							}
						}
						NOT = {
							any_neighbor_state = {
								controller = { has_war_with = ROOT }
							}
						}
					}
				}
				factor = 0.3
			}
			modifier = {
				has_war = yes
				enemies_strength_ratio > 0.8
				any_neighbor_country = {
					has_war_with = ROOT
				}
				factor = 0.3
			}
			modifier = {
				has_war = yes
				enemies_strength_ratio > 0.9
				any_neighbor_country = {
					has_war_with = ROOT
				}
				factor = 0.3
			}
			modifier = {
				has_war = yes
				enemies_strength_ratio > 1
				any_neighbor_country = {
					has_war_with = ROOT
				}
				factor = 0
			}
		}
		FROM = {
			start_border_war = {
                change_state_after_war = no
                attacker = {
                    state = var:ROOT.attacker_state_vs_@THIS
                    num_provinces = 4
                    on_win = raiding.1
                    on_lose = raiding.3
                    on_cancel = raiding.2
                }

                defender = {
                    state = var:ROOT.defender_state_vs_@THIS
                    num_provinces = 4
                    on_win = raiding.6
                    on_lose = raiding.4
                    on_cancel = raiding.5
                }
            }
		}
	}
	option = { #give up
		name = raiding.100.b
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 1
		}
		hidden_effect = {
			random_owned_state = {
				limit = { state = var:ROOT.defender_state_vs_@FROM }
				save_event_target_as = raided_state
			}
		}
		FROM = {
			country_event = { id = raiding.1 hours = 1 }
		}
		hidden_effect = { country_event = { id = raiding.4 hours = 1 } }
		effect_tooltip = {
			random_list = {
				20 = {
					country_event = { id = raiding.7 days = 2 }
				}
				20 = {
					country_event = { id = raiding.8 days = 2 }
				}
				20 = {
					country_event = { id = raiding.9 days = 2 }
				}
				20 = {
					country_event = { id = raiding.10 days = 2 }
				}
				20 = {
					country_event = { id = raiding.11 days = 2 }
				}
			}
		}
	}
}

country_event = { #Raid Successful/Attacker
	id = raiding.1
	immediate = {log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event raiding.1"}
	title = raiding.1.t
	desc = raiding.1.d

	picture = GFX_event_griffon_with_gun
	is_triggered_only = yes

	immediate = {
		hidden_effect = {
			if = {
				limit = { has_event_target = raided_state }
				event_target:raided_state = {
					set_variable = { PREV.temp_loot = industrial_complex_level }
					add_to_variable = { PREV.temp_loot = arms_factory_level }
				}
			}
			else = {
				set_variable = { temp_loot = FROM.FROM.FROM.industrial_complex_level }
				add_to_variable = { temp_loot = FROM.FROM.FROM.arms_factory_level }
			}
			clamp_variable = {
				var = temp_loot
				min = 3
				max = 6
			}
			add_to_variable = { loot = temp_loot }
		}
	}

	option = {
		name = raiding.1.a
		custom_effect_tooltip = loot_tp
		remove_targeted_decision = { target = FROM.FROM decision = back_out_of_raid_attacker }
		hidden_effect = {
			clear_variable = temp_loot
			clr_country_flag = raid_in_progress
			if = {
				limit = { has_country_flag = HEL_banditry_strengthened }
				set_country_flag = { flag = raid_succeeded days = 50 value = 1 }
			}
			else = {
			set_country_flag = { flag = raid_succeeded days = 100 value = 1 }
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_completed_focus = OLV_raid_tithes
			}
			add_political_power = 40
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_completed_focus = OLV_glory_of_battle
			}
			add_manpower = 3000
		}
	}
}

country_event = { #Raid Canceled/Attacker
	id = raiding.2
	immediate = {log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event raiding.2"}
	title = raiding.2.t
	desc = raiding.2.d

	picture = GFX_event_griffon_royal_guard
	is_triggered_only = yes

	option = {
		name = raiding.2.a
		add_political_power = 50
		remove_targeted_decision = { target = FROM.FROM decision = back_out_of_raid_attacker }
		hidden_effect = {
			clr_country_flag = raid_in_progress
			if = {
				limit = { has_country_flag = HEL_banditry_strengthened }
				set_country_flag = { flag = raid_failed days = 60 value = 1 }
			}
			else = {
			set_country_flag = { flag = raid_failed days = 120 value = 1 }
			}
		}
	}
}

	id = raiding.3
	immediate = {log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event raiding.3"}
	title = raiding.3.t
	desc = raiding.3.d

	picture = GFX_event_griffons_machine_gun
	is_triggered_only = yes

		name = raiding.3.a
		add_political_power = 25 #enough to start the next raid >:)
		remove_targeted_decision = { target = FROM.FROM decision = back_out_of_raid_attacker }
		hidden_effect = {
			clr_country_flag = raid_in_progress
			set_country_flag = { flag = raid_failed days = 160 value = 1 }
		}
	}
}

country_event = { #Raid Successful/Defender
	id = raiding.4
	immediate = {log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event raiding.4"}
	is_triggered_only = yes
	hidden = yes

	immediate = {
		hidden_effect = {
			if = {
				limit = { NOT = { has_event_target = raided_state } }
				FROM.FROM.FROM = { save_event_target_as = raided_state }
			}
		}
	}

	option = {
		set_temp_variable = { rand = random }
		if = {
			limit = { check_variable = { rand < 0.2 } }
			country_event = { id = raiding.7 days = 1 }
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = { check_variable = { rand < 0.4 } }
			country_event = { id = raiding.8 days = 1 }
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = { check_variable = { rand < 0.6 } }
			country_event = { id = raiding.9 days = 1 }
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = { check_variable = { rand < 0.8 } }
			country_event = { id = raiding.10 days = 1 }
		}
		else = {
			country_event = { id = raiding.11 days = 1 }
		}
		remove_targeted_decision = { target = FROM.FROM decision = back_out_of_raid_defender }
	}
}

country_event = { #Raid Defeat/Factory Burnt
	id = raiding.9
	immediate = {log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event raiding.9"}
	title = raiding.9.t
	desc = raiding.9.d

	picture = GFX_event_griffon_with_gun
	is_triggered_only = yes

	option = {
		name = raiding.9.a
		add_political_power = -25
		add_manpower = -250
		add_stability = -0.03
		if = {
			limit = {
				event_target:raided_state = {
					industrial_complex > 0
				}
			}
			event_target:raided_state = {
				damage_building = { type = industrial_complex damage = 0.40 }
			}
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = {
				event_target:raided_state = {
					any_neighbor_state = {
						industrial_complex > 0
					}
				}
			}
			random_owned_controlled_state = {
				limit = {
					industrial_complex > 0
					any_neighbor_state = {
						state = event_target:raided_state
					}
				}
				damage_building = { type = industrial_complex damage = 0.40 }
			}
		}
		else = {
			random_owned_controlled_state = {
				limit = { industrial_complex > 0 }
				damage_building = { type = industrial_complex damage = 0.40 }
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				event_target:raided_state = {
					infrastructure > 0
				}
			}
			event_target:raided_state = {
				damage_building = { type = infrastructure damage = 0.25 }
			}
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = {
				event_target:raided_state = {
					any_neighbor_state = {
						infrastructure > 0
					}
				}
			}
			random_owned_controlled_state = {
				limit = {
					infrastructure > 0
					any_neighbor_state = {
						state = event_target:raided_state
					}
				}
				damage_building = { type = infrastructure damage = 0.25 }
			}
		}
		else = {
			random_owned_controlled_state = {
				limit = { infrastructure > 0 }
				damage_building = { type = infrastructure damage = 0.25 }
			}
		}
	}
}

			}

country_event = { #Raid Defeat/Villages Slaugthered
	id = raiding.11
	immediate = {log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event raiding.11"}
	title = raiding.11.t
	desc = raiding.11.d

	picture = GFX_event_medieval_village
	is_triggered_only = yes

	option = {
		name = raiding.11.a
		add_political_power = -50
		add_stability = -0.03
		save_current_manpower = yes
		if = {
			limit = {
				event_target:raided_state = {
					state_population > 5000
				}
			}
			event_target:raided_state = {
				add_manpower = -5000
			}
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = {
				event_target:raided_state = {
					any_neighbor_state = {
						state_population > 5000
					}
				}
			}
			random_owned_controlled_state = {
				limit = {
					state_population > 5000
					any_neighbor_state = {
						state = event_target:raided_state
					}
				}
				add_manpower = -5000
			}
		}
		else = {
			random_owned_controlled_state = {
				limit = {
					state_population > 5000
				}
				add_manpower = -5000
			}
		}
		restore_previous_manpower = yes
	}
}

add_namespace = riverfed
add_namespace = riverfednews
add_namespace = coltstream
add_namespace = coltstream_news

### Science Society Founded ###
country_event = {
	id = riverfed.1
	immediate = {log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event riverfed.1"}
	title = riverfed.1.t
	desc = riverfed.1.d
	picture = GFX_event_river_coalition_summit

	is_triggered_only = yes

	option = {
		name = riverfed.1.a
		trigger = {
			if = {
				limit = { tag = WIT }
				NOT = {
					has_country_leader = { ruling_only = yes character = WIT_wulfric_grey }
				}
			}
		}
		add_to_tech_sharing_group = RIV_science_society_group
		hidden_effect = {
			if = {
				limit = {
					FROM = { tag = RCT}
					has_global_flag = RCT_uses_fabian_strategy
				}
				RIV_increase_socialist_indoctrination = yes
			}
		}

	}
	option = {
		name = riverfed.1.b
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 0
			modifier = {
				add = 1
				has_country_leader = { ruling_only = yes character = WIT_wulfric_grey }
			}
		}
	}
}

### RCSC Founded ###
country_event = {
	id = riverfed.2
	immediate = {log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event riverfed.2"}
	title = riverfed.2.t
	desc = riverfed.2.d
	picture = GFX_event_river_coalition_summit

	is_triggered_only = yes

	option = {
		name = riverfed.2.a
		trigger = {
			if = {
				limit = { tag = WIT }
				NOT = {
					has_country_leader = { ruling_only = yes character = WIT_wulfric_grey }
				}
			}
		}
		swap_ideas = {
			remove_idea = RIV_member_state
			add_idea = RIV_rcsc_member
		}
		hidden_effect = {
			if = {
				limit = {
					FROM = { tag = RCT}
					has_global_flag = RCT_uses_fabian_strategy
				}
				RIV_increase_socialist_indoctrination = yes
			}
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = riverfed.2.b
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 0
			modifier = {
				add = 1
				has_country_leader = { ruling_only = yes character = WIT_wulfric_grey }
			}
		}
	}
}

### We've been developed DEP ###
country_event = {
	id = riverfed.3
	immediate = {log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event riverfed.3"}
	title = riverfed.3.t
	desc = riverfed.3.d
	picture = GFX_event_river_coalition_summit

	is_triggered_only = yes

	option = {
		name = riverfed.3.a
		effect_tooltip = {
			random_state = {
				limit = {
					has_state_flag = RIV_develop_DEP_building
				}
				add_extra_state_shared_building_slots = 2
				add_building_construction = {
					type = industrial_complex
					level = 1
					instant_build = yes
				}
			}
		}
		hidden_effect = {
			if = {
				limit = {
					FROM = { tag = RCT}
					has_global_flag = RCT_uses_fabian_strategy
				}
				RIV_increase_socialist_indoctrination = yes
			}
		}
		add_opinion_modifier = { target = FROM modifier = aided_industry }
	}
}

### We've been granted industrial aid - Northen States ###
country_event = {
	id = riverfed.8
	immediate = {log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event riverfed.8"}
	title = riverfed.8.t
	desc = riverfed.8.d
	picture = GFX_event_river_coalition_summit

	is_triggered_only = yes

	option = {
		name = riverfed.8.a
		effect_tooltip = {
			random_state = {
				limit = {
					is_core_of = ROOT
					OR = {
						has_state_flag = RIV_develop_FIR_building
						has_state_flag = RIV_develop_FBK_building
						has_state_flag = RIV_develop_WAT_building
					}
				}
				add_extra_state_shared_building_slots = 2
				add_building_construction = {
					type = industrial_complex
					level = 1
					instant_build = yes
				}
			}

			add_timed_idea = { idea = RIV_development_grants_idea days = 730 }
		}
		add_opinion_modifier = { target = FROM modifier = aided_industry }
	}
}

### An Offer of Friendship - NCH ###
country_event = {
	id = riverfed.9
	immediate = {log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event riverfed.9"}
	title = riverfed.9.t
	desc = riverfed.9.d
	picture = GFX_event_river_coalition_summit

	is_triggered_only = yes

	option = {
		name = riverfed.9.a
		trigger = {
			NOT = { has_country_flag = NCH_having_crisis_flag }
		}
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 20
			modifier = {
				factor = 0.1
				OR = {
					has_government = fascism
					has_government = communism
				}
			}
		}
		add_opinion_modifier = { target = FROM modifier = RIV_friendship_delegation }
		FROM = {
			add_opinion_modifier = { target = ROOT modifier = RIV_friendship_delegation }
			country_event = { id = riverfed.10 hours = 1 }
		}
	}

	option = {
		name = riverfed.9.b
		trigger = {
			has_country_flag = NCH_having_crisis_flag
		}
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 100
		}
		set_country_flag = RIV_NCH_has_rejected_friendship
		add_opinion_modifier = { target = FROM modifier = RIV_friendship_delegation_rejected }
		FROM = {
			add_opinion_modifier = { target = ROOT modifier = RIV_friendship_delegation_rejected }
			country_event = { id = riverfed.11 hours = 1 }
		}
	}

	option = {
		name = riverfed.9.c
		trigger = {
			NOT = { has_country_flag = NCH_having_crisis_flag }
		}
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 1
			modifier = {
				factor = 20
				OR = {
					has_government = fascism
					has_government = communism
				}
			}
		}
		set_country_flag = RIV_NCH_has_rejected_friendship
		add_opinion_modifier = { target = FROM modifier = RIV_friendship_delegation_rejected }
		FROM = {
			add_opinion_modifier = { target = ROOT modifier = RIV_friendship_delegation_rejected }
			country_event = { id = riverfed.11 hours = 1 }
		}
	}
}
### An Offer of Friendship - Accepted ###
country_event = {
	id = riverfed.10
	immediate = {log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event riverfed.10"}
	title = riverfed.10.t
	desc = riverfed.10.d
	picture = GFX_event_river_coalition_summit

	is_triggered_only = yes

	option = {
		name = riverfed.10.a
		effect_tooltip = {
			FROM = { add_opinion_modifier = { target = ROOT modifier = RIV_friendship_delegation } }
			give_guarantee = FROM
			add_opinion_modifier = { target = FROM modifier = RIV_friendship_delegation }
		}
	}
}

		}
	}

### An Invitation to Sign the Treaty of Coltstream ###
country_event = {
	id = riverfed.12
	immediate = {log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event riverfed.12"}
	title = riverfed.12.t
	desc = riverfed.12.d
	picture = GFX_event_river_coalition_summit

	is_triggered_only = yes

	option = { #Yes
		name = riverfed.12.a
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 10
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				original_tag = FIR
				OR = {
					has_government = fascism
					has_government = communism
				}
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				original_tag = NCH
				OR = {
					has_government = fascism
					has_government = communism
				}
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				original_tag = FBK
				OR = {
					has_government = fascism
					has_government = communism
				}
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				has_country_flag = RIV_NCH_has_rejected_friendship
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				is_faction_leader = yes
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				is_in_faction = yes
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				country_exists = RIV
				NOT = { has_opinion = { target = RIV value > -50 } }
			}
		}
		add_ideas = RIV_member_state
		RIV_set_cosmetic_tag = yes
		random_country = {
			limit = {
				OR = {
					tag = FROM
					is_in_faction_with = FROM
				}
				is_faction_leader = yes
			}
			add_to_faction = ROOT
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				NOT = { tag = HLQ }
				HLQ = { has_idea = HLQ_honourary_member }
			}
			diplomatic_relation = {
				country = HLQ
				relation = non_aggression_pact
				active = yes
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = { original_tag = FIR }
			country_event = FIR.3
		}
		hidden_effect = {
			FROM = { country_event = { id = riverfed.122 hours = 1 } }
		}
		add_ai_strategy = {
			type = alliance
			id = FROM
			value = 200
		}
	}

	option = { #Not now
		name = riverfed.12.b
		FROM = { country_event = { id = riverfed.13 hours = 1 } }
		ai_chance = {
			base = 0
			modifier = {
				add = 10
				original_tag = FIR
				OR = {
					has_government = fascism
					has_government = communism
				}
			}
			modifier = {
				add = 10
				original_tag = NCH
				OR = {
					has_government = fascism
					has_government = communism
				}
			}
			modifier = {
				add = 5
				has_country_flag = RIV_NCH_has_rejected_friendship
			}
			modifier = {
				add = 5
				is_faction_leader = yes
			}
			modifier = {
				add = 5
				country_exists = RIV
				NOT = { has_opinion = { target = RIV value > 25 } }
			}
			modifier = {
				add = 100
				country_exists = RIV
				NOT = {  has_opinion = { target = RIV value > -50 } }
			}
		}
	}
}

						OR = {
							tag = ROOT
							is_in_faction_with = ROOT

					}

				}
			}
		}
	}

### RDC Founded ###
country_event = {
	id = riverfed.14
	immediate = {log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event riverfed.14"}
	title = riverfed.14.t
	desc = riverfed.14.d
	picture = GFX_event_river_coalition_summit

	is_triggered_only = yes

	option = {
		name = riverfed.14.a
		trigger = {
			if = {
				limit = { tag = WIT }
				NOT = {
					has_country_leader = { ruling_only = yes character = WIT_wulfric_grey }
				}
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				any_country = {
					has_completed_focus = RIV_eastern_transport_fund
				}
			}
			add_ideas = RIV_rdc2
		}
		else = {
			add_ideas = RIV_rdc
		}
		hidden_effect = {
			if = {
				limit = {
					FROM = { tag = RCT}
					has_global_flag = RCT_uses_fabian_strategy
				}
				RIV_increase_socialist_indoctrination = yes
			}
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = riverfed.14.b
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 0
			modifier = {
				add = 1
				has_country_leader = { ruling_only = yes character = WIT_wulfric_grey }
			}
		}
	}
}

### River Convention on Beings Rights ###
country_event = {
	id = riverfed.17
	immediate = {log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event riverfed.17"}
	title = riverfed.17.t
	desc = riverfed.17.d
	picture = GFX_event_river_coalition_summit

	is_triggered_only = yes

	option = {
		name = riverfed.17.a
		trigger = {
			if = {
				limit = { tag = WIT }
				NOT = {
					has_country_leader = { ruling_only = yes character = WIT_wulfric_grey }
				}
			}
		}
		add_ideas = RIV_beings_rights_idea
		hidden_effect = {
			if = {
				limit = {
					FROM = { tag = RCT}
					has_global_flag = RCT_uses_fabian_strategy
				}
				RIV_increase_socialist_indoctrination = yes
			}
		}
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 10
			modifier = {
				factor = 0.5
				has_government = fascism
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				tag = NIM
				OR = {
					has_government = fascism
					has_government = neutrality
				}
			}
		}

	}
	option = {
		name = riverfed.17.b

		ai_chance = {
			base = 0
			modifier = {
				add = 5
				has_government = fascism
			}
			modifier = {
				add = 10
				tag = NIM
				OR = {
					has_government = fascism
					has_government = neutrality
				}
			}
			modifier = {
				add = 1
				has_country_leader = { ruling_only = yes character = WIT_wulfric_grey }
			}
		}
	}
}

### River Parliament ###
country_event = {
	id = riverfed.18
	immediate = {log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event riverfed.18"}
	title = riverfed.18.t
	desc = riverfed.18.d
	picture = GFX_event_river_coalition_summit

	is_triggered_only = yes

	option = {
		name = riverfed.16.a
		trigger = {
			if = {
				limit = { tag = WIT }
				NOT = {
					has_country_leader = { ruling_only = yes character = WIT_wulfric_grey }
				}
			}
		}
		swap_ideas = {
			remove_idea = RIV_rec_member2
			add_idea = RIV_rec_member3
		}
		ai_chance = { factor = 5 }
	}
	option = {
		name = riverfed.16.b
		ai_chance = {
			base = 0
			modifier = {
				add = 3
				OR = {
					has_government = fascism
					has_government = communism
				}
			}
			modifier = {
				add = 1
				has_country_leader = { ruling_only = yes character = WIT_wulfric_grey }
			}
		}
	}
}

### River Free Movement ###
country_event = {
	id = riverfed.19
	immediate = {log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event riverfed.19"}
	title = riverfed.19.t
	desc = riverfed.19.d
	picture = GFX_event_river_coalition_summit

	is_triggered_only = yes

	option = {
		name = riverfed.19.a
		trigger = {
			if = {
				limit = { tag = WIT }
				NOT = {
					has_country_leader = { ruling_only = yes character = WIT_wulfric_grey }
				}
			}
		}
		swap_ideas = {
			remove_idea = RIV_rec_member3
			add_idea = RIV_rec_member4
		}
		ai_chance = { factor = 5 }
	}
	option = {
		name = riverfed.19.b
		ai_chance = {
			base = 0
			modifier = {
				add = 10
				OR = {
					has_government = fascism
					has_government = communism
				}
			}
			modifier = {
				add = 1
				has_country_leader = { ruling_only = yes character = WIT_wulfric_grey }
			}
		}
	}
}

### Central Bank ###
country_event = {
	id = riverfed.20
	immediate = {log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event riverfed.20"}
	title = riverfed.20.t
	desc = riverfed.20.d
	picture = GFX_event_river_coalition_summit

	is_triggered_only = yes

	option = {
		name = riverfed.20.a
		trigger = {
			if = {
				limit = { tag = WIT }
				NOT = {
					has_country_leader = { ruling_only = yes character = WIT_wulfric_grey }
				}
			}
		}
		add_ideas = RIV_centeral_bank_idea
		hidden_effect = {
			if = {
				limit = {
					FROM = { tag = RCT}
					has_global_flag = RCT_uses_fabian_strategy
				}
				RIV_increase_socialist_indoctrination = yes
			}
		}
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 5
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				OR = {
					has_government = fascism
					has_government = communism
				}
			}
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = riverfed.20.b
		ai_chance = {
			base = 0
			modifier = {
				add = 10
				OR = {
					has_government = fascism
					has_government = communism
				}
			}
			modifier = {
				add = 1
				has_country_leader = { ruling_only = yes character = WIT_wulfric_grey }
			}
		}
	}
}

			remove_idea = RIV_centeral_bank_idea
			add_idea = RIV_rivbit_idea

### River Federation ###
country_event = {
	id = riverfed.25
	immediate = {log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event riverfed.25"}
	title = riverfed.25.t
	desc = riverfed.25.d
	picture = GFX_event_river_coalition_summit

	is_triggered_only = yes

	option = { # Join
		name = riverfed.25.a
		trigger = {
			if = {
				limit = { tag = WIT }
				NOT = {
					has_country_leader = { ruling_only = yes character = WIT_wulfric_grey }
				}
			}
		}
		trigger = {
			OR = {
				has_idea = RIV_river_union_member1
				has_idea = RIV_river_union_member2
			}
		}
		custom_effect_tooltip = GAME_OVER_TT
		FROM = { country_event = riverfed.26 }

		effect_tooltip = {
			ROOT = {
				every_core_state = {
					add_core_of = FROM
				}
			}
			every_state = {
				limit = { is_claimed_by = ROOT }
				add_claim_by = FROM
			}
			every_character = {
				limit = {
					is_unit_leader = yes
					is_country_leader = no
				}
				set_nationality = FROM
			}
			FROM = { annex_country = { target = ROOT transfer_troops = yes } }
		}

		ai_chance = {
			factor = 15
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				OR = {
					has_government = fascism
					AND = {
						has_government = communism
						NOT = { tag = WAT }
						FROM = { NOT = { has_government = communism } }
					}
					FROM = {
						has_government = fascism
						AND = {
							has_government = communism
							ROOT = { NOT = { has_government = communism } }
						}
					}
					AND = {
						tag = NIM
						NOT = { has_completed_focus = NIM_integration }
					}
					AND = {
						tag = WIT
						has_country_leader = { ruling_only = yes character = WIT_wulfric_grey }
					}
				}
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				OR = {
					original_tag = HLQ
					original_tag = LSC
					original_tag = LSM
					original_tag = LNS
				}
			}
		}
	}
	option = { # Refuse
		name = riverfed.25.b
		trigger = {
			NOT = { is_subject_of = FROM }
		}
		FROM = { country_event = riverfed.27 }
		effect_tooltip = {
			FROM = { puppet = ROOT }
		}

		ai_chance = {
			base = 1
			modifier = {
				add = 5
				has_opinion = { target = FROM value < 25 }
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 5
				strength_ratio = {
					tag = FROM
					ratio > 1
				}
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				tag = WIT
				has_country_leader = { ruling_only = yes character = WIT_wulfric_grey }
			}
			modifier = {
				add = 500
				tag = WAT
				has_government = communism
				FROM = { has_government = democratic }
			}
		}
	}
	option = { # Leave
		name = riverfed.25.c
		trigger = {
			NOT = { is_subject_of = FROM }
		}
		FROM = { country_event = riverfed.28 }
		RIV_leave_fed = yes

		ai_chance = {
			base = 1
			modifier = {
				add = 5
				has_opinion = { target = FROM value < -50 }
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 5
				has_government = communism
				FROM = { NOT = { has_government = communism } }
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 10
				has_government = fascism
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 7
				FROM = {
					OR = {
						has_government = communism
						has_government = fascism
					}
				}
				OR = {
					has_government = democratic
					has_government = neutrality
				}
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 2
				strength_ratio = {
					tag = FROM
					ratio > 1
				}
			}
		}
	}
}

### River Federation - Accepted ###
country_event = {
	id = riverfed.26
	immediate = {log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event riverfed.26"}
	title = riverfed.26.t
	desc = riverfed.26.d
	picture = GFX_event_river_coalition_summit

	is_triggered_only = yes

	option = { # Yay
		name = riverfed.26.a
		every_country = {
			limit = {
				is_subject_of = FROM
			}
			hidden_effect = {
				get_current_autonomy_level = yes
				get_current_government_type = yes
				end_puppet_this = yes
			}
			ROOT = {
				puppet = PREV
			}
			hidden_effect = {
				restore_previous_government_type = yes
				set_previous_autonomy_level = yes
			}
		}

		FROM = {
			every_core_state = {
				add_core_of = ROOT
			}
		}

		every_state = {
			limit = {
				is_claimed_by = FROM
			}
			add_claim_by = ROOT
		}

		FROM = {
			every_character = {
				limit = {
					#ok pdx fixed this i think
					#FUCK YOU PDX
					#is_country_leader = no
					#can_be_country_leader = no
					#NOT = {
					#	is_character_slot = country_leader
					#}
					#NOT = {
					#	is_character = FBK_hermane_gering
					#	is_character = FBK_comrade_applethorn
					#	is_character = DMT_rover_diamondshield
					#	is_character = WIT_sigeweard_spellshield
					#}
					OR = {
						is_unit_leader = yes
						# has_character_flag = RIV_advisor_from_@FROM
						has_character_flag = RIV_advisor_from_BAK
						has_character_flag = RIV_advisor_from_DEP
						has_character_flag = RIV_advisor_from_FBK
						has_character_flag = RIV_advisor_from_FIR
						has_character_flag = RIV_advisor_from_FRE
						has_character_flag = RIV_advisor_from_GRY
						has_character_flag = RIV_advisor_from_LCT
						has_character_flag = RIV_advisor_from_NCH
						has_character_flag = RIV_advisor_from_NIM
						has_character_flag = RIV_advisor_from_RCT
						has_character_flag = RIV_advisor_from_WAT
						has_character_flag = RIV_advisor_from_WIT
					}
				}
				set_nationality = ROOT
			}
			ROOT = { transfer_technology = yes }
		}

		RIV_add_country_idea_on_annex = yes
		set_country_flag = RIV_annexed_@FROM
		annex_country = { target = FROM transfer_troops = yes }
		hidden_effect = {
			RIV_unlock_locked_templates = yes
		}
		add_to_variable = { annexed_riv_members = 1 }
		RIV_get_cosmetic_tag = yes
	}
}

### River Federation - Decline ###
country_event = {
	id = riverfed.27
	immediate = {log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event riverfed.27"}
	title = riverfed.27.t
	desc = riverfed.27.d
	picture = GFX_event_river_coalition_summit

	is_triggered_only = yes

	option = { # Aww
		name = riverfed.27.a

		every_country = {
			limit = {
				is_subject_of = FROM
			}
			hidden_effect = {
				get_current_autonomy_level = yes
				get_current_government_type = yes
				end_puppet_this = yes
			}
			ROOT = {
				puppet = PREV
			}
			hidden_effect = {
				restore_previous_government_type = yes
				set_previous_autonomy_level = yes
			}
		}
		hidden_effect = {
			FROM = { get_current_government_type = yes }
		}

		if = {
			limit = {
				FROM = {
					OR = {
						has_idea = RIV_river_union_member1
						has_idea = RIV_river_union_member2
					}
				}
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					has_government = fascism
				}
				set_autonomy = {
					target = FROM
					autonomy_state = autonomy_reichskommissariat
				}
			}
			else = {
				set_autonomy = {
					target = FROM
					autonomy_state = autonomy_integrated_puppet
				}
			}
		}
		else = {
			puppet = FROM
		}
		hidden_effect = {
			FROM = {
				set_country_flag = RIV_fed_puppet
				restore_previous_government_type = yes
			}
		}
	}
}

### River Federation - Left ###
country_event = {
	id = riverfed.28
	immediate = {log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event riverfed.28"}
	title = riverfed.28.t
	desc = riverfed.28.d
	picture = GFX_event_river_coalition_summit

	is_triggered_only = yes

	option = { # Gasp!
		name = riverfed.28.a
		add_political_power = -75
	}
}

### River Federation - Join Later ###
country_event = {
	id = riverfed.29
	immediate = {log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event riverfed.29"}
	title = riverfed.29.t
	desc = riverfed.29.d
	picture = GFX_event_river_coalition_summit

	is_triggered_only = yes

	option = { # yay!
		name = riverfed.29.a
		every_country = {
			limit = {
				is_subject_of = FROM
			}
			hidden_effect = {
				get_current_autonomy_level = yes
				get_current_government_type = yes
				end_puppet_this = yes
			}
			ROOT = {
				puppet = PREV
			}
			hidden_effect = {
				restore_previous_government_type = yes
				set_previous_autonomy_level = yes
			}
		}

		FROM = {
			every_core_state = {
				add_core_of = ROOT
			}
		}

		every_state = {
			limit = {
				is_claimed_by = FROM
			}
			add_claim_by = ROOT
		}

		FROM = {
			every_character = {
				limit = {
					is_country_leader = no
					OR = {
						is_unit_leader = yes
						# has_character_flag = RIV_advisor_from_@FROM
						has_character_flag = RIV_advisor_from_BAK
						has_character_flag = RIV_advisor_from_DEP
						has_character_flag = RIV_advisor_from_FBK
						has_character_flag = RIV_advisor_from_FIR
						has_character_flag = RIV_advisor_from_FRE
						has_character_flag = RIV_advisor_from_GRY
						has_character_flag = RIV_advisor_from_LCT
						has_character_flag = RIV_advisor_from_NCH
						has_character_flag = RIV_advisor_from_NIM
						has_character_flag = RIV_advisor_from_RCT
						has_character_flag = RIV_advisor_from_WAT
						has_character_flag = RIV_advisor_from_WIT
					}
				}
				set_nationality = ROOT
			}
			ROOT = { transfer_technology = yes }
		}

		RIV_add_country_idea_on_annex = yes
		set_country_flag = RIV_annexed_@FROM
		annex_country = { target = FROM transfer_troops = yes }
		hidden_effect = {
			RIV_unlock_locked_templates = yes
		}
		add_to_variable = { annexed_riv_members = 1 }
		RIV_get_cosmetic_tag = yes
	}
}

country_event = {
	id = riverfed.30
	immediate = {log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event riverfed.30"}
	hidden = yes
	is_triggered_only = yes
	trigger = {
		is_ai = yes
		NOT = { has_war_with = FROM }
		NOT = {
			has_idea = BAK_disrupted_communications
			event_target:defender = {
				has_idea = BAK_disrupted_communications
			}
		}
	}
	option = {
		event_target:defender = {
			ROOT = {
				add_to_war = {
					targeted_alliance = PREV
					enemy = FROM
				}
			}
		}
	}
}

### River Federation - Remove cosmetic tag ###
country_event = {
	id = riverfed.31
	immediate = {log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event riverfed.31"}
	#picture =
	hidden = yes

	trigger = {
		has_RIV_cosmetic_tag = yes
		is_river_fed_member = no
	}

	mean_time_to_happen = {
		days = 2
	}

	option = { # yay!
		RIV_drop_cosmetic_tag = yes
	}
}

### River Federation founding - River Swirl
news_event = {
	id = riverfednews.0
	immediate = {log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event riverfednews.0"}
	title = riverfednews.0.t
	desc = riverfednews.0.d
	picture = GFX_news_river_coalition_summit_long

	major = yes

	is_triggered_only = yes

	option = { # Founder
		name = riverfednews.0.a
		trigger = {
			original_tag = RCT
		}
	}
	option = { # Riv Member
		name = riverfednews.0.b
		trigger = {
			is_in_faction_with = RCT
			NOT = {
				original_tag = RCT
			}
		}
	}
	option = { # Empire
		name = riverfednews.0.c
		trigger = {
			TAG = GRD
		}
	}
	option = { # Equestria
		name = riverfednews.0.e
		trigger = {
			AND = {
				tag = event_target:equestria
				has_government = democratic
			}
		}
	}
	option = { # Griffons
		name = riverfednews.0.f
		trigger = {
			is_griffon_continent_griffon_country = yes
			NOT = {
				original_tag = RCT
				is_in_faction_with = RCT
				TAG = GRD
				AND = {
					tag = event_target:equestria
					has_government = democratic
				}
			}
		}
	}
	option = { # The Rest
		name = riverfednews.0.g
		trigger = {
			NOT = {
				OR = {
					original_tag = RCT
					is_in_faction_with = RCT
					TAG = GRD
					AND = {
						tag = event_target:equestria
						has_government = democratic
					}
					is_griffon_continent_griffon_country = yes
				}
			}
		}
	}
}

### River Federation founding - Nova Whirl
news_event = {
	id = riverfednews.1
	immediate = {log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event riverfednews.1"}
	title = riverfednews.1.t
	desc = riverfednews.1.d
	picture = GFX_news_river_coalition_summit_long

	major = yes

	is_triggered_only = yes

	option = { # Founder
		name = riverfednews.1.a
		trigger = {
			original_tag = RCT
		}
	}
	option = { # Riv Member
		name = riverfednews.1.b
		trigger = {
			is_in_faction_with = RCT
			NOT = {
				original_tag = RCT
			}
		}
	}
	option = { # Empire
		name = riverfednews.1.c
		trigger = {
			TAG = GRD
		}
	}
	option = { # Equestria
		name = riverfednews.1.e
		trigger = {
			AND = {
				tag = event_target:equestria
				has_government = democratic
			}
		}
	}
	option = { # Griffons
		name = riverfednews.1.f
		trigger = {
			is_griffon_continent_griffon_country = yes
			NOT = {
				original_tag = RCT
				is_in_faction_with = RCT
				TAG = GRD
				AND = {
					tag = event_target:equestria
					has_government = democratic
				}
			}
		}
	}
	option = { # The Rest
		name = riverfednews.1.g
		trigger = {
			NOT = {
				OR = {
					original_tag = RCT
					is_in_faction_with = RCT
					TAG = GRD
					AND = {
						tag = event_target:equestria
						has_government = democratic
					}
					is_griffon_continent_griffon_country = yes
				}
			}
		}
	}
}

### River Federation founding - Northen Tribes
news_event = {
	id = riverfednews.10
	immediate = {log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event riverfednews.10"}
	title = riverfednews.10.t
	desc = riverfednews.10.d
	picture = GFX_news_river_coalition_summit_long

	major = yes

	is_triggered_only = yes

	option = { # Founder
		name = riverfednews.10.a
		trigger = {
			AND = {
				OR = {
					original_tag = FIR
					original_tag = FBK
					original_tag = WAT
				}
				is_faction_leader = yes
			}

		}
	}
	option = { # Riv Member
		name = riverfednews.10.b
		trigger = {
			OR = {
				AND = {
					is_faction_leader = no
					is_in_faction_with = FIR
				}
				AND = {
					is_faction_leader = no
					is_in_faction_with = FBK
				}
				AND = {
					is_faction_leader = no
					is_in_faction_with = WAT
				}
			}
		}
	}
	option = { # Empire
		name = riverfednews.10.c
		trigger = {
			TAG = GRD
		}
	}
	option = { # Equestria
		name = riverfednews.10.e
		trigger = {
			AND = {
				tag = event_target:equestria
				has_government = democratic
			}
		}
	}
	option = { # Griffons
		name = riverfednews.10.f
		trigger = {
			is_griffon_continent_griffon_country = yes
			NOT = {
				OR = {
					AND = {
						is_faction_leader = no
						is_in_faction_with = FIR
					}
					AND = {
						is_faction_leader = no
						is_in_faction_with = FBK
					}
					AND = {
						is_faction_leader = no
						is_in_faction_with = WAT
					}
				}
				TAG = GRD
				AND = {
					tag = event_target:equestria
					has_government = democratic
				}
			}
		}
	}
	option = { # The Rest
		name = riverfednews.10.g
		trigger = {
			NOT = {
				OR = {
					OR = {
						AND = {
							is_faction_leader = no
							is_in_faction_with = FIR
						}
						AND = {
							is_faction_leader = no
							is_in_faction_with = FBK
						}
						AND = {
							is_faction_leader = no
							is_in_faction_with = WAT
						}
					}
					TAG = GRD
					AND = {
						tag = event_target:equestria
						has_government = democratic
					}
					is_griffon_continent_griffon_country = yes
				}
			}
		}
	}
}

			AND = {
				tag = event_target:equestria
				has_government = democratic
			}
		}
	}
	option = { # Griffons
		name = riverfednews.13.f
		trigger = {
			is_griffon_continent_griffon_country = yes
			NOT = {
				original_tag = DEP
				is_in_faction_with = DEP
				TAG = GRD
				AND = {
					tag = event_target:equestria
					has_government = democratic
				}
			}
		}
	}
	option = { # The Rest
		name = riverfednews.13.g
		trigger = {
			NOT = {
				OR = {
					original_tag = DEP
					is_in_faction_with = DEP
					TAG = GRD
					AND = {
						tag = event_target:equestria
						has_government = democratic
					}
					is_griffon_continent_griffon_country = yes
				}
			}
		}
	}
}

### Coltstream Summit Stuff ###

country_event = { #DMT Intro Event
	id = coltstream.1
	immediate = {log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event coltstream.1"}
	title = coltstream.1.t
	desc = coltstream.1.d

	picture = GFX_event_olenia_generic
	is_triggered_only = yes

	option = {
		name = coltstream.1.a
		hidden_effect = {
		    LCT = {
				country_event = {
					id = coltstream.2
				}
			}
		}
	}
}

country_event = { #BAK Intro Event
	id = coltstream.8
	immediate = {log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event coltstream.8"}
	title = coltstream.8.t
	desc = coltstream.8.d

	picture = GFX_event_gothic_interior
	is_triggered_only = yes

	option = { #Go
	    ai_chance = {
		    factor = 95
		}
		name = coltstream.8.a
		add_popularity = {
			ideology = democratic
			popularity = -0.01
		}
		hidden_effect = {
		    DMT = {
				country_event = {
					id = coltstream.9
					days = 7
				}
			}
		}
	}

	option = { #Refuse
	    ai_chance = {
		    factor = 5
		}
		name = coltstream.8.b
		add_political_power = 10
		hidden_effect = {
		    DMT = {
				country_event = {
					id = coltstream.9
					days = 7
				}
			}
			set_global_flag = BAK_not_attending
		}
	}
}

	immediate = {log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event coltstream.32"}
	title = coltstream.32.t
	desc = coltstream.32.d

	picture = GFX_event_olenia_generic

					id = coltstream.33
				}
			}
		}
	}

country_event = { #Qaylid placeholder war event
	id = storm.2
	immediate = {log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event storm.2"}
	title = storm.2.t
	desc = storm.2.d
	#picture =
	fire_only_once = yes
	is_triggered_only = yes

	option = {
		name = storm.2.a
		hidden_effect = {
			create_wargoal = {
				type = take_state_focus
				target = 1036.owner
				generator = { 1036 }
			}
		}
		declare_war_on = {
			type = take_state_focus
			target = 1036.owner
			generator = { 1036 }
		}
	}
}
country_event = { #White peace
	id = storm.3
	immediate = {log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event storm.3"}
	title = storm.3.t
	desc = storm.3.d
	#picture =
	fire_only_once = yes
	is_triggered_only = yes

	option = {
		name = storm.3.a
		1036 = {
			owner = {
				set_country_flag = { flag = bypass_on_peaceconference_ended days = 1 value = 1 }
				white_peace = HYE
			}
			set_state_name = HYE_thunderbowl_name
			set_province_name = {
				id = 15255
				name = HYE_thunderbowl_vp_name
			}
		}
		190 = {
			set_state_name = HYE_northvale_name
		}
		transfer_state = 1036
		transfer_state = 1050
		transfer_state = 1052
		transfer_state = 1112
		transfer_state = 205
		transfer_state = 190
		set_capital = {
			state = 1036
			remember_old_capital = no
		}
	}
}

add_namespace = tradefed_news

country_event = { #The Freie Reiter
	id = tradefed.1
	immediate = {log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event tradefed.1"}
	title = tradefed.1.t
	desc = tradefed.1.d

	picture = GFX_event_griffon_with_gun
	is_triggered_only = yes

	option = {
		name = tradefed.1.a
		custom_effect_tooltip = TRD_leopolds_knights
		add_corps_commander_role = {
			character = TRD_leopold_weinreich

			#desc = "trd_weinreich_desc"
			traits = { war_hero infantry_expert griffon_race_trait }
			skill = 4
			attack_skill = 4
			defense_skill = 3
			planning_skill = 3
			logistics_skill = 3
		} custom_effect_tooltip = TRD_leopold_stats_tp
		hidden_effect = {
			if = {
				limit = { NOT = { has_tech = tech_knights } }
				set_technology = { tech_knights = 1 }
			}
			fix_weapon_techs = yes
		    load_oob = "TRD_leopold_knight"
		}
	}
}

country_event = { #Trading
	id = tradefed.7
	immediate = {log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event tradefed.7"}
	title = tradefed.7.t
	desc = tradefed.7.d

	picture = GFX_event_griffon_back
	is_triggered_only = yes

	option = { #Accept
		name = tradefed.7.a
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 90
		}
		custom_effect_tooltip = TRD_skyfall_trade_tp
		hidden_effect = {
		    FROM = { country_event = { days = 2 id = tradefed.8 } }
		}
	}

	option = { #Decline
		name = tradefed.7.b
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 10
			modifier = {
				factor = 5
				has_opinion = { target = FROM value < -75 }
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 4
				has_opinion = { target = FROM value < -50 }
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 3
				has_opinion = { target = FROM value < -25 }
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 2
				has_opinion = { target = FROM value < 0 }
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 1.5
				has_opinion = { target = FROM value < 25 }
			}
		}
		hidden_effect = {
		    FROM = { country_event = { days = 2 id = tradefed.9 } }
		}
	}
}

		name = tradefed.8.a
		if = {
			limit = { is_major = yes }
			add_ideas = TRD_trading_with_skyfall_2

		else = {
			add_ideas = TRD_trading_with_skyfall_1
		}
		hidden_effect = {
			add_to_array = {
				TRD.trade_partners = ROOT
			}
		}
	}
}

country_event = { #The Meeting (Use Guichard's Perspective)
	id = tradefed.11
	immediate = {log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event tradefed.11"}
	title = tradefed.11.t
	desc = tradefed.11.d

	picture = GFX_event_gothic_interior
	is_triggered_only = yes

	option = {
		name = tradefed.11.a
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 25
			modifier = {
				OR = {
				    AND = {
						is_historical_focus_on = yes
						has_game_rule = {
							rule = TRD_ai_behavior
							option = DEFAULT
						}
					}
					has_country_flag = TRD_AI_HISTORICAL
					has_game_rule = {
						rule = TRD_ai_behavior
						option = HISTORICAL
					}
					has_country_flag = TRD_AI_FASCIST
					has_game_rule = {
						rule = TRD_ai_behavior
						option = FASCIST
					}
					has_country_flag = TRD_AI_COMMUNIST
					has_game_rule = {
						rule = TRD_ai_behavior
						option = COMMUNIST
					}
				}
				factor = 0
			}
		}
		hidden_effect = {
		    complete_national_focus = TRD_enhancing_our_prosperity
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = tradefed.11.b
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 5
			modifier = {
				OR = {
				    AND = {
						is_historical_focus_on = yes
						has_game_rule = {
							rule = TRD_ai_behavior
							option = DEFAULT
						}
					}
					has_country_flag = TRD_AI_HISTORICAL
					has_game_rule = {
						rule = TRD_ai_behavior
						option = HISTORICAL
					}
					has_country_flag = TRD_AI_NEUTRALITY
					has_game_rule = {
						rule = TRD_ai_behavior
						option = NEUTRALITY
					}
				}
				factor = 0
			}
		}
		hidden_effect = {
		    complete_national_focus = TRD_the_chancellors_authority
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = tradefed.11.c
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 70
			modifier = {
				OR = {
					has_country_flag = TRD_AI_NEUTRALITY
					has_game_rule = {
						rule = TRD_ai_behavior
						option = NEUTRALITY
					}
					has_country_flag = TRD_AI_FASCIST
					has_game_rule = {
						rule = TRD_ai_behavior
						option = FASCIST
					}
					has_country_flag = TRD_AI_COMMUNIST
					has_game_rule = {
						rule = TRD_ai_behavior
						option = COMMUNIST
					}
				}
				factor = 0
			}
		}
		hidden_effect = {
		    complete_national_focus = TRD_combating_inequality
		}
	}
}

country_event = { #Industrial Grants (Use Guichard's Perspective)
	id = tradefed.1400
	immediate = {log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event tradefed.1400"}
	title = tradefed.1400.t
	desc = tradefed.1400.d

	picture = GFX_event_bank_vault
	is_triggered_only = yes

	option = {
	name = tradefed.1400.a
	custom_effect_tooltip = TRD_lose_money_6_tp
	random_owned_controlled_state = {
		limit = {
			free_building_slots = {
				building = industrial_complex
				size > 0
				include_locked = yes
			}
			OR = {
				is_in_home_area = yes
				NOT = {
					owner = {
						any_owned_state = {
							free_building_slots = {
								building = industrial_complex
								size > 0
								include_locked = yes
							}
							is_in_home_area = yes
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
		add_extra_state_shared_building_slots = 1
		add_building_construction = {
			type = industrial_complex
			level = 1
		    instant_build = yes
			}
		}
		hidden_effect = {
		subtract_from_variable = {
            var = bank
            value = 3
            }
		}
	}
}

country_event = { #Changeling Equipment (Use Guichard's Perspective)
	id = tradefed.1500
	immediate = {log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event tradefed.1500"}
	title = tradefed.1500.t
	desc = tradefed.1500.d

	picture = GFX_event_griffon_para
	is_triggered_only = yes

	option = {
	name = tradefed.1500.a
		custom_effect_tooltip = TRD_lose_money_4_tp
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_dlc = "By Blood Alone"
				has_tech = iw_small_airframe
			}
			set_technology = {
				aa_lmg = 1
				engines_1 = 1
			}
			add_tech_bonus = {
				name = fighter_bonus
				bonus = 1.0
				uses = 1
				category = light_air
			}
			generic_early_fighter = yes
			add_equipment_to_stockpile = {
				type = small_plane_airframe_1
				variant_name = "Early Fighter"
				amount = 30
			}
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = {
				has_dlc = "By Blood Alone"
				NOT = {
					has_tech = iw_small_airframe
				}
			}
			set_technology = {
				iw_small_airframe = 1
				aa_lmg = 1
				engines_1 = 1
			}
			generic_early_fighter = yes
			add_equipment_to_stockpile = {
				type = small_plane_airframe_1
				variant_name = "Early Fighter"
				amount = 30
			}
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = {
			has_tech = early_fighter
			}
			add_tech_bonus = {
				name = fighter_bonus
				bonus = 1.0
				uses = 1
				category = light_fighter
			}
			add_equipment_to_stockpile = {
				type = small_plane_airframe
				amount = 30
				producer = CHN
			}
		}
		else = {
			set_technology = {
				early_fighter = 1
			}
			add_equipment_to_stockpile = {
				type = small_plane_airframe
				amount = 30
				producer = CHN
			}
		}
		add_equipment_to_stockpile = {
			type = light_tank_chassis
			amount = 60
			producer = CHN
		}
		hidden_effect = {
		subtract_from_variable = {
            var = bank
            value = 2
            }
		}
	}
}

country_event = { #Golden Griffon Cigarettes (Use Guichard's Perspective)
	id = tradefed.1600
	immediate = {log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event tradefed.1600"}
	title = tradefed.1600.t
	desc = tradefed.1600.d

	picture = GFX_event_medieval_village_2
	is_triggered_only = yes

	option = {
	name = tradefed.1600.a
	custom_effect_tooltip = TRD_lose_money_6_tp
	add_political_power = -30
	random_owned_controlled_state = {
		limit = {
			free_building_slots = {
				building = industrial_complex
				size > 0
				include_locked = yes
			}
			OR = {
				is_in_home_area = yes
				NOT = {
					owner = {
						any_owned_state = {
							free_building_slots = {
								building = industrial_complex
								size > 0
								include_locked = yes
							}
							is_in_home_area = yes
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
		add_extra_state_shared_building_slots = 1
		add_building_construction = {
			type = industrial_complex
			level = 1
		    instant_build = yes
			}
		}
		hidden_effect = {
		subtract_from_variable = {
            var = bank
            value = 3
            }
		}
	}
}

			expire = "1965.1.1"
			ideology = democratic_socialism
			traits = { }
		}
	}
	add_stability = -0.025
	add_political_power = 75
	add_popularity = {
        ideology = communism
        popularity = -0.05
    }
	hidden_effect = {
		    country_event = { days = 10 id = tradefed.42 }
		}
	}
}

country_event = { #Mass Strikes

	is_triggered_only = yes

	option = {
	name = tradefed.50.a
	add_manpower = -10000
	add_political_power = -75
	381 = {
	damage_building = {
        type = infrastructure
        damage = 0.4
    }
	damage_building = {
        type = industrial_complex
        damage = 0.3
        }
	}
	380 = {
	damage_building = {
        type = infrastructure
        damage = 0.6
    }
	damage_building = {
        type = industrial_complex
        damage = 0.3
        }
	}
	add_popularity = {
        ideology = communism
        popularity = 0.15
    }
	add_popularity = {
        ideology = democratic
        popularity = 0.05
    }
	hidden_effect = {
		country_event = { id = tradefed.51 days = 3 }
		}
	}

country_event = { #They Storm the Government
	id = tradefed.52
	immediate = {log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event tradefed.52"}
	title = tradefed.52.t
	desc = tradefed.52.d

	picture = GFX_event_western_griffon_city
	is_triggered_only = yes

	option = {
		name = tradefed.52.a
		swap_ideas = {
			remove_idea = TRD_the_riches_of_skyfall
			add_idea = TRD_economic_ruin
		}
		swap_ideas = {
			remove_idea = TRD_social_inequality
			add_idea = TRD_scars_of_the_revolution
		}
		set_politics = {
			ruling_party = communism
			elections_allowed = no
		}
		add_popularity = {
			ideology = communism
			popularity = 0.075
		}
		add_popularity = {
			ideology = democratic
			popularity = 0.05
		}
		add_popularity = {
			ideology = fascism
			popularity = 0.075
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				TRD_little_busta = { is_unit_leader = yes }
			}
			remove_unit_leader_role = TRD_little_busta
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				TRD_elric_rochette = { is_unit_leader = yes }
			}
			remove_unit_leader_role = TRD_elric_rochette
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				TRD_johann_price_ii = { is_unit_leader = yes }
			}
			remove_unit_leader_role = TRD_johann_price_ii
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				TRD_geoffroy_agnelli = { is_unit_leader = yes }
			}
			remove_unit_leader_role = TRD_geoffroy_agnelli
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				TRD_geoffroy_agnelli = { is_unit_leader = yes }
			}
			remove_unit_leader_role = TRD_geoffroy_agnelli
		}

		#who the fuck is this guy?
		#if = {
		#	limit = { has_unit_leader = 375953 }
		#	remove_unit_leader = 375953
		#}

		if = {
			limit = {
				TRD_horst_whitefeather = { is_unit_leader = yes }
			}
			remove_unit_leader_role = TRD_horst_whitefeather
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				TRD_alexandre_forgeur = { is_unit_leader = yes }
			}
			remove_unit_leader_role = TRD_alexandre_forgeur
		}
		hidden_effect = {
			country_event = { id = tradefed.53 days = 2 }
			every_country = {
				limit = {
					OR = {
						has_idea = TRD_trading_with_skyfall_1
						has_idea = TRD_trading_with_skyfall_2
					}
				}
				remove_ideas = {
					TRD_trading_with_skyfall_1
					TRD_trading_with_skyfall_2
				}
			}
			clear_array = trade_partners
			set_variable = { bank = 0 }
		}
	}
}

country_event = { #The Boreaiste and Syndies Duke it out
	id = tradefed.53
	immediate = {log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event tradefed.53"}
	title = tradefed.53.t
	desc = tradefed.53.d

	picture = GFX_event_medieval_city
	is_triggered_only = yes

	option = {
		name = tradefed.53.a
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 80
			modifier = {
				OR = {
					has_country_flag = TRD_AI_FASCIST
					has_game_rule = {
						rule = TRD_ai_behavior
						option = FASCIST
					}
				}
				factor = 0
			}
		}
		add_popularity = {
            ideology = communism
            popularity = 0.075
        }
		add_popularity = {
            ideology = democratic
            popularity = 0.05
        }
		custom_effect_tooltip = TRD_new_focus_tree_tp
		hidden_effect = {
		country_event = { id = tradefed.148 days = 3 }
		    load_focus_tree = { tree = TRD_communist_tree }
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = tradefed.53.b
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 20
			modifier = {
				OR = {
					has_country_flag = TRD_AI_COMMUNIST
					has_game_rule = {
						rule = TRD_ai_behavior
						option = COMMUNIST
					}
				}
				factor = 0
			}
		}
		add_stability = -0.40
		add_popularity = {
            ideology = fascism
            popularity = 0.075
        }
		set_politics = {
		    ruling_party = fascism
		    elections_allowed = no
	    }
		custom_effect_tooltip = TRD_new_focus_tree_tp
		hidden_effect = {
		country_event = { id = tradefed.149 days = 3 }
		    load_focus_tree = { tree = TRD_fascist_tree }
		}
	}
}

		    set_variable = { TRD_cogress_array^1 = 0 } #Haromic Socialists
		    set_variable = { TRD_cogress_array^2 = 0 } #Syndies
		}
	}

		}

country_event = { #The Final Votes
	id = tradefed.59
	immediate = {log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event tradefed.59"}
	title = tradefed.59.t
	desc = tradefed.59.d

	picture = GFX_event_griffon_back
	is_triggered_only = yes

	option = {
		name = tradefed.59.a
		hidden_effect = {
		    find_highest_in_array = {
				array = TRD_cogress_array
				#index = TRD_cogress_max
				# looks like index only works if variable name is all lowercase - default is i so we may as well use it
			}
			if = {
				limit = { check_variable = { i = 0 } }
				country_event = { id = tradefed.60 }
			}
			else_if = {
				limit = { check_variable = { i = 1 } }
				country_event = { id = tradefed.61 }
			}
			else = {
				country_event = { id = tradefed.62 }
			}
			clear_array = TRD_cogress_array
		}
	}
}

country_event = { #Jaegers
	id = tradefed.85
	immediate = {log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event tradefed.85"}
	title = tradefed.85.t
	desc = tradefed.85.d

	picture = GFX_event_griffon_back
	is_triggered_only = yes

	option = {
		name = tradefed.85.a
		custom_effect_tooltip = TRD_ceconys_tp
		add_corps_commander_role = {
			character = TRD_cerconys

			traits = { career_officer infiltrator changeling_race_trait }
			skill = 2
			attack_skill = 3
			defense_skill = 1
			planning_skill = 2
			logistics_skill = 1
		} custom_effect_tooltip = TRD_cerconys_stats_tp
		hidden_effect = {
			if = {
				limit = { NOT = { has_tech = tech_jager } }
				set_technology = { tech_jager = 1 }
			}
			fix_weapon_techs = yes
			load_oob = "TRD_cerconys_jagers"
		}
	}
}

country_event = { #New Fascist Government
	id = tradefed.86
	immediate = {log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event tradefed.86"}
	title = tradefed.86.t
	desc = tradefed.86.d

	picture = GFX_event_griffon_back
	is_triggered_only = yes

	option = {
		name = tradefed.86.a
		trigger = {
			GRI = { has_completed_focus = GRI_eros }
		}
		add_stability = 0.10
		add_war_support = 0.05
		GRI = { puppet = TRD }
		hidden_effect = {
		    complete_national_focus = TRD_servitude
			set_cosmetic_tag = GRI_SUBJECT
			GRI = {
				country_event = { days = 1 id = tradefed.87 }
			}
		}
	}

	option = {
		name = tradefed.86.b
		trigger = {
		    OR = {
			    GRI = { has_completed_focus = GRI_eagleclaw }
				GRI = { has_completed_focus = GRI_the_grand_coup }
			}
		}
		add_stability = 0.10
		add_war_support = 0.05
		every_possible_country = {
			limit = {
				has_character = GRI_archon_eros_vii
			}
			GRI_archon_eros_vii = {
				set_nationality = ROOT
			}
		}
		promote_character = {
			character = GRI_archon_eros_vii
			ideology = falangism
		}
		set_country_flag = TRD_borean_archonate
		set_cosmetic_tag = TRD_borean_archonate
		set_party_name = {
		    ideology = fascism
	        name = TRD_imperial_leauge
		    long_name = TRD_imperial_leauge_long
	    }
		hidden_effect = {
		    complete_national_focus = TRD_archon
		}
	}
}

	id = tradefed.103
	immediate = {log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event tradefed.103"}
	title = tradefed.103.t
	desc = tradefed.103.d

	picture = GFX_event_gothic_interior
	is_triggered_only = yes
	fire_only_once = yes

	trigger = {
		NOT = { has_global_flag = keremeskai_dead }
	}

	option = {
		name = tradefed.103.a
		add_political_power = 75
		add_stability = 0.05
		add_popularity = {
			ideology = democratic
			popularity = -0.05
		}
		FAT = { FAT_kill_kemerskai = yes }
	}
}

country_event = { #Grover VI Becomes Emperor
	id = tradefed.104
	immediate = {log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event tradefed.104"}
	title = tradefed.104.t
	desc = tradefed.104.d

	picture = GFX_event_griffenheim
	fire_only_once = yes
	trigger = {
		tag = TRD
		date > 1021.5.21
		has_completed_focus = TRD_empire_rising
		NOT = { has_global_flag = GRI_grover_vi_dead }
	}
	mean_time_to_happen = {
		days = 12
	}
	option = {
		name = tradefed.104.a
		add_political_power = 200
		add_stability = 0.05
		retire_country_leader = yes
		every_possible_country = {
			limit = {
				has_character = GRI_emperor_grover_vi
			}
			GRI_emperor_grover_vi = {
				set_nationality = ROOT
			}
		}
		GRI_emperor_grover_vi = {
			set_portraits = {
				civilian={
					large="gfx/leaders/GRI/Grover_VI_angry.tga"
				}
			}

			add_country_leader_role = {
				promote_leader = yes

				country_leader = {
					desc = "grover_vi_desc"
					expire = "1965.1.1"
					ideology = nazism
					traits = { chosen_one }
				}
			}
		}
		set_party_name = { ideology = fascism name = GRI_imperial_party_f long_name = GRI_imperial_party_f_long }
	}
}

country_event = { #Buying Out Industrialists
	id = tradefed.128
	immediate = {log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event tradefed.128"}
	title = tradefed.128.t
	desc = tradefed.128.d

	picture = GFX_event_griffon_back
	is_triggered_only = yes

	option = {
	    name = tradefed.128.a
	    custom_effect_tooltip = TRD_lose_money_6_tp
	    random_owned_controlled_state = {
		limit = {
			free_building_slots = {
				building = industrial_complex
				size > 0
				include_locked = yes
			}
			OR = {
				is_in_home_area = yes
				NOT = {
					owner = {
						any_owned_state = {
							free_building_slots = {
								building = industrial_complex
								size > 0
								include_locked = yes
							}
							is_in_home_area = yes
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
		add_extra_state_shared_building_slots = 1
		add_building_construction = {
			type = industrial_complex
			level = 1
		    instant_build = yes
			}
		}
		hidden_effect = {
		subtract_from_variable = {
            var = bank
            value = 3
            }
		}
	}
}

		add_stability = 0.04
		add_political_power = 25
	}
}

country_event = { #flavour event
	id = tradefed.146
	immediate = {log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event tradefed.146"}
	title = tradefed.146.t
	desc = {
		trigger = {
			has_country_leader = {
				ruling_only = yes
				character = GRI_emperor_grover_v
			}
		}
		text = tradefed.146.d_gv
	}
	desc = {
		trigger = {
			NOT = {
				has_country_leader = {
					ruling_only = yes
					character = GRI_emperor_grover_v
				}
			}
		}
		text = tradefed.146.d
	}
	trigger = {
		NOT = {
			has_country_leader = { ruling_only = yes character = GRI_ferdinand_dawnclaw }
		}
		has_game_rule = {
			rule = eog_april_fool
			option = DEFAULT
		}
	}

	picture = GFX_event_griffon_back
	is_triggered_only = yes

	option = {
		name = tradefed.146.a
		trigger = {
			NOT = {
				has_country_leader = {
					ruling_only = yes
					character = GRI_ferdinand_dawnclaw
				}
			}
		}
		add_political_power = 10
	}

	option = {
		name = tradefed.146.b
		trigger = {
			has_country_leader = {
				ruling_only = yes
				character = GRI_ferdinand_dawnclaw
			}
		}
		add_political_power = 10
	}
}

#Signing of the Southren Security Council
country_event = {
	id = wingbardy.101
	immediate = {log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event wingbardy.101"}
	title = wingbardy.101.t
	desc = wingbardy.101.d
	picture = GFX_event_griffon_diplomacy

	is_triggered_only = yes

	option = {
		name = wingbardy.101.a
		add_ideas = WNG_planning_bonus
	}
}

# Wingbardy demands Equestia hands over the colonies
country_event = {
	id = wingbardy.102
	immediate = {log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event wingbardy.102"}
	title = wingbardy.102.t
	desc = wingbardy.102.d
	picture = GFX_event_griffons_machine_gun

	is_triggered_only = yes

	option = { # Accept
		name = wingbardy.102.a
		ai_chance = {
			base = 1
		}
		end_puppet = EQC
		remove_from_faction = EQC
		EQC = {
			country_event = { hours = 2 id = wingbardy.1021 }
		}
	}
	option = { # Refuse
		name = wingbardy.102.b
		ai_chance = {
			base = 40
		}
		EQC = {
			country_event = { id = wingbardy.1022 }
		}
		WNG = {
			add_opinion_modifier = { target = EQS modifier = WNG_equestria_refulsed_to_hoof_over_their_colonies }
			add_opinion_modifier = { target = EQC modifier = WNG_equestria_refulsed_to_hoof_over_their_colonies }
			country_event = { hours = 2 id = wingbardy.106 }
			if = { limit = { is_in_faction_with = EQS }
				EQS = { remove_from_faction = WNG }
			}
			if = { limit = { is_in_faction_with = EQC }
				EQC = { remove_from_faction = WNG }
			}
		}
	}
}

#Equestia betrayed us!
country_event = {
	id = wingbardy.1021
	immediate = {log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event wingbardy.1021"}
	title = wingbardy.1021.t
	desc = wingbardy.1021.d
	picture = GFX_event_griffon_soldier

	is_triggered_only = yes

	immediate = {
		set_country_flag = EQS_betrayed_us
	}

	option = { # We have no choice
		name = wingbardy.1021.a
		ai_chance = {
			base = 0
		}
		WNG = {
			country_event = { hours = 2 id = wingbardy.105 }
		}
		custom_effect_tooltip = GAME_OVER_TT
	}
	option = { # We shall never surrender!
		name = wingbardy.1021.b
		ai_chance = {
			base = 10
		}
		WNG = {
			add_opinion_modifier = { target = EQS modifier = WNG_equestria_refulsed_to_hoof_over_their_colonies }
			add_opinion_modifier = { target = EQC modifier = WNG_equestria_refulsed_to_hoof_over_their_colonies }
			country_event = { hours = 2 id = wingbardy.106 }
			if = { limit = { is_in_faction_with = EQS }
				EQS = { remove_from_faction = WNG }
			}
			if = { limit = { is_in_faction_with = EQC }
				EQC = { remove_from_faction = WNG }
			}
		}
	}
}

	title = wingbardy.103.t
	desc = wingbardy.103.d
	picture = GFX_event_griffon_soldier

		name = wingbardy.103.a
		ai_chance = {
			base = 1
		}
		every_country_with_original_tag = {
			original_tag_to_check = EQC
			FROM = {
				create_wargoal = {
					target = PREV
					type = annex_everything
				}
			}
		}
	}
}

# Free Equestian Colonies are thretened
country_event = {
	id = wingbardy.104
	immediate = {log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event wingbardy.104"}
	title = wingbardy.104.t
	desc = wingbardy.104.d
	picture = GFX_event_griffon_soldier

	is_triggered_only = yes

	option = { # Accept
		name = wingbardy.104.a
		ai_chance = {
			base = 0
		}
		WNG = {
			country_event = { hours = 2 id = wingbardy.1051 }
		}
		custom_effect_tooltip = GAME_OVER_TT
	}
	option = { # Refuse
		name = wingbardy.104.b
		ai_chance = {
			base = 20
			modifier = {
				add = -5
				has_government = democratic
			}
			modifier = {
				add = 5
				strength_ratio = {
					tag = FROM
					ratio < 0.9
				}
			}
		}
		WNG = {
			add_opinion_modifier = { target = ROOT modifier = WNG_equestria_refulsed_to_hoof_over_their_colonies }
			country_event = { hours = 2 id = wingbardy.106 }
			if = { limit = { is_in_faction_with = EQC }
				remove_from_faction = EQC
			}
		}
	}
}

# New Mareland occupied
country_event = {
	id = wingbardy.105
	immediate = {log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event wingbardy.105"}
	title = wingbardy.105.t
	desc = wingbardy.105.d
	picture = GFX_event_griffon_royal_guard

	is_triggered_only = yes

	option = {
		name = wingbardy.105.a
		if = {
			limit = {
				EQC = {
					exists = yes
				}
			}
			annex_country = { target = EQC transfer_troops = no }
		}
		add_political_power = 75
		#add_named_threat = { threat = 5 name = wingbardy.105.t }
		set_country_flag = EQC_annexed
		hidden_effect = { news_event = { hours = 6 id = news_wingbardy.5 } }
	}
}
