# Pressure Falcor
country_event = {
	id = wingbardy.107
	immediate = {log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event wingbardy.107"}
	title = wingbardy.107.t
	desc = wingbardy.107.d
	picture = GFX_event_griffons_machine_gun

	is_triggered_only = yes

	option = { #Give In
		name = wingbardy.107.a

		ai_chance = {
			base = 10
			modifier = {
				add = -5
				WNG = { has_army_size = { size < 35 } }
			}
			modifier = {
				add = 5
				WNG = { has_army_size = { size > 34 } }
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 10
				OR = {
					is_in_faction_with = WNG
					is_subject_of = WNG
				}
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				has_government = fascism
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				WNG = {
					has_government = communism
				}
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 2
				has_country_flag = FAL_is_alone
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				is_in_faction = yes
				NOT = { is_in_faction_with = WNG }
			}
		}
		WNG = {
			country_event = { hours = 2 id = wingbardy.109 }
		}
		custom_effect_tooltip = GAME_OVER_TT
	}

	option = { #Refuse
		name = wingbardy.107.b

		ai_chance = {
			base = 10
			modifier = {
				add = 5
				WNG = { has_army_size = { size < 35 } }
			}
			modifier = {
				add = -5
				WNG = { has_army_size = { size > 34 } }
			}
			modifier = {
				any_other_country = {
					has_guaranteed = FAL
				}
				add = 15
			}
		}
		WNG = {
			country_event = { hours = 2 id = wingbardy.108 }
		}
	}
}
# Falcor occupied
country_event = {
	id = wingbardy.109
	immediate = {log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event wingbardy.109"}
	title = wingbardy.109.t
	desc = wingbardy.109.d
	picture = GFX_event_griffon_soldier

	is_triggered_only = yes

	option = {
		name = wingbardy.109.a
		annex_country = { target = FAL transfer_troops = no }
		add_political_power = 75
		add_named_threat = { threat = 1 name = news_wingbardy.6.t }
		set_country_flag = FAL_annexed
		hidden_effect = {
			news_event = { hours = 6 id = news_wingbardy.6 }
			FAL = {
				every_core_state = {
					limit = {
						NOT = {
							is_core_of = WNG
						}
						is_fully_controlled_by = WNG
					}
					set_compliance = 40
				}
			}
		}
	}
}

# Falcor refuses to give in
country_event = {
	id = wingbardy.108
	immediate = {log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event wingbardy.108"}
	title = wingbardy.108.t
	desc = wingbardy.108.d
	picture = GFX_event_griffon_soldier

	is_triggered_only = yes

	option = {
		name = wingbardy.108.a
		add_state_claim = 392
		add_state_claim = 393
		add_state_claim = 409
		add_state_claim = 503
		add_state_claim = 504
		add_state_claim = 529
		add_state_claim = 533
		add_state_claim = 549

		if = {
			limit = {
				is_faction_leader = yes
				is_in_faction_with = FAL
			}
			remove_from_faction = FAL
		}

		create_wargoal = {
			type = take_state_focus
			target = FAL
			generator = { 392 393 504 529 533 549 409 503 }
		}

		hidden_effect = {
			add_ai_strategy = {
				type = conquer
				id = "FAL"
				value = 200
			}
		}

	}
}

country_event = {
	id = wingbardy.110
	immediate = {log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event wingbardy.110"}
	title = wingbardy.110.t
	desc = wingbardy.110.d
	picture = GFX_event_griffon_diplomacy

	is_triggered_only = yes

	option = {
		name = wingbardy.110.a #yes
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 10
		}
		WNG = { add_to_faction = ROOT }
		WNG = {
			country_event = { id = wingbardy.111 hours = 6 }
		}

		hidden_effect = {
			add_ai_strategy = {
				type = befriend
				id = "WNG"
				value = 200
			}
			add_ai_strategy = {
				type = alliance
				id = "WNG"
				value = 200
			}
		}
	}

	option = {
		name = wingbardy.110.b #Only for Cores
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 40
		}
		WNG = {
			country_event = { id = wingbardy.112 hours = 6 }
		}

		hidden_effect = {

		}
	}

	option = {
		name = wingbardy.110.c #No
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 40
			modifier = {
				WNG = {
					surrender_progress > 0
				}
				factor = 15
			}
		}
		WNG = {
			country_event = { id = wingbardy.113 hours = 6 }
		}

		hidden_effect = {

		}
	}
}

# Falcor asks for their corse back
country_event = {
	id = wingbardy.112
	immediate = {log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event wingbardy.112"}
	title = wingbardy.112.t
	desc = wingbardy.112.d
	picture = GFX_event_griffon_diplomacy

	is_triggered_only = yes

	option = {
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 25
			modifier = {
				has_government = fascism
				factor = 0
			}
		}

		name = wingbardy.112.a #We agree
		add_political_power = -150
		WNG = { add_to_faction = FAL }
		FAL = {
			transfer_state = 530
		}

		hidden_effect = {
			FAL = {
				add_ai_strategy = {
					type = alliance
					id = "WNG"
					value = 200
				}
			}
			add_ai_strategy = {
				type = alliance
				id = "FAL"
				value = 200
			}
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = wingbardy.112.b #No
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 5
		}

		hidden_effect = {

		}
	}
	option = {
		name = wingbardy.112.c #We'll just take them

		ai_chance = {
			factor = 100
			modifier = {
				has_government = neutrality
				factor = 0.1
			}
		}
		add_state_claim = 392
		add_state_claim = 393
		add_state_claim = 409
		add_state_claim = 503
		add_state_claim = 504
		add_state_claim = 529
		add_state_claim = 533
		add_state_claim = 549

		create_wargoal = {
			type = take_state_focus
			target = FAL
			generator = { 392 393 504 529 533 549 409 503 }
		}
	}
}

# School for Gifted Griffons
country_event = {
	id = wingbardy.136
	immediate = {log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event wingbardy.136"}
	title = wingbardy.136.t
	desc = wingbardy.136.d
	picture = GFX_event_school

	is_triggered_only = yes

	option = {
		name = wingbardy.136.a	#sounds good
		ai_chance = { factor = 90 }
		add_political_power = -10
		WNG = {
			country_event = { days = 1 id = wingbardy.137 }
		}
		add_to_tech_sharing_group = school_for_gifted_griffons
		add_opinion_modifier = {
			target = FROM
			modifier = WNG_school_for_gifted_griffons
		}
	}

	option = {
		name = wingbardy.136.b	#no way
		ai_chance = { factor = 0 }
		WNG = {
			country_event = { days = 1 id = wingbardy.138 }
		}
	}
}

#Puppet ally
country_event = {
	id = wingbardy.141
	immediate = {log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event wingbardy.141"}
	title = wingbardy.141.t
	picture = GFX_event_griffon_royal_guard
	desc = {
		text = wingbardy.141.d.commie
		trigger = { has_government = communism }
	}
	desc = {
		text = wingbardy.141.d.fascist
		trigger = { NOT = { has_government = communism } }
	}

	is_triggered_only = yes

	option = {
		name = wingbardy.141.a
		FROM = { country_event = wingbardy.142 }
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 10
		}
		effect_tooltip = {
			if = {
				limit = { NOT = { ROOT = { is_subject_of = FROM } } }
				FROM = { puppet = ROOT }
			}
			ROOT = {
				add_ideas = WNG_intergration
			}
		}
		hidden_effect = {
			FRN_load_ideology_focus = yes
		}
	}

	option = {
		name = wingbardy.141.b
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 0
			modifier = {
				add = 50
				has_country_flag = FRN_sovereign_path
			}
		}
		FROM = { country_event = wingbardy.143 }
		custom_effect_tooltip = WNG_they_may_kill_you_tt
	}
}

#Puppet ally - yes
country_event = {
	id = wingbardy.142
	immediate = {log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event wingbardy.142"}
	title = wingbardy.142.t
	desc = wingbardy.142.d
	picture = GFX_event_griffon_royal_guard
	is_triggered_only = yes

	option = {
		name = wingbardy.142.a
		if = {
			limit = { NOT = { FROM = { is_subject_of = ROOT } } }
			if = {
				limit = {
					FROM = {
						NOT = {
							original_tag = FRN
						}
					}
				}
				FROM = {
					get_current_government_type = yes
				}
				puppet = FROM
				FROM = {
					restore_previous_government_type = yes
				}
			}
			else = {
				puppet = FROM
			}
		}
		FROM = {
			add_ideas = WNG_intergration
		}
	}
}

#Puppet ally - no
country_event = {
	id = wingbardy.143
	immediate = {log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event wingbardy.143"}
	title = wingbardy.143.t
	desc = wingbardy.143.d
	picture = GFX_event_griffon_royal_guard
	is_triggered_only = yes

	option = {
		name = wingbardy.143.a
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 10
		}
		remove_from_faction = FROM
		create_wargoal = {
			target = FROM
			type = annex_everything
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = wingbardy.143.b
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 1
			modifier = {
				factor = 12
				strength_ratio = { tag = FROM ratio > 0.59 }
			}
		}
		add_political_power = -50
	}
}

	id = wingbardy.2
	immediate = {log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event wingbardy.2"}
	title = wingbardy.2.t
	desc = wingbardy.2.d

	picture = GFX_event_griffinstone_sunset

	is_triggered_only = yes

	option = {
		name = wingbardy.2.a
		ai_chance = {
			base = 100
		}
		custom_effect_tooltip = GAME_OVER_TT
		FROM = {
			country_event = { hours = 1 id = wingbardy.3 }
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = wingbardy.2.b
		ai_chance = {
			base = 0
		}
		end_puppet_this = yes
		FROM = {
			add_opinion_modifier = { target = ROOT modifier = GER_anschluss_rejected }
			country_event = { hours = 1 id = wingbardy.4 }
			if = {
				limit = { is_in_faction_with = ROOT }
				remove_from_faction = ROOT
			}
		}
	}
}

# Garibald Talonuel III dies
country_event = {
	id = wingbardy.5
	immediate = {log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event wingbardy.5"}
	title = wingbardy.5.t
	desc = wingbardy.5.d
	picture = GFX_event_medieval_castle_on_hill
	fire_only_once = yes

	trigger = {
		original_tag = WNG
		OR = {
			has_country_leader = { ruling_only = yes character = WNG_garibald_talonuel_iii }
			has_idea = WNG_garibald_talonuel_iii
		}
		date > 1017.1.1
	}
	mean_time_to_happen = {
		days = 180 # Dies in 1017
	}

	#Nooo! :(
	option = {
		name = wingbardy.5.a
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_country_leader = { character = WNG_garibald_talonuel_iii }
			}
			WNG_garibald_talonuel_iii = {
				retire = yes
			}
			WNG_set_gumberto_ii_country_leader = yes
		}
		else = {
			if = {
				limit = {
					WNG_prince_gumberto = { is_unit_leader = yes }
				}
				WNG_prince_gumberto = { remove_unit_leader_role = yes }
			}
		}

		if = {
			limit = {
				has_idea = WNG_garibald_talonuel_iii
			}
			remove_ideas = WNG_garibald_talonuel_iii
			add_ideas = WNG_gumberto_ii
		}

		if = {
			limit = {
				has_completed_focus = WNG_absolute_rule
			}
			hidden_effect = {
				country_event = wingbardy_gumberto.29
			}
		}
		hidden_effect = {
			news_event = { id = news_wingbardy.15 hours = 3 }
		}
	}
}

# The National Antham Debate
country_event = {
	id = wingbardy.6
	immediate = {log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event wingbardy.6"}
	title = wingbardy.6.t
	desc = wingbardy.6.d
	picture = GFX_event_medieval_castle_on_hill
	fire_only_once = yes

	trigger = {
		tag = WNG
		has_government = fascism
		has_idea = WNG_garibald_talonuel_iii
		date > 1011.1.1
	}

	mean_time_to_happen = {
		days = 300
	}

	option = { #Marcia Reale d'Ordinanza
		name = wingbardy.6.a
		add_political_power = -5
		add_stability = -0.02
		add_popularity = {
			ideology = neutrality
			popularity = 0.05
		}
	}
	option = { #Giovinezza
		name = wingbardy.6.b
		add_stability = -0.02
		add_political_power = 5
	}
	option = { #La Leggenda del Piumave
		name = wingbardy.6.c
		add_stability = 0.02
		add_political_power = -2
		add_popularity = {
			ideology = neutrality
			popularity = 0.025
		}
	}
}
country_event = { # Abyssinia wins
	id = wingbardy.601
	title = wingbardy.601.t
	desc = wingbardy.601.d
	picture = GFX_event_griffons_machine_gun

	is_triggered_only = yes

	fire_only_once = yes

	option = { #
		name = wingbardy.601.a
		ai_chance = {
			base = 1
		}
		set_country_flag = { flag = bypass_on_peaceconference_ended days = 1 value = 1 }
		random_enemy_country = {
			limit = {
				OR = {
					owns_state = 1201
					owns_state = 1200
				}
			}
			white_peace = ROOT
			set_truce = { target = ROOT  days = 365 }
			if = {
				limit = {
					owns_state = 1201
				}
				ROOT = {
					transfer_state = 1201
				}
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					owns_state = 1200
				}
				ROOT = {
					transfer_state = 1200
				}
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					owns_state = 784
					784 = {
						is_controlled_by = ROOT
					}
				}
				ROOT = {
					transfer_state = 784
				}
			}
			country_event = wingbardy.602
			every_other_country = {
				limit = {
					has_war_with = ROOT
					OR = {
						is_subject_of = PREV
						is_in_faction_with = PREV
					}
				}
				set_country_flag = { flag = bypass_on_peaceconference_ended days = 1 value = 1 }
				white_peace = ROOT
			}
		}
		hidden_effect = {
			if = {
				limit = {
					has_country_flag = ABY_conscripts_raised
				}
				clr_country_flag = ABY_conscripts_raised
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					has_template = "Liberation War Veterans"
				}
				delete_unit_template_and_units = {
					division_template = "Liberation War Veterans"
					disband = no
				}
			}
		}
	}
	option = { # Continue fighting
		name = wingbardy.601.b
		ai_chance = {
			base = 0
		}
		add_war_support = -0.15
	}
}
country_event = { # Wingbardy informed of defeat
	id = wingbardy.602
	title = wingbardy.602.t
	desc = wingbardy.602.d
	picture = GFX_event_griffons_machine_gun
	is_triggered_only = yes

	option = { #
		name = wingbardy.602.a
		add_stability = -0.1
		add_war_support = -0.1
		add_political_power = -100
		if = {
			limit = {
				1201 = {
					has_resources_rights = {
						receiver = WNG
					}
				}
			}
			remove_resource_rights = 1201
		}
		effect_tooltip = {
			white_peace = FROM
			set_truce = { target = FROM  days = 365 }
			FROM = {
				transfer_state = 1201
				transfer_state = 1200
			}
		}
	}
}
# Wingbardy Moves Into Katkat
country_event = {
	id = wingbardy.60
	immediate = {log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event wingbardy.60"}#Auto-logging
	title = wingbardy.60.t
	desc = wingbardy.60.d
	picture = GFX_event_griffons_machine_gun

	is_triggered_only = yes

	option = { #Back down
		name = wingbardy.60.a
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 1
			modifier = {
				is_historical_focus_on = yes
				factor = 0
			}
			modifier = {
				has_government = democratic
				factor = 2
			}
			modifier = {
				has_cosmetic_tag = ABY_patriotic_revolt
				factor = 0
			}
		}
		effect_tooltip = {
			WNG = {
				transfer_state = 1201
				country_event = { id = wingbardy.61 days = 1 }
			}
		}
		hidden_effect = {
			WNG = {
				country_event = { id = wingbardy.61 days = 1 }
			}
			set_global_flag = WNG_ABY_gives_in
			news_event = { id = news_wingbardy.16 days = 1 }
		}
	}

	option = { #Contest them!
		name = wingbardy.60.b
		trigger = {
			NOT = {
				has_country_leader_with_trait = ABY_melancholic
			}
		}
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 1
			modifier = {
				has_government = fascism
				factor = 10
			}
			modifier = {
				has_war = yes
				factor = 0
			}
		}
		#WNG = {
		#	transfer_state = 1201
		#}
		declare_war_on = {
		 	type = annex_everything
		 	target = WNG
		}
		WNG = {
			country_event = { id = wingbardy.62 days = 1 }
		}
		hidden_effect = {
			news_event = { id = news_wingbardy.16 days = 1 }
		}
	}
}

# Wingbardy Civil War - Abyssinia seizes Katren?
country_event = {
	id = wingbardy.63
	immediate = {log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event wingbardy.63"}#Auto-logging
	title = wingbardy.63.t
	desc = wingbardy.63.d
	picture = GFX_event_griffons_machine_gun

	is_triggered_only = yes

	option = { #Seize it!
		name = wingbardy.63.a
		trigger = {
			NOT = {
				has_country_leader_with_trait = ABY_melancholic
			}
		}
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 10
		}
		transfer_state = 1200
		1201 = {
			set_demilitarized_zone = no
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				NOT = {
					owns_state = 1201
				}
			}
			transfer_state = 1201
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				1201 = {
					has_resources_rights = {
						receiver = WNG
					}
				}
			}
			WNG = {
				remove_resource_rights = 1201
			}
		}
		WNG = {
			country_event = { id = wingbardy.64 hours = 1 }
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_country_flag = ABY_unlock_noble_loyalty
			}
			custom_effect_tooltip = ABY_loyalty_notification
			ABY_duchess_loyal = yes
			ABY_update_number_of_loyal_disloyal = yes
		}
	}

	option = { #Best not to!
		name = wingbardy.63.b
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 1
		}
	}
}

# Wingbardy Civil War - Abyssinia seizes Katren!
country_event = {
	id = wingbardy.64
	immediate = {log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event wingbardy.64"}#Auto-logging
	title = wingbardy.64.t
	desc = wingbardy.64.d
	picture = GFX_event_griffons_machine_gun

	is_triggered_only = yes

	option = { #It's thairs anyway.
		name = wingbardy.64.a
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 10
		}
		effect_tooltip = {
			ABY = {
				transfer_state = 1200
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					1200 = {
						is_claimed_by = ROOT
					}
				}
				remove_state_claim = 1200
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					1201 = {
						has_resources_rights = {
							receiver = WNG
						}
					}
				}
				remove_resource_rights = 1201
			}
		}
	}

	option = { #We'll be back.
		name = wingbardy.64.b
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 2
		}
		effect_tooltip = {
			ABY = {
				transfer_state = 1200
			}
		}
		add_state_claim = 1200
	}
}

# Formalise the Chiazbeacle Pact
country_event = {
	id = wingbardy.65
	title = wingbardy.65.t
	desc = wingbardy.65.d
	picture = GFX_event_medieval_castle_on_hill

	is_triggered_only = yes

	option = {
		name = wingbardy.65.a
		custom_effect_tooltip = WNG_formalise_the_pact_tt_2
		hidden_effect = {
			every_country = {
				limit = {
					is_in_faction_with = JER
					NOT = {
						has_war_with = WNG
					}
				}
				WNG = {
					add_to_faction = PREV
				}
				add_ai_strategy = {
					type = alliance
					id = "WNG"
					value = 200
				}
			}
		}
	}

	option = {
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 0
		}
		name = wingbardy.65.b
	}
}

#Give up in New Mareland
country_event = {
	id = wingbardy.7
	immediate = {log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event wingbardy.7"}
	title = wingbardy.7.t
	desc = wingbardy.7.d
	picture = GFX_event_equestria_fail
	is_triggered_only = yes
	option = {
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 10
		}
		name = wingbardy.7.a
		add_political_power = -200
		EQC = {
			if = {
				limit = { is_subject = yes }
				end_puppet_this = yes
			}
			if = {
				limit = { is_in_faction = yes }
				leave_faction = yes
			}
		}
		set_country_flag = { flag = bypass_on_peaceconference_ended days = 1 value = 1 }
		white_peace = FROM
		hidden_effect = {
			every_other_country = {
				limit = {
					OR = {
						AND = {
							ROOT = {
								is_faction_leader = yes
							}
							is_in_faction_with = ROOT
						}
						is_subject_of = ROOT
					}
					has_war_with = FROM
				}
				set_country_flag = { flag = bypass_on_peaceconference_ended days = 1 value = 1 }
				white_peace = FROM
			}
		}
		FROM = {
			country_event = { hours = 2 id = wingbardy.105 }
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = wingbardy.7.b
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 0
			#modifier = {
			#	factor = 0.75
			#	OR = {
			#		has_war_with = CHN
			#		has_war_with = NLR
			#		has_war_with = STG
			#		has_war_with = CRY
			#	}
			#}
			#modifier = {
			#	surrender_progress > 0.5
			#	factor = 0.5
			#}
			#modifier = {
			#	surrender_progress > 0.75
			#	factor = 0
			#}
		}
		FROM = {
			country_event = { id = wingbardy.8 hours = 2 }
		}
	}
}

				id = wingbardy.13
				days = 1
			}
		}
		effect_tooltip = {
			WNG = {
				diplomatic_relation = {
					country = STG
					relation = non_aggression_pact
					active = yes
				}
				add_opinion_modifier = {
					target = STG
					modifier = WNG_STG_treaty_trade
				}
				add_opinion_modifier = {
					target = ROOT
					modifier = made_friends
				}
			}
			diplomatic_relation = {
				country = WNG
				relation = non_aggression_pact
				active = yes
			}
			add_opinion_modifier = {
				target = WNG
				modifier = WNG_STG_treaty_trade
			}
			add_opinion_modifier = {
				target = FROM
				modifier = made_friends
			}
		}
	}
	option = {#No
		name = wingbardy.12.b
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 0
		}
		FROM = {
			country_event = {
				id = wingbardy.14
				days = 1
			}
		}
	}
}

# From the Pact
country_event = {
	id = wingbardy.15
	title = wingbardy.15.t
	desc = wingbardy.15.d
	picture = GFX_event_medieval_castle_on_hill
	immediate = {log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event wingbardy.15"}

	fire_only_once = yes

	is_triggered_only = yes

	option = {
		name = wingbardy.15.a
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 50
		}
		FROM = {
			country_event = {
				id = wingbardy.16
				days = 1
			}
		}
		effect_tooltip = {
			give_guarantee = BOI
			diplomatic_relation = {
				country = WNG
				relation = non_aggression_pact
				active = yes
			}
			WNG = {
				give_guarantee = BOI
				diplomatic_relation = {
					country = JER
					relation = non_aggression_pact
					active = yes
				}
			}
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = wingbardy.15.b
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 50
			modifier = {
				factor = 0.8
				has_opinion = { target = FROM value > 0 }
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0.8
				has_opinion = { target = FROM value > 25 }
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0.8
				has_opinion = { target = FROM value > 50 }
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0.8
				has_opinion = { target = FROM value > 75 }
			}
			modifier = {
				FROM = {
					is_ai = yes
				}
				factor = 0
			}
		}
		FROM = {
			country_event = {
				id = wingbardy.17
				days = 1
			}
		}
	}
}

#Tarrin Compromise - WNG makes a proposal
country_event = {
	id = wingbardy.20
	title = wingbardy.20.t
	desc = wingbardy.20.d

	picture = GFX_event_griffon_diplomacy

	is_triggered_only = yes

	option = {#Offer the whole thing
		name = wingbardy.20.a
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 3
		}
		set_global_flag = WNG_tarrin_compromise_full
		JER = {
			country_event = {
				id = wingbardy.21
				hours = 2
			}
		}
		custom_effect_tooltip = if_they_accept
		effect_tooltip = {
			JER = {
				if = {
					limit = {
						FRN = {
							owns_state = 487
						}
					}
					transfer_state = 487
				}
				if = {
					limit = {
						FRN = {
							owns_state = 652
						}
					}
					transfer_state = 652
				}
				if = {
					limit = {
						FRN = {
							owns_state = 521
						}
					}
					transfer_state = 521
				}
			}
		}
	}
	option = {#Offer some
		name = wingbardy.20.b
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 6
		}
		set_global_flag = WNG_tarrin_compromise_half
		JER = {
			country_event = {
				id = wingbardy.22
				hours = 2
			}
		}
		custom_effect_tooltip = if_they_accept
		effect_tooltip = {
			JER = {
				if = {
					limit = {
						FRN = {
							owns_state = 487
						}
					}
					transfer_state = 487
				}
			}
		}
	}
	option = {#Offer something else
		name = wingbardy.20.c
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 1
		}
		set_global_flag = WNG_tarrin_compromise_componsation
		JER = {
			country_event = {
				id = wingbardy.23
				hours = 2
			}
		}
		custom_effect_tooltip = if_they_accept
		effect_tooltip = {

		}
	}
}

	id = wingbardy.23
	title = wingbardy.23.t
	desc = wingbardy.23.d

	picture = GFX_event_griffon_diplomacy

	is_triggered_only = yes

	option = {#Yes
		name = wingbardy.23.a
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 10
		}
		WNG = {
			country_event = {
				id = wingbardy.27
				hours = 2
			}
		}
		set_country_flag = accepted_tarrin_compromise
	}

	option = {#No
		name = wingbardy.23.b
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 10
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				has_opinion = { target = WNG value > 94 }
			}
			modifier = {
				WNG = {
					is_ai = yes
				}
				factor = 0
			}
		}
		WNG = {
			country_event = {
				id = wingbardy.28
				hours = 2
			}
		}
	}
}

#Tarrin Compromise - They offered it all!!! for FRN

	id = wingbardy.24
	title = wingbardy.24.t
	desc = wingbardy.24.d

	picture = GFX_event_griffon_diplomacy

	is_triggered_only = yes

	option = {#Yes
		name = wingbardy.24.a
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 5
		}
		WNG = {
			country_event = {
				id = wingbardy.29
				hours = 5
			}
		}
		set_country_flag = accepted_tarrin_compromise
	}

	option = {#No
		name = wingbardy.24.b
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 10
			modifier = {
				factor = 0.8
				check_variable = {
					var = chance_to_hand_over_tarrin
					value = 6
					compare = greater_than_or_equals
				}
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				check_variable = {
					var = chance_to_hand_over_tarrin
					value = 10
					compare = greater_than_or_equals
				}
			}
			modifier = {
				WNG = {
					is_ai = yes
				}
				factor = 0
			}
		}
		WNG = {
			country_event = {
				id = wingbardy.30
				hours = 2
			}
		}
	}
}

#Tarrin Compromise - JER agreed - for WNG
country_event = {
	id = wingbardy.27
	title = wingbardy.27.t
	desc = wingbardy.27.d

	picture = GFX_event_griffon_diplomacy

	is_triggered_only = yes

	option = {#Yes!
		name = wingbardy.27.a
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_global_flag = WNG_tarrin_compromise_full
			}
			FRN = {
				country_event = {
					id = wingbardy.24
					hours = 2
				}
			}
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = {
				has_global_flag = WNG_tarrin_compromise_half
			}
			FRN = {
				country_event = {
					id = wingbardy.25
					hours = 2
				}
			}
		}
		else = {
			FRN = {
				country_event = {
					id = wingbardy.26
					hours = 2
				}
			}
		}
	}
}

#Tarrin Compromise - JER rejected - for WNG and FRN
country_event = {
	id = wingbardy.28
	title = wingbardy.28.t
	desc = wingbardy.28.d

	picture = GFX_event_griffon_diplomacy

	is_triggered_only = yes

	option = {#Aww...
		name = wingbardy.28.a
		every_country = {
			limit = {
				OR = {
					original_tag = FRN
					original_tag = WNG
					original_tag = JER
					is_neighbor_of = FRN
					is_neighbor_of = WNG
					is_neighbor_of = JER
				}
			}
			news_event = news_wingbardy.18
		}
	}
}

#Tarrin Compromise - FRN rejected - for WNG and FRN
country_event = {
	id = wingbardy.30
	title = wingbardy.30.t
	desc = wingbardy.30.d

	picture = GFX_event_griffon_diplomacy

	is_triggered_only = yes

	option = {#Let them Go.
		name = wingbardy.30.a
		JER = {
			country_event = {
				id = wingbardy.32
				days = 1
			}
		}
		FRN = {
			leave_faction = yes
		}
		every_country = {
			limit = {
				OR = {
					original_tag = FRN
					original_tag = WNG
					original_tag = JER
					is_neighbor_of = FRN
					is_neighbor_of = WNG
					is_neighbor_of = JER
				}
			}
			news_event = news_wingbardy.18
		}
	}

	option = {#Give up.
		name = wingbardy.30.b
		JER = {
			country_event = {
				id = wingbardy.33
				days = 1
			}
		}
		every_country = {
			limit = {
				OR = {
					original_tag = FRN
					original_tag = WNG
					original_tag = JER
					is_neighbor_of = FRN
					is_neighbor_of = WNG
					is_neighbor_of = JER
				}
			}
			news_event = news_wingbardy.18
		}
	}
}

#Tarrin Compromise - All Done! - for JER
country_event = {
	id = wingbardy.31
	title = wingbardy.31.t
	desc = wingbardy.31.d

	picture = GFX_event_griffon_diplomacy

	immediate = {
		set_country_flag = WNG_tarrin_compromise_met
		WNG = {
			set_country_flag = WNG_tarrin_compromise_met
		}
	}

	is_triggered_only = yes

	option = {#Yes!
		name = wingbardy.31.a
		WNG_tarrin_compromise_effect = yes
		hidden_effect = {
			every_country = {
				limit = {
					OR = {
						original_tag = FRN
						original_tag = WNG
						original_tag = JER
						is_neighbor_of = FRN
						is_neighbor_of = WNG
						is_neighbor_of = JER
					}
				}
				news_event = news_wingbardy.19
			}
		}
	}
}

#Tarrin Compromise - FRN rejected - for WNG abaondoned them - for JER
country_event = {
	id = wingbardy.32
	title = wingbardy.32.t
	desc = wingbardy.32.d

	picture = GFX_event_griffon_diplomacy

	is_triggered_only = yes

	option = {#Let them Go.
		name = wingbardy.32.a
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 10
		}
		add_state_claim = 487
		add_state_claim = 652
		add_state_claim = 521
	}

	option = {#Give up.
		name = wingbardy.32.b
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 10
			modifier = {
				has_war = yes
				factor = 0
			}
			modifier = {
				has_war_support < 0.5
				factor = 0
			}
		}
		add_state_claim = 487
		add_state_claim = 652
		add_state_claim = 521
		create_wargoal = {
			target = FRN
			type = take_state_focus
			generator = { 487 652 521 }
		}

	}
}

		add_state_claim = 521
	}

			factor = 5
			modifier = {
				has_war = yes
				factor = 0
			}
			modifier = {
				has_war_support < 0.5
				factor = 0
			}
		}
		add_state_claim = 487
		add_state_claim = 652
		add_state_claim = 521

			target = FRN
			type = take_state_focus

		}

		}
	}

	desc = wingbardy.39.d

	picture = GFX_event_griffon_diplomacy

	is_triggered_only = yes

		name = wingbardy.39.a
		custom_effect_tooltip = WNG_fascists_in_power_election_tt
		hidden_effect = {
			setup_WNG_gacerbo_law_government = yes
			country_event = {
				id = wingbardy.44
				days = 30
			}
			country_event = {
				id = wingbardy.45
				days = 65
			}
		}
		swap_ruler_traits = {
			remove = aspiring_duce
			add = duce
		}
		WNG_giulio_beakolini = {
			set_portraits = {
				civilian = {
					large = "gfx/leaders/WNG/portrait_wingbardy_giulio_beakolini.tga"
				}
			}
		}
		remove_ideas = WNG_political_deadlock
	}
}

#For STG - Wingbardy experiance sharing
country_event = {
	id = wingbardy.49
	title = wingbardy.49.t
	desc = wingbardy.49.d

	picture = GFX_event_griffon_diplomacy

	is_triggered_only = yes

	option = { # This is a good idea
		name = wingbardy.49.a
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 1
		}
		army_experience = 25
		navy_experience = 25
		air_experience = 25
		add_mastery_bonus = {
			bonus = 0.2
			days = 180
			folder = land
			name = wingbardy.49.t
		}
		effect_tooltip = {
			FROM = {
				country_event = {
					id = wingbardy.53
					hours = 2
				}
				army_experience = 25
				navy_experience = 25
				air_experience = 25
				add_mastery_bonus = {
					bonus = 0.2
					days = 180
					folder = land
					name = wingbardy.49.t
				}
			}
		}
		hidden_effect = {
			FROM = {
				country_event = {
					id = wingbardy.53
					hours = 2
				}
			}
		}
	}
	option = { # No
		name = wingbardy.49.b
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 0
		}
		FROM = {
			country_event = {
				id = wingbardy.54
				hours = 2
			}
		}
	}
}

# Communists start a civil war
country_event = {
	id = wingbardy.50
	immediate = {log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event wingbardy.50"}
	title = wingbardy.50.t
	desc = wingbardy.50.d
	picture = GFX_event_griffon_soldier
	is_triggered_only = yes

	immediate = {
		hidden_effect = {
			if = {
				limit = {
					is_ai = no
					has_dlc = "By Blood Alone"
				}
				hidden_effect = { play_song = "bella_ciao" }
			}
			country_event = {
				id = wingbardy.79
				days = 5
				random_hours = 7
			}
		}
	}


	option = {      #Start the war
		name = wingbardy.50.a
	}
}

# Event for end of civil war
#TODO - Add event to delete troops when all wars end
country_event = {
	id = wingbardy.51
	immediate = {log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event wingbardy.51"}
	title = wingbardy.51.t
	desc = {
		text = wingbardy.51.d
		trigger = {
			has_war = no
		}
	}
	desc = {
		text = wingbardy.51.d_war
		trigger = {
			has_war = yes
		}
	}
	picture = GFX_event_griffon_soldier
	is_triggered_only = yes

	option = {
		name = wingbardy.51.a
		trigger = {
			has_war = no
		}
		add_stability = 0.05
		add_popularity = { ideology = fascism popularity = -0.05 }
		delete_unit_template_and_units = { division_template = "Guardia Rossa" disband = yes }
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_completed_focus = WNG_secure_police_support
			}
			delete_unit_template_and_units = { division_template = "Brigata Carabinieri" disband = yes }
		}
		set_country_flag = WNG_civil_war_troops_dispanded
		add_timed_idea = {
			idea = WNG_rebuild_the_nation_idea
			days = 365
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = wingbardy.51.b
		trigger = {
			has_war = yes
		}
		add_stability = 0.05
		add_popularity = { ideology = fascism popularity = -0.05 }
		add_timed_idea = {
			idea = WNG_rebuild_the_nation_idea
			days = 365
		}
	}
}

# Fascist Coup
country_event = {
	id = wingbardy.52
	title = wingbardy.52.t
	desc = wingbardy.52.d

	picture = GFX_event_griffon_diplomacy

	is_triggered_only = yes

	option = { # Victory
		name = wingbardy.52.a
		#TODO News Event
		custom_effect_tooltip = WNG_only_fascism_government_tt
		hidden_effect = {
			setup_WNG_only_fascism_government = yes
			set_politics = {
				ruling_party = fascism
				elections_allowed = no
			}
		}
				swap_ruler_traits = {
			remove = aspiring_duce
			add = duce
		}
		WNG_giulio_beakolini = {
			set_portraits = {
				civilian = {
					large = "gfx/leaders/WNG/portrait_wingbardy_giulio_beakolini.tga"
				}
			}
		}
		add_ideas = WNG_only_fascism_idea
					if = {
				limit = {
					has_idea = WNG_political_deadlock
				}
				remove_ideas = WNG_political_deadlock
			}
	}
	option = { # Victory
		name = wingbardy.52.b
		#TODO News Event
		custom_effect_tooltip = WNG_only_fascism_government_tt
		hidden_effect = {
			setup_WNG_only_fascism_government = yes
			set_politics = {
				ruling_party = fascism
				elections_allowed = no
			}
		}
				swap_ruler_traits = {
			remove = aspiring_duce
			add = duce
		}
		WNG_giulio_beakolini = {
			set_portraits = {
				civilian = {
					large = "gfx/leaders/WNG/portrait_wingbardy_giulio_beakolini.tga"
				}
			}
		}
		add_ideas = WNG_only_fascism_idea
		custom_effect_tooltip = WNG_fascist_republic
		remove_ideas = WNG_garibald_talonuel_iii
		set_cosmetic_tag = WNG_republic
		set_country_flag = have_regular_puppets
		remove_opinion_modifier = {
			target = MIT
			modifier = SIC_antimonarchism
		}
		remove_opinion_modifier = {
			target = SIC
			modifier = SIC_antimonarchism
		}
		MIT = {
			remove_opinion_modifier = {
				target = ROOT
				modifier = SIC_antimonarchism
			}
		}
		SIC = {
			remove_opinion_modifier = {
				target = ROOT
				modifier = SIC_antimonarchism
			}
		}
					if = {
				limit = {
					has_idea = WNG_political_deadlock
				}
				remove_ideas = WNG_political_deadlock
			}
	}
}

		}

#WNG - Communists and Socalists fight for power
country_event = {
	id = wingbardy.70
	title = wingbardy.70.t
	desc = wingbardy.70.d

	picture = GFX_event_griffon_diplomacy

	is_triggered_only = yes

	option = { # Communists
		name = wingbardy.70.a
		country_event = wingbardy.701
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 2
			modifier = {
				OR = {
					has_country_flag = WNG_AI_SOCIALIST
					has_game_rule = {
						rule = WNG_ai_behavior
						option = SOCIALIST
					}
				}
				factor = 0
			}
		}
	}
	option = { # Socialists
		name = wingbardy.70.b
		country_event = wingbardy.702
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 1
			modifier = {
				OR = {
					has_country_flag = WNG_AI_COMMUNIST
					has_game_rule = {
						rule = WNG_ai_behavior
						option = COMMUNIST
					}
				}
				factor = 0
			}
		}
	}
	option = { # Socialists (Proletarino survives)
		name = wingbardy.70.c
		country_event = wingbardy.703
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 1
			modifier = {
				OR = {
					has_country_flag = WNG_AI_COMMUNIST
					has_game_rule = {
						rule = WNG_ai_behavior
						option = COMMUNIST
					}
				}
				factor = 0
			}
		}
	}
}
#WNG - Communists take power
country_event = {
	id = wingbardy.701
	title = wingbardy.701.t
	desc = wingbardy.701.d

	picture = GFX_event_griffon_diplomacy

	is_triggered_only = yes

	option = { # Communists
		name = wingbardy.701.a
		set_politics = {
			ruling_party = communism
		}
		complete_national_focus = WNG_the_communists_take_power
		set_country_flag = have_regular_puppets
		remove_opinion_modifier = {
			target = MIT
			modifier = SIC_antimonarchism
		}
		remove_opinion_modifier = {
			target = SIC
			modifier = SIC_antimonarchism
		}
		MIT = {
			remove_opinion_modifier = {
				target = ROOT
				modifier = SIC_antimonarchism
			}
		}
		SIC = {
			remove_opinion_modifier = {
				target = ROOT
				modifier = SIC_antimonarchism
			}
		}
		drop_cosmetic_tag = yes
		hidden_effect = {
			set_party_name = {
				ideology = democratic
				long_name = WNG_democratic_party_long
				name = WNG_democratic_party
			}
			promote_character = WNG_giovanni_de_gaspwingi
		}
	}
}
#WNG - Socalists take power

	id = wingbardy.702
	title = wingbardy.702.t
	desc = wingbardy.702.d

	picture = GFX_event_griffon_diplomacy

	is_triggered_only = yes

		name = wingbardy.702.a
		kill_ideology_leader = communism
		set_party_name = {
			ideology = communism
			long_name = WNG_psw_long
			name = WNG_psw
		}
		promote_character = WNG_giovanni_gacci
		set_politics = {
			ruling_party = communism
		}
		set_country_flag = have_regular_puppets
		remove_opinion_modifier = {
			target = MIT
			modifier = SIC_antimonarchism
		}
		remove_opinion_modifier = {
			target = SIC
			modifier = SIC_antimonarchism
		}
		MIT = {
			remove_opinion_modifier = {
				target = ROOT
				modifier = SIC_antimonarchism
			}
		}
		SIC = {
			remove_opinion_modifier = {
				target = ROOT
				modifier = SIC_antimonarchism
			}
		}
		complete_national_focus = WNG_the_socialists_take_power
		set_cosmetic_tag = WNG_republic

			set_party_name = {
				ideology = democratic
				long_name = WNG_psu_long
				name = WNG_psu
			}
		}
	}
}

		}

			remove_opinion_modifier = {
				target = ROOT

				target = ROOT

		}

#WNG - for STG - Wingbardian Communists ask for support
country_event = {
	id = wingbardy.71
	title = wingbardy.71.t
	desc = wingbardy.71.d

	picture = GFX_event_griffon_diplomacy

	is_triggered_only = yes

	option = { # Yes
		name = wingbardy.71.a
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 10
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_global_flag = WNG_civil_war
			}
			FROM = {
				country_event = {
					id = wingbardy.74
					days = 1
				}
			}
		}
		else = {
			FROM = {
				country_event = {
					id = wingbardy.72
					days = 1
				}
			}
		}
		set_country_flag = STG_WNG_help
	}
	option = { # No
		name = wingbardy.71.b
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 0
		}
		country_event = {
			id = wingbardy.73
			days = 1
		}
	}
}

		set_country_flag = STG_WNG_help
	}

country_event = { # Weapons Arrive
	id = wingbardy.74
	title = wingbardy.74.t
	desc = wingbardy.74.d

	picture = GFX_event_griffon_diplomacy

	is_triggered_only = yes

	option = { # Yes
		name = wingbardy.74.a
		add_equipment_to_stockpile = {
			type = infantry_equipment_0
			amount = 1500
			producer = STG
		}
		add_equipment_to_stockpile = {
			type = support_equipment
			amount = 50
			producer = STG
		}
		add_equipment_to_stockpile = {
			type = artillery_equipment_1
			amount = 25
			producer = STG
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_dlc = "Arms Against Tyranny"
			}
			add_equipment_subsidy = {
				cic = 250
				equipment_type = infantry_equipment
				seller_trigger = is_communist_seller_trigger
			}
			add_equipment_subsidy = {
				cic = 250
				equipment_type = support_equipment
				seller_trigger = is_communist_seller_trigger
			}
			add_equipment_subsidy = {
				cic = 250
				equipment_type = artillery_equipment_1
				seller_trigger = is_communist_seller_trigger
			}
		}
	}
}

	id = wingbardy.75

	desc = wingbardy.75.d

	picture = GFX_event_griffon_diplomacy

		name = wingbardy.75.a

			JER = {
				exists = yes
				has_government = communism
				is_faction_leader = yes
			}
		}
		JER = { add_to_faction = ROOT }
	}
	option = { # Pywhen
		name = wingbardy.75.b
		trigger = {
			GRW = {
				exists = yes
				has_government = communism
				is_faction_leader = yes
			}
		}
		GRW = { add_to_faction = ROOT }
	}
	option = { # New Mareland
		name = wingbardy.75.c
		trigger = {
			EQC = {
				exists = yes
				has_government = communism
				is_faction_leader = yes
			}
		}
		EQC = { add_to_faction = ROOT }
	}
	option = { # We will lead
		name = wingbardy.75.e
		create_faction_from_template = faction_template_WNG_communist_international
		set_rule = {
			can_create_factions = yes
		}
	}
}

country_event = { # Wingbardy backed communist uprising
	id = wingbardy.77
	title = wingbardy.77.t
	desc = wingbardy.77.d

	picture = GFX_event_griffon_soldier

	is_triggered_only = yes

	immediate = {
		set_temp_variable = {
			commie_support = party_popularity@communism
		}
		set_temp_variable = {
			non_commie_support = party_popularity@democratic
		}
		add_to_temp_variable = {
			non_commie_support = party_popularity@fascism
		}
		add_to_temp_variable = {
			non_commie_support = party_popularity@neutrality
		}
	}

	option = { # Darn Commies
		name = wingbardy.77.a
		remove_ideas = WNG_communist_propaganda
		start_civil_war = {
			ideology = communism
			size = commie_support
		}
		random_other_country = {
			limit = {
				original_tag = ROOT
				has_government = communism
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					check_variable = {
						WNG_commie_guns > 0
					}
				}
				add_equipment_to_stockpile = {
					type = infantry_equipment
					amount = WNG_commie_guns
					producer = WNG
				}
			}
			hidden_effect = {
					country_event = {
						id = wingbardy.utility
						days = 1
					}
			}
		}
		effect_tooltip = {
			WNG = {
				country_event = {
					id = wingbardy.78
					days = 1
				}
			}
		}
	}
	option = { # For the Revolution!
		name = wingbardy.77.a
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 0
		}
		remove_ideas = WNG_communist_propaganda
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_government = democratic
			}
			start_civil_war = {
				ruling_party = communism
				ideology = democratic
				size = non_commie_support
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_government = fascism
			}
			start_civil_war = {
				ruling_party = communism
				ideology = fascism
				size = non_commie_support
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_government = neutrality
			}
			start_civil_war = {
				ruling_party = communism
				ideology = neutrality
				size = non_commie_support
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				check_variable = {
					WNG_commie_guns > 0
				}
			}
			add_equipment_to_stockpile = {
				type = infantry_equipment
				amount = WNG_commie_guns
				producer = WNG
			}
		}
		hidden_effect = {
			random_other_country = {
				limit = {
					original_tag = ROOT
					NOT = {
						has_government = communism
					}
				}
				country_event = {
					id = wingbardy.utility
					days = 1
				}
			}
		}
		effect_tooltip = {
			WNG = {
				country_event = {
					id = wingbardy.78
					days = 1
				}
			}
		}
	}
}
country_event = { # Wingbardy backed communist uprising
	id = wingbardy.utility
	title = wingbardy.78.t
	desc = wingbardy.78.d

	hidden = yes
	picture = GFX_event_griffon_soldier

	is_triggered_only = yes

	immediate = {
		hidden_effect = {
			if = {
				limit = {
					has_government = communism
				}
				random_other_country = {
					limit = {
						original_tag = FROM
						NOT = {
							has_government = communism
						}
					}
					save_event_target_as = FROM_not_commie_country
				}
			}
			else = {
				save_event_target_as = FROM_not_commie_country
			}
			WNG = {
				country_event = {
					id = wingbardy.78
				}
			}
		}
	}
}
country_event = { # Wingbardy backed communist uprising
	id = wingbardy.78
	title = wingbardy.78.t
	desc = wingbardy.78.d

	picture = GFX_event_griffon_soldier

	is_triggered_only = yes

	immediate = {
		log = "[FROM.GetName] and [FROM.FROM.GetName]"
	}

	option = { # Help them
		name = wingbardy.78.a
		if = {
			limit = {
				FROM = {
					has_government = communism
				}
			}
			add_to_war = {
				targeted_alliance = FROM
				enemy = FROM.FROM
				hostility_reason = asked_to_join
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					is_in_faction = yes
				}
				add_to_faction = FROM
			}
		}
		else = {
			add_to_war = {
				targeted_alliance = FROM.FROM
				enemy = FROM
				hostility_reason = asked_to_join
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					is_in_faction = yes
				}
				add_to_faction = FROM.FROM
			}
		}
	}
	option = { # Nah, not for us
		name = wingbardy.78.b
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 0
		}
	}
}
country_event = { # Conscription in the Civil War
	id = wingbardy.79
	title = wingbardy.79.t
	desc = wingbardy.79.d

	picture = GFX_event_griffon_soldier

	is_triggered_only = yes

	immediate = {
		hidden_effect = {
			country_event = {
				id = wingbardy.80
				days = 3
				random_hours = 7
			}
		}
	}

	option = { # Conscript those birbs!
		name = wingbardy.79.a
		add_political_power = -25
		add_stability = -0.02
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_idea = volunteer_only
			}
			add_ideas = limited_conscription
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = {
				has_idea = limited_conscription
			}
			add_ideas = extensive_conscription
		}
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 5
			modifier = {
				has_stability > 0.1
				factor = 2
			}
		}
	}
	option = { # Nah, let's not
		name = wingbardy.79.b
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 1
			modifier = {
				has_stability < 0.1
				factor = 10
			}
		}
	}
}
country_event = { # Government Minister
	id = wingbardy.80
	title = wingbardy.80.t
	desc = wingbardy.80.d

	picture = GFX_event_griffon_diplomacy

	is_triggered_only = yes

	immediate = {
	}

	option = { # Harmony
		name = wingbardy.80.a
		activate_advisor = WNG_Givanoe_Wingomi
		ai_chance = {
			base = 5
			modifier = {
				factor = 2
				has_completed_focus = WNG_evacuate_the_chamber_of_Deputies
			}
			modifier = {
				has_completed_focus = WNG_promise_labour_reforms
				add = 2
			}
			modifier = {
				democratic_greater_than_communism = yes
				add = 2
			}
			modifier = {
				has_completed_focus = WNG_anti_fascist_propoganda
				add = -2
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				OR = {
					has_country_flag = WNG_AI_COMMUNIST
					has_game_rule = {
						rule = WNG_ai_behavior
						option = COMMUNIST
					}
					has_country_flag = WNG_AI_SOCIALIST
					has_game_rule = {
						rule = WNG_ai_behavior
						option = SOCIALIST
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}
	option = { # Communist
		name = wingbardy.80.b
		activate_advisor = WNG_Griffmadeo_bordiga
		ai_chance = {
			base = 5
			modifier = {
				add = 2
				has_completed_focus = WNG_mobilise_the_trade_unions
			}
			modifier = {
				has_completed_focus = WNG_anti_fascist_propoganda
				add = 2
			}
			modifier = {
				communism_greater_than_democratic = yes
				add = 2
			}
			modifier = {
				has_completed_focus = WNG_promise_labour_reforms
				add = -2
			}
			modifier = {
				has_completed_focus = WNG_evacuate_the_chamber_of_Deputies
				add = -2
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				OR = {
					has_country_flag = WNG_AI_REPUBLICAN
					has_game_rule = {
						rule = WNG_ai_behavior
						option = REPUBLICAN
					}
					has_country_flag = WNG_AI_UNITARY_SOCIALIST
					has_game_rule = {
						rule = WNG_ai_behavior
						option = UNITARY_SOCIALIST
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}
	option = { # Neither
		name = wingbardy.80.c
		add_political_power = 25
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 0
		}
	}
}

country_event = { # Gallus is Invited to Speak
	id = wingbardy.812
	title = wingbardy.812.t
	desc = wingbardy.812.d

	picture = GFX_event_gallus_in_wingbardy

	is_triggered_only = yes

	immediate = {
	}

	option = { #
		name = wingbardy.812.a
		add_popularity = {
			ideology = democratic
			popularity = 0.05
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				BOI = {
					exists = yes
					NOT = {
						has_war_with = ROOT
					}
				}
			}
			diplomatic_relation = {
				country = BOI
				relation = guarantee
			}
		}
	}
}

#For EQS - Wingbardy experiance sharing
country_event = {
	id = wingbardy.86
	title = wingbardy.86.t
	desc = wingbardy.86.d

	picture = GFX_event_griffon_diplomacy

	is_triggered_only = yes

	option = { # This is a good idea
		name = wingbardy.86.a
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 1
		}
		army_experience = 25
		navy_experience = 25
		air_experience = 25
		add_mastery_bonus = {
			bonus = 0.2
			days = 180
			folder = land
			name = wingbardy.86.t
		}
		effect_tooltip = {
			FROM = {
				country_event = {
					id = wingbardy.87
					hours = 2
				}
				army_experience = 25
				navy_experience = 25
				air_experience = 25
				add_mastery_bonus = {
					bonus = 0.2
					days = 180
					folder = land
					name = wingbardy.86.t
				}
			}
		}
		hidden_effect = {
			FROM = {
				country_event = {
					id = wingbardy.87
					hours = 2
				}
			}
		}
	}
	option = { # No
		name = wingbardy.86.b
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 0
		}
		FROM = {
			country_event = {
				id = wingbardy.88
				hours = 2
			}
		}
	}
}

# Wingbardy offers Associate Status in the Republic
country_event = {
	id = wingbardy.90
	title = wingbardy.90.t
	desc = wingbardy.90.d

	picture = GFX_event_griffon_diplomacy

	is_triggered_only = yes

	option = {
		name = wingbardy.90.a
		FROM = { country_event = wingbardy.91 }
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 10
		}
		effect_tooltip = {
			if = {
				limit = { NOT = { ROOT = { is_subject_of = FROM } } }
				FROM = { puppet = ROOT }
			}
			ROOT = {
				add_ideas = WNG_intergration
			}
		}
		hidden_effect = {
			FRN_load_ideology_focus = yes
		}
	}

	option = {
		name = wingbardy.90.b
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 0
			modifier = {
				add = 50
				has_country_flag = FRN_sovereign_path
			}
		}
		FROM = { country_event = wingbardy.143 }
		custom_effect_tooltip = WNG_they_may_kill_you_tt
	}
}

#Puppet ally - yes
country_event = {
	id = wingbardy.91
	title = wingbardy.91.t
	desc = wingbardy.91.d
	picture = GFX_event_griffon_diplomacy
	is_triggered_only = yes

	option = {
		name = wingbardy.142.a
		if = {
			limit = { NOT = { FROM = { is_subject_of = ROOT } } }
			if = {
				limit = {
					FROM = {
						NOT = {
							original_tag = FRN
						}
					}
				}
				FROM = {
					get_current_government_type = yes
				}
				puppet = FROM
				FROM = {
					restore_previous_government_type = yes
				}
			}
			else = {
				puppet = FROM
			}
		}
		FROM = {
			add_ideas = WNG_intergration
		}
	}
}

#Puppet ally - no
country_event = {
	id = wingbardy.92
	title = wingbardy.92.t
	desc = wingbardy.92.d
	picture = GFX_event_griffon_diplomacy
	is_triggered_only = yes

	option = {
		name = wingbardy.92.a
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 10
		}
		remove_from_faction = FROM
		create_wargoal = {
			target = FROM
			type = annex_everything
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = wingbardy.92.b
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 1
			modifier = {
				factor = 12
				strength_ratio = { tag = FROM ratio > 0.59 }
			}
		}
		add_political_power = -50
	}
}

#WNG befriends GRI
country_event = {
	id = wingbardy.93
	title = wingbardy.93.t
	desc = wingbardy.93.d
	picture = GFX_event_griffon_diplomacy
	is_triggered_only = yes

	option = {
		name = wingbardy.93.a
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 10
		}
		custom_effect_tooltip = WNG_support_the_archons_tt
		diplomatic_relation = {
			country = FROM
			relation = non_aggression_pact
			active = yes
		}
		every_country = {
			limit = {
				OR = {
					original_tag = ARA
					original_tag = FRN
					original_tag = TAL
					original_tag = FAL
					original_tag = SIC
					original_tag = CYA
					original_tag = MIT
				}
			}
			add_ideas = WNG_southern_shield
		}
		FROM = {
			country_event = {
				id = wingbardy.94
				hours = 4
			}
		}
		#TODO NEWS EVENT
	}
	option = {
		name = wingbardy.93.b
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 0
		}
		FROM = {
			country_event = {
				id = wingbardy.95
				hours = 4
			}
		}
	}
}

country_event = {
	id = wingbardy.99
	title = wingbardy.99.t
	desc = wingbardy.99.d
	picture = GFX_event_griffon_diplomacy
	is_triggered_only = yes

	option = {
		name = wingbardy.99.a
		add_country_leader_trait = democratic_centralist
			if = {
				limit = {
					has_country_flag = WNG_COM_good
				}
            set_country_leader_ideology = leninism
			custom_effect_tooltip = WNG_com_goodchange
			}
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 10
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = wingbardy.99.b
		add_country_leader_trait = organic_centralist
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 10
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = wingbardy.99.c
		add_country_leader_trait = dictator
		add_stability = -0.1
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 10
		}
	}
}

country_event = {
	id = wingbardy.145
	title = wingbardy.145.t
	desc = wingbardy.145.d
	picture = GFX_event_griffon_diplomacy
	is_triggered_only = yes

	option = {
		name = wingbardy.145.a
		add_opinion_modifier = { target = FROM modifier = made_friends }
		FROM = {
			every_owned_state = {
				limit = {
					OR = {
						is_core_of = ROOT
						is_claimed_by = ROOT
					}
				}
				transfer_state_to = ROOT
			}
		}
		1201 = {
			set_demilitarized_zone = no
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				1201 = {
					has_resources_rights = {
						receiver = WNG
					}
				}
			}
			WNG = {
				remove_resource_rights = 1201
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_country_flag = ABY_unlock_noble_loyalty
			}
			custom_effect_tooltip = ABY_loyalty_notification
			ABY_duchess_loyal = yes
			ABY_update_number_of_loyal_disloyal = yes
		}
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 100
		}
	}
}

country_event = { # Commie Flavour - The Stamps
	id = wingbardy_flavour.11
	title = wingbardy_flavour.11.t
	desc = wingbardy_flavour.11.d

	picture = GFX_event_stamps

	trigger = {
		original_tag = WNG
		has_cosmetic_tag = WNG_republic
		has_global_flag = WNG_civil_war
		OR = {
			has_government = democratic
			has_government = communism
		}
		has_war = no
		owns_state = 371
	}

	mean_time_to_happen = {
		days = 60
	}

	fire_only_once = yes

	option = { # Sell them
		name = wingbardy_flavour.11.a
		add_timed_idea = {
			idea = WNG_stamp_sells
			days = 365
		}
	}
	option = { # Put them in a museum
		name = wingbardy_flavour.11.b
		add_stability = 0.05
		add_political_power = 75
	}
}
country_event = { # The Altar is Complete
	id = wingbardy_flavour.12
	title = wingbardy_flavour.12.t
	desc = {
		text = wingbardy_flavour.12.d_fascist
		trigger = {
			has_government = fascism
		}
	}
	desc = {
		text = wingbardy_flavour.12.d_communist
		trigger = {
			has_government = communism
		}
	}
	desc = {
		text = wingbardy_flavour.12.d_monarchy
		trigger = {
			has_government = neutrality
			has_completed_focus = WNG_viva_il_re
		}
	}
	desc = {
		text = wingbardy_flavour.12.d_republic
		trigger = {
			has_government = democratic
			has_cosmetic_tag = WNG_republic
		}
	}
	desc = {
		text = wingbardy_flavour.12.d_defult
		trigger = {
			NOT = {
				has_government = communism
				has_government = fascism
				AND = {
					has_completed_focus = WNG_viva_il_re
					has_government = neutrality
				}
				AND = {
					has_government = democratic
					has_cosmetic_tag = WNG_republic
				}
			}
		}
	}

	picture = GFX_event_altar_of_the_fatherland

	is_triggered_only = yes

	option = { #
		name = wingbardy_flavour.12.a
	}
}

#Bordiclaw leaves the party
country_event = {
	id = wingbardy_flavour.15
	title = wingbardy_flavour.15.t
	desc = wingbardy_flavour.15.d
	picture = GFX_event_griffon_diplomacy
	is_triggered_only = yes

	option = { #Ban his party
		name = wingbardy_flavour.15.a
		add_popularity = {
			ideology = communism
			popularity = -0.01
		}
		WNG_griffmadeo_bordiga = {
			retire = yes
		}
	}
	option = { #Arrest him
		trigger = {
			has_country_leader_ideology = stalinism
		}
		name = wingbardy_flavour.15.b
		add_stability = -0.01
		WNG_griffmadeo_bordiga = {
			retire = yes
		}
	}
	option = { #Kill him
		trigger = {
			has_country_leader_ideology = stalinism
		}
		name = wingbardy_flavour.15.c
		add_manpower = -1
		WNG_griffmadeo_bordiga = {
			retire = yes
		}
		hidden_effect = {
			set_country_flag = WNG_bordiclaw_actually_dead
		}
	}
}
#Bordiclaw has tea
country_event = {
	id = wingbardy_flavour.16
	title = wingbardy_flavour.16.t
	desc = wingbardy_flavour.16.d
	picture = GFX_event_griffon_diplomacy
	is_triggered_only = yes

	option = { #to internationalism!
		name = wingbardy_flavour.16.a
		add_war_support = 0.01
	}
}
#On colonialism memes and Zebrica
country_event = {
	id = wingbardy_flavour.17
	title = wingbardy_flavour.17.t
	desc = wingbardy_flavour.17.d
	picture = GFX_event_equestrian_ships
	is_triggered_only = yes

	option = {
		name = wingbardy_flavour.17.a
		trigger = {
			OR = {
				has_government = neutrality
				has_government = fascism
			}
		}
		add_political_power = 15
		add_popularity = {
			ideology = fascism
			popularity = 0.01
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = wingbardy_flavour.17.b
		trigger = {
			OR = {
				has_government = communism
				has_government = democratic
			}
		}
		add_political_power = -15
		add_popularity = {
			ideology = fascism
			popularity = 0.01
		}
	}
}

				WNG_harsh_on_gumberto = 1
			}
		}
	}

		name = wingbardy_gumberto.1.b
		hidden_effect = {
			country_event = wingbardy_gumberto.3
			add_to_variable = {
				WNG_easy_on_gumberto = 1
			}
		}
	}
}

		}
	}

		name = wingbardy_gumberto.9.a
		hidden_effect = {
			country_event = {
				id = wingbardy_gumberto.10
				days = 14
				random_days = 4
			}
		}
	}
	option = { # Keep Some Friends
		name = wingbardy_gumberto.9.b
		hidden_effect = {
			country_event = {
				id = wingbardy_gumberto.11
				days = 14
				random_days = 4
			}
		}
	}
	option = { # Let him pick his friends
		name = wingbardy_gumberto.9.c
		hidden_effect = {
			country_event = {
				id = wingbardy_gumberto.12
				days = 14
				random_days = 4
			}
			set_country_flag = WNG_gumberto_fascist
		}
	}
}

# Outcome
## Double Down - 20
country_event = {
	id = wingbardy_gumberto.20
	title = wingbardy_gumberto.20.t
	desc = wingbardy_gumberto.20.d
	picture = GFX_event_medieval_castle_on_hill

	trigger = {
		original_tag = WNG
		has_completed_focus = WNG_one_night_in_griffenheim
		check_variable = {
			WNG_harsh_on_gumberto > 4
		}
		NOT = {
			has_country_flag = WNG_gumberto_exit
		}
	}

	mean_time_to_happen = {
		days = 20
	}

	fire_only_once = yes

	option = { # We are doomed
		name = wingbardy_gumberto.20.a
		custom_effect_tooltip = WNG_gumberto_fail
		hidden_effect = {
			set_country_flag = WNG_gumberto_1
			set_country_flag = WNG_gumberto_exit
		}
	}
}
## Sender - 21
country_event = {
	id = wingbardy_gumberto.21
	title = wingbardy_gumberto.21.t
	desc = wingbardy_gumberto.21.d
	picture = GFX_event_medieval_castle_on_hill
	is_triggered_only = yes

	trigger = {
		NOT = {
			has_country_flag = WNG_gumberto_exit
		}
	}

	option = { # We are doomed
		name = wingbardy_gumberto.21.a
		if = {
			limit = {
				check_variable = {
					WNG_harsh_on_gumberto > 4
				}
			}
			country_event = wingbardy_gumberto.20
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = {
				has_country_flag = WNG_gumberto_fascist
				check_variable = {
					WNG_easy_on_gumberto < 5
				}
			}
			country_event = wingbardy_gumberto.22
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = {
				has_country_flag = WNG_gumberto_fascist
			}
			country_event = wingbardy_gumberto.23
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = {
				NOT = { has_country_flag = WNG_gumberto_fascist }
				check_variable = {
					WNG_easy_on_gumberto < 5
				}
			}
			country_event = wingbardy_gumberto.24
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = {
				NOT = { has_country_flag = WNG_gumberto_fascist }
				NOT = { has_country_flag = WNG_gumberto_friends }
				check_variable = {
					WNG_easy_on_gumberto > 4
				}
			}
			country_event = wingbardy_gumberto.24
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = {
				NOT = { has_country_flag = WNG_gumberto_fascist }
				has_country_flag = WNG_gumberto_friends
				check_variable = {
					WNG_easy_on_gumberto > 4
				}
			}
			country_event = wingbardy_gumberto.25
		}
	}
}

#State Dinner
country_event = {
	id = wingbardy_gumberto.28
	title = wingbardy_gumberto.28.t
	desc = wingbardy_gumberto.28.d
	picture = GFX_event_medieval_castle_on_hill

	is_triggered_only = yes
	trigger = {
		NOT = {
			has_country_flag = WNG_gumberto_exit
		}
	}

	option = { #
		name = wingbardy_gumberto.28.a
		hidden_effect = {
			add_to_variable = {
				WNG_harsh_on_gumberto = 1
			}
		}
	}
	option = { #
		name = wingbardy_gumberto.28.b
	}
	option = { #
		name = wingbardy_gumberto.28.c
		hidden_effect = {
			add_to_variable = {
				WNG_easy_on_gumberto = 1
			}
		}
	}
}

#Give Gumberto trait if needed
country_event = {
	id = wingbardy_gumberto.29
	title = wingbardy_gumberto.29.t
	desc = wingbardy_gumberto.29.d
	picture = GFX_event_medieval_castle_on_hill
	hidden = yes

	is_triggered_only = yes

	option = {
		name = wingbardy_gumberto.29.a
		add_country_leader_trait = absolute_monarch
	}
}

	id = wingbardy_king_struggle.0
	title = wingbardy_king_struggle.0.t
	desc = wingbardy_king_struggle.0.d

	picture = GFX_event_medieval_city_in_mountains

	is_triggered_only = yes

	option = {
		name = wingbardy_king_struggle.0.a
		random_list = {
			25 = {

			}
			75 = {
				add_political_power = -200
				set_country_flag = WNG_skip_revolt
			}
		}
	}
}
country_event = {
	id = wingbardy_king_struggle.1
	title = wingbardy_king_struggle.1.t
	desc = wingbardy_king_struggle.1.d

	picture = GFX_event_medieval_city_in_mountains

	is_triggered_only = yes

	trigger = {
		has_country_leader = {
			character = WNG_dismissed_parlement
			ruling_only = yes
		}
	}

	hidden = yes

	option = {
		name = wingbardy_king_struggle.1.a
		random_list = {
			25 = {
				country_event = {
					id = wingbardy_king_struggle.2
					days = 28
					random_days = 4
				}
			}
			25 = {
				country_event = {
					id = wingbardy_king_struggle.3
					days = 28
					random_days = 4
				}
			}
			25 = {
				country_event = {
					id = wingbardy_king_struggle.4
					days = 28
					random_days = 4
				}
			}
			40 = {
				country_event = {
					id = wingbardy_king_struggle.5
					days = 28
					random_days = 4
				}
			}
		}
		country_event = {
			id = wingbardy_king_struggle.1
			days = 28
		}
	}
}
# Communists
country_event = {
	id = wingbardy_king_struggle.2
	title = wingbardy_king_struggle.2.t
	desc = wingbardy_king_struggle.2.d

	picture = GFX_event_medieval_city_in_mountains

	is_triggered_only = yes

	trigger = {
		NOT = {
			has_country_flag = WNG_blocking_socalist_news
		}
		has_country_leader = {
			character = WNG_dismissed_parlement
			ruling_only = yes
		}
	}

	option = {
		name = wingbardy_king_struggle.2.a
		add_popularity = {
			ideology = communism
			popularity = 0.02
		}
	}
}

		name = wingbardy_investigation.1.a
	}

#J'accuse !
country_event = {
	id = wingbardy_investigation.15
	immediate = {log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event wingbardy_investigation.15"}
	title = wingbardy_investigation.15.t
	desc = wingbardy_investigation.15.de

	is_triggered_only = yes

	#Eros VII
	option = {
		name = wingbardy_investigation.15.a
		hidden_effect = {
			set_country_flag = WNG_investigation_choose_eros
			country_event = {
				id = wingbardy_investigation.16
			}
		}
	}
	#Marie Discret
	option = {
		name = wingbardy_investigation.15.b
		hidden_effect = {
			set_country_flag = WNG_investigation_choose_marie
			country_event = {
				id = wingbardy_investigation.16
			}
		}
	}
	#Marijke Redclaw
	option = {
		name = wingbardy_investigation.15.c
		hidden_effect = {
			set_country_flag = WNG_investigation_choose_redclaw
			country_event = {
				id = wingbardy_investigation.16
			}
		}
	}
	#Erich Ebonwing
	option = {
		name = wingbardy_investigation.15.d
		hidden_effect = {
			set_country_flag = WNG_investigation_choose_erich
			set_temp_variable = {
				evidence = 0
			}
			if = {limit = { has_country_flag = WNG_evidence_leaving_party_flag } add_to_temp_variable = { evidence = 1 }}
			if = {limit = { has_country_flag = WNG_evidence_weapons_flag } add_to_temp_variable = { evidence = 1 }}
			if = {limit = { has_country_flag = WNG_evidence_wine_noble_flag } add_to_temp_variable = { evidence = 1 }}
			if = {limit = { has_country_flag = WNG_evidence_mail_flag } add_to_temp_variable = { evidence = 1 }}
			if = {limit = { has_country_flag = WNG_evidence_vinovian_wine_flag } add_to_temp_variable = { evidence = 1 }}

			if = {
				limit = {
					check_variable = {
						evidence < 2
					}
				}
				country_event = {
					id = wingbardy_investigation.16
				}
			}
			else = {
				country_event = {
					id = wingbardy_investigation.20
				}
			}
		}
	}
}

#Wrong person / not enough evidence
country_event = {
	id = wingbardy_investigation.16
	immediate = {log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event wingbardy_investigation.16"}
	title = wingbardy_investigation.16.t
	desc = wingbardy_investigation.16.d

	is_triggered_only = yes

	option = {
		name = wingbardy_investigation.16.a
		hidden_effect = {
			if = {
				limit = {
					has_country_flag = WNG_investigation_choose_eros
				}
				GRI = {
					if = {
						limit = {
							exists = yes
							has_country_leader = {
							    character = GRI_archon_eros_vii
							    ruling_only = yes
							}
						}
						country_event = {
							id = wingbardy_investigation.17
						}
					}
				}
				TRD = {
					if = {
						limit = {
							exists = yes
							has_country_leader = {
							    character = GRI_archon_eros_vii
							    ruling_only = yes
							}
						}
						country_event = {
							id = wingbardy_investigation.17
						}
					}
				}
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					has_country_flag = WNG_investigation_choose_marie
				}
				if = {
					limit = {
						JER = {
							has_completed_focus = JER_state_of_aquileia
						}
					}
					JER = {
						country_event = {
							id = wingbardy_investigation.18
						}
					}
				}
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					has_country_flag = WNG_investigation_choose_erich
					GRI = {
						exists = yes
						NOT = {
							has_country_leader = {
							    character = GRI_ferdinand_dawnclaw
							    ruling_only = yes
							}
						}
					}
				}
				GRI = {
					country_event = {
						id = wingbardy_investigation.19
					}
				}
			}
		}
		custom_effect_tooltip = WNG_case_closed_tt
	}
}

				}
			}

	immediate = {log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event wingbardy_investigation.21"}
	title = wingbardy_investigation.21.t
	desc = wingbardy_investigation.21.d

	is_triggered_only = yes

	#There ye go
	option = {
		name = wingbardy_investigation.21.a
		ai_chance = {
			base = 0
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				GRI_erich_ebonwing = { is_unit_leader = yes }
			}
			remove_unit_leader_role = GRI_erich_ebonwing
		}
		GRI_erich_ebonwing = {
			remove_advisor_role = {
				slot = army_chief
			}
			set_nationality = WNG
		}
		WNG = {
			country_event = {
				id = wingbardy_investigation.25
			}
		}
	}
	#Succ my imperial weewee
	option = {
		name = wingbardy_investigation.21.b
		ai_chance = {
			base = 1
		}
		WNG = {
			country_event = {
				id = wingbardy_investigation.23
			}
		}
	}
}

	id = wingbardy_investigation.26
	immediate = {log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event wingbardy_investigation.26"}
	title = wingbardy_investigation.26.t
	desc = wingbardy_investigation.26.d

	is_triggered_only = yes

	#End the case.
	option = {
		name = wingbardy_investigation.26.a
		clr_country_flag = WNG_begins_the_investigation
		add_ideas = WNG_investigation_1
		custom_effect_tooltip = WNG_case_closed_tt
	}
	#More stuff.
	option = {
		trigger = {
			OR = {
				has_country_flag = WNG_investigation_imprisoned_killer_flag
				has_country_flag = WNG_mail_records_flag
			}
		}
		name = wingbardy_investigation.26.b
		set_country_flag = WNG_investigation_delve_deeper_flag
	}
}

#Interrogate killer
country_event = {
	id = wingbardy_investigation.27
	immediate = {log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event wingbardy_investigation.27"}
	title = wingbardy_investigation.27.t
	desc = wingbardy_investigation.27.d

	is_triggered_only = yes

	#Regency Chambers
	option = {
		name = wingbardy_investigation.27.a
		set_country_flag = WNG_search_regency_chamber_flag
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_dlc = "La Resistance"
			}
			custom_effect_tooltip = WNG_search_regency_chamber_tt
		}
		else = {
			custom_effect_tooltip = WNG_search_regency_chamber_noLaR_tt
		}
	}
}

#Investigate seal
country_event = {
	id = wingbardy_investigation.28
	immediate = {log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event wingbardy_investigation.28"}
	title = wingbardy_investigation.28.t
	desc = wingbardy_investigation.28.d

	is_triggered_only = yes

	#Regency Chambers
	option = {
		name = wingbardy_investigation.28.a
		set_country_flag = WNG_search_regency_chamber_flag
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_dlc = "La Resistance"
			}
			custom_effect_tooltip = WNG_search_regency_chamber_tt
		}
		else = {
			custom_effect_tooltip = WNG_search_regency_chamber_noLaR_tt
		}
	}
	#Grover's room
	option = {
		name = wingbardy_investigation.28.b
		set_country_flag = WNG_search_grover_room_flag
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_dlc = "La Resistance"
			}
			custom_effect_tooltip = WNG_search_grovers_room_tt
		}
		else = {
			custom_effect_tooltip = WNG_search_grovers_room_noLaR_tt
		}
	}
}

#Grover room

	id = wingbardy_investigation.29
	immediate = {log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event wingbardy_investigation.29"}
	title = wingbardy_investigation.29.t
	desc = wingbardy_investigation.29.d

	is_triggered_only = yes

	option = {
		name = wingbardy_investigation.29.a
		clr_country_flag = WNG_begins_the_investigation
		custom_effect_tooltip = WNG_investigation_failure_tt
	}
}

#Regency chamber
country_event = {
	id = wingbardy_investigation.30
	immediate = {log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event wingbardy_investigation.30"}
	title = wingbardy_investigation.30.t
	desc = wingbardy_investigation.30.d

	is_triggered_only = yes

	option = {
		name = wingbardy_investigation.30.a
		add_ideas = WNG_investigation_2
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_country_flag = WNG_mail_records_flag
			}
			set_country_flag = WNG_last_investigation_decision_flag
		}
		else = {
			clr_country_flag = WNG_begins_the_investigation
			custom_effect_tooltip = WNG_investigation_success_tt
		}
	}
}

#Extra event
country_event = {
	id = wingbardy_investigation.31
	immediate = {log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event wingbardy_investigation.31"}
	title = wingbardy_investigation.31.t
	desc = wingbardy_investigation.31.d

	is_triggered_only = yes

	option = {
		name = wingbardy_investigation.31.a
		country_event = {
			id = wingbardy_investigation.32
			days = 10
		}
	}
}


#FINAL BESTEST EVENT
country_event = {
	id = wingbardy_investigation.32
	immediate = {log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event wingbardy_investigation.32"}
	title = wingbardy_investigation.32.t
	desc = wingbardy_investigation.32.d

	is_triggered_only = yes

	option = {
		name = wingbardy_investigation.32.a
		swap_ideas = {
			remove_idea = WNG_investigation_2
			add_idea = WNG_investigation_3
		}
		custom_effect_tooltip = WNG_investigation_victory_tt
	}
}

###########################
# Wargoal Justification Events
###########################

add_namespace = war_justification

# Fascists vs Neutrals
country_event = {
	id = war_justification.1
	immediate = {log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event war_justification.1"}
	title = war_justification.1.t
	desc = war_justification.1.d
	picture = GFX_event_griffon_soldier

	is_triggered_only = yes

	trigger = {
		has_government = fascism
		FROM = { has_government = neutrality }
		NOT = { has_country_flag = war_justification_last_event_political }

		HIE_is_star_father_fighting_avians = no
	}

	option = {
		name = war_justification.1.a
		FROM = { country_event = { id = war_justification.201 } }
		set_country_flag = war_justification_last_event_political
		clr_country_flag = war_justification_last_event_generic
		clr_country_flag = war_justification_last_event_neighbor
		clr_country_flag = war_justification_last_event_mobilized
		clr_country_flag = war_justification_last_event_borderthreat
	}
}

# Fascists vs Democrats
country_event = {
	id = war_justification.2
	immediate = {log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event war_justification.2"}
	title = war_justification.2.t
	desc = war_justification.2.d
	picture = GFX_event_pony_soldiers_sunset

	is_triggered_only = yes

	trigger = {
		has_government = fascism
		FROM = { has_government = democratic }
		NOT = { has_country_flag = war_justification_last_event_political }

		HIE_is_star_father_fighting_avians = no
	}

	option = {
		name = war_justification.2.a
		FROM = { country_event = { id = war_justification.202 } }
		set_country_flag = war_justification_last_event_political
		clr_country_flag = war_justification_last_event_generic
		clr_country_flag = war_justification_last_event_neighbor
		clr_country_flag = war_justification_last_event_mobilized
		clr_country_flag = war_justification_last_event_borderthreat
	}
}

country_event = {
	id = war_justification.17
	immediate = {log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event war_justification.17"}
	title = war_justification.17.t
	desc = war_justification.17.d
	picture = GFX_event_griffons_machine_gun

	is_triggered_only = yes

	trigger = {
		is_neighbor_of = FROM
		NOT = { has_country_flag = war_justification_last_event_neighbor }

		HIE_is_star_father_fighting_avians = no
	}

	option = {
		name = war_justification.17.a
		FROM = { country_event = { id = war_justification.217 } }
		set_country_flag = war_justification_last_event_neighbor
		clr_country_flag = war_justification_last_event_generic
		clr_country_flag = war_justification_last_event_political

# Generic: Mobilized Nation
country_event = {
	id = war_justification.18
	immediate = {log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event war_justification.18"}
	title = war_justification.18.t
	desc = war_justification.18.d
	picture = GFX_event_griffon_soldier

	is_triggered_only = yes

	trigger = {
		FROM = {
			OR = {
				has_idea = low_economic_mobilisation
				has_idea = partial_economic_mobilisation
				has_idea = war_economy
				has_idea = tot_economic_mobilisation
				has_idea = totaler_krieg_economy
			}
		}
		NOT = { has_country_flag = war_justification_last_event_mobilized }

		HIE_is_star_father_fighting_avians = no
	}

	option = {
		name = war_justification.18.a
		FROM = { country_event = { id = war_justification.218 } }
		set_country_flag = war_justification_last_event_mobilized
		clr_country_flag = war_justification_last_event_generic
		clr_country_flag = war_justification_last_event_political
		clr_country_flag = war_justification_last_event_neighbor
		clr_country_flag = war_justification_last_event_borderthreat
	}
}

# Generic: Enemy Troops at the Border
country_event = {
	id = war_justification.19
	immediate = {log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event war_justification.19"}
	title = war_justification.19.t
	desc = war_justification.19.d
	picture = GFX_event_pony_soldiers_sunset

	is_triggered_only = yes

	trigger = {
		FROM = {
			is_neighbor_of = ROOT
			any_owned_state = {
				any_neighbor_state = { is_owned_by = ROOT }
				FROM = {
					divisions_in_state = {
						state = PREV
						size > 1
					}
				}
			}
		}
		NOT = { has_country_flag = war_justification_last_event_borderthreat }

		HIE_is_star_father_fighting_avians = no
	}

	option = {
		name = war_justification.19.a
		FROM = { country_event = { id = war_justification.219 } }
		set_country_flag = war_justification_last_event_borderthreat
		clr_country_flag = war_justification_last_event_generic
		clr_country_flag = war_justification_last_event_political
		clr_country_flag = war_justification_last_event_neighbor
		clr_country_flag = war_justification_last_event_mobilized
	}
}

		name = war_justification.215.a
	}
}

# Wargoal Expired
country_event = {
	id = war_justification.301
	immediate = {log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event war_justification.301"}
	title = war_justification.301.t
	desc = war_justification.301.d
	picture = GFX_event_griffon_royal_guard

	is_triggered_only = yes

	trigger = {
		has_war = no
	}

	option = {
		name = war_justification.301.a
		trigger = { has_government = democratic }
		add_political_power = -30
		add_war_support = -0.05
		add_popularity = {
			ideology = democratic
			popularity = -0.05
		}
	}

	option = {
		name = war_justification.301.b
		trigger = { has_government = communism }
		add_political_power = -30
		add_war_support = -0.05
		add_popularity = {
			ideology = communism
			popularity = -0.05
		}
	}

	option = {
		name = war_justification.301.c
		trigger = {
			OR = {
				has_government = fascism
				has_government = neutrality
			}
		}
		add_political_power = -30
		add_war_support = -0.05
		add_popularity = {
			ideology = ROOT
			popularity = -0.05
		}
	}
}
add_namespace = wittenland

add_namespace = wittenland_duel

		add_stability = 0.05

			country_event = {
				id = wittenland.2
				days = 45
			}
		}
	}

#Magic events

country_event = { #Best Mages Proving Event
	id = wittenland.7
	immediate = {log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event wittenland.7"}

	title = wittenland.7.t
	desc = wittenland.7.d
	picture = GFX_event_medieval_city_3

	is_triggered_only = yes

	option = {
		name = wittenland.7.a
		add_field_marshal_role = {
			character = WIT_archmage_river_run

			traits = { pony_race_trait adaptable determined_innovator }
			skill = 2
			attack_skill = 2
			defense_skill = 2
			planning_skill = 2
			logistics_skill = 1
		} custom_effect_tooltip = archmage_river_run_stats_tp
		add_corps_commander_role = {
			character = WIT_mysteria

			traits = { pony_race_trait ranger }
			skill = 2
			attack_skill = 2
			defense_skill = 1
			planning_skill = 1
			logistics_skill = 3
		} custom_effect_tooltip = mysteria_stats_tp
		add_corps_commander_role = {
			character = WIT_spirit_fire

			traits = { pony_race_trait trait_mountaineer trait_unpredictable }
			skill = 2
			attack_skill = 2
			defense_skill = 1
			planning_skill = 2
			logistics_skill = 2
		} custom_effect_tooltip = spirit_fire_stats_tp
	}
}

country_event = { #Nimbusian attache
	id = wittenland.8
	immediate = {log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event wittenland.8"}

	title = wittenland.8.t
	desc = {
        text = wittenland.8.d_snowy
        trigger = {
			ROOT = {
				has_character = WIT_snowy_smarty
			}
		}
    }
	desc = {
        text = wittenland.8.d_no_snowy
        trigger = {
			ROOT = {
				NOT = {
					has_character = WIT_snowy_smarty
				}
			}
		}
    }
	picture = GFX_event_pegasi_city

	is_triggered_only = yes

	option = {
		name = wittenland.8.a
		army_experience = 25
		effect_tooltip = {
			NIM_iodis_avgi = {
				set_nationality = WIT
			}
		}
		add_ideas = WIT_nimbusian_training
	}
}

country_event = { #Magic Tank
	id = wittenland.9
	immediate = {log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event wittenland.9"}

	title = wittenland.9.t
	desc = wittenland.9.d
	picture = GFX_event_unicorn_worker

	is_triggered_only = yes

	option = {
		name = wittenland.9.a
		custom_effect_tooltip = WIT_enchanted_armor_tech_tt
		hidden_effect = {
			set_technology = {
				tech_griffon_army_def_a = 1
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_dlc = "Arms Against Tyranny"
			}
			custom_effect_tooltip = available_mio_tt
			show_mio_tooltip = WIT_Magic_Tank_Concern_organization
			mio:WIT_Magic_Tank_Concern_organization = {
				add_mio_size = 1
				add_mio_funds = 600
			}
		}
		else = {
			custom_effect_tooltip = available_designer
			show_ideas_tooltip = WIT_Magic_Tank_Concern
		}
		set_country_flag = WIT_Tank_Concern_Unlocked_Flag
	}
}

country_event = { #Military review event
	id = wittenland.12
	immediate = {log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event wittenland.12"}

	title = wittenland.12.t
	desc = wittenland.12.d
	picture = GFX_event_bazooka_team

	is_triggered_only = yes

	option = {
		name = wittenland.12.a
		army_experience = 25
		custom_effect_tooltip = WIT_superior_firepower_chosen_tt
		set_country_flag = WIT_superior_firepower_chosen
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 20
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				OR = {
					has_doctrine = new_mobile_warfare
					has_doctrine = grand_battleplan
					has_doctrine = mass_assault
				}
			}
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = wittenland.12.b
		army_experience = 25
		custom_effect_tooltip = WIT_grand_battleplan_chosen_tt
		set_country_flag = WIT_grand_battleplan_chosen
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 20
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				OR = {
					has_doctrine = new_mobile_warfare
					has_doctrine = superior_firepower
					has_doctrine = mass_assault
				}
			}
		}
	}
}

	immediate = {log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event wittenland.13"}

	title = wittenland.13.t
	desc = wittenland.13.d
