			add_idea = WIT_titular_nobility
			remove_idea = WIT_unicorn_parties
		}
	}
}


################################################################################################
###Coltstream or war

country_event = { #Fasc purchase of coltstream
	id = wittenland.16
	immediate = {log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event wittenland.16"}

	title = wittenland.16.t
	desc = wittenland.16.d
	picture = GFX_event_medieval_castle_on_hill

	is_triggered_only = yes

	option = { #Sure fam
		name = wittenland.16.a
		add_political_power = -25
		add_timed_idea = { idea = WIT_payment_for_land  days = 365 }
		FROM = {
			transfer_state = 682
			country_event = { id = wittenland.17 days = 1 }
		}
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 7
		}
	}
	option = { #Nah mate
		name = wittenland.16.b
		FROM = {
			country_event = {id = wittenland.18 days = 4}
		}
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 3
		}
	}
}

country_event = { #They let us have Coltstream!
	id = wittenland.17
	immediate = {log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event wittenland.17"}

	title = wittenland.17.t
	desc = wittenland.17.d
	picture = GFX_event_medieval_castle_on_hill

	is_triggered_only = yes

	option = {
		name = wittenland.17.a
		add_timed_idea = { idea = WIT_paying_for_land  days = 365 }
	}
}

country_event = { #they denied us, how do we respond?
	id = wittenland.18
	immediate = {log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event wittenland.18"}

	title = wittenland.18.t
	desc = wittenland.18.d
	picture = GFX_event_medieval_castle_on_hill

	is_triggered_only = yes

	option = { #Bring on the tanks
		name = wittenland.18.a
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_non_aggression_pact_with = FROM
			}
			diplomatic_relation = {
				country = FROM
				relation = non_aggression_pact
				active = no
			}
		}
		add_war_support = 0.05
		add_political_power = -25
		custom_effect_tooltip = WIT_coltstream_borderwar_unlocked_tt
		set_country_flag = WIT_coltstream_borderwar_unlocked
	}
}

	id = wittenland.21
	immediate = {log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event wittenland.21"}

	title = wittenland.21.t
	desc = wittenland.21.d
	picture = GFX_event_medieval_castle_on_hill

	is_triggered_only = yes

	option = { #Sure fam
		name = wittenland.21.a
		FROM = {
			transfer_state = 682
			country_event = {id = wittenland.22 days = 1}
		}
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 1
		}
	}
	option = { #Nah mate
		name = wittenland.21.b
		FROM = {
			country_event = {id = wittenland.23 days = 1}
		}
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 10
		}
	}
}

	id = wittenland.22
	immediate = {log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event wittenland.22"}

	title = wittenland.22.t
	desc = wittenland.22.d
	picture = GFX_event_medieval_castle_on_hill

	is_triggered_only = yes

	option = {
		name = wittenland.22.a
		add_political_power = 25
		if = {
			limit = { is_river_fed_member = yes }
			RIV_leave_fed = yes
		}
	}
}

			limit = { is_river_fed_member = yes }
			RIV_leave_fed = yes
		}
	}

country_event = { #Start of the duel chain
	id = wittenland_duel.1
	immediate = {log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event wittenland_duel.1"}

	title = wittenland_duel.1.t
	desc = wittenland_duel.1.d
	picture = GFX_event_medieval_city_winter

	is_triggered_only = yes

	option = {
		name = wittenland_duel.1.a
		country_event = wittenland_duel.2
	}
}

country_event = { #Honoria's Challenge
	id = wittenland_duel.2
	immediate = {log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event wittenland_duel.2"}
	title = wittenland_duel.2.t
	desc = wittenland_duel.2.d
	picture = GFX_event_palace_hall

	is_triggered_only = yes

	option = {
		name = wittenland_duel.2.a
		country_event = wittenland_duel.3
	}
}

country_event = { #Wulfric's Gambit
	id = wittenland_duel.3
	immediate = {log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event wittenland_duel.3"}
	title = wittenland_duel.3.t
	desc = wittenland_duel.3.d
	picture = GFX_event_hornia_and_white_star

	is_triggered_only = yes

	option = {
		name = wittenland_duel.3.a
		country_event = wittenland_duel.4
	}
}

country_event = { #White Star's Fury
	id = wittenland_duel.4
	immediate = {log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event wittenland_duel.4"}
	title = wittenland_duel.4.t
	desc = wittenland_duel.4.d
	picture = GFX_event_hornia_and_white_star

	is_triggered_only = yes

	option = {
		name = wittenland_duel.4.a
		country_event = wittenland_duel.5
		set_variable = {
			var = honoria_points_var
			value = 0
		}
		set_variable = {
			var = white_star_points_var
			value = 0
		}
		set_variable = {
			var = volaire_points_var
			value = 0
		}
	}
}

country_event = {
	id = wittenland_duel.5
	immediate = {log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event wittenland_duel.5"}

	title = wittenland_duel.5.t
	desc = wittenland_duel.5.d
	picture = GFX_event_hornia_and_white_star

	is_triggered_only = yes

	option = {
		ai_chance = {
			base = 30
			modifier = {
				OR = {
					AND = {
						is_historical_focus_on = yes
						has_game_rule = {
							rule = WIT_ai_behavior
							option = DEFAULT
						}
					}
					has_country_flag = WIT_AI_HISTORICAL
					has_country_flag = WIT_AI_VOLIAIRE
					has_country_flag = WIT_AI_WULFRIC
					has_game_rule = {
							rule = WIT_ai_behavior
							option = HISTORICAL
					}
					has_game_rule = {
							rule = WIT_ai_behavior
							option = VOLIAIRE
					}
					has_game_rule = {
						rule = WIT_ai_behavior
						option = WULFRIC
					}
				}
				factor = 0
			}
		}
		name = wittenland_duel.5.a
		add_to_variable = {
			var = honoria_points_var
			value = 1
		}
		country_event = wittenland_duel.6
	}
	option = {
		ai_chance = {
			base = 30
			modifier = {
				OR = {
					AND = {
						is_historical_focus_on = yes
						has_game_rule = {
							rule = WIT_ai_behavior
							option = DEFAULT
						}
					}
					has_country_flag = WIT_AI_HISTORICAL
					has_country_flag = WIT_AI_HONORIA
					has_game_rule = {
							rule = WIT_ai_behavior
							option = HONORIA
					}
					has_game_rule = {
							rule = WIT_ai_behavior
							option = HISTORICAL
					}
				}
				factor = 0
			}
		}
		name = wittenland_duel.5.b
		add_to_variable = {
			var = volaire_points_var
			value = 1
		}
		country_event = wittenland_duel.6
	}
	option = {
		ai_chance = {
			base = 40
			modifier = {
				OR = {
					has_country_flag = WIT_AI_HONORIA
					has_country_flag = WIT_AI_VOLIAIRE
					has_country_flag = WIT_AI_WULFRIC
					has_game_rule = {
							rule = WIT_ai_behavior
							option = HONORIA
					}
					has_game_rule = {
							rule = WIT_ai_behavior
							option = VOLIAIRE
					}
					has_game_rule = {
						rule = WIT_ai_behavior
						option = WULFRIC
					}
				}
				factor = 0
			}
		}
		name = wittenland_duel.5.c
		add_to_variable = {
			var = white_star_points_var
			value = 1
		}
		country_event = wittenland_duel.6
	}
}

country_event = {
	id = wittenland_duel.6
	immediate = {log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event wittenland_duel.6"}

	title = wittenland_duel.6.t
	desc = wittenland_duel.6.d
	picture = GFX_event_hornia_and_white_star

	is_triggered_only = yes

	option = {
		ai_chance = {
			base = 30
			modifier = {
				OR = {
					AND = {
						is_historical_focus_on = yes
						has_game_rule = {
							rule = WIT_ai_behavior
							option = DEFAULT
						}
					}
					has_country_flag = WIT_AI_HISTORICAL
					has_country_flag = WIT_AI_VOLIAIRE
					has_country_flag = WIT_AI_WULFRIC
					has_game_rule = {
							rule = WIT_ai_behavior
							option = HISTORICAL
					}
					has_game_rule = {
							rule = WIT_ai_behavior
							option = VOLIAIRE
					}
					has_game_rule = {
						rule = WIT_ai_behavior
						option = WULFRIC
					}
				}
				factor = 0
			}
		}
		name = wittenland_duel.6.a
		add_to_variable = {
			var = honoria_points_var
			value = 1
		}
		country_event = wittenland_duel.7
	}
	option = {
		ai_chance = {
			base = 30
			modifier = {
				OR = {
					AND = {
						is_historical_focus_on = yes
						has_game_rule = {
							rule = WIT_ai_behavior
							option = DEFAULT
						}
					}
					has_country_flag = WIT_AI_HISTORICAL
					has_country_flag = WIT_AI_HONORIA
					has_game_rule = {
							rule = WIT_ai_behavior
							option = HONORIA
					}
					has_game_rule = {
							rule = WIT_ai_behavior
							option = HISTORICAL
					}
				}
				factor = 0
			}
		}
		name = wittenland_duel.6.b
		add_to_variable = {
			var = volaire_points_var
			value = 1
		}
		country_event = wittenland_duel.7
	}
	option = {
		ai_chance = {
			base = 40
			modifier = {
				OR = {
					has_country_flag = WIT_AI_HONORIA
					has_country_flag = WIT_AI_VOLIAIRE
					has_country_flag = WIT_AI_WULFRIC
					has_game_rule = {
							rule = WIT_ai_behavior
							option = HONORIA
					}
					has_game_rule = {
							rule = WIT_ai_behavior
							option = VOLIAIRE
					}
					has_game_rule = {
						rule = WIT_ai_behavior
						option = WULFRIC
					}
				}
				factor = 0
			}
		}
		name = wittenland_duel.6.c
		add_to_variable = {
			var = white_star_points_var
			value = 1
		}
		country_event = wittenland_duel.7
	}
}

country_event = {
	id = wittenland_duel.7
	immediate = {log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event wittenland_duel.7"}

	title = wittenland_duel.7.t
	desc = wittenland_duel.7.d
	picture = GFX_event_hornia_and_white_star

	is_triggered_only = yes

	option = {
		ai_chance = {
			base = 30
			modifier = {
				OR = {
					AND = {
						is_historical_focus_on = yes
						has_game_rule = {
							rule = WIT_ai_behavior
							option = DEFAULT
						}
					}
					has_country_flag = WIT_AI_HISTORICAL
					has_country_flag = WIT_AI_VOLIAIRE
					has_country_flag = WIT_AI_WULFRIC
					has_game_rule = {
							rule = WIT_ai_behavior
							option = HISTORICAL
					}
					has_game_rule = {
							rule = WIT_ai_behavior
							option = VOLIAIRE
					}
					has_game_rule = {
						rule = WIT_ai_behavior
						option = WULFRIC
					}
				}
				factor = 0
			}
		}
		name = wittenland_duel.7.a
		add_to_variable = {
			var = honoria_points_var
			value = 1
		}
		country_event = wittenland_duel.8
	}
	option = {
		ai_chance = {
			base = 30
			modifier = {
				OR = {
					AND = {
						is_historical_focus_on = yes
						has_game_rule = {
							rule = WIT_ai_behavior
							option = DEFAULT
						}
					}
					has_country_flag = WIT_AI_HISTORICAL
					has_country_flag = WIT_AI_HONORIA
					has_game_rule = {
							rule = WIT_ai_behavior
							option = HONORIA
					}
					has_game_rule = {
							rule = WIT_ai_behavior
							option = HISTORICAL
					}
				}
				factor = 0
			}
		}
		name = wittenland_duel.7.b
		add_to_variable = {
			var = volaire_points_var
			value = 1
		}
		country_event = wittenland_duel.8
	}
	option = {
		ai_chance = {
			base = 40
			modifier = {
				OR = {
					has_country_flag = WIT_AI_HONORIA
					has_country_flag = WIT_AI_VOLIAIRE
					has_country_flag = WIT_AI_WULFRIC

							rule = WIT_ai_behavior
							option = HONORIA
					}
					has_game_rule = {
							rule = WIT_ai_behavior
							option = VOLIAIRE
					}
					has_game_rule = {
						rule = WIT_ai_behavior
						option = WULFRIC
					}
				}
				factor = 0
			}
		}
		name = wittenland_duel.7.c
		add_to_variable = {
			var = white_star_points_var
			value = 1
		}
		country_event = wittenland_duel.8
	}
}

country_event = { #Who wins?
	id = wittenland_duel.8
	immediate = {log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event wittenland_duel.8"}

	title = wittenland_duel.8.t
	desc = wittenland_duel.8.d
	picture = GFX_event_hornia_and_white_star

	is_triggered_only = yes

	option = { #white star
		name = wittenland_duel.8.a

		trigger = {
			check_variable = {white_star_points_var > volaire_points_var}
			check_variable = {white_star_points_var > honoria_points_var}
		}
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 40
			modifier = {
				factor = 10
				AND = {
					is_historical_focus_on = yes
					has_game_rule = {
						rule = WIT_ai_behavior
						option = DEFAULT
					}
				}
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				OR = {
					has_country_flag = WIT_AI_HONORIA
					has_country_flag = WIT_AI_VOLIAIRE
					has_country_flag = WIT_AI_WULFRIC
					has_game_rule = {
							rule = WIT_ai_behavior
							option = HONORIA
					}
					has_game_rule = {
							rule = WIT_ai_behavior
							option = VOLIAIRE
					}
					has_game_rule = {
						rule = WIT_ai_behavior
						option = WULFRIC
					}
				}
			}
		}
		country_event = wittenland_duel.9
	}
	option = { #the challenger
		name = wittenland_duel.8.b

		trigger = {
			check_variable = {honoria_points_var > volaire_points_var}
			check_variable = {honoria_points_var > white_star_points_var}
		}
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 30
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				OR = {
					AND = {
						is_historical_focus_on = yes
						has_game_rule = {
							rule = WIT_ai_behavior
							option = DEFAULT
						}
					}
					has_country_flag = WIT_AI_HISTORICAL
					has_country_flag = WIT_AI_VOLIAIRE
					has_country_flag = WIT_AI_WULFRIC
					has_game_rule = {
							rule = WIT_ai_behavior
							option = HISTORICAL
					}
					has_game_rule = {
							rule = WIT_ai_behavior
							option = VOLIAIRE
					}
					has_game_rule = {
						rule = WIT_ai_behavior
						option = WULFRIC
					}
				}
			}
		}
		country_event = wittenland_duel.11
	}

	option = { #nobody
		name = wittenland_duel.8.c

		trigger = {
			AND = {
				check_variable = {
					var = volaire_points_var
					value = honoria_points_var
					compare = greater_than_or_equals
				}
				check_variable = {
					var = volaire_points_var
					value = white_star_points_var
					compare = greater_than_or_equals
				}
			}
		}
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 30
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				OR = {
					AND = {
						is_historical_focus_on = yes
						has_game_rule = {
							rule = WIT_ai_behavior
							option = DEFAULT
						}
					}
					has_country_flag = WIT_AI_HISTORICAL
					has_country_flag = WIT_AI_HONORIA
					has_game_rule = {
							rule = WIT_ai_behavior
							option = HISTORICAL
					}
					has_game_rule = {
							rule = WIT_ai_behavior
							option = HONORIA
					}
				}
			}
		}
		country_event = wittenland_duel.13
	}
}

country_event = { #White Star Won 1
	id = wittenland_duel.9
	immediate = {log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event wittenland_duel.9"}

	title = wittenland_duel.9.t
	desc = wittenland_duel.9.d
	picture = GFX_event_palace_hall

	is_triggered_only = yes

	option = {
		name = wittenland_duel.9.a
		country_event = wittenland_duel.10
	}

}

country_event = { #White Star Won 2
	id = wittenland_duel.10
	immediate = {log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event wittenland_duel.10"}

	title = wittenland_duel.10.t
	desc = wittenland_duel.10.d
	picture = GFX_event_medieval_city_winter

	is_triggered_only = yes

	option = {
		name = wittenland_duel.10.a
		add_popularity = {
			ideology = democratic
			popularity = 0.05
		}
		every_country = { limit = { is_riverlands_country = yes } news_event = { id =  wittenland.32 hours = 6 } }
		set_country_flag = WIT_White_Stat_Won_Flag
		hidden_effect = {
			country_event = {
				id = wittenland.35
				days = 15
			}
			country_event = {
				id = wittenland.72
				days = 364
			}
		}
	}
}

country_event = { #Honoria Won 1
	id = wittenland_duel.11
	immediate = {log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event wittenland_duel.11"}

	title = wittenland_duel.11.t
	desc = wittenland_duel.11.d
	picture = GFX_event_palace_hall

	is_triggered_only = yes

	option = {
		name = wittenland_duel.11.a
		country_event = wittenland_duel.12
		WIT_white_star = {
			retire = yes
		}
		set_politics = {
			ruling_party = neutrality
		}
	}
}

country_event = { #Honoria Won 2
	id = wittenland_duel.12
	immediate = {log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event wittenland_duel.12"}
	title = wittenland_duel.12.t
	desc = wittenland_duel.12.d
	picture = GFX_event_medieval_city_winter

	is_triggered_only = yes

	option = {
		name = wittenland_duel.12.a
		WIT_wulfric_grey = {
			retire = yes
		}
		set_politics = {
			ruling_party = fascism
		}
		add_stability = -0.1
		add_popularity = {
			ideology = fascism
			popularity = 0.1
		}
		every_country = { limit = { is_riverlands_country = yes } news_event = { id =  wittenland.30 hours = 6 } }
		set_country_flag = WIT_Challenger_Won_Flag
		set_country_flag = blocked_coalition_focuses_flag
		load_focus_tree = {
			tree = WIT_focus_tree_honoria
			keep_completed = yes
		}
		hidden_effect = {
			country_event = {
				id = wittenland.34
				days = 15
			}
			country_event = {
				id = wittenland.37
				days = 364
			}
		}
	}
}

country_event = { #Volaire 'Won' 1
	id = wittenland_duel.13
	immediate = {log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event wittenland_duel.13"}
	title = wittenland_duel.13.t
	desc = wittenland_duel.13.d
	picture = GFX_event_medieval_city_winter

	is_triggered_only = yes

	option = {
		name = wittenland_duel.13.a
		WIT_white_star = {
			retire = yes
		}
		WIT_honoria_goldmane = {
			retire = yes
		}
		hidden_effect = {
			add_country_leader_role = {
				character = WIT_forlorn_hope
				promote_leader = yes

				country_leader = {
					expire = "1965.1.1"
					ideology = nazism
					traits = { }
				}
			}
		}
		set_politics = {
			ruling_party = neutrality
		}
		every_country = { limit = { is_riverlands_country = yes } news_event = { id =  wittenland.31 hours = 6 } }
		set_country_flag = WIT_Wulfric_Won_Flag
		set_country_flag = blocked_coalition_focuses_flag
		load_focus_tree = {
			tree = WIT_focus_tree_wulfric
			keep_completed = yes
		}
		country_event = wittenland_duel.14
	}
}

country_event = { #Volaire 'Won' 2
	id = wittenland_duel.14
	immediate = {log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event wittenland_duel.14"}
	title = wittenland_duel.14.t
	desc = wittenland_duel.14.d
	picture = GFX_event_medieval_city_in_mountains

	is_triggered_only = yes

	option = {
		name = wittenland_duel.14.a
		add_stability = -0.1
		add_popularity = {
			ideology = communism
			popularity = 0.1
		}
		hidden_effect = {
			country_event = {
				id = wittenland.36
				days = 15
			}
		}
	}
}

#### Post-duel events

country_event = { #White star's funeral - Honoria
	id = wittenland.34
	immediate = {log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event wittenland.34"}

	title = wittenland.34.t
	desc = wittenland.34.d
	picture = GFX_event_camelot

	is_triggered_only = yes

	option = {
		name = wittenland.34.a
		add_popularity = {
			ideology = democratic
			popularity = 0.05
		}
	}
}

		name = wittenland.35.a

	}

country_event = { #White Star's funeral - Wulfric
	id = wittenland.36
	immediate = {log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event wittenland.36"}

	title = wittenland.36.t
	desc = wittenland.36.d
	picture = GFX_event_camelot

	is_triggered_only = yes

	option = {
		name = wittenland.36.a
		add_popularity = {
			ideology = neutrality
			popularity = -0.05
		}
		add_popularity = {
			ideology = democratic
			popularity = 0.05
		}
	}
}
country_event = { #Voliare challenges Honoria
	id = wittenland.37
	immediate = {log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event wittenland.37"}

	title = wittenland.37.t
	desc = wittenland.37.d
	picture = GFX_event_palace_hall

	is_triggered_only = yes

	option = {
		name = wittenland.37.a
		country_event = wittenland.38
	}
}
country_event = { #Voliare challenges Honoria pt2
	id = wittenland.38
	immediate = {log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event wittenland.38"}

	title = wittenland.38.t
	desc = wittenland.38.d
	picture = GFX_event_palace_hall

	is_triggered_only = yes

	option = {
		name = wittenland.38.a
		add_political_power = 50
		WIT_voliare_gingerbeard = {
			retire = yes
		}
		hidden_effect = {
			add_country_leader_role = {
				character = WIT_violet_plough
				promote_leader = yes

				country_leader = {
					desc = "POLITICS_VIOLENT_DESC"
					expire = "1965.1.1"
					ideology = marxism
					traits = { }
				}
			}
			country_event = {
				id = wittenland.86
				days = 364
			}
		}
		ai_chance = {
			base = 1
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = wittenland.38.b
		trigger = {
			NOT = {
				is_subject = yes
			}
		}
		add_political_power = -150
		country_event = wittenland.39
		ai_chance = {
			base = 0
		}
	}
}
country_event = { #Voliare's short reign as king
	id = wittenland.39
	immediate = {log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event wittenland.39"}

	title = wittenland.39.t
	desc = wittenland.39.d
	picture = GFX_event_palace_hall

	is_triggered_only = yes

	option = {
		name = wittenland.39.a
		every_country = { limit = { is_riverlands_country = yes } news_event = { id =  wittenland.40 hours = 6 } }
		set_politics = {
			ruling_party = communism
		}
		clr_country_flag = WIT_Challenger_Won_Flag
		clr_country_flag = blocked_coalition_focuses_flag
		set_country_flag = have_regular_puppets
		drop_cosmetic_tag = yes
		if = {
			limit = {
				is_river_fed_member = yes
			}
			set_cosmetic_tag = WIT_republic_tag_RIV
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = {
				is_in_faction = yes
			}
			leave_faction = yes
			set_cosmetic_tag = WIT_republic_tag
		}
		else = {
			set_cosmetic_tag = WIT_republic_tag
		}
		set_country_flag = WIT_Communists_Won_Flag
		load_focus_tree = {
			tree = WIT_focus_tree_volaire
			keep_completed = yes
		}
	}
}
news_event = { #Voliare is victorious
	id = wittenland.40
	immediate = {log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event wittenland.40"}
	title = wittenland.40.t
	desc = {
        text = wittenland.40.d_wulfric_peace_com
        trigger = {
			WIT = {
				has_country_flag = WIT_wulfric_peaceful_commie
			}
		}
    }
	desc = {
        text = wittenland.40.d_wulfric_conflict_com
        trigger = {
			WIT = {
				has_country_flag = WIT_wulfric_conflict_commie
			}
		}
    }
	desc = {
        text = wittenland.40.d_honoria_com
        trigger = {
			WIT = {
				NOT = {
					has_country_flag = WIT_wulfric_peaceful_commie
					has_country_flag = WIT_wulfric_conflict_commie
				}
			}
		}
    }

	picture = GFX_crystal_city_news

	is_triggered_only = yes

	option = { #response for river feds
		name = wittenland.40.a
		trigger = {
			NOT = {
				original_tag = WIT
			}
		}
	}
	option = { #response for WIT
		name = wittenland.40.b
		trigger = {
			original_tag = WIT
		}
	}
}
country_event = { #WIT requests Barrad states
	id = wittenland.41
	immediate = {log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event wittenland.41"}
	title = wittenland.41.t
	desc = wittenland.41.d

	picture = GFX_event_medieval_tower

	is_triggered_only = yes

	option = { #Ok here you go
		name = wittenland.41.a
		add_political_power = -50
		if = {
			limit = {
				owns_state = 624
			}
			FROM = {
				transfer_state = 624
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				owns_state = 625
			}
			FROM = {
				transfer_state = 625
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				owns_state = 626
			}
			FROM = {
				transfer_state = 626
			}
		}
		FROM = {
			country_event = {
				id = wittenland.42
				days = 1
			}
		}
		ai_chance = {
			base = 10
			modifier = {
				original_tag = ZES
				factor = 0
			}
		}
	}
	option = { #No
		name = wittenland.41.b
		FROM = {
			country_event = {
				id = wittenland.43
				days = 1
			}
		}
		ai_chance = {
			base = 0
			modifier = {
				OR = {
					original_tag = ZES
					NOT = {
						has_government = democratic
					}
				}
				add = 20
			}
		}
	}
}

country_event = { #They say nay
	id = wittenland.43
	immediate = {log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event wittenland.43"}

	title = wittenland.43.t
	desc = wittenland.43.d
	picture = GFX_event_medieval_tower

	is_triggered_only = yes

	option = { #Fine i guess they can have it
		trigger = {
			has_government = democratic
		}
		name = wittenland.43.a
		add_political_power = -50
		add_stability = -0.1
		set_country_flag = WIT_barrad_abandoned
		ai_chance = {
			base = 0
			modifier = {
				add = 1
				FROM = {
					has_government = democratic
				}
			}
		}
	}
	option = { #Offer payment
		name = wittenland.43.b
		trigger = {
			NOT = {
				WIT_wulfric_grey = { is_country_leader = yes }
			}
		}
		FROM = {
			country_event = {
				id = wittenland.44
				days = 1
			}
		}
		ai_chance = {
			base = 1
		}
	}
	option = { #Murder them
		name = wittenland.43.c
		trigger = {
			WIT_wulfric_grey = { is_country_leader = yes }
		}
		create_wargoal = {
			type = annex_everything
			target = FROM
		}
		ai_chance = {
			base = 1
		}
	}
}

	id = wittenland.44
	immediate = {log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event wittenland.44"}

	desc = wittenland.44.d

	picture = GFX_event_medieval_tower

	is_triggered_only = yes

	option = { #Ok here you go
		name = wittenland.44.a
		add_timed_idea = { idea = WIT_payment_for_land  days = 365 }
		add_political_power = 25
		if = {
			limit = {
				owns_state = 624
			}
			FROM = {
				transfer_state = 624
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				owns_state = 625
			}
			FROM = {
				transfer_state = 625
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				owns_state = 626
			}
			FROM = {
				transfer_state = 626
			}
		}
		FROM = {
			country_event = wittenland.45
		}
		ai_chance = {
			base = 10
		}
	}
	option = { #No
		name = wittenland.44.b
		add_stability = -0.05
		FROM = {
			country_event = wittenland.46
		}
		ai_chance = {
			base = 0
			modifier = {
				OR = {
					has_government = fascism
					has_government = communism
				}
				add = 20
			}
		}
	}
}

				}

				FROM = {
					is_subject_of = ROOT
				}
			}
		}

country_event = { #Referendum
	id = wittenland.50
	immediate = {log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event wittenland.50"}

	title = wittenland.50.t
	desc = wittenland.50.d
	picture = GFX_event_medieval_city_in_mountains

	is_triggered_only = yes

	option = { #Very well
		name = wittenland.50.a
		custom_effect_tooltip = WIT_RCT_referendum_tooltip
		random_list = {
			50 = {
				country_event = {
					id = wittenland.51
					days = 7
				}
				FROM = {
					country_event = {
						id = wittenland.51
						days = 7
					}
				}
				modifier = {
					factor = 1.5
					has_completed_focus = RCT_urbanise_coltstream
				}
				modifier = {
					factor = 1.25
					has_completed_focus = RCT_industry_all_in_one
				}
				modifier = {
					factor = 1.5
					has_completed_focus = RCT_industry_alumimum_work
				}
				modifier = {
					factor = 1.25
					682 = {
						arms_factory > 1
					}
				}
				modifier = {
					factor = 1.5
					682 = {
						industrial_complex > 3
					}
				}
				modifier = {
					factor = 1.5
					682 = {
						infrastructure > 2
					}
				}
			}
			50 = {
				country_event = {
					id = wittenland.52
					days = 7
				}
				FROM = {
					country_event = {
						id = wittenland.52
						days = 7
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}
}

country_event = { #Fate of Barrad
	id = wittenland.61
	immediate = {log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event wittenland.61"}
	title = wittenland.61.t
	desc = {
        text = wittenland.61.d_normal
        trigger = {
			NOT = {
				BAR = {
					has_country_flag = BAR_everyone_ded
				}
			}
		}
    }
	desc = {
        text = wittenland.61.d_everyone_ded
       trigger = {
			BAR = {
				has_country_flag = BAR_everyone_ded
			}
		}
    }

	picture = GFX_event_magehold
	is_triggered_only = yes

	option = {
		name = wittenland.61.a
		trigger = {
			NOT = {
				BAR = {
					has_country_flag = BAR_everyone_ded
				}
			}
		}
		add_stability = -0.1
		add_political_power = -100
		624 = {
			remove_core_of = BAR
			add_core_of = WIT
		}
		625 = {
			remove_core_of = BAR
			add_core_of = WIT
		}
		626 = {
			remove_core_of = BAR
			add_core_of = WIT
		}
		set_province_name = {
			id = 9946
			name = BAR_dunburh
		}
		set_province_name = {
			id = 4557
			name = BAR_beorgham
		}
		set_province_name = {
			id = 4910
			name = BAR_axford
		}
		set_province_name = {
			id = 4516
			name = BAR_grenbridge
		}
		unlock_decision_tooltip = WIT_cleanse_barrad
		set_country_flag = WIT_unlock_barrad_cleansing
	}
	option = {
		name = wittenland.61.b
		trigger = {
			NOT = {
				BAR = {
					has_country_flag = BAR_everyone_ded
				}
			}
		}
		add_stability = -0.05
		add_political_power = -50
		save_current_manpower = yes
		625 = {
			add_manpower = -75000
			remove_core_of = BAR
			set_state_category = pastoral
			remove_building = {
				type = arms_factory
				level = 2
			}
			remove_building = {
				type = industrial_complex
				level = 2
			}
		}
		626 = {
			add_manpower = -150000
			remove_core_of = BAR
			set_state_category = pastoral
			remove_building = {
				type = arms_factory
				level = 2
			}
			remove_building = {
				type = industrial_complex
				level = 2
			}
		}
		624 = {
			add_manpower = -250000
			remove_core_of = BAR
			set_state_category = pastoral
			remove_building = {
				type = arms_factory
				level = 2
			}
			remove_building = {
				type = industrial_complex
				level = 2
			}
		}
		restore_previous_manpower = yes
		set_victory_points = {
			province = 9946
			value = 0
		}
		set_victory_points = {
			province = 4557
			value = 0
		}
		set_victory_points = {
			province = 4910
			value = 0
		}
		set_victory_points = {
			province = 4516
			value = 0
		}
		set_victory_points = {
			province = 12307
			value = 0
		}
		627 = {
			add_extra_state_shared_building_slots = 2
			add_building_construction = {
				type = arms_factory
				level = 2
				instant_build = yes
			}
		}
		629 = {
			add_extra_state_shared_building_slots = 2
			add_building_construction = {
				type = industrial_complex
				level = 2
				instant_build = yes
			}
		}
		set_temp_variable = { transfer_pop = 475000 }
		divide_temp_variable = { transfer_pop = num_owned_controlled_states }
		every_owned_state = {
			limit = { is_controlled_by = ROOT }
			add_manpower = var:transfer_pop
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = wittenland.61.c
		trigger = {
			BAR = {
				has_country_flag = BAR_everyone_ded
			}
		}
		624 = {
			remove_core_of = BAR
			set_demilitarized_zone = yes
		}
		625 = {
			remove_core_of = BAR
			set_demilitarized_zone = yes
		}
		626 = {
			remove_core_of = BAR
			set_demilitarized_zone = yes
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = wittenland.61.e
		trigger = {
			has_government = fascism
			is_subject = no
			BAR = {
				NOT = {
					has_country_flag = BAR_everyone_ded
				}
				BAR_angry_mob = {
					is_country_leader = no
				}
			}
		}
		add_political_power = -50
		if = {
			limit = { NOT = { country_exists = BAR } }
			release_puppet = BAR
		}
		set_autonomy = {
			target = BAR
			autonomy_state = autonomy_reichsprotectorate
		}
		add_ideas = NIM_BAR_cooperation
		hidden_effect = {
			BAR = {
				load_focus_tree = generic_griffon_focus
			}
		}
	}
}

country_event = { #Hostage crisis
	id = wittenland.93
	immediate = {
		log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event wittenland.93"
		set_country_flag = WIT_insurgency_active
	}
	title = wittenland.93.t
	desc = wittenland.93.d

	picture = GFX_event_medieval_city_winter
	is_triggered_only = yes

	option = {
		name = wittenland.93.a
		add_stability = -0.15
		add_political_power = -300
		set_country_flag = WIT_wulfric_peaceful_commie
		clr_country_flag = WIT_insurgency_active
		every_country = { limit = { is_riverlands_country = yes } news_event = { id =  wittenland.40 hours = 6 } }
		set_politics = {
			ruling_party = communism
		}
		clr_country_flag = WIT_Wulfric_Won_Flag
		clr_country_flag = blocked_coalition_focuses_flag
		set_country_flag = have_regular_puppets
		drop_cosmetic_tag = yes
		if = {
			limit = {
				is_river_fed_member = yes
			}
			set_cosmetic_tag = WIT_republic_tag_RIV
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = {
				is_in_faction = yes
			}
			leave_faction = yes
			set_cosmetic_tag = WIT_republic_tag
		}
		else = {
			set_cosmetic_tag = WIT_republic_tag
		}
		set_country_flag = WIT_Communists_Won_Flag
		load_focus_tree = {
			tree = WIT_focus_tree_volaire
			keep_completed = yes
		}
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 1
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				OR = {
					has_country_flag = WIT_AI_WULFRIC
					has_game_rule = {
						rule = WIT_ai_behavior
						option = WULFRIC
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = wittenland.93.b
		country_event = wittenland.94
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 4
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				OR = {
					has_country_flag = WIT_AI_VOLIAIRE
					has_game_rule = {
						rule = WIT_ai_behavior
						option = VOLIAIRE
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}
}

	is_triggered_only = yes

		add_stability = 0.025
		add_manpower = -2500
		add_popularity = {
			ideology = neutrality
			popularity = 0.025
		}
		616 = {
			set_demilitarized_zone = no
			clr_state_flag = WIT_rebel_state
			damage_building = {
				type = infrastructure
				damage = 1
			}
		}
		set_country_flag = WIT_insurgency_north_win
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 1
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = wittenland.95.b
		add_stability = -0.05
		add_manpower = -5000
		add_popularity = {
			ideology = communism
			popularity = 0.025
		}
		add_popularity = {
			ideology = democratic
			popularity = 0.025
		}
		615 = {
			set_demilitarized_zone = yes
			set_state_flag = WIT_rebel_state
		}
		set_country_flag = WIT_insurgency_north_lose
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 1
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				OR = {
					has_country_flag = WIT_AI_WULFRIC
					has_game_rule = {
						rule = WIT_ai_behavior
						option = WULFRIC
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}
}

	title = wittenland.96.t
	desc = wittenland.96.d

	picture = GFX_event_pony_trench
	is_triggered_only = yes

	option = {
		name = wittenland.96.a
		add_stability = 0.025
		add_manpower = -2500
		add_popularity = {
			ideology = neutrality
			popularity = 0.025
		}
		614 = {
			set_demilitarized_zone = no
			clr_state_flag = WIT_rebel_state
			damage_building = {
				type = infrastructure
				damage = 1
			}
			damage_building = {
				type = bunker
				damage = 1
			}
		}
		set_country_flag = WIT_insurgency_north_over
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_country_flag = WIT_insurgency_south_over
			}
			country_event = {
				id = wittenland.102
				days = 1
			}
		}
	}
}

country_event = { #"Communists" win!
	id = wittenland.101
	immediate = {log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event wittenland.101"}
	title = wittenland.101.t
	desc = wittenland.101.d

	picture = GFX_event_medieval_city_3
	is_triggered_only = yes

	option = {
		name = wittenland.101.a
		add_popularity = {
			ideology = communism
			popularity = 0.025
		}
		add_popularity = {
			ideology = democratic
			popularity = 0.025
		}
		add_stability = 0.15
		add_political_power = 100
		set_country_flag = WIT_wulfric_conflict_commie
		every_country = { limit = { is_riverlands_country = yes } news_event = { id =  wittenland.40 hours = 6 } }
		set_politics = {
			ruling_party = communism
		}
		clr_country_flag = WIT_Wulfric_Won_Flag
		clr_country_flag = blocked_coalition_focuses_flag
		set_country_flag = have_regular_puppets
		drop_cosmetic_tag = yes
		if = {
			limit = {
				is_river_fed_member = yes
			}
			set_cosmetic_tag = WIT_republic_tag_RIV
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = {
				is_in_faction = yes
			}
			leave_faction = yes
			set_cosmetic_tag = WIT_republic_tag
		}
		else = {
			set_cosmetic_tag = WIT_republic_tag
		}
		set_country_flag = WIT_Communists_Won_Flag
		clr_country_flag = WIT_insurgency_active
		clr_country_flag = WIT_insurgency_north_lose
		clr_country_flag = WIT_insurgency_north_over
		clr_country_flag = WIT_insurgency_north_win
		clr_country_flag = WIT_insurgency_south_over
		clr_country_flag = WIT_insurgency_south_lose
		clr_country_flag = WIT_insurgency_south_win
		hidden_effect = {
			every_owned_state = {
				set_demilitarized_zone = no
				clr_state_flag = WIT_rebel_state
			}
		}
		load_focus_tree = {
			tree = WIT_focus_tree_volaire
			keep_completed = yes
		}
	}
}

country_event = { #Ponaidhean refuses
	id = wittenland.107
	immediate = {log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event wittenland.107"}
	title = wittenland.107.t
	desc = {
        text = wittenland.107.d_wulfric_FRE_riv
        trigger = {
			is_river_fed_member = yes
		}
    }
	desc = {
        text = wittenland.107.d_wulfric_FRE_no_riv
        trigger = {
			is_river_fed_member = no
		}
    }

	picture = GFX_event_green_mountain
	is_triggered_only = yes

	option = {
		name = wittenland.107.a
		trigger = {
			is_river_fed_member = yes
		}
		set_variable = {
			var = WIT_support_for
			value = 1
		}
		every_other_country = {
			limit = {
				is_river_fed_member = yes
				NOT = {
					tag = FRE
				}
			}
			country_event = wittenland.108
		}
		hidden_effect = {
			country_event = {
				id = wittenland.109
				days = 10
			}
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = wittenland.107.b
		trigger = {
			is_river_fed_member = no
		}
		add_political_power = -50
		add_state_claim = 681
		add_state_claim = 580
		add_state_claim = 621
		add_state_claim = 618
	}
}
country_event = { #River fed members get to decide ponaidhean's fate
	id = wittenland.108
	immediate = {log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event wittenland.108"}
	title = wittenland.108.t
	desc = wittenland.108.d

	picture = GFX_event_green_mountain
	is_triggered_only = yes

	option = {
		name = wittenland.108.a
		FROM = {
			subtract_from_variable = {
				var = WIT_support_for
				value = 1
			}
		}
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 8
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = wittenland.108.b
		FROM = {
			add_to_variable = {
				var = WIT_support_for
				value = 1
			}
		}
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 10
			modifier = {
				factor = 0.2
				OR = {
					has_government = democratic
					has_government = communism
				}
			}
		}
	}
}
country_event = { #Result
	id = wittenland.109
	immediate = {log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event wittenland.109"}
	title = {
        text = wittenland.109.t_river_fed_no_support
        trigger = {
			check_variable = {
				WIT_support_for < 1
			}
		}
    }
	title = {
        text = wittenland.109.t_river_fed_supports
        trigger = {
			check_variable = {
				WIT_support_for > 0
			}
		}
    }
	desc = {
        text = wittenland.109.d_river_fed_no_support
        trigger = {
			check_variable = {
				WIT_support_for < 1
			}
		}
    }
	desc = {
        text = wittenland.109.d_river_fed_supports
        trigger = {
			check_variable = {
				WIT_support_for > 0
			}
		}
    }

	picture = GFX_event_river_coalition_summit
	is_triggered_only = yes

	option = {
		name = wittenland.109.a
		trigger = {
			check_variable = {
				WIT_support_for < 1
			}
		}
		add_political_power = -50
		if = {
			limit = { is_river_fed_member = yes }
			RIV_leave_fed = yes
		}
		add_state_claim = 681
		add_state_claim = 580
		add_state_claim = 621
		add_state_claim = 618
	}
	option = {
		name = wittenland.109.b
		trigger = {
			check_variable = {
				WIT_support_for > 0
			}
		}
		add_political_power = 50
		effect_tooltip = {
			ROOT = { puppet = FRE }
		}
		FRE = {
			country_event = wittenland.111
		}
	}
}

	id = wittenland.114
	immediate = {log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event wittenland.114"}
	title = wittenland.114.t
	desc = wittenland.114.d

	picture = GFX_event_viking_harbour
	is_triggered_only = yes

	option = {
		name = wittenland.114.a
		create_wargoal = {
			type = annex_everything
			target = OLV
		}
	}
}

country_event = { #High kingdom restored
	id = wittenland.117
	immediate = {log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event wittenland.117"}
	title = wittenland.117.t
	desc = wittenland.117.d

	picture = GFX_event_medieval_city_3
	is_triggered_only = yes

	option = {
		name = wittenland.117.a
		add_political_power = 100
		add_stability = 0.1
		add_war_support = 0.1
		ZES = { add_to_ROOT_potential_cores = yes }
		OLV = { add_to_ROOT_potential_cores = yes }
		FRE = { add_to_ROOT_potential_cores = yes }
		add_state_claim = 646
		add_state_claim = 620
		add_state_claim = 619
		add_state_claim = 577
		drop_cosmetic_tag = yes
		clr_country_flag = have_regular_puppets
		set_country_flag = WIT_high_kingdom_tag
		set_cosmetic_tag = WIT_high_kingdom_tag
		if = {
			limit = {
				ZES = {
					is_subject_of = ROOT
				}
			}
			ZES = {
				country_event = wittenland.146
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				OLV = {
					is_subject_of = ROOT
				}
			}
			OLV = {
				country_event = wittenland.146
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				FRE = {
					is_subject_of = ROOT
				}
			}
			FRE = {
				country_event = wittenland.146
			}
		}
	}
}

		WIT_wulfric_grey = {
			retire = yes
		}
		add_country_leader_role = {
			character = WIT_spirit_fire
			promote_leader = yes

			country_leader = {
				expire = "1965.1.1"
				ideology = oligarchism
				traits = { deranged }
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				NOT = {
					has_completed_focus = WIT_proving_day
				}
			}
			add_corps_commander_role = {
				character = WIT_spirit_fire

				traits = { pony_race_trait trait_mountaineer trait_unpredictable }
				skill = 2
				attack_skill = 2
				defense_skill = 1
				planning_skill = 2
				logistics_skill = 2
			} custom_effect_tooltip = spirit_fire_stats_tp
		}
	}
}
country_event = { #Foundations of a republic
	id = wittenland.119
	immediate = {log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event wittenland.119"}
	title = wittenland.119.t
	desc = wittenland.119.d

	picture = GFX_event_medieval_city_3
	is_triggered_only = yes

	option = {
		name = wittenland.119.a
		add_political_power = 50
		add_stability = 0.1
		set_party_name = {
			ideology = neutrality
			long_name = WIT_neutrality_party_parliament_long
			name = WIT_neutrality_party_parliament
		}
		set_party_name = {
			ideology = democratic
			long_name = WIT_democratic_party_parliament_long
			name = WIT_democratic_party_parliament
		}
		set_party_name = {
			ideology = communism
			long_name = WIT_communism_party_parliament_long
			name = WIT_communism_party_parliament
		}
		set_party_name = {
			ideology = fascism
			long_name = WIT_fascism_party_parliament_long
			name = WIT_fascism_party_parliament
		}
		hidden_effect = {
			#Just to make sure they're leaders
			add_country_leader_role = {
				character = WIT_sigeweard_spellshield
				promote_leader = yes

				country_leader = {
					desc = "POLITICS_SIGEWEARD_DESC"
					expire = "1965.1.1"
					ideology = liberalism
					traits = { FBK_anti_extremist }
				}
			}
			add_country_leader_role = {
				character = WIT_eadberhta_featherwing
				promote_leader = yes

				country_leader = {
					desc = "POLITICS_EADBERHT_DESC"
					expire = "1965.1.1"
					ideology = libertarianism
					traits = { smooth_talking_charmer }
				}
			}
		}
		set_popularities = {
			democratic = 32
			neutrality = 30
			fascism = 10
			communism = 28
		}
	}
}
country_event = { #Fate of nobility
	id = wittenland.120
	immediate = {log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event wittenland.120"}
	title = wittenland.120.t
	desc = wittenland.120.d

	picture = GFX_event_camelot
	is_triggered_only = yes

	option = {
		name = wittenland.120.a
		save_current_manpower = yes
		every_owned_state = {
			add_manpower = -500
		}
		restore_previous_manpower = yes
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_idea = WIT_unicorn_parties
			}
			swap_ideas = {
				add_idea = WIT_abolished_nobility
				remove_idea = WIT_unicorn_parties
			}
		}
		else = {
			add_ideas = WIT_abolished_nobility
		}

		add_popularity = {
			ideology = communism
			popularity = 0.05
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = wittenland.120.b
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_idea = WIT_unicorn_parties
			}
			swap_ideas = {
				add_idea = WIT_integrated_nobility
				remove_idea = WIT_unicorn_parties
			}
		}
		else = {
			add_ideas = WIT_integrated_nobility
		}
		add_popularity = {
			ideology = democratic
			popularity = 0.05
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = wittenland.120.c
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_idea = WIT_unicorn_parties
			}
			swap_ideas = {
				add_idea = WIT_equal_nobility
				remove_idea = WIT_unicorn_parties
			}
		}
		else = {
			add_ideas = WIT_equal_nobility
		}
		add_popularity = {
			ideology = neutrality
			popularity = 0.05
		}
	}
}

country_event = { #Elections
	id = wittenland.126
	immediate = {log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event wittenland.126"}
	title = wittenland.126.t
	desc = wittenland.126.d

	picture = GFX_event_vote_pony
	is_triggered_only = yes

	option = {
		name = wittenland.126.a
		trigger = {
			check_variable = { party_popularity@communism >  party_popularity@democratic }
			check_variable = { party_popularity@communism >  party_popularity@neutrality }
		}
		hidden_effect = {
			if = {
				limit = {
					NOT = {
						has_country_flag = river_federation_founder
					}
				}
				drop_cosmetic_tag = yes
				if = {
					limit = {
						is_in_faction_with = RIV
					}
					set_cosmetic_tag = RIV_federation_mem
				}
			}
		}
		add_country_leader_role = {
			character = WIT_violet_plough
			promote_leader = yes

			country_leader = {
				desc = "POLITICS_VIOLENT_DESC"
				expire = "1965.1.1"
				ideology = marxism
				traits = { }
			}
		}
		add_political_power = 50
	}
	option = {
		name = wittenland.126.b
		trigger = {
			check_variable = { party_popularity@democratic >  party_popularity@communism }
			check_variable = { party_popularity@democratic >  party_popularity@neutrality }
		}
		set_politics = {
			ruling_party = democratic
			election_frequency = 48
			elections_allowed = yes
		}
		hidden_effect = {
			add_country_leader_role = {
				character = WIT_violet_plough
				promote_leader = yes

				country_leader = {
					desc = "POLITICS_VIOLENT_DESC"
					expire = "1965.1.1"
					ideology = marxism
					traits = { }
				}
			}
			country_event = {
				id = wittenland.127
				days = 1
			}
		}
		add_political_power = 50
	}
	option = {
		name = wittenland.126.c
		trigger = {
			check_variable = { party_popularity@neutrality >  party_popularity@democratic }
			check_variable = { party_popularity@neutrality >  party_popularity@communism }
		}
		set_politics = {
			ruling_party = neutrality
			election_frequency = 48
			elections_allowed = yes
		}
		hidden_effect = {
			add_country_leader_role = {
				character = WIT_violet_plough
				promote_leader = yes

				country_leader = {
					desc = "POLITICS_VIOLENT_DESC"
					expire = "1965.1.1"
					ideology = marxism
					traits = { }
				}
			}
			country_event = {
				id = wittenland.127
				days = 1
			}
		}
		add_political_power = 50
	}
}

country_event = { #lynchings
	id = wittenland.131
	immediate = {log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event wittenland.131"}
	title = wittenland.131.t
	desc = wittenland.131.d

	picture = GFX_event_pony_trench
	is_triggered_only = yes

	option = {
		name = wittenland.131.a
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_idea = WIT_integrated_nobility
			}
			swap_ideas = {
				add_idea = WIT_abolished_nobility
				remove_idea = WIT_integrated_nobility
			}
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = {
				has_idea = WIT_equal_nobility
			}
			swap_ideas = {
				add_idea = WIT_abolished_nobility
				remove_idea = WIT_equal_nobility
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_idea = WIT_deal_with_army
			}
			swap_ideas = {
				add_idea = WIT_peoples_army
				remove_idea = WIT_deal_with_army
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_idea = WIT_state_religion
			}
			swap_ideas = {
				add_idea = WIT_r_atheism
				remove_idea = WIT_state_religion
			}
		}
		WIT_sigeweard_spellshield = {
			remove_unit_leader_role = yes
		}
		save_current_manpower = yes
		every_owned_state = {
			add_manpower = -1000
		}
		restore_previous_manpower = yes
	}
}

	title = wittenland.134.t
	desc = wittenland.134.d

	picture = GFX_event_medieval_city_in_mountains
	is_triggered_only = yes

	option = {
		name = wittenland.134.a
		add_political_power = 75
		add_stability = 0.1
		add_popularity = {
			ideology = communism
			popularity = -0.1
		}
		WIT_violet_plough = {
			retire = yes
		}
		hidden_effect = {
			add_country_leader_role = {
				character = WIT_voliare_gingerbeard
				promote_leader = yes

				country_leader = {
					desc = "POLITICS_VOLIARE_2_DESC"
					expire = "1965.1.1"
					ideology = democratic_socialism
					traits = { democratic_sympathies hero_of_the_revolution }
				}
			}
		}
	}
}

			}

			factor = 8
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = wittenland.135.b
		FROM = {
			add_to_variable = {
				var = WIT_support_for
				value = 1
			}
		}
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 10
		}
	}

country_event = { #Result
	id = wittenland.136
	immediate = {log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event wittenland.136"}
	title = {
        text = wittenland.136.t_river_fed_no_support
        trigger = {
			check_variable = {
				WIT_support_for < 1
			}
		}
    }
	title = {
        text = wittenland.136.t_river_fed_supports
        trigger = {
			check_variable = {
				WIT_support_for > 0
			}
		}
    }
	desc = {
        text = wittenland.136.d_river_fed_no_support
        trigger = {
			check_variable = {
				WIT_support_for < 1
			}
		}
    }
	desc = {
        text = wittenland.136.d_river_fed_supports
        trigger = {
			check_variable = {
				WIT_support_for > 0
			}
		}
    }

	picture = GFX_event_river_coalition_summit
	is_triggered_only = yes

	option = {
		name = wittenland.136.a
		trigger = {
			check_variable = {
				WIT_support_for < 1
			}
		}
		add_political_power = -50
	}
	option = {
		name = wittenland.136.b
		trigger = {
			check_variable = {
				WIT_support_for > 0
			}
		}
		add_political_power = 50
		every_other_country = {
			limit = {
				is_river_fed_member = yes
				OR = {
					has_government = communism
					has_government = fascism
				}
			}
			country_event = wittenland.137
		}
	}
}

	id = wittenland.152
	immediate = {log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event wittenland.152"}
	title = wittenland.152.t
	desc = wittenland.152.d
	picture = GFX_event_palace_hall
	is_triggered_only = yes

	option = {
		name = wittenland.152.a
		BAR = {
		    BAR_silver_star = {
				set_portraits = {
					civilian = {
						large = "gfx/leaders/WIT/bloomer.tga"
						small = "gfx/interface/ideas/Advisors/WIT/WIT_bloomer.tga"
					}
					army = {
						large = "gfx/leaders/WIT/bloomer.tga"
						small = "gfx/interface/ideas/Advisors/WIT/WIT_bloomer.tga"
					}
				}
				if = {
					limit = {
						is_unit_leader = no
					}
					add_corps_commander_role = {
						traits={ armchair_general pony_race_trait }
						skill=3
						attack_skill=1
						defense_skill=1
						planning_skill=5
						logistics_skill=3
					}
				}
				set_nationality = WIT
			}
		}
	}
}
country_event = { #Why the fuck are you still doing this?
	id = wittenland.153
	immediate = {log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event wittenland.153"}
	title = temple.12.t
	desc = temple.12.d
	picture = GFX_event_apartment_club
	trigger = {
		original_tag = ZAI
		is_ai = no
		has_country_flag = ready_for_next_stage_now
	}
	fire_only_once = yes
	mean_time_to_happen = {
		days = 1
	}
	option = {
		name = wittenland.153.a
		if = {
			limit = {
				MIT = {
					exists = yes
				}
			}
			set_country_flag = yes_master_i_was_in_asterion
			hidden_effect = {
				activate_decision = RCT_rivers_of_blood
			}
		}
		else = {
			export_sand = yes
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = wittenland.153.b
		if = {
			limit = {
				BUF = {
					exists = yes
				}
			}
			set_country_flag = a_man_chooses
			hidden_effect = {
				activate_decision = JUN_jungle_of_death
			}
		}
		else = {
			export_sand = yes
		}
	}
	option = {
	name = wittenland.153.c
		if = {
			limit = {
				LMB = {
					exists = yes
				}
			}
			set_country_flag = a_slave_obeys
			hidden_effect = {
				activate_decision = HIP_seas_of_slaughter
			}
		}
		else = {
			export_sand = yes
    }
   }
  }
  add_namespace = great_lakes

news_event = { ### Non-aligned Ugabi conquers Great Lakes
	id = great_lakes.2
	immediate = {log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event great_lakes.2"}
    title = great_lakes.2.t
    desc = great_lakes.2.d

    picture = GFX_news_ponies_advance
	###Placeholder image
	is_triggered_only = yes
	major = yes

	option = {
		name = great_lakes.2.a
		trigger = {
			original_tag = ZUG
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = great_lakes.2.b
		trigger = {
			NOT = { original_tag = ZUG }
		}
	}
}
country_event = { #Placeholder event for ALO-TIM war
	id = great_lakes.5
	immediate = {log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event great_lakes.5"}
	title = great_lakes.5.t
	desc = great_lakes.5.d
	#picture =
	fire_only_once = yes
	is_triggered_only = yes

	option = {
		name = great_lakes.5.a
		hidden_effect = {
			create_wargoal = {
				type = annex_everything
				target = TIM
			}
		}
		declare_war_on = { type = annex_everything target = TIM }
		TIM = {
			add_to_ROOT_potential_cores = yes
			ALO = {
				add_to_PREV_potential_cores = yes
			}
		}
	}
}

###########################
#stability events
###########################

add_namespace = stability



#low stability selector event, hidden
country_event = {
	id = stability.3
	immediate = {log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event stability.3"}
	title = stability.3.t
	desc = stability.3.desc	#
	#picture = GFX_					#

	hidden = yes

	trigger = {
		OR = {
			has_idea = modern_society
			has_outdated_industry = yes
		}
		NOT = {
			has_idea = detached_country
			has_idea = GRF_political_chaos
			has_idea = GRF_doused_flames
		}
		has_war = yes
		OR = {
			has_civil_war = no
			AND = {
				is_eqs_civil_war_tag = yes
				eqs_has_civil_war = no
			}
		}
		is_government_in_exile = no # strikes etc shouldn't affect you if you are not there...
		OR = {
			AND = {
				tag = EQS
				has_war_with = CHN
				OR = {
					has_stability < 0.5
					has_war_support < 0.3
				}
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = {
					tag = EQS
					has_war_with = CHN
				}
				OR = {
					has_stability < 0.5
					has_war_support < 0.5
				}
			}
		}
		NOT = {
			AND = {
				is_major = yes
				all_enemy_country = {
					is_major = no
				}
			}
		}
		NOT = {
			has_country_flag = crisis_in_progress
		}
		NOT = {
			AND = {
				OR = {
					original_tag = JUN
					original_tag = BAL
					original_tag = CES
					original_tag = NMS
				}
				OR = {
					has_war_with = NMS
					has_war_with = CES
					has_war_with = BAL
					has_war_with = NMS
				}
			}
		}
		NOT = { # Don't fire stability events if the country is not mobilising at all
			OR = {
				has_idea = disarmed_nation
				has_idea = volunteer_only
			}
			OR = {
				has_idea = undisturbed_isolation
				has_idea = isolation
				has_idea = civilian_economy
			}
		}
		NOT = {
			has_idea = collectivized_society
		}
		NOT = {
		    has_country_flag = BAT_no_crisises
		}
		NOT = {
			AND = {
				tag = TBK
				OR = {
					has_war_with = BAT
					has_war_with = ZAR
				}
			}
		}
		NOT = {
			has_country_flag = HIP_siren_takeover
		}
	}

	mean_time_to_happen = {
		days = 360
		modifier = {
			factor = 2.0
			has_idea = disarmed_nation
		}
		modifier = {
			factor = 1.5
			has_idea = volunteer_only
		}
		modifier = {
			factor = 2.5
			has_idea = undisturbed_isolation
		}
		modifier = {
			factor = 2.0
			has_idea = isolation
		}
		modifier = {
			factor = 1.5
			has_idea = civilian_economy
		}
		modifier = {
			factor = 2
			NOT = { has_government = democratic }
		}
		modifier = {
			factor = 0.75
			OR = {
				has_stability < 0.4
				has_war_support < 0.4
			}
		}
		modifier = {
			factor = 0.75
			OR = {
				has_stability < 0.2
				has_war_support < 0.2
			}
		}
		modifier = {
			factor = 1.25
			has_tech = tech_kirin_astrology
		}
	}

	immediate = {
		random_list = {
			20 = {
				modifier = {
					factor = 0
					has_country_flag = draft_dodging_resolved
				}
				modifier = {
					factor = 0
					has_idea = disarmed_nation
				}
				modifier = {
					factor = 0
					has_idea = volunteer_only
				}
				modifier = {
					factor = 0.1
					has_war_support > 0.5
				}
				modifier = {
					factor = 0.5
					has_country_flag = eqs_conscription_crisis_recently
				}
				modifier = {
					factor = 0.75
					has_tech = tech_kirin_astrology
				}
				add_ideas = draft_dodging
				country_event = stability.21
				} #draft dodging
			20 = {
				modifier = {
					factor = 0
					has_country_flag = strikes_resolved
				}
				modifier = {
					factor = 0.1
					has_stability > 0.5
				}
				modifier = {
					factor = 0.5
					OR = {
						has_idea = undisturbed_isolation
						has_idea = isolation
						has_idea = civilian_economy
					}
				}
				modifier = {
					factor = 0
					has_country_flag = CTH_strikes_outlawed
				}
				modifier = {
					factor = 0.75
					has_tech = tech_kirin_astrology
				}
				add_ideas = strikes_1
				country_event = stability.22
				} #strikes
			20 = {
				modifier = {
					factor = 0
					has_country_flag = mutiny_resolved
				}
				modifier = {
					factor = 0.1
					has_war_support > 0.5
				}
				modifier = {
					factor = 0.75
					has_tech = tech_kirin_astrology
				}
				add_ideas = mutiny_1
				country_event = stability.23
				} #mutinies
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				NOT = {
					has_country_flag = crisis_in_progress
				}
			}
			set_country_flag = crisis_in_progress
		}
	}

	option = {
		name = stability.3.a
		ai_chance = {

		}

	}

}


#draft dodging
country_event = {
	id = stability.21
	immediate = {log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event stability.21"}
	title = stability.21.t
	desc = {
		text = stability.21.desc.a
		trigger = {
			has_idea = draft_dodging
		}
	}
	desc = {
		text = stability.21.desc.b
		trigger = { has_idea = draft_dodging_2 }
	}
	desc = {
		text = stability.21.desc.c
		trigger = { has_idea = draft_dodging_3 }
	}

	picture = GFX_event_pony_soldiers_sunset

	is_triggered_only = yes

	immediate = {
		if = {
			limit = {
				NOT = { has_country_flag = crisis_in_progress }
			}
			set_country_flag = crisis_in_progress
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_country_flag = crisis_solution_in_progress
			}
			clr_country_flag = crisis_solution_in_progress
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = stability.21.a
		ai_chance = {
			base = 0
		}
	}

	option = { #military crackdown level 1
		trigger = {
			NOT = {
				OR = {
					has_idea = draft_dodging_2
					has_idea = draft_dodging_3
				}
			}
		}
		ai_chance = {
			base = 50
			modifier = {
				has_stability < 0.4
				factor = 0
			}
			modifier = {
				has_political_power > 100
				factor = 0.5
			}
		}
		name = stability.21.d
		add_political_power = -75
		custom_effect_tooltip = 15_days_tt
		set_country_flag = crisis_solution_in_progress
		hidden_effect = {
			if = {
				limit = { tag = EQS }
				modify_country_flag = { flag = celestia_evil_meter value = 2 }
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_stability > 0.3
			}
			random_list = {
				60 = { modifier = { factor = 1.25 has_tech = tech_kirin_astrology } country_event = { id = stability.31 days = 15 } } #success
				40 = { country_event = { id = stability.32 days = 15 } } #failure
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_stability < 0.3
			}
			random_list = {
				60 = { modifier = { factor = 1.25 has_tech = tech_kirin_astrology } country_event = { id = stability.31 days = 15 } } #success
				30 = { country_event = { id = stability.32 days = 15 } } #failure
				#5 = { country_event = { id = stability.33 days = 15 } } #civil war
			}
		}
	}

	option = { #improve living standards
		trigger = {
			NOT = {
				OR = {
					has_idea = draft_dodging_2
					has_idea = draft_dodging_3
				}
			}
		}
		name = stability.21.e
		ai_chance = {
			base = 50
			modifier = {
				has_stability < 0.4
				factor = 2
			}
			modifier = {
				has_political_power > 100
				factor = 2
			}
			modifier = {
				tag = EQS
				has_global_flag = EQS_evil_celestia
				factor = 0
			}
		}
		add_political_power = -120
		custom_effect_tooltip = 30_days_tt
		set_country_flag = crisis_solution_in_progress
		random_list = {
			80 = { modifier = { factor = 1.25 has_tech = tech_kirin_astrology } country_event = { id = stability.34 days = 30 } } #success
			20 = { country_event = { id = stability.21 days = 30 } }

		}
	}

	option = { #military crackdown level 2
		trigger = {
			has_idea = draft_dodging_2
		}
		name = stability.21.f
		ai_chance = {
			base = 50
			modifier = {
				has_stability < 0.4
				factor = 0
			}
			modifier = {
				has_political_power > 100
				factor = 0.5
			}
		}
		add_political_power = -80

				modify_country_flag = { flag = celestia_evil_meter value = 2 }
			}
		}
		if = {

			}
			random_list = {
				60 = { modifier = { factor = 1.25 has_tech = tech_kirin_astrology } country_event = { id = stability.35 days = 15 } } #success
				40 = { country_event = { id = stability.36 days = 15 } } #failure
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_stability < 0.3
			}
			random_list = {
				55 = { modifier = { factor = 1.25 has_tech = tech_kirin_astrology } country_event = { id = stability.35 days = 15 } } #success
				30 = { country_event = { id = stability.36 days = 15 } } #failure
				#10 = { country_event = { id = stability.33 days = 15 } } #civil war
			}

		trigger = {
			has_idea = strikes_1
		}
	}
	desc = {
		text = stability.22.desc.b
		trigger = { has_idea = strikes_2 }
	}
	desc = {
		text = stability.22.desc.c
		trigger = { has_idea = strikes_3 }
		}	#
	picture = GFX_event_democratic_protest					#

	is_triggered_only = yes

	immediate = {
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_country_flag = crisis_solution_in_progress
			}
			clr_country_flag = crisis_solution_in_progress
		}
	}

	option = {
		name = stability.22.a #nothing to be done
		ai_chance = {
			base = 0
		}

			has_idea = strikes_1

#mutinies
country_event = {
	id = stability.23
	immediate = {log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event stability.23"}
	title = stability.23.t
	desc = {
		text = stability.23.desc.a
		trigger = {
			has_idea = mutiny_1
		}
	}
	desc = {
		text = stability.23.desc.b
		trigger = { has_idea = mutiny_2 }
	}
	desc = {
		text = stability.23.desc.c
		trigger = { has_idea = mutiny_3 }
	}
	picture = GFX_event_ponies_in_battle

	is_triggered_only = yes

	immediate = {
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_country_flag = crisis_solution_in_progress
			}
			clr_country_flag = crisis_solution_in_progress
		}
	}

	option = {
		name = stability.23.a #eh
		ai_chance = {
			base = 0
		}
	}

		trigger = {
			has_idea = mutiny_1
		}

			base = 50

				has_stability < 0.4
				factor = 0

			60 = { modifier = { factor = 1.25 has_tech = tech_kirin_astrology } country_event = { id = mutiny_event.4 days = 30 } }#success

			has_idea = mutiny_2
		}
		name = stability.23.e #negotiations - level 2
		custom_effect_tooltip = 45_days_tt
		ai_chance = {
			base = 50
			modifier = {
				has_stability < 0.4
				factor = 2
			}
			modifier = {
				has_political_power > 100
				factor = 2
			}
			modifier = {
				tag = EQS
				has_global_flag = EQS_evil_celestia
				factor = 0
			}
		}
		add_political_power = -135
		set_country_flag = crisis_solution_in_progress
		random_list = {
			80 = { modifier = { factor = 1.25 has_tech = tech_kirin_astrology } country_event = { id = mutiny_event.6 days = 45 } }#success
			20 = { country_event = { id = stability.23 days = 45 } }

		}
	}
	option = {
		trigger = {
			has_idea = mutiny_3
		}
		name = stability.23.f #violence - level 3
		ai_chance = {
			base = 50
			modifier = {
				has_stability < 0.4
				factor = 0
			}
			modifier = {
				has_political_power > 100
				factor = 0.5
			}
		}
		custom_effect_tooltip = 30_days_tt
		set_country_flag = crisis_solution_in_progress
		add_political_power = -85
		hidden_effect = {
			if = {
				limit = { tag = EQS }
				modify_country_flag = { flag = celestia_evil_meter value = 2 }
			}
		}
		random_list = {
			60 = { modifier = { factor = 1.25 has_tech = tech_kirin_astrology } country_event = { id = mutiny_event.7 days = 30 } }#success
			40 = { country_event = { id = mutiny_event.8 days = 30 } }#failure
		}
	}
	option = {
		trigger = {
			has_idea = mutiny_3
		}
		name = stability.23.g #negotiations - level 3
		ai_chance = {
			base = 50
			modifier = {
				has_stability < 0.4
				factor = 2
			}
			modifier = {
				has_political_power > 100
				factor = 2
			}
			modifier = {
				tag = EQS
				has_global_flag = EQS_evil_celestia
				factor = 0
			}
		}
		custom_effect_tooltip = 45_days_tt
		set_country_flag = crisis_solution_in_progress
		add_political_power = -145
		random_list = {
			80 = { modifier = { factor = 1.25 has_tech = tech_kirin_astrology } country_event = { id = mutiny_event.9 days = 45 } }#success
			20 = { country_event = { id = stability.23 days = 45 } }

		}
	}
}


#military crackdown response to draft dodging - success
country_event = {
	id = stability.31
	immediate = {log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event stability.31"}
	title = stability.31.t
	desc = stability.31.desc	#
	picture = GFX_event_griffon_para					#

	is_triggered_only = yes

	option = {
		name = stability.31.a
		remove_ideas =  {
			draft_dodging
			draft_dodging_2
			draft_dodging_3
		}
		clr_country_flag = crisis_in_progress
		clr_country_flag = crisis_solution_in_progress
		set_country_flag = { flag = draft_dodging_resolved days = 90 }
	}

}

#military crackdown response to draft dodging - failure, loss of stability
country_event = {
	id = stability.32
	immediate = {log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event stability.32"}
	title = stability.32.t
	desc = stability.32.desc	#
	picture = GFX_event_griffon_royal_guard					#

	is_triggered_only = yes

	option = {
		name = stability.32.a
		add_stability = -0.05
		add_war_support = -0.05
		clr_country_flag = crisis_solution_in_progress
	}

}

#military crackdown response to draft dodging - failure, civil war
country_event = {
	id = stability.33
	immediate = {log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event stability.33"}
	title = stability.33.t
	desc = stability.33.desc	#
	picture = GFX_event_ponies_in_battle					#

	is_triggered_only = yes

	option = {
		name = stability.33.a
		if = {
			limit = { has_government = democratic }
			start_civil_war = { ideology = communism size = 0.35 }
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				OR = {
					has_government = fascism
					has_government = communism
				}
			}
			start_civil_war = { ideology = democratic size = 0.45 }
		}
		clr_country_flag = crisis_in_progress
		clr_country_flag = crisis_solution_in_progress
		set_country_flag = { flag = draft_dodging_resolved days = 90 }
	}

}
